495namespace io
496{
497
498template<>
499std::string enum_to_string<blood_type>( blood_type data )
500{
501 switch( data ) {
502 // *INDENT-OFF*
503 case blood_type::blood_O: return "O";
504 case blood_type::blood_A: return "A";
505 case blood_type::blood_B: return "B";
506 case blood_type::blood_AB: return "AB";
507 // *INDENT-ON*
508 case blood_type::num_bt:
509 break;
510 }
511 cata_fatal( "Invalid blood_type" )do { realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "511", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid blood_type"); std::abort
(); } while( false );
512}
513
514} // namespace io
515
516void Character::queue_effect( const std::string &name, const time_duration &delay,
517 const time_duration &effect_duration )
518{
519 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> ctx = {
520 { "npctalk_var_effect", name },
521 { "npctalk_var_duration", std::to_string( to_turns<int>( effect_duration ) ) }
522 };
523
524 effect_on_conditions::queue_effect_on_condition( delay, effect_on_condition_add_effect, *this,
525 ctx );
526}
527
528int Character::count_queued_effects( const std::string &effect ) const
529{
530 return std::count_if( queued_effect_on_conditions.list.begin(),
531 queued_effect_on_conditions.list.end(), [&effect]( const queued_eoc & eoc ) {
532 return eoc.eoc == effect_on_condition_add_effect &&
533 eoc.context.at( "npctalk_var_effect" ) == effect;
534 } );
535}
536
537// *INDENT-OFF*
538Character::Character() :
539 id( -1 ),
540 next_climate_control_check( calendar::before_time_starts ),
541 last_climate_control_ret( false )
542{
543 randomize_blood();
544 cached_organic_size = 1.0f;
545 str_cur = 8;
546 str_max = 8;
547 dex_cur = 8;
548 dex_max = 8;
549 int_cur = 8;
550 int_max = 8;
551 per_cur = 8;
552 per_max = 8;
553 set_dodges_left(1);
554 blocks_left = 1;
555 str_bonus = 0;
556 dex_bonus = 0;
557 per_bonus = 0;
558 int_bonus = 0;
559 lifestyle = 0;
560 daily_health = 0;
561 health_tally = 0;
562 hunger = 0;
563 thirst = 0;
564 fatigue = 0;
565 sleep_deprivation = 0;
566 daily_sleep = 0_turns;
567 continuous_sleep = 0_turns;
568 radiation = 0;
569 slow_rad = 0;
570 set_stim( 0 );
571 arms_power_use = 0;
572 legs_power_use = 0;
573 arms_stam_mult = 1.0f;
574 legs_stam_mult = 1.0f;
575 set_stamina( 10000 ); //Temporary value for stamina. It will be reset later from external json option.
576 cardio_acc = 1000; // Temporary cardio accumulator. It will be updated when reset_cardio_acc is called.
577 set_anatomy( anatomy_human_anatomy );
578 update_type_of_scent( true );
579 pkill = 0;
580 // 55 Mcal or 55k kcal
581 healthy_calories = 55'000'000;
582 base_cardio_acc = 1000;
583 // this makes sure characters start with normal bmi
584 stored_calories = healthy_calories - 1'000'000;
585 initialize_stomach_contents();
586
587 name.clear();
588 custom_profession.clear();
589
590 *path_settings = pathfinding_settings{ 0, 1000, 1000, 0, true, true, true, true, false, true };
591
592 move_mode = move_mode_walk;
593 next_expected_position = std::nullopt;
594 invalidate_crafting_inventory();
595
596 set_power_level( 0_kJ );
597 cash = 0;
598 scent = 500;
599 male = true;
600 prof = profession::has_initialized() ? profession::generic() :
601 nullptr; //workaround for a potential structural limitation, see player::create
602 start_location = start_location_sloc_shelter_a;
603 moves = 100;
604 oxygen = 0;
605 in_vehicle = false;
606 controlling_vehicle = false;
607 grab_point = tripoint_zero;
608 hauling = false;
609 set_focus( 100 );
610 last_item = itype_null;
611 sight_max = 9999;
612 last_batch = 0;
613 death_drops = true;
614 nv_cached = false;
615 leak_level = 0.0f;
616 leak_level_dirty = true;
617 volume = 0;
618 set_value( "THIEF_MODE", "THIEF_ASK" );
619 for( const auto &v : vitamin::all() ) {
620 vitamin_levels[ v.first ] = 0;
621 daily_vitamins[v.first] = { 0,0 };
622 }
623 // Only call these if game is initialized
624 if( !!g && json_flag::is_ready() ) {
625 recalc_sight_limits();
626 calc_encumbrance();
627 worn.recalc_ablative_blocking(this);
628 }
629}
630// *INDENT-ON*
631
632Character::~Character() = default;
633Character::Character( Character && ) noexcept( map_is_noexcept ) = default;
634Character &Character::operator=( Character && ) noexcept( list_is_noexcept ) = default;
635
636void Character::setID( character_id i, bool force )
637{
638 if( id.is_valid() && !force ) {
639 debugmsg( "tried to set id of a npc/player, but has already a id: %d", id.get_value() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "639", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "tried to set id of a npc/player, but has already a id: %d"
, id.get_value());
640 } else if( !i.is_valid() && !force ) {
641 debugmsg( "tried to set invalid id of a npc/player: %d", i.get_value() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "641", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "tried to set invalid id of a npc/player: %d"
, i.get_value());
642 } else {
643 id = i;
644 }
645}
646
647character_id Character::getID() const
648{
649 return this->id;
650}
651
652void Character::swap_character( Character &other )
653{
654 npc tmp_npc;
655 Character &tmp = tmp_npc;
656 tmp = std::move( other );
657 other = std::move( *this );
658 *this = std::move( tmp );
659}
660
661void Character::randomize_height()
662{
663 // Height distribution data is taken from CDC distributes statistics for the US population
664 // https://github.com/CleverRaven/Cataclysm-DDA/pull/49270#issuecomment-861339732
665 const int x = std::round( normal_roll( 168.35, 15.50 ) );
666 init_height = clamp( x, Character::min_height(), Character::max_height() );
667}
668
669item_location Character::get_wielded_item() const
670{
671 return const_cast<Character *>( this )->get_wielded_item();
672}
673
674item_location Character::get_wielded_item()
675{
676 if( weapon.is_null() ) {
677 return item_location();
678 }
679 return item_location( *this, &weapon );
680}
681
682void Character::set_wielded_item( const item &to_wield )
683{
684 weapon = to_wield;
685}
686
687std::vector<matype_id> Character::known_styles( bool teachable_only ) const
688{
689 return martial_arts_data->get_known_styles( teachable_only );
690}
691
692bool Character::has_martialart( const matype_id &m ) const
693{
694 return martial_arts_data->has_martialart( m );
695}
696
697int Character::get_oxygen_max() const
698{
699 return 30 + ( has_bionic( bio_synlungs ) ? 30 : 2 * str_cur );
700}
701
702bool Character::can_recover_oxygen() const
703{
704 return get_limb_score( limb_score_breathing ) > 0.5f && !is_underwater() &&
705 !has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) && !( has_bionic( bio_synlungs ) &&
706 !has_active_bionic( bio_synlungs ) );
707}
708
709void Character::randomize_heartrate()
710{
711 // assume starting character is sedentary so we have some room to go down for cardio hr lowering
712 avg_nat_bpm = rng_normal( 70, 90 );
713}
714
715void Character::randomize_blood()
716{
717 // Blood type distribution data is taken from this study on blood types of
718 // COVID-19 patients presented to five major hospitals in Massachusetts:
719 // https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7354354/
720 // and is adjusted for racial/ethnic distribution in game, which is defined in
721 // data/json/npcs/appearance_trait_groups.json
722 static const std::array<std::tuple<double, blood_type, bool>, 8> blood_type_distribution = {{
723 std::make_tuple( 0.3821, blood_type::blood_O, true ),
724 std::make_tuple( 0.0387, blood_type::blood_O, false ),
725 std::make_tuple( 0.3380, blood_type::blood_A, true ),
726 std::make_tuple( 0.0414, blood_type::blood_A, false ),
727 std::make_tuple( 0.1361, blood_type::blood_B, true ),
728 std::make_tuple( 0.0134, blood_type::blood_B, false ),
729 std::make_tuple( 0.0437, blood_type::blood_AB, true ),
730 std::make_tuple( 0.0066, blood_type::blood_AB, false )
731 }
732 };
733 const double x = rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 );
734 double cumulative_prob = 0.0;
735 for( const std::tuple<double, blood_type, bool> &type : blood_type_distribution ) {
736 cumulative_prob += std::get<0>( type );
737 if( x <= cumulative_prob ) {
738 my_blood_type = std::get<1>( type );
739 blood_rh_factor = std::get<2>( type );
740 return;
741 }
742 }
743 my_blood_type = blood_type::blood_AB;
744 blood_rh_factor = false;
745}
746
747field_type_id Character::bloodType() const
748{
749 if( has_flag( json_flag_ACIDBLOOD ) ) {
750 return fd_acid;
751 }
752 if( has_flag( json_flag_PLANTBLOOD ) ) {
753 return fd_blood_veggy;
754 }
755 if( has_flag( json_flag_INSECTBLOOD ) ) {
756 return fd_blood_insect;
757 }
758 if( has_flag( json_flag_INVERTEBRATEBLOOD ) ) {
759 return fd_blood_invertebrate;
760 }
761 return fd_blood;
762}
763field_type_id Character::gibType() const
764{
765 return fd_gibs_flesh;
766}
767
768bool Character::in_species( const species_id &spec ) const
769{
770 return spec == species_HUMAN;
771}
772
773bool Character::is_warm() const
774{
775 // TODO: is there a mutation (plant?) that makes a npc not warm blooded?
776 return true;
777}
778
779const std::string &Character::symbol() const
780{
781 static const std::string character_symbol( "@" );
782 return character_symbol;
783}
784
785void Character::mod_stat( const std::string &stat, float modifier )
786{
787 if( stat == "thirst" ) {
788 mod_thirst( modifier );
789 } else if( stat == "fatigue" ) {
790 mod_fatigue( modifier );
791 } else if( stat == "oxygen" ) {
792 oxygen += modifier;
793 } else if( stat == "stamina" ) {
794 mod_stamina( modifier );
795 } else if( stat == "str" ) {
796 mod_str_bonus( modifier );
797 } else if( stat == "dex" ) {
798 mod_dex_bonus( modifier );
799 } else if( stat == "per" ) {
800 mod_per_bonus( modifier );
801 } else if( stat == "int" ) {
802 mod_int_bonus( modifier );
803 } else if( stat == "healthy" ) {
804 mod_livestyle( modifier );
805 } else if( stat == "hunger" ) {
806 mod_hunger( modifier );
807 } else {
808 Creature::mod_stat( stat, modifier );
809 }
810}
811
812int Character::get_fat_to_hp() const
813{
814 float mut_fat_hp = 0.0f;
815 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
816 mut_fat_hp += mut.obj().fat_to_max_hp;
817 }
818
819 return mut_fat_hp * ( get_bmi_fat() - character_weight_category::normal );
820}
821
822creature_size Character::get_size() const
823{
824 return size_class;
825}
826
827std::string Character::disp_name( bool possessive, bool capitalize_first ) const
828{
829 if( !possessive ) {
830 if( is_avatar() ) {
831 return capitalize_first ? _( "You" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You" ) ) ) : _( "you" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "you" ) ) );
832 }
833 return get_name();
834 } else {
835 if( is_avatar() ) {
836 return capitalize_first ? _( "Your" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your" ) ) ) : _( "your" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "your" ) ) );
837 }
838 return string_format( _( "%s's" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s's" ) ) ), get_name() );
839 }
840}
841
842std::string Character::name_and_maybe_activity() const
843{
844 return disp_name( false, true );
845}
846
847std::string Character::skin_name() const
848{
849 // TODO: Return actual deflecting layer name
850 return _( "armor" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "armor" ) ) );
851}

860 const std::string &/*npc_msg*/ ) const

862 Messages::add_msg( player_msg );
863}

866{
867 Messages::add_msg( params, msg );
868}
869
870void Character::add_msg_player_or_npc( const game_message_params &params,
871 const std::string &player_msg,
872 const std::string &/*npc_msg*/ ) const
873{
874 Messages::add_msg( params, player_msg );
875}
876
877void Character::add_msg_player_or_say( const std::string &player_msg,
878 const std::string &/*npc_speech*/ ) const
879{
880 Messages::add_msg( player_msg );
881}
882
883void Character::add_msg_player_or_say( const game_message_params &params,
884 const std::string &player_msg,
885 const std::string &/*npc_speech*/ ) const
886{
887 Messages::add_msg( params, player_msg );
888}
889
890int Character::effective_dispersion( int dispersion, bool zoom ) const
891{
892 return get_character_parallax( zoom ) + dispersion;
893}
894
895int Character::get_character_parallax( bool zoom ) const
896{
897 /** @EFFECT_PER penalizes sight dispersion when low. */
898 int character_parallax = zoom ? static_cast<int>( ranged_per_mod() * 0.25 ) : ranged_per_mod();
899 character_parallax += get_modifier( character_modifier_ranged_dispersion_vision_mod );
900
901 return std::max( static_cast<int>( std::round( character_parallax ) ), 0 );
902}
903
904static double modified_sight_speed( double aim_speed_modifier, double effective_sight_dispersion,
905 double recoil )
906{
907 if( recoil <= effective_sight_dispersion ) {
908 return 0;
909 }
910 // When recoil tends to effective_sight_dispersion, the aiming speed bonus will tend to 0
911 // When recoil > 3 * effective_sight_dispersion + 1, attenuation_factor = 1
912 // use 3 * effective_sight_dispersion + 1 instead of 3 * effective_sight_dispersion to avoid min=max
913 if( effective_sight_dispersion < 0 ) {
914 return 0;
915 }
916 double attenuation_factor = 1 - logarithmic_range( effective_sight_dispersion,
917 3 * effective_sight_dispersion + 1, recoil );
918
919 return ( 10.0 + aim_speed_modifier ) * attenuation_factor;
920}
921
922int Character::point_shooting_limit( const item &gun )const
923{
924 // This value is not affected by PER, because the accuracy of aim shooting depends more on muscle memory and skill
925 skill_id gun_skill = gun.gun_skill();
926 if( gun_skill == skill_archery ) {
927 return 30 + 220 / ( 1 + std::min( get_skill_level( gun_skill ), static_cast<float>( MAX_SKILL ) ) );
928 } else {
929 return 200 - 10 * std::min( get_skill_level( gun_skill ), static_cast<float>( MAX_SKILL ) );
930 }
931}
932
933aim_mods_cache Character::gen_aim_mods_cache( const item &gun )const
934{
935 parallax_cache parallaxes{ get_character_parallax( true ), get_character_parallax( false ) };
936 return { get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_skill_mod, gun.gun_skill() ), get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_dex_mod ), get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_mod ), most_accurate_aiming_method_limit( gun ), aim_factor_from_volume( gun ), aim_factor_from_length( gun ), parallaxes };
937}
938
939double Character::fastest_aiming_method_speed( const item &gun, double recoil,
940 const Target_attributes &target_attributes,
941 const std::optional<std::reference_wrapper<const parallax_cache>> parallax_cache ) const
942{
943 // Get fastest aiming method that can be used to improve aim further below @ref recoil.
944
945 skill_id gun_skill = gun.gun_skill();
946 // aim with instinct (point shooting)
947
948 // When it is a negative number, the effect of reducing the aiming speed is very significant.
949 // When it is a positive number, a large value is needed to significantly increase the aiming speed
950 double point_shooting_speed_modifier = 0;
951 if( gun_skill == skill_pistol ) {
952 point_shooting_speed_modifier = 10 + 4 * get_skill_level( gun_skill );
953 } else {
954 point_shooting_speed_modifier = get_skill_level( gun_skill );
955 }
956
957 double aim_speed_modifier = modified_sight_speed( point_shooting_speed_modifier,
958 point_shooting_limit( gun ), recoil );
959 // aim with iron sight
960 if( !gun.has_flag( flag_DISABLE_SIGHTS ) ) {
961 const int iron_sight_FOV = 480;
962 int effective_iron_sight_dispersion = effective_dispersion( gun.type->gun->sight_dispersion );
963 double iron_sight_speed = modified_sight_speed( 0, effective_iron_sight_dispersion, recoil );
964 if( effective_iron_sight_dispersion < recoil && iron_sight_speed > aim_speed_modifier &&
965 recoil <= iron_sight_FOV ) {
966 aim_speed_modifier = iron_sight_speed;
967 }
968 }
969
970 // aim with other sights
971
972 // to check whether laser sights are available
973 const int base_distance = 10;
974 const float light_limit = 120.0f;
975 bool laser_light_available = target_attributes.range <= ( base_distance + per_cur ) * std::max(
976 1.0f - target_attributes.light / light_limit, 0.0f ) && target_attributes.visible;
977 // There are only two kinds of parallaxes, one with zoom and one without. So cache them.
978 std::vector<std::optional<int>> parallaxes;
979 parallaxes.resize( 2 );
980 if( parallax_cache.has_value() ) {
981 parallaxes[0].emplace( parallax_cache.value().get().parallax_without_zoom );
982 parallaxes[1].emplace( parallax_cache.value().get().parallax_with_zoom );
983 }
984 for( const item *e : gun.gunmods() ) {
985 const islot_gunmod &mod = *e->type->gunmod;
986 if( mod.sight_dispersion < 0 || mod.field_of_view <= 0 ) {
987 continue; // skip gunmods which don't provide a sight
988 }
989 if( e->has_flag( flag_LASER_SIGHT ) && !laser_light_available ) {
990 continue;
991 }
992 bool zoom = e->has_flag( flag_ZOOM );
993 // zoom==true will access parallaxes[1], zoom==false will access parallaxes[0].
994 int parallax = parallaxes[static_cast<int>( zoom )].has_value() ? parallaxes[static_cast<int>
995 ( zoom )].value() : get_character_parallax( zoom );
996 parallaxes[static_cast<int>( zoom )].emplace( parallax );
997 // Maunal expansion of effective_dispersion() for performance.
998 double e_effective_dispersion = parallax + mod.sight_dispersion;
999
1000 // The character can hardly get the aiming speed bonus from a non-magnifier sight when aiming at a target that is too far or too small
1001 double effective_aim_speed_modifier = 4 * parallax >
1002 target_attributes.size_in_moa ? std::min( 0.0, mod.aim_speed_modifier ) : mod.aim_speed_modifier;
1003 if( e_effective_dispersion < recoil && recoil <= mod.field_of_view ) {
1004 double e_speed = recoil < mod.field_of_view ? modified_sight_speed( effective_aim_speed_modifier,
1005 e_effective_dispersion, recoil ) : 0;
1006 if( e_speed > aim_speed_modifier ) {
1007 aim_speed_modifier = e_speed;
1008 }
1009 }
1010
1011 }
1012 return aim_speed_modifier;
1013}
1014
1015int Character::most_accurate_aiming_method_limit( const item &gun ) const
1016{
1017 if( !gun.is_gun() ) {
1018 return 0;
1019 }
1020
1021 int limit = point_shooting_limit( gun );
1022
1023 if( !gun.has_flag( flag_DISABLE_SIGHTS ) ) {
1024 int iron_sight_limit = effective_dispersion( gun.type->gun->sight_dispersion );
1025 if( limit > iron_sight_limit ) {
1026 limit = iron_sight_limit;
1027 }
1028 }
1029
1030 for( const item *e : gun.gunmods() ) {
1031 const islot_gunmod &mod = *e->type->gunmod;
1032 if( mod.field_of_view > 0 && mod.sight_dispersion >= 0 ) {
1033 limit = std::min( limit, effective_dispersion( mod.sight_dispersion, e->has_flag( flag_ZOOM ) ) );
1034 }
1035 }
1036
1037 return limit;
1038}
1039
1040double Character::aim_factor_from_volume( const item &gun ) const
1041{
1042 skill_id gun_skill = gun.gun_skill();
1043 double wielded_volume = gun.volume() / 1_ml;
1044 // this is only here for mod support
1045 if( gun.has_flag( flag_COLLAPSIBLE_STOCK ) ) {
1046 // use the unfolded volume
1047 wielded_volume += gun.collapsed_volume_delta() / 1_ml;
1048 }
1049
1050 double factor = gun_skill == skill_pistol ? 4 : 1;
1051 double min_volume_without_debuff = 800;
1052 if( wielded_volume > min_volume_without_debuff ) {
1053 factor *= std::pow( min_volume_without_debuff / wielded_volume, 0.333333 );
1054 }
1055
1056 return std::max( factor, 0.2 ) ;
1057}
1058
1059static bool is_obstacle( tripoint pos )
1060{
1061 return get_map().coverage( pos ) >= 50;
1062}
1063
1064double Character::aim_factor_from_length( const item &gun ) const
1065{
1066 tripoint cur_pos = pos();
1067 bool nw_to_se = is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_south_east ) &&
1068 is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_north_west );
1069 bool w_to_e = is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_west ) &&
1070 is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_east );
1071 bool sw_to_ne = is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_south_west ) &&
1072 is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_north_east );
1073 bool n_to_s = is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_north ) &&
1074 is_obstacle( cur_pos + tripoint_south );
1075 double wielded_length = gun.length() / 1_mm;
1076 double factor = 1.0;
1077
1078 if( nw_to_se || w_to_e || sw_to_ne || n_to_s ) {
1079 factor = 1.0 - static_cast<float>( ( wielded_length - 300 ) / 1000 );
1080 factor = std::min( factor, 1.0 );
1081 }
1082 return std::max( factor, 0.2 ) ;
1083}
1084
1085double Character::aim_per_move( const item &gun, double recoil,
1086 const Target_attributes &target_attributes,
1087 std::optional<std::reference_wrapper<const aim_mods_cache>> aim_cache ) const
1088{
1089 if( !gun.is_gun() ) {
1090 return 0.0;
1091 }
1092 bool use_cache = aim_cache.has_value();
1093 double sight_speed_modifier = fastest_aiming_method_speed( gun, recoil, target_attributes,
1094 use_cache ? std::make_optional( std::ref( aim_cache.value().get().parallaxes ) ) : std::nullopt );
1095 int limit = use_cache ? aim_cache.value().get().limit :
1096 most_accurate_aiming_method_limit( gun );
1097 if( sight_speed_modifier == INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) {
1098 // No suitable sights (already at maximum aim).
1099 return 0;
1100 }
1101
1102 // Overall strategy for determining aim speed is to sum the factors that contribute to it,
1103 // then scale that speed by current recoil level.
1104 // Player capabilities make aiming faster, and aim speed slows down as it approaches 0.
1105 // Base speed is non-zero to prevent extreme rate changes as aim speed approaches 0.
1106 double aim_speed = 10.0;
1107
1108 skill_id gun_skill = gun.gun_skill();
1109
1110 aim_speed += sight_speed_modifier;
1111
1112 if( !use_cache ) {
1113 // Ranges [-1.5 - 3.5] for archery Ranges [0 - 2.5] for others
1114 aim_speed += get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_skill_mod, gun_skill );
1115
1116 /** @EFFECT_DEX increases aiming speed */
1117 // every DEX increases 0.5 aim_speed
1118 aim_speed += get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_dex_mod );
1119
1120 aim_speed *= get_modifier( character_modifier_aim_speed_mod );
1121 } else {
1122 aim_speed += aim_cache.value().get().aim_speed_skill_mod;
1123
1124 aim_speed += aim_cache.value().get().aim_speed_dex_mod;
1125
1126 aim_speed *= aim_cache.value().get().aim_speed_mod;
1127 }
1128
1129 // finally multiply everything by a harsh function that is eliminated by 7.5 gunskill
1130 aim_speed /= std::max( 1.0, 2.5 - 0.2 * get_skill_level( gun_skill ) );
1131 // Use a milder attenuation function to replace the previous logarithmic attenuation function when recoil is closed to 0.
1132 aim_speed *= std::max( recoil / MAX_RECOIL, 1 - logarithmic_range( 0, MAX_RECOIL, recoil ) );
1133
1134 // add 4 max aim speed per skill up to 5 skill, then 1 per skill for skill 5-10
1135 double base_aim_speed_cap = 5.0 + 1.0 * get_skill_level( gun_skill ) + std::max( 10.0,
1136 3.0 * get_skill_level( gun_skill ) );
1137 if( !use_cache ) {
1138 // This upper limit usually only affects the first half of the aiming process
1139 // Pistols have a much higher aiming speed limit
1140 aim_speed = std::min( aim_speed, base_aim_speed_cap * aim_factor_from_volume( gun ) );
1141
1142 // When the character is in an open area, it will not be affected by the length of the weapon.
1143 // This upper limit usually only affects the first half of the aiming process
1144 // Weapons shorter than carbine are usually not affected by it
1145 aim_speed = std::min( aim_speed, base_aim_speed_cap * aim_factor_from_length( gun ) );
1146 } else {
1147 aim_speed = std::min( aim_speed,
1148 base_aim_speed_cap * aim_cache.value().get().aim_factor_from_volume );
1149
1150 aim_speed = std::min( aim_speed,
1151 base_aim_speed_cap * aim_cache.value().get().aim_factor_from_length );
1152 }
1153 // Just a raw scaling factor.
1154 aim_speed *= 2.4;
1155
1156 // Minimum improvement is 0.01MoA. This is just to prevent data anomalies
1157 aim_speed = std::max( aim_speed, MIN_RECOIL_IMPROVEMENT );
1158
1159 // Never improve by more than the currently used sights permit.
1160 return std::min( aim_speed, recoil - limit );
1161}
1162
1163int Character::get_dodges_left() const
1164{
1165 return dodges_left;
1166}
1167
1168void Character::set_dodges_left( int dodges )
1169{
1170 dodges_left = dodges;
1171}
1172
1173void Character::mod_dodges_left( int mod )
1174{
1175 dodges_left += mod;
1176}
1177
1178void Character::consume_dodge_attempts()
1179{
1180 if( get_dodges_left() > 0 ) {
1181 mod_dodges_left( -1 );
1182 }
1183}
1184
1185ret_val<void> Character::can_try_doge( bool ignore_dodges_left ) const
1186{
1187 //If we're asleep or busy we can't dodge
1188 if( in_sleep_state() || has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ||
1189 has_effect( effect_winded ) || has_effect( effect_fearparalyze ) || is_driving() ) {
1190 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MELEE, "Unable to dodge (sleeping, winded, or driving)" )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_MELEE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Unable to dodge (sleeping, winded, or driving)"
) ) ); } } while( false );
1191 return ret_val<void>::make_failure();
1192 }
1193 //If stamina is too low we can't dodge
1194 if( get_stamina_dodge_modifier() <= 0.11 ) {
1195 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MELEE, "Stamina too low to doge. Stamina: %d", get_stamina() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_MELEE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Stamina too low to doge. Stamina: %d"
, get_stamina() ) ) ); } } while( false );
1196 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MELEE, "Stamina dodge modifier: %f", get_stamina_dodge_modifier() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_MELEE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Stamina dodge modifier: %f"
, get_stamina_dodge_modifier() ) ) ); } } while( false );
1197 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( !is_npc() ? _( "Your stamina is too low to attempt to dodge." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your stamina is too low to attempt to dodge."
) ) )
1198 :
1199 _( "<npcname>'s stamina is too low to attempt to dodge." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s stamina is too low to attempt to dodge."
) ) ) );;
1200 }
1201 // Ensure no attempt to dodge without sources of extra dodges, eg martial arts
1202 if( get_dodges_left() <= 0 && !ignore_dodges_left ) {
1203 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MELEE, "No remaining dodge attempts" )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_MELEE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "No remaining dodge attempts"
) ) ); } } while( false );
1204 return ret_val<void>::make_failure();
1205 }
1206 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
1207}
1208
1209float Character::get_stamina_dodge_modifier() const
1210{
1211 const double stamina = get_stamina();
1212 const double stamina_min = get_stamina_max() * 0.1;
1213 const double stamina_max = get_stamina_max() * 0.9;
1214 const double stamina_logistic = 1.0 - logarithmic_range( stamina_min, stamina_max, stamina );
1215 return stamina_logistic;
1216}
1217
1218void Character::tally_organic_size()
1219{
1220 float ret = 0.0;
1221 for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts() ) {
1222 if( !part->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
1223 ret += part->hit_size;
1224 }
1225 }
1226 cached_organic_size = ret / 100.0f;
1227 //return creature_anatomy->get_organic_size_sum() / 100.0f;
1228}
1229
1230float Character::get_cached_organic_size() const
1231{
1232 return cached_organic_size;
1233}
1234
1235int Character::sight_range( float light_level ) const
1236{
1237 if( light_level == 0 ) {
1238 return 1;
1239 }
1240 /* Via Beer-Lambert we have:
1241 * light_level * (1 / exp( LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance) ) <= LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW
1242 * Solving for distance:
1243 * 1 / exp( LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance ) <= LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW / light_level
1244 * 1 <= exp( LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance ) * LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW / light_level
1245 * light_level <= exp( LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance ) * LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW
1246 * log(light_level) <= LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance + log(LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW)
1247 * log(light_level) - log(LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW) <= LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance
1248 * log(LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW / light_level) <= LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR * distance
1249 * log(LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW / light_level) * (1 / LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR) <= distance
1250 */
1251
1252 int range = static_cast<int>( -std::log( get_vision_threshold( get_map().ambient_light_at(
1253 pos() ) ) / light_level ) / LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR );
1254
1255 // Clamp to [1, sight_max].
1256 return clamp( range, 1, sight_max );
1257}
1258
1259int Character::unimpaired_range() const
1260{
1261 return std::min( sight_max, 60 );
1262}
1263
1264bool Character::overmap_los( const tripoint_abs_omt &omt, int sight_points ) const
1265{
1266 const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
1267 const point_rel_omt offset = omt.xy() - ompos.xy();
1268 if( offset.x() < -sight_points || offset.x() > sight_points ||
1269 offset.y() < -sight_points || offset.y() > sight_points ) {
1270 // Outside maximum sight range
1271 return false;
1272 }
1273
1274 const std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> line = line_to( ompos, omt );
1275 for( size_t i = 0; i < line.size() && sight_points >= 0; i++ ) {
1276 const tripoint_abs_omt &pt = line[i];
1277 const oter_id &ter = overmap_buffer.ter( pt );
1278 sight_points -= static_cast<int>( ter->get_see_cost() );
1279 if( sight_points < 0 ) {
1280 return false;
1281 }
1282 }
1283 return true;
1284}
1285
1286int Character::overmap_sight_range( float light_level ) const
1287{
1288 int sight = sight_range( light_level );
1289 if( sight < SEEX ) {
1290 sight = 0;
1291 }
1292 if( sight <= SEEX * 4 ) {
1293 sight /= ( SEEX / 2 );
1294 }
1295
1296 if( sight > 0 ) {
1297 sight = 6;
1298 }
1299 // Mutations like Scout and Topographagnosia affect how far you can see.
1300 sight += mutation_value( "overmap_sight" );
1301
1302 sight = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::OVERMAP_SIGHT, sight );
1303
1304 float multiplier = mutation_value( "overmap_multiplier" );
1305 // If sight is change due to overmap_sight, process the rest of the modifiers, otherwise skip them
1306 if( sight > 0 ) {
1307 // The higher your perception, the farther you can see.
1308 sight += static_cast<int>( get_per() / 2 );
1309 // The higher up you are, the farther you can see.
1310 sight += std::max( 0, posz() ) * 2;
1311
1312 // Binoculars double your sight range.
1313 // When adding checks here, also call game::update_overmap_seen at the place they first become true
1314 const bool has_optic = cache_has_item_with( flag_ZOOM ) ||
1315 has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ||
1316 ( is_mounted() && mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_MECH_RECON_VISION ) ) ||
1317 get_map().veh_at( pos() ).avail_part_with_feature( "ENHANCED_VISION" ).has_value();
1318
1319 if( has_optic ) {
1320 multiplier += 1;
1321 }
1322 }
1323
1324 if( sight == 0 ) {
1325 return 0;
1326 }
1327
1328 sight = std::round( sight * multiplier );
1329 return std::max( sight, 3 );
1330}
1331
1332int Character::clairvoyance() const
1333{
1334 if( vision_mode_cache[VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE_SUPER] ) {
1335 return MAX_CLAIRVOYANCE;
1336 }
1337
1338 if( vision_mode_cache[VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE_PLUS] ) {
1339 return 8;
1340 }
1341
1342 if( vision_mode_cache[VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE] ) {
1343 return 3;
1344 }
1345
1346 return 0;
1347}
1348
1349bool Character::sight_impaired() const
1350{
1351 const bool in_light = get_map().ambient_light_at( pos() ) > LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT;
1352 return ( ( has_effect( effect_boomered ) || has_effect( effect_no_sight ) ||
1353 has_effect( effect_darkness ) ) &&
1354 ( !has_trait( trait_PER_SLIME_OK ) ) ) ||
1355 ( underwater && !has_flag( json_flag_EYE_MEMBRANE ) &&
1356 !worn_with_flag( flag_SWIM_GOGGLES ) ) ||
1357 ( ( has_flag( json_flag_MYOPIC ) || ( in_light && has_flag( json_flag_MYOPIC_IN_LIGHT ) ) ) &&
1358 !worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_NEARSIGHT ) &&
1359 !has_effect( effect_contacts ) &&
1360 !has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
1361 !has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ) ||
1362 has_trait( trait_PER_SLIME ) || is_blind();
1363}
1364
1365bool Character::has_alarm_clock() const
1366{
1367 map &here = get_map();
1368 return cache_has_item_with_flag( flag_ALARMCLOCK, true ) ||
1369 ( here.veh_at( pos() ) &&
1370 !empty( here.veh_at( pos() )->vehicle().get_avail_parts( "ALARMCLOCK" ) ) ) ||
1371 has_flag( json_flag_ALARMCLOCK );
1372}
1373
1374bool Character::has_watch() const
1375{
1376 map &here = get_map();
1377 return cache_has_item_with_flag( flag_WATCH, true ) ||
1378 ( here.veh_at( pos() ) &&
1379 !empty( here.veh_at( pos() )->vehicle().get_avail_parts( "WATCH" ) ) ) ||
1380 has_flag( json_flag_WATCH );
1381}
1382
1383void Character::react_to_felt_pain( int intensity )
1384{
1385 if( intensity <= 0 ) {
1386 return;
1387 }
1388 if( uistate.distraction_pain && is_avatar() && intensity >= 2 ) {
1389 g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::pain, _( "Ouch, something hurts!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Ouch, something hurts!" ) ) ) );
1390 }
1391 // Only a large pain burst will actually wake people while sleeping.
1392 if( has_effect( effect_sleep ) && get_effect( effect_sleep ).get_duration() > 0_turns &&
1393 !has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
1394 int pain_thresh = rng( 3, 5 );
1395
1396 if( has_bionic( bio_sleep_shutdown ) ) {
1397 pain_thresh += 999;
1398 } else if( has_trait( trait_HEAVYSLEEPER ) ) {
1399 pain_thresh += 2;
1400 } else if( has_trait( trait_HEAVYSLEEPER2 ) ) {
1401 pain_thresh += 5;
1402 }
1403
1404 if( intensity >= pain_thresh ) {
1405 wake_up();
1406 }
1407 }
1408}
1409
1410void Character::action_taken()
1411{
1412 nv_cached = false;
1413}
1414
1415int Character::swim_speed() const
1416{
1417 int ret;
1418 if( is_mounted() ) {
1419 monster *mon = mounted_creature.get();
1420 // no difference in swim speed by monster type yet.
1421 // TODO: difference in swim speed by monster type.
1422 // No monsters are currently mountable and can swim, though mods may allow this.
1423 if( mon->swims() ) {
1424 ret = 25;
1425 ret += get_weight() / 120_gram - 50 * ( mon->get_size() - 1 );
1426 return ret;
1427 }
1428 }
1429 const body_part_set usable = exclusive_flag_coverage( flag_ALLOWS_NATURAL_ATTACKS );
1430 float hand_bonus_mult = ( usable.test( body_part_hand_l ) ? 0.5f : 0.0f ) +
1431 ( usable.test( body_part_hand_r ) ? 0.5f : 0.0f );
1432
1433 // base swim speed.
1434 float swim_speed_mult = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::MOVECOST_SWIM_MOD, 1 );
1435 ret = ( 440 * swim_speed_mult ) + weight_carried() /
1436 ( 60_gram / swim_speed_mult ) - 50 * get_skill_level( skill_swimming );
1437 /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed bonus from PAWS */
1438 if( has_trait( trait_PAWS ) ) {
1439 ret -= hand_bonus_mult * ( 20 + str_cur * 3 );
1440 }
1441 /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed bonus from PAWS_LARGE */
1442 if( has_trait( trait_PAWS_LARGE ) ) {
1443 ret -= hand_bonus_mult * ( 20 + str_cur * 4 );
1444 }
1445 /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed bonus from swim_fins */
1446 if( worn_with_flag( flag_FIN, body_part_foot_l ) ||
1447 worn_with_flag( flag_FIN, body_part_foot_r ) ) {
1448 if( worn_with_flag( flag_FIN, body_part_foot_l ) &&
1449 worn_with_flag( flag_FIN, body_part_foot_r ) ) {
1450 ret -= ( 15 * str_cur );
1451 } else {
1452 ret -= ( 15 * str_cur ) / 2;
1453 }
1454 }
1455 /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed bonus from WEBBED and WEBBED_FEET */
1456 float webbing_factor = 60 + str_cur * 5;
1457 if( has_flag( json_flag_WEBBED_HANDS ) ) {
1458 ret -= hand_bonus_mult * webbing_factor * 0.5f;
1459 }
1460 if( has_flag( json_flag_WEBBED_FEET ) && is_barefoot() ) {
1461 ret -= webbing_factor * 0.5f;
1462 }
1463 /** @EFFECT_SWIMMING increases swim speed */
1464 ret *= get_modifier( character_modifier_swim_mod );
1465 ret += worn.swim_modifier( round( get_skill_level( skill_swimming ) ) );
1466 /** @EFFECT_STR increases swim speed */
1467
1468 /** @EFFECT_DEX increases swim speed */
1469 ret -= str_cur * 6 + dex_cur * 4;
1470 if( worn_with_flag( flag_FLOTATION ) ) {
1471 ret = std::min( ret, 400 );
1472 ret = std::max( ret, 200 );
1473 }
1474 // If (ret > 500), we can not swim; so do not apply the underwater bonus.
1475 if( underwater && ret < 500 ) {
1476 ret -= 50;
1477 }
1478
1479 ret += move_mode->swim_speed_mod();
1480
1481 if( ret < 30 ) {
1482 ret = 30;
1483 }
1484 return ret;
1485}
1486
1487bool Character::is_on_ground() const
1488{
1489 return ( !enough_working_legs() && !weapon.has_flag( flag_CRUTCHES ) ) ||
1490 has_effect( effect_downed ) || is_prone();
1491}
1492
1493bool Character::can_stash( const item &it, bool ignore_pkt_settings )
1494{
1495 return best_pocket( it, nullptr, ignore_pkt_settings ).second != nullptr;
1496}
1497
1498bool Character::can_stash( const item &it, int &copies_remaining, bool ignore_pkt_settings )
1499{
1500 bool stashed_any = false;
1501
1502 for( item_location loc : top_items_loc() ) {
1503 if( loc->can_contain( it, copies_remaining, false, false, ignore_pkt_settings ).success() ) {
1504 stashed_any = true;
1505 }
1506 if( copies_remaining <= 0 ) {
1507 return stashed_any;
1508 }
1509 }
1510 return stashed_any;
1511}
1512
1513bool Character::can_stash_partial( const item &it, bool ignore_pkt_settings )
1514{
1515 item copy = it;
1516 if( it.count_by_charges() ) {
1517 copy.charges = 1;
1518 }
1519
1520 return can_stash( copy, ignore_pkt_settings );
1521}
1522
1523void Character::cancel_stashed_activity()
1524{
1525 stashed_outbounds_activity = player_activity();
1526 stashed_outbounds_backlog = player_activity();
1527}
1528
1529player_activity Character::get_stashed_activity() const
1530{
1531 return stashed_outbounds_activity;
1532}
1533
1534void Character::set_stashed_activity( const player_activity &act, const player_activity &act_back )
1535{
1536 stashed_outbounds_activity = act;
1537 stashed_outbounds_backlog = act_back;
1538}
1539
1540bool Character::has_stashed_activity() const
1541{
1542 return static_cast<bool>( stashed_outbounds_activity );
1543}
1544
1545void Character::assign_stashed_activity()
1546{
1547 activity = stashed_outbounds_activity;
1548 backlog.push_front( stashed_outbounds_backlog );
1549 cancel_stashed_activity();
1550}
1551
1552bool Character::check_outbounds_activity( const player_activity &act, bool check_only )
1553{
1554 map &here = get_map();
1555 if( ( act.placement != tripoint_abs_ms() && act.placement != player_activity::invalid_place &&
1556 !here.inbounds( here.getlocal( act.placement ) ) ) || ( !act.coords.empty() &&
1557 !here.inbounds( here.getlocal( act.coords.back() ) ) ) ) {
1558 if( is_npc() && !check_only ) {
1559 // stash activity for when reloaded.
1560 stashed_outbounds_activity = act;
1561 if( !backlog.empty() ) {
1562 stashed_outbounds_backlog = backlog.front();
1563 }
1564 activity = player_activity();
1565 }
1566 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "npc %s at pos %s, activity target is not inbounds at %s therefore "
"activity was stashed", disp_name(), pos().to_string_writable
(), act.placement.to_string_writable() ) ) ); } } while( false
)
1567 "npc %s at pos %s, activity target is not inbounds at %s therefore "do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "npc %s at pos %s, activity target is not inbounds at %s therefore "
"activity was stashed", disp_name(), pos().to_string_writable
(), act.placement.to_string_writable() ) ) ); } } while( false
)
1568 "activity was stashed",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "npc %s at pos %s, activity target is not inbounds at %s therefore "
"activity was stashed", disp_name(), pos().to_string_writable
(), act.placement.to_string_writable() ) ) ); } } while( false
)
1569 disp_name(), pos().to_string_writable(),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "npc %s at pos %s, activity target is not inbounds at %s therefore "
"activity was stashed", disp_name(), pos().to_string_writable
(), act.placement.to_string_writable() ) ) ); } } while( false
)
1570 act.placement.to_string_writable() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "npc %s at pos %s, activity target is not inbounds at %s therefore "
"activity was stashed", disp_name(), pos().to_string_writable
(), act.placement.to_string_writable() ) ) ); } } while( false
);
1571 return true;
1572 }
1573 return false;
1574}
1575
1576void Character::set_destination_activity( const player_activity &new_destination_activity )
1577{
1578 destination_activity = new_destination_activity;
1579}
1580
1581void Character::clear_destination_activity()
1582{
1583 destination_activity = player_activity();
1584}
1585
1586player_activity Character::get_destination_activity() const
1587{
1588 return destination_activity;
1589}
1590
1591void Character::mount_creature( monster &z )
1592{
1593 tripoint pnt = z.pos();
1594 shared_ptr_fast<monster> mons = g->shared_from( z );
1595 if( mons == nullptr ) {
1596 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "mount_creature(): monster not found in critter_tracker" )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "mount_creature(): monster not found in critter_tracker"
) ) ); } } while( false );
1597 return;
1598 }
1599
1600 add_effect( effect_riding, 1_turns, true );
1601 z.add_effect( effect_ridden, 1_turns, true );
1602 if( z.has_effect( effect_tied ) ) {
1603 z.remove_effect( effect_tied );
1604 if( z.tied_item ) {
1605 i_add( *z.tied_item );
1606 z.tied_item.reset();
1607 }
1608 }
1609 z.mounted_player_id = getID();
1610 if( z.has_effect( effect_harnessed ) ) {
1611 z.remove_effect( effect_harnessed );
1612 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You remove the %s's harness." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You remove the %s's harness."
) ) ), z.get_name() );
1613 }
1614 mounted_creature = mons;
1615 mons->mounted_player = this;
1616 avatar &player_avatar = get_avatar();
1617 if( is_avatar() && player_avatar.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE ) {
1618 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You let go of the grabbed object." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You let go of the grabbed object."
) ) ) );
1619 player_avatar.grab( object_type::NONE );
1620 }
1621 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You climb on the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You climb on the %s." ) ) ), z.get_name() );
1622 if( z.has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
1623 if( !z.type->mech_weapon.is_empty() ) {
1624 item mechwep = item( z.type->mech_weapon );
1625 set_wielded_item( mechwep );
1626 }
1627 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You hear your %s whir to life." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You hear your %s whir to life."
) ) ), z.get_name() );
1628 }
1629 if( is_avatar() ) {
1630 if( player_avatar.is_hauling() ) {
1631 player_avatar.stop_hauling();
1632 }
1633 g->place_player( pnt );
1634 } else {
1635 npc &guy = dynamic_cast<npc &>( *this );
1636 guy.setpos( pnt );
1637 }
1638 z.facing = facing;
1639 // some rideable mechs have night-vision
1640 recalc_sight_limits();
1641 if( is_avatar() && z.has_flag( mon_flag_MECH_RECON_VISION ) ) {
1642 // mech night-vision counts as optics for overmap sight range.
1643 g->update_overmap_seen();
1644 }
1645 mod_moves( -100 );
1646}
1647
1648bool Character::check_mount_will_move( const tripoint &dest_loc )
1649{
1650 if( !is_mounted() || mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_COMBAT_MOUNT ) ) {
1651 return true;
1652 }
1653 if( mounted_creature && mounted_creature->type->has_fear_trigger( mon_trigger::HOSTILE_CLOSE ) ) {
1654 for( const monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
1655 if( critter.is_hallucination() ) {
1656 continue;
1657 }
1658 Attitude att = critter.attitude_to( *this );
1659 if( att == Attitude::HOSTILE && sees( critter ) && rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= 15 &&
1660 rl_dist( dest_loc, critter.pos() ) < rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) ) {
1661 add_msg_if_player( _( "You fail to budge your %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You fail to budge your %s!" )
) ), mounted_creature->get_name() );
1662 return false;
1663 }
1664 }
1665 }
1666 return true;
1667}
1668
1669bool Character::check_mount_is_spooked()
1670{
1671 if( !is_mounted() ) {
1672 return false;
1673 }
1674 // chance to spook per monster nearby:
1675 // base 1% per turn.
1676 // + 1% per square closer than 15 distance. (1% - 15%)
1677 // * 2 if hostile monster is bigger than or same size as mounted creature.
1678 // -0.25% per point of dexterity (low -1%, average -2%, high -3%, extreme -3.5%)
1679 // -0.1% per point of strength ( low -0.4%, average -0.8%, high -1.2%, extreme -1.4% )
1680 // / 2 if horse has full tack and saddle.
1681 // / 2 if mount has the monster flag COMBAT_MOUNT
1682 // Monster in spear reach monster and average stat (8) player on saddled horse, 14% -2% -0.8% / 2 = ~5%
1683 if( mounted_creature && mounted_creature->type->has_fear_trigger( mon_trigger::HOSTILE_CLOSE ) ) {
1684 const creature_size mount_size = mounted_creature->get_size();
1685 const bool saddled = mounted_creature->has_effect( effect_monster_saddled );
1686 const bool combat_mount = mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_COMBAT_MOUNT );
1687 for( const monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
1688 if( critter.is_hallucination() ) {
1689 continue;
1690 }
1691 double chance = 1.0;
1692 Attitude att = critter.attitude_to( *this );
1693 // actually too close now - horse might spook.
1694 if( att == Attitude::HOSTILE && sees( critter ) && rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= 10 ) {
1695 chance += 10 - rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() );
1696 if( critter.get_size() >= mount_size ) {
1697 chance *= 2;
1698 }
1699 chance -= 0.25 * get_dex();
1700 chance -= 0.1 * get_str();
1701 chance *= get_limb_score( limb_score_grip );
1702 if( saddled ) {
1703 chance /= 2;
1704 }
1705 if( combat_mount ) {
1706 chance /= 2;
1707 }
1708 chance = std::max( 1.0, chance );
1709 if( x_in_y( chance, 100.0 ) ) {
1710 forced_dismount();
1711 return true;
1712 }
1713 }
1714 }
1715 }
1716 return false;
1717}
1718
1719bool Character::cant_do_mounted( bool msg ) const
1720{
1721 if( is_mounted() ) {
1722 if( msg ) {
1723 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info, _( "You can't do that while mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't do that while mounted."
) ) ),
1724 _( "<npcname> can't do that while mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> can't do that while mounted."
) ) ) );
1725 }
1726 return true;
1727 }
1728 return false;
1729}
1730
1731bool Character::is_mounted() const
1732{
1733 return has_effect( effect_riding ) && mounted_creature;
1734}
1735
1736void Character::forced_dismount()
1737{
1738 remove_effect( effect_riding );
1739 bool mech = false;
1740 if( mounted_creature ) {
1741 auto *mon = mounted_creature.get();
1742 if( mon->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) && !mon->type->mech_weapon.is_empty() ) {
1743 mech = true;
1744 remove_item( weapon );
1745 }
1746 mon->mounted_player_id = character_id();
1747 mon->remove_effect( effect_ridden );
1748 mon->add_effect( effect_controlled, 5_turns );
1749 mounted_creature = nullptr;
1750 mon->mounted_player = nullptr;
1751 }
1752 std::vector<tripoint> valid;
1753 for( const tripoint &jk : get_map().points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
1754 if( g->is_empty( jk ) ) {
1755 valid.push_back( jk );
1756 }
1757 }
1758 if( !valid.empty() ) {
1759 setpos( random_entry( valid ) );
1760 if( mech ) {
1761 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You are ejected from your mech!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are ejected from your mech!"
) ) ),
1762 _( "<npcname> is ejected from their mech!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> is ejected from their mech!"
) ) ) );
1763 } else {
1764 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You fall off your mount!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You fall off your mount!" ) )
),
1765 _( "<npcname> falls off their mount!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> falls off their mount!"
) ) ) );
1766 }
1767 const int dodge = get_dodge();
1768 const int damage = std::max( 0, rng( 1, 20 ) - rng( dodge, dodge * 2 ) );
1769 bodypart_id hit( "bp_null" );
1770 switch( rng( 1, 10 ) ) {
1771 case 1:
1772 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
1773 hit = body_part_foot_l;
1774 } else {
1775 hit = body_part_foot_r;
1776 }
1777 break;
1778 case 2:
1779 case 3:
1780 case 4:
1781 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
1782 hit = body_part_leg_l;
1783 } else {
1784 hit = body_part_leg_r;
1785 }
1786 break;
1787 case 5:
1788 case 6:
1789 case 7:
1790 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
1791 hit = body_part_arm_l;
1792 } else {
1793 hit = body_part_arm_r;
1794 }
1795 break;
1796 case 8:
1797 case 9:
1798 hit = body_part_torso;
1799 break;
1800 case 10:
1801 hit = body_part_head;
1802 break;
1803 }
1804 if( damage > 0 ) {
1805 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You hurt yourself!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You hurt yourself!" ) ) ) );
1806 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
1807 deal_damage( nullptr, hit, damage_instance( damage_bash, damage ) );
1808 if( is_avatar() ) {
1809 get_memorial().add(
1810 pgettext( "memorial_male", "Fell off a mount." ),
1811 pgettext( "memorial_female", "Fell off a mount." ) );
1812 }
1813 check_dead_state();
1814 }
1815 add_effect( effect_downed, 5_turns, true );
1816 } else {
1817 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Forced_dismount could not find a square to deposit player"
) ) ); } } while( false )
1818 "Forced_dismount could not find a square to deposit player" )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Forced_dismount could not find a square to deposit player"
) ) ); } } while( false );
1819 }
1820 if( is_avatar() ) {
1821 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1822 if( player_character.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE ) {
1823 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You let go of the grabbed object." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You let go of the grabbed object."
) ) ) );
1824 player_character.grab( object_type::NONE );
1825 }
1826 set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
1827 if( player_character.is_auto_moving() || player_character.has_destination() ||
1828 player_character.has_destination_activity() ) {
1829 player_character.clear_destination();
1830 }
1831 g->update_map( player_character );
1832 }
1833 if( activity ) {
1834 cancel_activity();
1835 }
1836 moves -= 150;
1837}
1838
1839void Character::dismount()
1840{
1841 if( !is_mounted() ) {
1842 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "dismount called when not riding" )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "dismount called when not riding"
) ) ); } } while( false );
1843 return;
1844 }
1845 if( const std::optional<tripoint> pnt = choose_adjacent( _( "Dismount where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dismount where?" ) ) ) ) ) {
1846 if( !g->is_empty( *pnt ) ) {
1847 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot dismount there!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot dismount there!" )
) ) );
1848 return;
1849 }
1850
1851 remove_effect( effect_riding );
1852 monster *critter = mounted_creature.get();
1853 critter->mounted_player_id = character_id();
1854 if( critter->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) && !critter->type->mech_weapon.is_empty() &&
1855 weapon.typeId() == critter->type->mech_weapon ) {
1856 remove_item( weapon );
1857 }
1858 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
1859 if( is_avatar() && player_character.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE ) {
1860 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You let go of the grabbed object." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You let go of the grabbed object."
) ) ) );
1861 player_character.grab( object_type::NONE );
1862 }
1863 critter->remove_effect( effect_ridden );
1864 critter->add_effect( effect_controlled, 5_turns );
1865 mounted_creature = nullptr;
1866 critter->mounted_player = nullptr;
1867 setpos( *pnt );
1868 mod_moves( -100 );
1869 set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
1870 }
1871}
1872
1873float Character::balance_roll() const
1874{
1875 /** @EFFECT_DEX improves player balance roll */
1876 /** Balance and footing influence stability rolls */
1877 /** @EFFECT_SWIMMING improves player stability roll */
1878 return ( get_dex() + get_skill_level( skill_swimming ) ) * ( ( get_limb_score(
1879 limb_score_balance ) * 3 + get_limb_score( limb_score_footing ) ) / 4.0f );
1880}
1881
1882float Character::stability_roll() const
1883{
1884 /** @EFFECT_STR improves player stability roll */
1885 /** Balance and reaction scores influence stability rolls */
1886 /** @EFFECT_MELEE improves player stability roll */
1887 return ( get_melee() + get_str() ) * ( ( get_limb_score( limb_score_balance ) * 3 + get_limb_score(
1888 limb_score_reaction ) ) / 4.0f );
1889}
1890
1891bool Character::is_dead_state() const
1892{
1893 if( cached_dead_state.has_value() ) {
1894 return cached_dead_state.value();
1895 }
1896
1897 cached_dead_state = false;
1898 // we want to warn the player with a debug message if they are invincible. this should be unimportant once wounds exist and bleeding is how you die.
1899 bool has_vitals = false;
1900 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
1901 if( bp->is_vital ) {
1902 has_vitals = true;
1903 if( get_part_hp_cur( bp ) <= 0 ) {
1904 cached_dead_state = true;
1905 return cached_dead_state.value();
1906 }
1907 }
1908 }
1909 if( !has_vitals ) {
1910 debugmsg( _( "WARNING! Player has no vital part and is invincible." ) )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "1910", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ( ( []( const auto & arg )
{ static auto cache = detail::get_local_translation_cache( arg
); return cache( arg ); } )( translation_argument_identity( "WARNING! Player has no vital part and is invincible."
) ) ));
1911 }
1912 return false;
1913}
1914
1915void Character::set_part_hp_cur( const bodypart_id &id, int set )
1916{
1917 bool is_broken_before = get_part_hp_cur( id ) <= 0;
1918 Creature::set_part_hp_cur( id, set );
1919 bool is_broken_after = get_part_hp_cur( id ) <= 0;
1920 // detect unbroken->broken (possible death) as well as broken->unbroken (possible revival)
1921 if( is_broken_before != is_broken_after ) {
1922 cached_dead_state.reset();
1923 }
1924}
1925
1926void Character::mod_part_hp_cur( const bodypart_id &id, int set )
1927{
1928 bool is_broken_before = get_part_hp_cur( id ) <= 0;
1929 Creature::mod_part_hp_cur( id, set );
1930 bool is_broken_after = get_part_hp_cur( id ) <= 0;
1931 // detect unbroken->broken (possible death) as well as broken->unbroken (possible revival)
1932 if( is_broken_before != is_broken_after ) {
1933 cached_dead_state.reset();
1934 }
1935}
1936
1937void Character::on_try_dodge()
1938{
1939 ret_val<void> can_dodge = can_try_doge();
1940 if( !can_dodge.success() ) {
1941 add_msg( m_bad, can_dodge.c_str() );
1942 return;
1943 }
1944
1945 // Each attempt consumes an available dodge
1946 consume_dodge_attempts();
1947
1948 const int base_burn_rate = get_option<int>( STATIC( "PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE" )(([]()-> const auto &{ using ExprType = std::decay_t<
decltype(static_argument_identity( "PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE"
))>; using CachedType = std::conditional_t<std::is_same_v
<ExprType, const char*>, std::string, ExprType>; static
const CachedType _cached_expr = static_argument_identity( "PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE"
); return _cached_expr; })()) );
1949 const float dodge_skill_modifier = ( 20.0f - get_skill_level( skill_dodge ) ) / 20.0f;
1950 burn_energy_legs( std::floor( static_cast<float>( base_burn_rate ) * 6.0f *
1951 dodge_skill_modifier ) );
1952 set_activity_level( EXTRA_EXERCISE );
1953}
1954
1955void Character::on_dodge( Creature *source, float difficulty, float training_level )
1956{
1957 // Make sure we're not practicing dodge in situation where we can't dodge
1958 // We can ignore dodges_left because it was already checked in get_dodge()
1959 if( !can_try_doge( true ).success() ) {
1960 return;
1961 }
1962
1963 // dodging throws of our aim unless we are either skilled at dodging or using a small weapon
1964 if( is_armed() && weapon.is_gun() ) {
1965 recoil += std::max( weapon.volume() / 250_ml - get_skill_level( skill_dodge ), 0.0f ) * rng( 0,
1966 100 );
1967 recoil = std::min( MAX_RECOIL, recoil );
1968 }
1969
1970 // Even if we are not to train still call practice to prevent skill rust
1971 difficulty = std::max( difficulty, 0.0f );
1972
1973 // If training_level is set, treat that as the difficulty instead
1974 if( training_level != 0.0f ) {
1975 difficulty = training_level;
1976 }
1977
1978 practice( skill_dodge, difficulty * 2, difficulty );
1979 martial_arts_data->ma_ondodge_effects( *this );
1980
1981 // For adjacent attackers check for techniques usable upon successful dodge
1982 if( source && square_dist( pos(), source->pos() ) == 1 ) {
1983 matec_id tec = pick_technique( *source, used_weapon(), false, true, false );
1984
1985 if( tec != tec_none && !is_dead_state() ) {
1986 if( get_stamina() < get_stamina_max() / 3 ) {
1987 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You try to counterattack, but you are too exhausted!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You try to counterattack, but you are too exhausted!"
) ) ) );
1988 } else {
1989 melee_attack( *source, false, tec );
1990 }
1991 }
1992 }
1993}
1994
1995float Character::get_melee() const
1996{
1997 return get_skill_level( skill_melee );
1998}
1999
2000bool Character::uncanny_dodge()
2001{
2002 bool is_u = is_avatar();
2003 bool seen = get_player_view().sees( *this );
2004
2005 const units::energy trigger_cost = bio_uncanny_dodge->power_trigger;
2006
2007 const bool can_dodge_bio = get_power_level() >= trigger_cost &&
2008 has_active_bionic( bio_uncanny_dodge );
2009 const bool can_dodge_mut = get_stamina() >= 300 && has_trait_flag( json_flag_UNCANNY_DODGE );
2010 const bool can_dodge_both = get_power_level() >= ( trigger_cost / 2 ) &&
2011 has_active_bionic( bio_uncanny_dodge ) &&
2012 get_stamina() >= 150 && has_trait_flag( json_flag_UNCANNY_DODGE );
2013
2014 if( !( can_dodge_bio || can_dodge_mut || can_dodge_both ) ) {
2015 return false;
2016 }
2017 tripoint adjacent = adjacent_tile();
2018
2019 if( can_dodge_both ) {
2020 mod_power_level( -trigger_cost / 2 );
2021 burn_energy_legs( -150 );
2022 } else if( can_dodge_bio ) {
2023 mod_power_level( -trigger_cost );
2024 } else if( can_dodge_mut ) {
2025 burn_energy_legs( -300 );
2026 }
2027
2028 map &here = get_map();
2029 const optional_vpart_position veh_part = here.veh_at( pos() );
2030 if( in_vehicle && veh_part && veh_part.avail_part_with_feature( "SEATBELT" ) ) {
2031 return false;
2032 }
2033
2034 //uncanny dodge triggered in car and wasn't secured by seatbelt
2035 if( in_vehicle && veh_part ) {
2036 here.unboard_vehicle( pos() );
2037 }
2038 if( adjacent.x != posx() || adjacent.y != posy() ) {
2039 set_pos_only( adjacent );
2040
2041 //landed in a vehicle tile
2042 if( here.veh_at( pos() ) ) {
2043 here.board_vehicle( pos(), this );
2044 }
2045
2046 if( is_u ) {
2047 add_msg( _( "Time seems to slow down, and you instinctively dodge!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Time seems to slow down, and you instinctively dodge!"
) ) ) );
2048 } else if( seen ) {
2049 add_msg( _( "%s dodgesâ¦ so fast!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s dodgesâ¦ so fast!" ) ) ), this->disp_name() );
2050
2051 }
2052 return true;
2053 }
2054 if( is_u ) {
2055 add_msg( _( "You try to dodge, but there's no room!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You try to dodge, but there's no room!"
) ) ) );
2056 } else if( seen ) {
2057 add_msg( _( "%s tries to dodge, but there's no room!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s tries to dodge, but there's no room!"
) ) ), this->disp_name() );
2058 }
2059 return false;
2060}
2061
2062bool Character::check_avoid_friendly_fire() const
2063{
2064 double chance = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::AVOID_FRIENDRY_FIRE, 0.0 );
2065 return rng( 0, 99 ) < chance * 100.0;
2066}
2067
2068void Character::handle_skill_warning( const skill_id &id, bool force_warning )
2069{
2070 //remind the player intermittently that no skill gain takes place
2071 if( is_avatar() && ( force_warning || one_in( 5 ) ) ) {
2072 SkillLevel &level = get_skill_level_object( id );
2073
2074 const Skill &skill = id.obj();
2075 std::string skill_name = skill.name();
2076 int curLevel = level.level();
2077
2078 add_msg( m_info, _( "This task is too simple to train your %s beyond %d." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This task is too simple to train your %s beyond %d."
) ) ),
2079 skill_name, curLevel );
2080 }
2081}
2082
2083bool Character::has_min_manipulators() const
2084{
2085 return get_limb_score( limb_score_manip ) > MIN_MANIPULATOR_SCORE;
2086}
2087
2088/** Returns true if the character has two functioning arms */
2089bool Character::has_two_arms_lifting() const
2090{
2091 // 0.5f is one "standard" arm, so if you have more than that you barely qualify.
2092 return get_limb_score( limb_score_lift, body_part_type::type::arm ) > 0.5f;
2093}
2094
2095std::set<matec_id> Character::get_limb_techs() const
2096{
2097 std::set<matec_id> result;
2098 for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts() ) {
2099 if( !natural_attack_restricted_on( part ) ) {
2100 std::set<matec_id> part_tech = get_part( part )->get_limb_techs();
2101 result.insert( part_tech.begin(), part_tech.end() );
2102 }
2103 }
2104 return result;
2105}
2106
2107int Character::get_working_arm_count() const
2108{
2109 int limb_count = 0;
2110 body_part_type::type arm_type = body_part_type::type::arm;
2111 for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts_of_type( arm_type ) ) {
2112 // Almost broken or overencumbered arms don't count
2113 if( get_part( part )->get_limb_score( limb_score_lift ) * part->limbtypes.at( arm_type ) >= 0.1 &&
2114 !get_part( part )->is_limb_overencumbered() ) {
2115 limb_count++;
2116 }
2117 }
2118 return limb_count;
2119}
2120
2121// working is defined here as not broken
2122bool Character::enough_working_legs() const
2123{
2124 int limb_count = 0;
2125 int working_limb_count = 0;
2126 for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts() ) {
2127 if( part->primary_limb_type() == body_part_type::type::leg ) {
2128 limb_count++;
2129 if( !is_limb_broken( part ) ) {
2130 working_limb_count++;
2131 }
2132 }
2133 }
2134
2135 return working_limb_count == limb_count;
2136}
2137
2138// working is defined here as not broken
2139int Character::get_working_leg_count() const
2140{
2141 int working_limb_count = 0;
2142 for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts() ) {
2143 if( part->primary_limb_type() == body_part_type::type::leg ) {
2144 if( !is_limb_broken( part ) ) {
2145 working_limb_count++;
2146 }
2147 }
2148 }
2149
2150 return working_limb_count;
2151}
2152
2153// this is the source of truth on if a limb is broken so all code to determine
2154// if a limb is broken should point here to make any future changes to breaking easier
2155bool Character::is_limb_broken( const bodypart_id &limb ) const
2156{
2157 return get_part_hp_cur( limb ) == 0;
2158}
2159
2160bool Character::can_run() const
2161{
2162 return get_stamina() > 0 && !has_effect( effect_winded ) && enough_working_legs();
2163}
2164
2165move_mode_id Character::current_movement_mode() const
2166{
2167 return move_mode;
2168}
2169
2170bool Character::movement_mode_is( const move_mode_id &mode ) const
2171{
2172 return move_mode == mode;
2173}
2174
2175bool Character::is_running() const
2176{
2177 return move_mode->type() == move_mode_type::RUNNING;
2178}
2179
2180bool Character::is_walking() const
2181{
2182 return move_mode->type() == move_mode_type::WALKING;
2183}
2184
2185bool Character::is_crouching() const
2186{
2187 return move_mode->type() == move_mode_type::CROUCHING;
2188}
2189
2190bool Character::is_prone() const
2191{
2192 return move_mode->type() == move_mode_type::PRONE;
2193}
2194
2195int Character::footstep_sound() const
2196{
2197 if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_SILENT ) ) {
2198 return 0;
2199 }
2200
2201 double volume = is_stealthy() ? 3 : 6;
2202 volume *= mutation_value( "noise_modifier" );
2203 if( volume > 0 ) {
2204 volume *= current_movement_mode()->sound_mult();
2205 if( is_mounted() ) {
2206 monster *mons = mounted_creature.get();
2207 switch( mons->get_size() ) {
2208 case creature_size::tiny:
2209 volume = 0; // No sound for the tinies
2210 break;
2211 case creature_size::small:
2212 volume /= 3;
2213 break;
2214 case creature_size::medium:
2215 break;
2216 case creature_size::large:
2217 volume *= 1.5;
2218 break;
2219 case creature_size::huge:
2220 volume *= 2;
2221 break;
2222 default:
2223 break;
2224 }
2225 if( mons->has_flag( mon_flag_LOUDMOVES ) ) {
2226 volume += 6;
2227 } else if( mons->has_flag( mon_flag_QUIETMOVES ) ) {
2228 volume /= 2;
2229 }
2230 } else {
2231 volume = calculate_by_enchantment( volume, enchant_vals::mod::FOOTSTEP_NOISE );
2232 }
2233 }
2234 return std::round( volume );
2235}
2236
2237int Character::clatter_sound() const
2238{
2239 return worn.clatter_sound();
2240}
2241
2242void Character::make_footstep_noise() const
2243{
2244 if( is_hallucination() ) {
2245 return;
2246 }
2247
2248 const int volume = footstep_sound();
2249 if( volume <= 0 ) {
2250 return;
2251 }
2252 if( is_mounted() ) {
2253 sounds::sound( pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::movement,
2254 mounted_creature.get()->type->get_footsteps(),
2255 false, "none", "none" );
2256 } else {
2257 sounds::sound( pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "footsteps" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "footsteps" ) ) ), true,
2258 "none", "none" ); // Sound of footsteps may awaken nearby monsters
2259 }
2260 sfx::do_footstep();
2261}
2262
2263void Character::make_clatter_sound() const
2264{
2265
2266 const int volume = clatter_sound();
2267 if( volume <= 0 ) {
2268 return;
2269 }
2270 sounds::sound( pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "clattering equipment" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "clattering equipment" ) ) ), true,
2271 "none", "none" ); // Sound of footsteps may awaken nearby monsters
2272}
2273
2274steed_type Character::get_steed_type() const
2275{
2276 steed_type steed;
2277 if( is_mounted() ) {
2278 if( mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
2279 steed = steed_type::MECH;
2280 } else {
2281 steed = steed_type::ANIMAL;
2282 }
2283 } else {
2284 steed = steed_type::NONE;
2285 }
2286 return steed;
2287}
2288
2289bool Character::can_switch_to( const move_mode_id &mode ) const
2290{
2291 // Only running modes are restricted at the moment and only when its your legs doing the running
2292 return get_steed_type() != steed_type::NONE || mode->type() != move_mode_type::RUNNING || can_run();
2293}
2294
2295void Character::expose_to_disease( const diseasetype_id &dis_type )
2296{
2297 const std::optional<int> &healt_thresh = dis_type->health_threshold;
2298 if( healt_thresh && healt_thresh.value() < get_lifestyle() ) {
2299 return;
2300 }
2301 const std::set<bodypart_str_id> &bps = dis_type->affected_bodyparts;
2302 if( !bps.empty() ) {
2303 for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : bps ) {
2304 add_effect( dis_type->symptoms, rng( dis_type->min_duration, dis_type->max_duration ), bp.id(),
2305 false,
2306 rng( dis_type->min_intensity, dis_type->max_intensity ) );
2307 }
2308 } else {
2309 add_effect( dis_type->symptoms, rng( dis_type->min_duration, dis_type->max_duration ),
2310 bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID(),
2311 false,
2312 rng( dis_type->min_intensity, dis_type->max_intensity ) );
2313 }
2314}
2315
2316void Character::process_turn()
2317{
2318 // Has to happen before reset_stats
2319 clear_miss_reasons();
2320 migrate_items_to_storage( false );
2321
2322 for( bionic &i : *my_bionics ) {
2323 if( i.incapacitated_time > 0_turns ) {
2324 i.incapacitated_time -= 1_turns;
2325 if( i.incapacitated_time == 0_turns ) {
2326 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s bionic comes back online." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s bionic comes back online."
) ) ), i.info().name );
2327 }
2328 }
2329 }
2330
2331 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
2332 mutation_reflex_trigger( mut );
2333 }
2334
2335 Creature::process_turn();
2336
2337 // If we're actively handling something we can't just drop it on the ground
2338 // in the middle of handling it
2339 if( activity.targets.empty() && activity.do_drop_invalid_inventory() ) {
2340 drop_invalid_inventory();
2341 }
2342 if( leak_level_dirty ) {
2343 calculate_leak_level();
2344 }
2345 process_items();
2346 leak_items();
2347 // Didn't just pick something up
2348 last_item = itype_null;
2349
2350 cache_visit_items_with( "is_relic", &item::is_relic, [this]( item & it ) {
2351 it.process_relic( this, pos() );
2352 } );
2353
2354 suffer();
2355 // NPCs currently don't make any use of their scent, pointless to calculate it
2356 // TODO: make use of NPC scent.
2357 if( !is_npc() ) {
2358 if( !has_effect( effect_masked_scent ) ) {
2359 restore_scent();
2360 }
2361 const int mask_intensity = get_effect_int( effect_masked_scent );
2362
2363 // Set our scent towards the norm
2364 int norm_scent = 500;
2365 int temp_norm_scent = INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1);
2366 bool found_intensity = false;
2367 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
2368 const std::optional<int> &scent_intensity = mut->scent_intensity;
2369 if( scent_intensity ) {
2370 found_intensity = true;
2371 temp_norm_scent = std::max( temp_norm_scent, *scent_intensity );
2372 }
2373 }
2374 if( found_intensity ) {
2375 norm_scent = temp_norm_scent;
2376 }
2377
2378 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
2379 const std::optional<int> &scent_mask = mut->scent_mask;
2380 if( scent_mask ) {
2381 norm_scent += *scent_mask;
2382 }
2383 }
2384
2385 //mask from scent altering items;
2386 norm_scent += mask_intensity;
2387
2388 // Scent increases fast at first, and slows down as it approaches normal levels.
2389 // Estimate it will take about norm_scent * 2 turns to go from 0 - norm_scent / 2
2390 // Without smelly trait this is about 1.5 hrs. Slows down significantly after that.
2391 if( scent < rng( 0, norm_scent ) ) {
2392 scent++;
2393 }
2394
2395 // Unusually high scent decreases steadily until it reaches normal levels.
2396 if( scent > norm_scent ) {
2397 scent--;
2398 }
2399
2400 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
2401 scent *= mut.obj().scent_modifier;
2402 }
2403 }
2404
2405 // We can dodge again! Assuming we can actually move...
2406 if( in_sleep_state() ) {
2407 blocks_left = 0;
2408 set_dodges_left( 0 );
2409 } else if( moves > 0 ) {
2410 blocks_left = get_num_blocks();
2411 set_dodges_left( get_num_dodges() );
2412 }
2413
2414 // auto-learning. This is here because skill-increases happens all over the place:
2415 // SkillLevel::readBook (has no connection to the skill or the player),
2416 // player::read, player::practice, ...
2417 // Check for spontaneous discovery of martial art styles
2418 for( auto &style : autolearn_martialart_types() ) {
2419 const matype_id &ma( style );
2420
2421 if( !martial_arts_data->has_martialart( ma ) && can_autolearn( ma ) ) {
2422 martial_arts_data->add_martialart( ma );
2423 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have learned a new style: %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have learned a new style: %s!"
) ) ), ma.obj().name );
2424 }
2425 }
2426
2427 // Update time spent conscious in this overmap tile for the Nomad traits.
2428 if( !is_npc() && ( has_trait( trait_NOMAD ) || has_trait( trait_NOMAD2 ) ||
2429 has_trait( trait_NOMAD3 ) ) &&
2430 !has_effect( effect_sleep ) && !has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
2431 const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
2432 const point_abs_omt pos = ompos.xy();
2433 if( overmap_time.find( pos ) == overmap_time.end() ) {
2434 overmap_time[pos] = 1_turns;
2435 } else {
2436 overmap_time[pos] += 1_turns;
2437 }
2438 }
2439 // Decay time spent in other overmap tiles.
2440 if( !is_npc() && calendar::once_every( 1_hours ) ) {
2441 const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
2442 const time_point now = calendar::turn;
2443 time_duration decay_time = 0_days;
2444 if( has_trait( trait_NOMAD ) ) {
2445 decay_time = 7_days;
2446 } else if( has_trait( trait_NOMAD2 ) ) {
2447 decay_time = 14_days;
2448 } else if( has_trait( trait_NOMAD3 ) ) {
2449 decay_time = 28_days;
2450 }
2451 auto it = overmap_time.begin();
2452 while( it != overmap_time.end() ) {
2453 if( it->first == ompos.xy() ) {
2454 it++;
2455 continue;
2456 }
2457 // Find the amount of time passed since the player touched any of the overmap tile's submaps.
2458 const tripoint_abs_omt tpt( it->first, 0 );
2459 const time_point last_touched = overmap_buffer.scent_at( tpt ).creation_time;
2460 const time_duration since_visit = now - last_touched;
2461 // If the player has spent little time in this overmap tile, let it decay after just an hour instead of the usual extended decay time.
2462 const time_duration modified_decay_time = it->second > 5_minutes ? decay_time : 1_hours;
2463 if( since_visit > modified_decay_time ) {
2464 // Reduce the tracked time spent in this overmap tile.
2465 const time_duration decay_amount = std::min( since_visit - modified_decay_time, 1_hours );
2466 const time_duration updated_value = it->second - decay_amount;
2467 if( updated_value <= 0_turns ) {
2468 // We can stop tracking this tile if there's no longer any time recorded there.
2469 it = overmap_time.erase( it );
2470 continue;
2471 } else {
2472 it->second = updated_value;
2473 }
2474 }
2475 it++;
2476 }
2477 }
2478 effect_on_conditions::process_effect_on_conditions( *this );
2479}
2480
2481void Character::recalc_hp()
2482{
2483 int str_boost_val = 0;
2484 std::optional<skill_boost> str_boost = skill_boost::get( "str" );
2485 if( str_boost ) {
2486 float skill_total = 0;
2487 for( const std::string &skill_str : str_boost->skills() ) {
2488 skill_total += get_skill_level( skill_id( skill_str ) );
2489 }
2490 str_boost_val = str_boost->calc_bonus( skill_total );
2491 }
2492 // Mutated toughness stacks with starting, by design.
2493 float hp_mod = 1.0f + enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( enchant_vals::mod::MAX_HP );
2494 float hp_adjustment = ( str_boost_val * 3 ) +
2495 enchantment_cache->get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::MAX_HP );
2496 calc_all_parts_hp( hp_mod, hp_adjustment, get_str_base(), get_dex_base(), get_per_base(),
2497 get_int_base(), get_lifestyle(), get_fat_to_hp() );
2498 cached_dead_state.reset();
2499}
2500
2501void Character::calc_all_parts_hp( float hp_mod, float hp_adjustment, int str_max, int dex_max,
2502 int per_max, int int_max, int healthy_mod, int fat_to_max_hp )
2503{
2504 for( std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &part : body ) {
2505 int new_max = ( part.first->base_hp + str_max * part.first->hp_mods.str_mod + dex_max *
2506 part.first->hp_mods.dex_mod + int_max * part.first->hp_mods.int_mod + per_max *
2507 part.first->hp_mods.per_mod + part.first->hp_mods.health_mod * healthy_mod + fat_to_max_hp +
2508 hp_adjustment ) * hp_mod;
2509
