2510 if( has_trait( trait_GLASSJAW ) && part.first == body_part_head ) {
2511 new_max *= 0.8;
2512 }
2513
2514 float max_hp_ratio = static_cast<float>( new_max ) /
2515 static_cast<float>( part.second.get_hp_max() );
2516
2517 int new_cur = std::ceil( static_cast<float>( part.second.get_hp_cur() ) * max_hp_ratio );
2518
2519 part.second.set_hp_max( std::max( new_max, 1 ) );
2520 part.second.set_hp_cur( std::max( std::min( new_cur, new_max ), 0 ) );
2521 }
2522}
2523
2524// This must be called when any of the following change:
2525// - effects
2526// - bionics
2527// - traits
2528// - underwater
2529// - clothes
2530// With the exception of clothes, all changes to these character attributes must
2531// occur through a function in this class which calls this function. Clothes are
2532// typically added/removed with wear() and takeoff(), but direct access to the
2533// 'wears' vector is still allowed due to refactor exhaustion.
2534void Character::recalc_sight_limits()
2535{
2536 sight_max = 9999;
2537 vision_mode_cache.reset();
2538 const bool in_light = get_map().ambient_light_at( pos() ) > LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT;
2539 bool in_shell = has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL2 ) ||
2540 has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL3 );
2541
2542 // Set sight_max.
2543 if( is_blind() || ( in_sleep_state() && !has_flag( json_flag_SEESLEEP ) && is_avatar() ) ||
2544 has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
2545 sight_max = 0;
2546 } else if( has_effect( effect_boomered ) && ( !has_trait( trait_PER_SLIME_OK ) ) ) {
2547 sight_max = 1;
2548 vision_mode_cache.set( BOOMERED );
2549 } else if( has_effect( effect_in_pit ) || has_effect( effect_no_sight ) ||
2550 ( underwater && !has_flag( json_flag_EYE_MEMBRANE ) && !worn_with_flag( flag_SWIM_GOGGLES ) ) ) {
2551 sight_max = 1;
2552 } else if( in_shell ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
2553 // You can kinda see out a bit.
2554 sight_max = 2;
2555 } else if( has_trait( trait_PER_SLIME ) ) {
2556 sight_max = 8;
2557 } else if( ( has_flag( json_flag_MYOPIC ) || ( in_light &&
2558 has_flag( json_flag_MYOPIC_IN_LIGHT ) ) ) &&
2559 !worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_NEARSIGHT ) && !has_effect( effect_contacts ) &&
2560 !has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) ) {
2561 sight_max = 12;
2562 } else if( has_effect( effect_darkness ) ) {
2563 vision_mode_cache.set( DARKNESS );
2564 sight_max = 10;
2565 }
2566
2567 // Debug-only NV, by vache's request
2568 if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NIGHTVISION ) ) {
2569 vision_mode_cache.set( DEBUG_NIGHTVISION );
2570 }
2571 if( has_nv() ) {
2572 vision_mode_cache.set( NV_GOGGLES );
2573 }
2574 if( has_active_mutation( trait_NIGHTVISION3 ) || is_wearing( itype_rm13_armor_on ) ||
2575 ( is_mounted() && mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_MECH_RECON_VISION ) ) ) {
2576 vision_mode_cache.set( NIGHTVISION_3 );
2577 }
2578 if( has_active_mutation( trait_ELFA_FNV ) ) {
2579 vision_mode_cache.set( FULL_ELFA_VISION );
2580 }
2581 if( has_active_mutation( trait_CEPH_VISION ) ) {
2582 vision_mode_cache.set( CEPH_VISION );
2583 }
2584 if( has_active_mutation( trait_ELFA_NV ) ) {
2585 vision_mode_cache.set( ELFA_VISION );
2586 }
2587 if( has_active_mutation( trait_NIGHTVISION2 ) ) {
2588 vision_mode_cache.set( NIGHTVISION_2 );
2589 }
2590 if( has_active_mutation( trait_FEL_NV ) ) {
2591 vision_mode_cache.set( FELINE_VISION );
2592 }
2593 if( has_active_mutation( trait_URSINE_EYE ) ) {
2594 vision_mode_cache.set( URSINE_VISION );
2595 }
2596 if( has_active_mutation( trait_NIGHTVISION ) ) {
2597 vision_mode_cache.set( NIGHTVISION_1 );
2598 }
2599 if( has_trait( trait_BIRD_EYE ) ) {
2600 vision_mode_cache.set( BIRD_EYE );
2601 }
2602
2603 // Not exactly a sight limit thing, but related enough
2604 if( has_flag( json_flag_INFRARED ) ||
2605 worn_with_flag( flag_IR_EFFECT ) || ( is_mounted() &&
2606 mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_MECH_RECON_VISION ) ) ) {
2607 vision_mode_cache.set( IR_VISION );
2608 }
2609
2610 if( has_flag( json_flag_SUPER_CLAIRVOYANCE ) ) {
2611 vision_mode_cache.set( VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE_SUPER );
2612 } else if( has_flag( json_flag_CLAIRVOYANCE_PLUS ) ) {
2613 vision_mode_cache.set( VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE_PLUS );
2614 } else if( has_flag( json_flag_CLAIRVOYANCE ) ) {
2615 vision_mode_cache.set( VISION_CLAIRVOYANCE );
2616 }
2617}
2618
2619static float threshold_for_range( float range )
2620{
2621 constexpr float epsilon = 0.01f;
2622 return LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL / std::exp( range * LIGHT_TRANSPARENCY_OPEN_AIR ) - epsilon;
2623}
2624
2625float Character::get_vision_threshold( float light_level ) const
2626{
2627 if( vision_mode_cache[DEBUG_NIGHTVISION] ) {
2628 // Debug vision always works with absurdly little light.
2629 return 0.01;
2630 }
2631
2632 // As light_level goes from LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL to LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT,
2633 // dimming goes from 1.0 to 2.0.
2634 const float dimming_from_light = 1.0f + ( ( light_level - LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL ) /
2635 ( LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT - LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL ) );
2636
2637 float range = get_per() / 3.0f;
2638 if( vision_mode_cache[NV_GOGGLES] || vision_mode_cache[NIGHTVISION_3] ||
2639 vision_mode_cache[FULL_ELFA_VISION] || vision_mode_cache[CEPH_VISION] ) {
2640 range += 10;
2641 } else if( vision_mode_cache[NIGHTVISION_2] || vision_mode_cache[FELINE_VISION] ||
2642 vision_mode_cache[URSINE_VISION] || vision_mode_cache[ELFA_VISION] ) {
2643 range += 4.5;
2644 } else if( vision_mode_cache[NIGHTVISION_1] ) {
2645 range += 2;
2646 }
2647
2648 if( vision_mode_cache[BIRD_EYE] ) {
2649 range++;
2650 }
2651
2652 range = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::NIGHT_VIS, range );
2653
2654 // Clamp range to 1+, so that we can always see where we are
2655 range = std::max( 1.0f, range * get_limb_score( limb_score_night_vis ) );
2656
2657 return std::min( LIGHT_AMBIENT_LOW,
2658 threshold_for_range( range ) * dimming_from_light );
2659}
2660
2661void Character::flag_encumbrance()
2662{
2663 check_encumbrance = true;
2664}
2665
2666void Character::check_item_encumbrance_flag()
2667{
2668 if( worn.check_item_encumbrance_flag( check_encumbrance ) ) {
2669 calc_encumbrance();
2670 }
2671}
2672
2673bool Character::natural_attack_restricted_on( const bodypart_id &bp ) const
2674{
2675 return worn.natural_attack_restricted_on( bp );
2676}
2677
2678bool Character::natural_attack_restricted_on( const sub_bodypart_id &bp ) const
2679{
2680 return worn.natural_attack_restricted_on( bp );
2681}
2682
2683std::vector<const item *> Character::get_pseudo_items() const
2684{
2685 if( !pseudo_items_valid ) {
2686 pseudo_items.clear();
2687
2688 for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
2689 std::vector<const item *> pseudos = bio.get_available_pseudo_items();
2690 for( const item *pseudo : pseudos ) {
2691 pseudo_items.push_back( pseudo );
2692 }
2693 }
2694
2695 pseudo_items_valid = true;
2696 }
2697 return pseudo_items;
2698}
2699
2700bool Character::practice( const skill_id &id, int amount, int cap, bool suppress_warning )
2701{
2702 SkillLevel &level = get_skill_level_object( id );
2703 const Skill &skill = id.obj();
2704 if( !level.can_train() || in_sleep_state() ||
2705 ( static_cast<int>( get_skill_level( id ) ) >= MAX_SKILL ) ) {
2706 // Do not practice if: cannot train, asleep, or at effective skill cap
2707 // Leaving as a skill method rather than global for possible future skill cap setting
2708 return false;
2709 }
2710
2711 // Your ability to "catch up" skill experience to knowledge is mostly a function of intelligence,
2712 // but perception also plays a role, representing both memory/attentiveness and catching on to how
2713 // the two apply to each other.
2714 float catchup_modifier = 1.0f + ( 2.0f * get_int() + get_per() ) / 24.0f; // 2 for an average person
2715 float knowledge_modifier = 1.0f + get_int() /
2716 40.0f; // 1.2 for an average person, always a bit higher than base amount
2717
2718 const auto highest_skill = [&]() {
2719 std::pair<skill_id, int> result( skill_id::NULL_ID(), -1 );
2720 for( const auto &pair : *_skills ) {
2721 const SkillLevel &lobj = pair.second;
2722 if( lobj.level() > result.second ) {
2723 result = std::make_pair( pair.first, lobj.level() );
2724 }
2725 }
2726 return result.first;
2727 };
2728
2729 const bool isSavant = has_trait( trait_SAVANT );
2730 const skill_id savantSkill = isSavant ? highest_skill() : skill_id::NULL_ID();
2731
2732 amount = adjust_for_focus( std::min( 1000, amount ) ) * 100.0f;
2733
2734 if( has_trait( trait_PACIFIST ) && skill.is_combat_skill() ) {
2735 amount /= 3.0f;
2736 }
2737
2738 catchup_modifier = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::COMBAT_CATCHUP,
2739 catchup_modifier );
2740
2741 if( isSavant && id != savantSkill ) {
2742 amount *= 0.5f;
2743 }
2744
2745 if( amount > 0 &&
2746 static_cast<int>( get_skill_level( id ) ) > cap ) { //blunt grinding cap implementation for crafting
2747 amount = 0;
2748 if( !suppress_warning ) {
2749 handle_skill_warning( id, false );
2750 }
2751 }
2752 bool level_up = false;
2753 if( amount > 0 && level.isTraining() ) {
2754 int old_practical_level = static_cast<int>( get_skill_level( id ) );
2755 int old_theoretical_level = get_knowledge_level( id );
2756 get_skill_level_object( id ).train( amount, catchup_modifier, knowledge_modifier );
2757 int new_practical_level = static_cast<int>( get_skill_level( id ) );
2758 int new_theoretical_level = get_knowledge_level( id );
2759 std::string skill_name = skill.name();
2760 if( new_practical_level > old_practical_level ) {
2761 get_event_bus().send<event_type::gains_skill_level>( getID(), id, new_practical_level );
2762 }
2763 if( is_avatar() && new_practical_level > old_practical_level ) {
2764 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your practical skill in %s has increased to %d!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your practical skill in %s has increased to %d!"
) ) ), skill_name,
2765 new_practical_level );
2766 level_up = true;
2767 }
2768 if( is_avatar() && new_theoretical_level > old_theoretical_level ) {
2769 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your theoretical understanding of %s has increased to %d!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your theoretical understanding of %s has increased to %d!"
) ) ), skill_name,
2770 new_theoretical_level );
2771 }
2772 if( is_avatar() && new_practical_level > cap ) {
2773 //inform player immediately that the current recipe can't be used to train further
2774 add_msg( m_info, _( "You feel that %s tasks of this level are becoming trivial." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You feel that %s tasks of this level are becoming trivial."
) ) ),
2775 skill_name );
2776 }
2777
2778 // Apex Predators don't think about much other than killing.
2779 // They don't lose Focus when practicing combat skills.
2780 if( !( has_flag( json_flag_PRED4 ) && skill.is_combat_skill() ) ) {
2781 // Base reduction on the larger of 1% of total, or practice amount.
2782 // The latter kicks in when long actions like crafting
2783 // apply many turns of gains at once.
2784 int focus_drain = std::max( focus_pool / 100, amount );
2785
2786 // The purpose of having this squared is that it makes focus drain dramatically slower
2787 // as it approaches zero. As such, the square function would not be used if the drain is
2788 // larger or equal to 1000 to avoid the runaway, and the original drain gets applied instead.
2789 if( focus_drain >= 1000 ) {
2790 focus_pool -= focus_drain;
2791 } else {
2792 focus_pool -= ( focus_drain * focus_drain ) / 1000;
2793 }
2794 }
2795 focus_pool = std::max( focus_pool, 0 );
2796 }
2797
2798 get_skill_level_object( id ).practice();
2799 return level_up;
2800}
2801
2802// Returned values range from 1.0 (unimpeded vision) to 11.0 (totally blind).
2803// 1.0 is LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT or brighter
2804// 4.0 is a dark clear night, barely bright enough for reading and crafting
2805// 6.0 is LIGHT_AMBIENT_DIM
2806// 7.3 is LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL, a dark cloudy night, unlit indoors
2807// 11.0 is zero light or blindness
2808float Character::fine_detail_vision_mod( const tripoint &p ) const
2809{
2810 // PER_SLIME_OK implies you can get enough eyes around the bile
2811 // that you can generally see. There still will be the haze, but
2812 // it's annoying rather than limiting.
2813 if( is_blind() ||
2814 ( ( has_effect( effect_boomered ) || has_effect( effect_darkness ) ) &&
2815 !has_trait( trait_PER_SLIME_OK ) ) ) {
2816 return 11.0;
2817 }
2818 // Scale linearly as light level approaches LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT.
2819 // If we're actually a source of light, assume we can direct it where we need it.
2820 // Therefore give a hefty bonus relative to ambient light.
2821 float own_light = std::max( 1.0f, LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT - active_light() - 2.0f );
2822
2823 // Same calculation as above, but with a result 3 lower.
2824 float ambient_light{};
2825 tripoint const check_p = p == tripoint_min ? pos() : p;
2826 tripoint const avatar_p = get_avatar().pos();
2827 if( is_avatar() || check_p.z == avatar_p.z ) {
2828 ambient_light = std::max( 1.0f,
2829 LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT - get_map().ambient_light_at( check_p ) + 1.0f );
2830 } else {
2831 // light map is not calculated outside the player character's z-level
2832 // even if fov_3d_z_range > 0, and building light map on multiple levels
2833 // could be expensive, so make NPCs able to see things in this case to
2834 // not interfere with NPC activity.
2835 ambient_light = 1.0f;
2836 }
2837
2838 return std::min( own_light, ambient_light );
2839}
2840
2841units::energy Character::get_power_level() const
2842{
2843 return power_level;
2844}
2845
2846units::energy Character::get_max_power_level() const
2847{
2848 units::energy val = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::BIONIC_POWER,
2849 max_power_level_cached + max_power_level_modifier );
2850 return clamp( val, 0_kJ, units::energy_max );
2851}
2852
2853void Character::set_power_level( const units::energy &npower )
2854{
2855 power_level = clamp( npower, 0_kJ, get_max_power_level() );
2856}
2857
2858void Character::set_max_power_level_modifier( const units::energy &capacity )
2859{
2860 max_power_level_modifier = clamp( capacity, units::energy_min, units::energy_max );
2861}
2862
2863void Character::set_max_power_level( const units::energy &capacity )
2864{
2865 max_power_level_modifier = clamp( capacity - max_power_level_cached, units::energy_min,
2866 units::energy_max );
2867}
2868
2869void Character::mod_power_level( const units::energy &npower )
2870{
2871 set_power_level( power_level + npower );
2872 if( npower < 0_kJ && !has_power() ) {
2873 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
2874 if( !bp->no_power_effect.is_null() ) {
2875 add_effect( bp->no_power_effect, 5_turns );
2876 }
2877 }
2878 }
2879}
2880
2881void Character::mod_max_power_level_modifier( const units::energy &npower )
2882{
2883 max_power_level_modifier = clamp( max_power_level_modifier + npower, units::energy_min,
2884 units::energy_max );
2885}
2886
2887bool Character::is_max_power() const
2888{
2889 return get_power_level() >= get_max_power_level();
2890}
2891
2892bool Character::has_power() const
2893{
2894 return get_power_level() > 0_kJ;
2895}
2896
2897bool Character::has_max_power() const
2898{
2899 return get_max_power_level() > 0_kJ;
2900}
2901
2902bool Character::enough_power_for( const bionic_id &bid ) const
2903{
2904 return get_power_level() >= bid->power_activate;
2905}
2906
2907std::vector<skill_id> Character::skills_offered_to( const Character *you ) const
2908{
2909 std::vector<skill_id> ret;
2910 for( const auto &pair : *_skills ) {
2911 const skill_id &id = pair.first;
2912 if( id->is_teachable() && pair.second.level() > 0 &&
2913 ( !you || you->get_knowledge_level( id ) < pair.second.level() ) ) {
2914 ret.push_back( id );
2915 }
2916 }
2917 return ret;
2918}
2919
2920std::vector<matype_id> Character::styles_offered_to( const Character *you ) const
2921{
2922 if( you ) {
2923 return you->martial_arts_data->get_unknown_styles( *martial_arts_data, true );
2924 }
2925 return martial_arts_data->get_known_styles( true );
2926}
2927
2928std::vector<spell_id> Character::spells_offered_to( const Character *you ) const
2929{
2930 std::vector<spell_id> teachable;
2931 for( const spell_id &sp : magic->spells() ) {
2932 const spell &teacher_spell = magic->get_spell( sp );
2933 if( sp->teachable && ( !you || you->magic->can_learn_spell( *you, sp ) ) ) {
2934 if( you && you->magic->knows_spell( sp ) ) {
2935 const spell &student_spell = you->magic->get_spell( sp );
2936 if( student_spell.is_max_level( *you ) ||
2937 student_spell.get_level() >= teacher_spell.get_level() ) {
2938 continue;
2939 }
2940 }
2941 teachable.emplace_back( sp );
2942 }
2943 }
2944 return teachable;
2945}
2946
2947void Character::conduct_blood_analysis()
2948{
2949 std::vector<std::string> effect_descriptions;
2950 std::vector<nc_color> colors;
2951
2952 for( auto &elem : *effects ) {
2953 if( elem.first->get_blood_analysis_description().empty() ) {
2954 continue;
2955 }
2956 effect_descriptions.emplace_back( elem.first->get_blood_analysis_description() );
2957 colors.emplace_back( elem.first->get_rating() == m_good ? c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) : c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) );
2958 }
2959
2960 const int win_w = 46;
2961 size_t win_h = 0;
2962 catacurses::window w;
2963 ui_adaptor ui;
2964 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2965 win_h = std::min( static_cast<size_t>( TERMY ),
2966 std::max<size_t>( 1, effect_descriptions.size() ) + 2 );
2967 w = catacurses::newwin( win_h, win_w,
2968 point( ( TERMX - win_w ) / 2, ( TERMY - win_h ) / 2 ) );
2969 ui.position_from_window( w );
2970 } );
2971 ui.mark_resize();
2972 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
2973 draw_border( w, c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red), string_format( " %s ", _( "Blood Test Results" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Blood Test Results" ) ) ) ) );
2974 if( effect_descriptions.empty() ) {
2975 trim_and_print( w, point( 2, 1 ), win_w - 3, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "No effects." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No effects." ) ) ) );
2976 } else {
2977 for( size_t line = 1; line < ( win_h - 1 ) && line <= effect_descriptions.size(); ++line ) {
2978 trim_and_print( w, point( 2, line ), win_w - 3, colors[line - 1], effect_descriptions[line - 1] );
2979 }
2980 }
2981 wnoutrefresh( w );
2982 } );
2983 input_context ctxt( "BLOOD_TEST_RESULTS" );
2984 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
2985 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
2986 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
2987 bool stop = false;
2988 // Display new messages
2989 g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
2990 while( !stop ) {
2991 ui_manager::redraw();
2992 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
2993 if( action == "CONFIRM" || action == "QUIT" ) {
2994 stop = true;
2995 }
2996 }
2997}
2998
2999int Character::get_standard_stamina_cost( const item *thrown_item ) const
3000{
3001 // Previously calculated as 2_gram * std::max( 1, str_cur )
3002 // using 16_gram normalizes it to 8 str. Same effort expenditure
3003 // for each strike, regardless of weight. This is compensated
3004 // for by the additional move cost as weapon weight increases
3005 //If the item is thrown, override with the thrown item instead.
3006
3007 item current_weapon = used_weapon() ? *used_weapon() : null_item_reference();
3008
3009 const int weight_cost = ( thrown_item == nullptr ) ? current_weapon.weight() /
3010 16_gram : thrown_item->weight() / 16_gram;
3011 return ( weight_cost + 50 ) * -1 * get_modifier( character_modifier_melee_stamina_cost_mod );
3012}
3013
3014std::vector<item_location> Character::nearby( const
3015 std::function<bool( const item *, const item * )> &func, int radius ) const
3016{
3017 std::vector<item_location> res;
3018
3019 visit_items( [&]( const item * e, const item * parent ) {
3020 if( func( e, parent ) ) {
3021 res.emplace_back( const_cast<Character &>( *this ), const_cast<item *>( e ) );
3022 }
3023 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3024 } );
3025
3026 for( const map_cursor &cur : map_selector( pos(), radius ) ) {
3027 cur.visit_items( [&]( const item * e, const item * parent ) {
3028 if( func( e, parent ) ) {
3029 res.emplace_back( cur, const_cast<item *>( e ) );
3030 }
3031 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3032 } );
3033 }
3034
3035 for( const vehicle_cursor &cur : vehicle_selector( pos(), radius ) ) {
3036 cur.visit_items( [&]( const item * e, const item * parent ) {
3037 if( func( e, parent ) ) {
3038 res.emplace_back( cur, const_cast<item *>( e ) );
3039 }
3040 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3041 } );
3042 }
3043
3044 return res;
3045}
3046
3047std::list<item> Character::remove_worn_items_with( const std::function<bool( item & )> &filter )
3048{
3049 invalidate_inventory_validity_cache();
3050 invalidate_leak_level_cache();
3051 return worn.remove_worn_items_with( filter, *this );
3052}
3053
3054void Character::clear_worn()
3055{
3056 worn.worn.clear();
3057 inv_search_caches.clear();
3058}
3059
3060std::list<item *> Character::get_dependent_worn_items( const item &it )
3061{
3062 std::list<item *> dependent;
3063
3064 if( is_worn( it ) ) {
3065 worn.add_dependent_item( dependent, it );
3066 }
3067
3068 return dependent;
3069}
3070
3071item Character::remove_weapon()
3072{
3073 item tmp = weapon;
3074 weapon = item();
3075 get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_wields_item>( getID(), weapon.typeId() );
3076 cached_info.erase( "weapon_value" );
3077 invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
3078 return tmp;
3079}
3080
3081void Character::remove_mission_items( int mission_id )
3082{
3083 if( mission_id == -1 ) {
3084 return;
3085 }
3086 remove_items_with( has_mission_item_filter { mission_id } );
3087}
3088
3089void Character::on_move( const tripoint_abs_ms &old_pos )
3090{
3091 Creature::on_move( old_pos );
3092 // In case we've moved out of range of lifting assist.
3093 if( using_lifting_assist ) {
3094 invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
3095 }
3096}
3097
3098units::mass Character::weight_carried() const
3099{
3100 if( cached_weight_carried ) {
3101 return *cached_weight_carried;
3102 }
3103 cached_weight_carried = weight_carried_with_tweaks( item_tweaks() );
3104 return *cached_weight_carried;
3105}
3106
3107void Character::invalidate_weight_carried_cache()
3108{
3109 cached_weight_carried = std::nullopt;
3110}
3111
3112units::mass Character::best_nearby_lifting_assist() const
3113{
3114 return best_nearby_lifting_assist( this->pos() );
3115}
3116
3117units::mass Character::best_nearby_lifting_assist( const tripoint &world_pos ) const
3118{
3119 int mech_lift = 0;
3120 if( is_mounted() ) {
3121 auto *mons = mounted_creature.get();
3122 if( mons->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
3123 mech_lift = mons->mech_str_addition() + 10;
3124 }
3125 }
3126 int lift_quality = std::max( { this->max_quality( qual_LIFT ), mech_lift,
3127 map_selector( this->pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ).max_quality( qual_LIFT ),
3128 vehicle_selector( world_pos, 4, true, true ).max_quality( qual_LIFT )
3129 } );
3130 return lifting_quality_to_mass( lift_quality );
3131}
3132
3133units::mass Character::weight_carried_with_tweaks( const std::vector<std::pair<item_location, int>>
3134 &locations ) const
3135{
3136 std::map<const item *, int> dropping;
3137 for( const std::pair<item_location, int> &location_pair : locations ) {
3138 dropping.emplace( location_pair.first.get_item(), location_pair.second );
3139 }
3140 return weight_carried_with_tweaks( item_tweaks( { dropping } ) );
3141}
3142
3143units::mass Character::weight_carried_with_tweaks( const item_tweaks &tweaks ) const
3144{
3145 const std::map<const item *, int> empty;
3146 const std::map<const item *, int> &without = tweaks.without_items ? tweaks.without_items->get() :
3147 empty;
3148
3149 // Worn items
3150 units::mass ret = worn.weight_carried_with_tweaks( without );
3151
3152 // Wielded item
3153 units::mass weaponweight = 0_gram;
3154 if( !without.count( &weapon ) ) {
3155 weaponweight += weapon.weight();
3156 for( const item *i : weapon.all_items_ptr( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
3157 if( i->count_by_charges() ) {
3158 weaponweight -= get_selected_stack_weight( i, without );
3159 } else if( without.count( i ) ) {
3160 weaponweight -= i->weight();
3161 }
3162 }
3163 } else if( weapon.count_by_charges() ) {
3164 weaponweight += weapon.weight() - get_selected_stack_weight( &weapon, without );
3165 }
3166
3167 // Exclude wielded item if using lifting tool
3168 if( ( weaponweight + ret <= weight_capacity() ) || ( g->new_game ||
3169 best_nearby_lifting_assist() < weaponweight ) ) {
3170 ret += weaponweight;
3171 using_lifting_assist = false;
3172 } else {
3173 using_lifting_assist = true;
3174 }
3175
3176 return ret;
3177}
3178
3179units::volume Character::volume_carried_with_tweaks( const
3180 std::vector<std::pair<item_location, int>>
3181 &locations ) const
3182{
3183 std::map<const item *, int> dropping;
3184 for( const std::pair<item_location, int> &location_pair : locations ) {
3185 dropping.emplace( location_pair.first.get_item(), location_pair.second );
3186 }
3187 return volume_carried_with_tweaks( item_tweaks( { dropping } ) );
3188}
3189
3190units::volume Character::volume_carried_with_tweaks( const item_tweaks &tweaks ) const
3191{
3192 const std::map<const item *, int> empty;
3193 const std::map<const item *, int> &without = tweaks.without_items ? tweaks.without_items->get() :
3194 empty;
3195
3196 // Worn items
3197 units::volume ret = worn.contents_volume_with_tweaks( without );
3198
3199 // Wielded item
3200 if( !without.count( &weapon ) ) {
3201 ret += weapon.get_contents_volume_with_tweaks( without );
3202 }
3203
3204 return ret;
3205}
3206
3207units::mass Character::weight_capacity() const
3208{
3209 // Get base capacity from creature,
3210 // then apply player-only mutation and trait effects.
3211 units::mass ret = Creature::weight_capacity();
3212 /** @EFFECT_STR increases carrying capacity */
3213 ret += get_str() * 4_kilogram;
3214 ret *= mutation_value( "weight_capacity_modifier" );
3215
3216 units::mass worn_weight_bonus = 0_gram;
3217 ret *= worn.weight_capacity_modifier();
3218 worn_weight_bonus += worn.weight_capacity_bonus();
3219
3220 units::mass bio_weight_bonus = 0_gram;
3221 for( const bionic_id &bid : get_bionics() ) {
3222 ret *= bid->weight_capacity_modifier;
3223 bio_weight_bonus += bid->weight_capacity_bonus;
3224 }
3225
3226 ret += bio_weight_bonus + worn_weight_bonus;
3227
3228 ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::CARRY_WEIGHT, ret );
3229
3230 if( ret < 0_gram ) {
3231 ret = 0_gram;
3232 }
3233 if( is_mounted() ) {
3234 auto *mons = mounted_creature.get();
3235 // the mech has an effective strength for other purposes, like hitting.
3236 // but for lifting, its effective strength is even higher, due to its sturdy construction, leverage,
3237 // and being built entirely for that purpose with hydraulics etc.
3238 ret = mons->mech_str_addition() == 0 ? ret : ( mons->mech_str_addition() + 10 ) * 4_kilogram;
3239 }
3240 return ret;
3241}
3242
3243bool Character::can_pickVolume( const item &it, bool, const item *avoid,
3244 const bool ignore_pkt_settings ) const
3245{
3246 if( ( avoid == nullptr || &weapon != avoid ) &&
3247 weapon.can_contain( it, false, false, ignore_pkt_settings ).success() ) {
3248 return true;
3249 }
3250 if( worn.can_pickVolume( it, ignore_pkt_settings ) ) {
3251 return true;
3252 }
3253 return false;
3254}
3255
3256bool Character::can_pickVolume_partial( const item &it, bool, const item *avoid,
3257 const bool ignore_pkt_settings ) const
3258{
3259 item copy = it;
3260 if( it.count_by_charges() ) {
3261 copy.charges = 1;
3262 }
3263
3264 if( ( avoid == nullptr || &weapon != avoid ) &&
3265 weapon.can_contain( copy, false, false, ignore_pkt_settings ).success() ) {
3266 return true;
3267 }
3268
3269 return worn.can_pickVolume( copy, ignore_pkt_settings );
3270}
3271
3272bool Character::can_pickWeight( const item &it, bool safe ) const
3273{
3274 if( !safe ) {
3275 // Character can carry up to four times their maximum weight
3276 return ( weight_carried() + it.weight() <= weight_capacity() * 4 );
3277 } else {
3278 return ( weight_carried() + it.weight() <= weight_capacity() );
3279 }
3280}
3281
3282bool Character::can_pickWeight_partial( const item &it, bool safe ) const
3283{
3284 item copy = it;
3285 if( it.count_by_charges() ) {
3286 copy.charges = 1;
3287 }
3288
3289 return can_pickWeight( copy, safe );
3290}
3291
3292bool Character::can_use( const item &it, const item &context ) const
3293{
3294 if( has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
3295 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You can't use anything while incorporeal." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't use anything while incorporeal."
) ) ),
3296 _( "<npcname> can't use anything while incorporeal." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> can't use anything while incorporeal."
) ) ) );
3297 return false;
3298 }
3299 const item &ctx = !context.is_null() ? context : it;
3300
3301 if( !meets_requirements( it, ctx ) ) {
3302 const std::string unmet( enumerate_unmet_requirements( it, ctx ) );
3303
3304 if( &it == &ctx ) {
3305 //~ %1$s - list of unmet requirements, %2$s - item name.
3306 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You need at least %1$s to use this %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need at least %1$s to use this %2$s."
) ) ),
3307 _( "<npcname> needs at least %1$s to use this %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> needs at least %1$s to use this %2$s."
) ) ),
3308 unmet, it.tname() );
3309 } else {
3310 //~ %1$s - list of unmet requirements, %2$s - item name, %3$s - indirect item name.
3311 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You need at least %1$s to use this %2$s with your %3$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need at least %1$s to use this %2$s with your %3$s."
) ) ),
3312 _( "<npcname> needs at least %1$s to use this %2$s with their %3$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> needs at least %1$s to use this %2$s with their %3$s."
) ) ),
3313 unmet, it.tname(), ctx.tname() );
3314 }
3315
3316 return false;
3317 }
3318
3319 return true;
3320}
3321
3322ret_val<void> Character::can_unwield( const item &it ) const
3323{
3324 if( it.has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) ) {
3325 // check if "it" is currently wielded fake bionic weapon that can be deactivated
3326 std::optional<bionic *> bio_opt = find_bionic_by_uid( get_weapon_bionic_uid() );
3327 if( !is_wielding( it ) || it.ethereal || !bio_opt ||
3328 !can_deactivate_bionic( **bio_opt ).success() ) {
3329 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You cannot unwield your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot unwield your %s."
) ) ), it.tname() );
3330 }
3331 }
3332
3333 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
3334}
3335
3336void Character::invalidate_inventory_validity_cache()
3337{
3338 cache_inventory_is_valid = false;
3339}
3340bool Character::is_wielding( const item &target ) const
3341{
3342 return &weapon == &target;
3343}
3344
3345std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> Character::get_overlay_ids() const
3346{
3347 std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> rval;
3348 std::multimap<int, std::pair<std::string, std::string>> mutation_sorting;
3349 int order;
3350 std::string overlay_id;
3351 std::string variant;
3352
3353 // first get effects
3354 for( const auto &eff_pr : *effects ) {
3355 rval.emplace_back( "effect_" + eff_pr.first.str(), "" );
3356 }
3357
3358 // then get mutations
3359 const std::vector<trait_id> &all_mutations = get_mutations();
3360 for( const trait_id &mut : all_mutations ) {
3361 // get the data if it exists
3362 const auto mut_data = my_mutations.find( mut );
3363 if( mut_data == my_mutations.end() ) {
3364 // this entry is from an enchantment and doesn't have any character dependent info
3365 overlay_id = mut.str();
3366
3367 } else {
3368 if( !mut_data->second.show_sprite ) {
3369 continue;
3370 }
3371 overlay_id = ( mut_data->second.powered ? "active_" : "" ) + mut.str();
3372 if( mut_data->second.variant != nullptr ) {
3373 variant = mut_data->second.variant->id;
3374 }
3375 }
3376 order = get_overlay_order_of_mutation( overlay_id );
3377 mutation_sorting.emplace( order, std::pair<std::string, std::string> { overlay_id, variant } );
3378 }
3379
3380 // then get bionics
3381 for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
3382 if( !bio.show_sprite ) {
3383 continue;
3384 }
3385 overlay_id = ( bio.powered ? "active_" : "" ) + bio.id.str();
3386 order = get_overlay_order_of_mutation( overlay_id );
3387 mutation_sorting.emplace( order, std::pair<std::string, std::string> { overlay_id, "" } );
3388 }
3389
3390 for( auto &mutorder : mutation_sorting ) {
3391 rval.emplace_back( "mutation_" + mutorder.second.first, mutorder.second.second );
3392 }
3393
3394 // next clothing
3395 worn.get_overlay_ids( rval );
3396
3397 // last weapon
3398 // TODO: might there be clothing that covers the weapon?
3399 if( is_armed() ) {
3400 const std::string variant = weapon.has_itype_variant() ? weapon.itype_variant().id : "";
3401 rval.emplace_back( "wielded_" + weapon.typeId().str(), variant );
3402 }
3403
3404 if( !is_walking() ) {
3405 rval.emplace_back( move_mode.str(), "" );
3406 }
3407
3408 return rval;
3409}
3410
3411std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> Character::get_overlay_ids_when_override_look()
3412 const
3413{
3414 std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> rval;
3415 std::multimap<int, std::pair<std::string, std::string>> mutation_sorting;
3416 std::string overlay_id;
3417 std::string variant;
3418
3419 // first get effects
3420 for( const auto &eff_pr : *effects ) {
3421 rval.emplace_back( "effect_" + eff_pr.first.str(), "" );
3422 }
3423 // then move_move sign
3424 if( !is_walking() ) {
3425 rval.emplace_back( move_mode.str(), "" );
3426 }
3427 return rval;
3428}
3429
3430SkillLevelMap Character::get_all_skills() const
3431{
3432 SkillLevelMap skills = *_skills;
3433 for( std::pair<const skill_id, SkillLevel> &sk : skills ) {
3434 sk.second.level( std::round( enchantment_cache->modify_value( sk.first, sk.second.level() ) ) );
3435 }
3436 return skills;
3437}
3438
3439const SkillLevel &Character::get_skill_level_object( const skill_id &ident ) const
3440{
3441 return _skills->get_skill_level_object( ident );
3442}
3443
3444SkillLevel &Character::get_skill_level_object( const skill_id &ident )
3445{
3446 return _skills->get_skill_level_object( ident );
3447}
3448
3449float Character::get_skill_level( const skill_id &ident ) const
3450{
3451 return enchantment_cache->modify_value( ident,
3452 _skills->get_skill_level( ident ) + _skills->get_progress_level( ident ) );
3453}
3454
3455float Character::get_skill_level( const skill_id &ident, const item &context ) const
3456{
3457 return enchantment_cache->modify_value( ident, _skills->get_skill_level( ident,
3458 context ) + _skills->get_progress_level( ident,
3459 context ) );
3460}
3461
3462int Character::get_knowledge_level( const skill_id &ident ) const
3463{
3464 return _skills->get_knowledge_level( ident );
3465}
3466
3467float Character::get_knowledge_plus_progress( const skill_id &ident ) const
3468{
3469 return _skills->get_knowledge_level( ident ) + _skills->get_knowledge_progress_level( ident );
3470}
3471
3472int Character::get_knowledge_level( const skill_id &ident, const item &context ) const
3473{
3474 return _skills->get_knowledge_level( ident, context );
3475}
3476
3477float Character::get_average_skill_level( const skill_id &ident ) const
3478{
3479 return ( get_skill_level( ident ) + get_knowledge_plus_progress( ident ) ) / 2;
3480}
3481
3482float Character::get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( const skill_id &ident ) const
3483{
3484 return get_skill_level( ident ) > get_knowledge_plus_progress( ident ) ? get_skill_level(
3485 ident ) : get_knowledge_plus_progress( ident );
3486}
3487
3488void Character::set_skill_level( const skill_id &ident, const int level )
3489{
3490 get_skill_level_object( ident ).level( level );
3491}
3492
3493void Character::mod_skill_level( const skill_id &ident, const int delta )
3494{
3495 _skills->mod_skill_level( ident, delta );
3496}
3497void Character::set_knowledge_level( const skill_id &ident, const int level )
3498{
3499 get_skill_level_object( ident ).knowledgeLevel( level );
3500}
3501
3502void Character::mod_knowledge_level( const skill_id &ident, const int delta )
3503{
3504 _skills->mod_knowledge_level( ident, delta );
3505}
3506
3507std::string Character::enumerate_unmet_requirements( const item &it, const item &context ) const
3508{
3509 std::vector<std::string> unmet_reqs;
3510
3511 const auto check_req = [ &unmet_reqs ]( const std::string & name, int cur, int req ) {
3512 if( cur < req ) {
3513 unmet_reqs.push_back( string_format( "%s %d", name, req ) );
3514 }
3515 };
3516
3517 check_req( _( "strength" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "strength" ) ) ), get_str(), it.get_min_str() );
3518 check_req( _( "dexterity" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "dexterity" ) ) ), get_dex(), it.type->min_dex );
3519 check_req( _( "intelligence" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "intelligence" ) ) ), get_int(), it.type->min_int );
3520 check_req( _( "perception" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "perception" ) ) ), get_per(), it.type->min_per );
3521
3522 for( const auto &elem : it.type->min_skills ) {
3523 check_req( context.contextualize_skill( elem.first )->name(),
3524 static_cast<int>( get_skill_level( elem.first, context ) ),
3525 elem.second );
3526 }
3527
3528 return enumerate_as_string( unmet_reqs );
3529}
3530
3531int Character::read_speed() const
3532{
3533 // Stat window shows stat effects on based on current stat
3534 const float intel = 2.0f + get_int() / 8.0f;
3535 // 4 int = 72 seconds, 8 int = 60 seconds, 12 int = 51 seconds, 16 int = 45 seconds, 20 int = 40 seconds
3536 /** @EFFECT_INT affects reading speed by an decreasing amount the higher intelligence goes, intially about 9% per point at 4 int to lower than 4% at 20+ int */
3537 time_duration ret = 180_seconds / intel;
3538
3539 ret *= mutation_value( "reading_speed_multiplier" );
3540
3541 ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::READING_SPEED_MULTIPLIER, ret );
3542 if( ret < 1_seconds ) {
3543 ret = 1_seconds;
3544 }
3545 return ret * 100 / 1_minutes;
3546}
3547
3548bool Character::meets_skill_requirements( const std::map<skill_id, int> &req,
3549 const item &context ) const
3550{
3551 return _skills->meets_skill_requirements( req, context );
3552}
3553
3554bool Character::meets_skill_requirements( const construction &con ) const
3555{
3556 return std::all_of( con.required_skills.begin(), con.required_skills.end(),
3557 [&]( const std::pair<skill_id, int> &pr ) {
3558 return get_knowledge_level( pr.first ) >= pr.second;
3559 } );
3560}
3561
3562bool Character::meets_stat_requirements( const item &it ) const
3563{
3564 return get_str() >= it.get_min_str() &&
3565 get_dex() >= it.type->min_dex &&
3566 get_int() >= it.type->min_int &&
3567 get_per() >= it.type->min_per;
3568}
3569
3570bool Character::meets_requirements( const item &it, const item &context ) const
3571{
3572 const item &ctx = !context.is_null() ? context : it;
3573 return meets_stat_requirements( it ) && meets_skill_requirements( it.type->min_skills, ctx );
3574}
3575
3576void Character::normalize()
3577{
3578 Creature::normalize();
3579
3580 activity_history.weary_clear();
3581 martial_arts_data->reset_style();
3582 weapon = item( "null", calendar::turn_zero );
3583
3584 set_body();
3585 recalc_hp();
3586 set_all_parts_temp_conv( BODYTEMP_NORM );
3587 set_stamina( get_stamina_max() );
3588 oxygen = get_oxygen_max();
3589}
3590
3591// Actual player death is mostly handled in game::is_game_over
3592void Character::die( Creature *nkiller )
3593{
3594 g->set_critter_died();
3595 set_all_parts_hp_cur( 0 );
3596 set_killer( nkiller );
3597 set_time_died( calendar::turn );
3598
3599 if( has_effect( effect_heavysnare ) ) {
3600 inv->add_item( item( "rope_6", calendar::turn_zero ) );
3601 inv->add_item( item( "snare_trigger", calendar::turn_zero ) );
3602 }
3603 if( has_effect( effect_beartrap ) ) {
3604 inv->add_item( item( "beartrap", calendar::turn_zero ) );
3605 }
3606 mission::on_creature_death( *this );
3607}
3608
3609void Character::prevent_death()
3610{
3611 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
3612 if( bp->is_vital ) {
3613 if( get_part_hp_cur( bp ) <= 0 ) {
3614 set_part_hp_cur( bp, 1 );
3615 }
3616 }
3617 }
3618 cached_dead_state.reset();
3619}
3620
3621void Character::apply_skill_boost()
3622{
3623 for( const skill_boost &boost : skill_boost::get_all() ) {
3624 float skill_total = 0;
3625 for( const std::string &skill_str : boost.skills() ) {
3626 skill_total += get_skill_level( skill_id( skill_str ) );
3627 }
3628 mod_stat( boost.stat(), boost.calc_bonus( skill_total ) );
3629 if( boost.stat() == "str" ) {
3630 recalc_hp();
3631 }
3632 }
3633}
3634
3635std::pair<bodypart_id, int> Character::best_part_to_smash() const
3636{
3637 const bodypart_id bp_null( "bp_null" );
3638 std::pair<bodypart_id, int> best_part_to_smash = {bp_null, 0};
3639 int tmp_bash_armor = 0;
3640 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
3641 tmp_bash_armor += worn.damage_resist( damage_bash, bp );
3642 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
3643 const resistances &res = mut->damage_resistance( bp );
3644 tmp_bash_armor += std::floor( res.type_resist( damage_bash ) );
3645 }
3646 if( tmp_bash_armor > best_part_to_smash.second ) {
3647 best_part_to_smash = {bp, tmp_bash_armor};
3648 }
3649 }
3650
3651 return best_part_to_smash;
3652}
3653
3654int Character::smash_ability() const
3655{
3656 int ret = get_arm_str();
3657 ///\EFFECT_STR increases smashing capability
3658 if( is_mounted() ) {
3659 auto *mon = mounted_creature.get();
3660 ret += mon->mech_str_addition() + mon->type->melee_dice * mon->type->melee_sides;
3661 } else if( get_wielded_item() ) {
3662 ret += get_wielded_item()->damage_melee( damage_bash );
3663 ret = calculate_by_enchantment( ret, enchant_vals::mod::ITEM_DAMAGE_BASH, true );
3664 }
3665
3666 if( !has_weapon() ) {
3667 std::pair<bodypart_id, int> best_part = best_part_to_smash();
3668 const int min_ret = ret * best_part.first->smash_efficiency;
3669 const int max_ret = ret * ( 1.0f + best_part.first->smash_efficiency );
3670 ret = std::min( best_part.second + min_ret, max_ret );
3671 }
3672 ret = calculate_by_enchantment( ret, enchant_vals::mod::MELEE_DAMAGE, true );
3673
3674 return ret;
3675}
3676
3677void Character::do_skill_rust()
3678{
3679 for( std::pair<const skill_id, SkillLevel> &pair : *_skills ) {
3680 const Skill &aSkill = *pair.first;
3681 SkillLevel &skill_level_obj = pair.second;
3682
3683 if( aSkill.is_combat_skill() &&
3684 ( ( has_flag( json_flag_PRED2 ) && calendar::once_every( 8_hours ) ) ||
3685 ( has_flag( json_flag_PRED3 ) && calendar::once_every( 4_hours ) ) ||
3686 ( has_flag( json_flag_PRED4 ) && calendar::once_every( 3_hours ) ) ) ) {
3687 // Their brain is optimized to remember this
3688 if( one_in( 13 ) ) {
3689 // They've already passed the roll to avoid rust at
3690 // this point, but print a message about it now and
3691 // then.
3692 //
3693 // 13 combat skills.
3694 // This means PRED2/PRED3/PRED4 think of hunting on
3695 // average every 8/4/3 hours, enough for immersion
3696 // without becoming an annoyance.
3697 //
3698 add_msg_if_player( _( "Your heart races as you recall your most recent hunt." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your heart races as you recall your most recent hunt."
) ) ) );
3699 mod_stim( 1 );
3700 }
3701 continue;
3702 }
3703
3704 const int rust_resist = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SKILL_RUST_RESIST, 0 );
3705 if( skill_level_obj.rust( rust_resist, mutation_value( "skill_rust_multiplier" ) ) ) {
3706 mod_power_level( -bio_memory->power_trigger );
3707 }
3708 }
3709}
3710
3711int Character::focus_equilibrium_fatigue_cap( int equilibrium ) const
3712{
3713 if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::MASSIVE_FATIGUE && equilibrium > 20 ) {
3714 return 20;
3715 } else if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::EXHAUSTED && equilibrium > 40 ) {
3716 return 40;
3717 } else if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::DEAD_TIRED && equilibrium > 60 ) {
3718 return 60;
3719 } else if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::TIRED && equilibrium > 80 ) {
3720 return 80;
3721 }
3722 return equilibrium;
3723}
3724
3725int Character::calc_focus_equilibrium( bool ignore_pain ) const
3726{
3727 int focus_equilibrium = 100;
3728
3729 if( activity.id() == ACT_READ ) {
3730 const item_location book = activity.targets[0];
3731 if( book && book->is_book() ) {
3732 const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &bt = book->type->book;
3733 // apply a penalty when we're actually learning something
3734 const SkillLevel &skill_level = get_skill_level_object( bt->skill );
3735 if( skill_level.can_train() && skill_level < bt->level ) {
3736 focus_equilibrium -= 50;
3737 }
3738 }
3739 }
3740
3741 int eff_morale = get_morale_level();
3742 // Factor in perceived pain, since it's harder to rest your mind while your body hurts.
3743 // Cenobites don't mind, though
3744 if( !ignore_pain && !has_trait( trait_CENOBITE ) ) {
3745 int perceived_pain = get_perceived_pain();
3746 if( has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST ) ) {
3747 if( perceived_pain > 20 ) {
3748 eff_morale = eff_morale - ( perceived_pain - 20 );
3749 }
3750 } else {
3751 eff_morale = eff_morale - perceived_pain;
3752 }
3753 }
3754
3755 if( eff_morale < -99 ) {
3756 // At very low morale, focus is at it's minimum
3757 focus_equilibrium = 1;
3758 } else if( eff_morale <= 50 ) {
3759 // At -99 to +50 morale, each point of morale gives or takes 1 point of focus
3760 focus_equilibrium += eff_morale;
3761 } else {
3762 /* Above 50 morale, we apply strong diminishing returns.
3763 * Each block of 50 takes twice as many morale points as the previous one:
3764 * 150 focus at 50 morale (as before)
3765 * 200 focus at 150 morale (100 more morale)
3766 * 250 focus at 350 morale (200 more morale)
3767 * ...
3768 * Cap out at 400% focus gain with 3,150+ morale, mostly as a sanity check.
3769 */
3770
3771 int block_multiplier = 1;
3772 int morale_left = eff_morale;
3773 while( focus_equilibrium < 400 ) {
3774 if( morale_left > 50 * block_multiplier ) {
3775 // We can afford the entire block. Get it and continue.
3776 morale_left -= 50 * block_multiplier;
3777 focus_equilibrium += 50;
3778 block_multiplier *= 2;
3779 } else {
3780 // We can't afford the entire block. Each block_multiplier morale
3781 // points give 1 focus, and then we're done.
3782 focus_equilibrium += morale_left / block_multiplier;
3783 break;
3784 }
3785 }
3786 }
3787
3788 // This should be redundant, but just in case...
3789 if( focus_equilibrium < 1 ) {
3790 focus_equilibrium = 1;
3791 } else if( focus_equilibrium > 400 ) {
3792 focus_equilibrium = 400;
3793 }
3794 return focus_equilibrium;
3795}
3796
3797int Character::calc_focus_change() const
3798{
3799 return focus_equilibrium_fatigue_cap( calc_focus_equilibrium() ) - get_focus();
3800}
3801
3802void Character::update_mental_focus()
3803{
3804 // calc_focus_change() returns percentile focus, applying it directly
3805 // to focus pool is an implicit / 100.
3806 focus_pool += 10 * calc_focus_change();
3807}
3808
3809void Character::reset_stats()
3810{
3811 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
3812 update_mental_focus();
3813 }
3814
3815 // Bionic buffs
3816 if( has_active_bionic( bio_hydraulics ) ) {
3817 mod_str_bonus( 20 );
3818 }
3819
3820 mod_str_bonus( get_mod_stat_from_bionic( character_stat::STRENGTH ) );
3821 mod_dex_bonus( get_mod_stat_from_bionic( character_stat::DEXTERITY ) );
3822 mod_per_bonus( get_mod_stat_from_bionic( character_stat::PERCEPTION ) );
3823 mod_int_bonus( get_mod_stat_from_bionic( character_stat::INTELLIGENCE ) );
3824
3825 /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX above 15 decreases Dodge bonus by 1 (NEGATIVE) */
3826 if( str_max >= 16 ) {
3827 mod_dodge_bonus( -1 ); // Penalty if we're huge
3828 }
3829 /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX below 6 increases Dodge bonus by 1 */
3830 else if( str_max <= 5 ) {
3831 mod_dodge_bonus( 1 ); // Bonus if we're small
3832 }
3833
3834 apply_skill_boost();
3835
3836 nv_cached = false;
3837
3838 // Reset our stats to normal levels
3839 // Any persistent buffs/debuffs will take place in effects,
3840 // player::suffer(), etc.
3841
3842 // repopulate the stat fields
3843 str_cur = str_max + get_str_bonus();
3844 dex_cur = dex_max + get_dex_bonus();
3845 per_cur = per_max + get_per_bonus();
3846 int_cur = int_max + get_int_bonus();
3847
3848 // Floor for our stats. No stat changes should occur after this!
3849 if( dex_cur < 0 ) {
3850 dex_cur = 0;
3851 }
3852 if( str_cur < 0 ) {
3853 str_cur = 0;
3854 }
3855 if( per_cur < 0 ) {
3856 per_cur = 0;
3857 }
3858 if( int_cur < 0 ) {
3859 int_cur = 0;
3860 }
3861}
3862
3863void Character::reset()
3864{
3865 // TODO: Move reset_stats here, remove it from Creature
3866 reset_bonuses();
3867 // Apply bonuses from hardcoded effects
3868 mod_str_bonus( str_bonus_hardcoded );
3869 mod_dex_bonus( dex_bonus_hardcoded );
3870 mod_int_bonus( int_bonus_hardcoded );
3871 mod_per_bonus( per_bonus_hardcoded );
3872 reset_stats();
3873}
3874
3875bool Character::has_nv()
3876{
3877 static bool nv = false;
3878
3879 if( !nv_cached ) {
3880 nv_cached = true;
3881 nv = ( worn_with_flag( flag_GNV_EFFECT ) ||
3882 has_flag( json_flag_NIGHT_VISION ) );
3883 }
3884
3885 return nv;
3886}
3887
3888void Character::calc_discomfort()
3889{
3890 // clear all instances of discomfort
3891 remove_effect( effect_chafing );
3892 for( const bodypart_id &bp : worn.where_discomfort( *this ) ) {
3893 if( bp->feels_discomfort ) {
3894 add_effect( effect_chafing, 1_turns, bp, true, 1 );
3895 }
3896 }
3897}
3898
3899void Character::calc_encumbrance()
3900{
3901 calc_encumbrance( item() );
3902}
3903
3904void Character::calc_encumbrance( const item &new_item )
3905{
3906
3907 std::map<bodypart_id, encumbrance_data> enc;
3908 worn.item_encumb( enc, new_item, *this );
3909 mut_cbm_encumb( enc );
3910 calc_bmi_encumb( enc );
3911
3912 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_id, encumbrance_data> &elem : enc ) {
3913 set_part_encumbrance_data( elem.first, elem.second );
3914 }
3915
3916}
3917
3918units::mass Character::get_weight() const
3919{
3920 units::mass ret = 0_gram;
3921 units::mass wornWeight = worn.weight();
3922
3923 ret += bodyweight(); // The base weight of the player's body
3924 ret += inv->weight(); // Weight of the stored inventory
3925 ret += wornWeight; // Weight of worn items
3926 ret += weapon.weight(); // Weight of wielded item
3927 ret += bionics_weight(); // Weight of installed bionics
3928 return ret;
3929}
3930
3931std::pair<int, int> Character::climate_control_strength()
3932{
3933 // In warmth points
3934 const int DEFAULT_STRENGTH = 50;
3935
3936 int power_heat = enchantment_cache->get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::CLIMATE_CONTROL_HEAT );
3937 int power_chill = enchantment_cache->get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::CLIMATE_CONTROL_CHILL );
3938
3939 map &here = get_map();
3940 if( has_trait( trait_M_SKIN3 ) && here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FUNGUS, pos() ) &&
3941 in_sleep_state() ) {
3942 power_heat += DEFAULT_STRENGTH;
3943 power_chill += DEFAULT_STRENGTH;
3944 }
3945
3946 bool regulated_area = false;
3947 if( calendar::turn >= next_climate_control_check ) {
3948 // save CPU and simulate acclimation.
3949 next_climate_control_check = calendar::turn + 20_turns;
3950 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pos() ) ) {
3951 // TODO: (?) Force player to scrounge together an AC unit
3952 regulated_area = (
3953 (
3954 vp->is_inside() && // Already checks for opened doors
3955 vp->vehicle().engine_on &&
3956 vp->vehicle().has_engine_type_not( fuel_type_muscle, true ) &&
3957 vp->vehicle().has_engine_type_not( fuel_type_animal, true )
3958 ) ||
3959 // Also check for a working alternator. Muscle or animal could be powering it.
3960 (
3961 vp->is_inside() &&
3962 vp->vehicle().total_alternator_epower() > 0_W
3963 )
3964 );
3965 }
3966 // TODO: AC check for when building power is implemented
3967 last_climate_control_ret = regulated_area;
3968 if( !regulated_area ) {
3969 // Takes longer to cool down / warm up with AC, than it does to step outside and feel cruddy.
3970 next_climate_control_check += 40_turns;
3971 }
3972 } else {
3973 regulated_area = last_climate_control_ret;
3974 }
3975
3976 if( regulated_area ) {
3977 power_heat += DEFAULT_STRENGTH;
3978 power_chill += DEFAULT_STRENGTH;
3979 }
3980
3981 return { power_heat, power_chill };
3982}
3983
3984std::map<bodypart_id, int> Character::get_wind_resistance( const std::map <bodypart_id,
3985 std::vector<const item *>> &clothing_map ) const
3986{
3987
3988 std::map<bodypart_id, int> ret;
3989 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
3990 ret.emplace( bp, 0 );
3991 }
3992 bool in_shell = has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL2 ) ||
3993 has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL3 );
3994 // Your shell provides complete wind protection if you're inside it
3995 if( in_shell ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
3996 for( std::pair<const bodypart_id, int> &this_bp : ret ) {
3997 this_bp.second = 100;
3998 }
3999 return ret;
4000 }
4001
4002 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_id, std::vector<const item *>> &on_bp : clothing_map ) {
4003 const bodypart_id &bp = on_bp.first;
4004
4005 int coverage = 0;
4006 float totalExposed = 1.0f;
4007 int penalty = 100;
4008
4009 for( const item *it : on_bp.second ) {
4010 const item &i = *it;
4011 penalty = 100 - i.wind_resist();
4012 coverage = std::max( 0, i.get_coverage( bp ) - penalty );
4013 totalExposed *= ( 1.0 - coverage / 100.0 ); // Coverage is between 0 and 1?
4014 }
4015
4016 ret[bp] = 100 - totalExposed * 100;
4017 }
4018
4019 return ret;
4020}
4021
4022void layer_details::reset()
4023{
4024 *this = layer_details();
4025}
4026
4027// The stacking penalty applies by doubling the encumbrance of
4028// each item except the highest encumbrance one.
4029// So we add them together and then subtract out the highest.
4030int layer_details::layer( const int encumbrance, bool conflicts )
4031{
4032 /*
4033 * We should only get to this point with an encumbrance value of 0
4034 * if the item is 'semitangible'. A normal item has a minimum of
4035 * 2 encumbrance for layer penalty purposes.
4036 * ( even if normally its encumbrance is 0 )
4037 */
4038 if( encumbrance == 0 ) {
4039 return total; // skip over the other logic because this item doesn't count
4040 }
4041
4042 // if this layer has conflicting pieces then add that information
4043 if( conflicts ) {
4044 is_conflicting = true;
4045 }
4046
4047 pieces.push_back( encumbrance );
4048
4049 int current = total;
4050 if( encumbrance > max ) {
4051 total += max; // *now* the old max is counted, just ignore the new max
4052 max = encumbrance;
4053 } else {
4054 total += encumbrance;
4055 }
4056 return total - current;
4057}
4058
4059int Character::avg_encumb_of_limb_type( body_part_type::type part_type ) const
4060{
4061 float limb_encumb = 0.0f;
4062 int num_limbs = 0;
4063 for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts_of_type( part_type,
4064 get_body_part_flags::primary_type ) ) {
4065 limb_encumb += encumb( part );
4066 num_limbs++;
4067 }
4068 if( num_limbs == 0 ) {
4069 return 0;
4070 }
4071 limb_encumb /= num_limbs;
4072 return std::round( limb_encumb );
4073}
4074
4075int Character::encumb( const bodypart_id &bp ) const
4076{
4077 if( !has_part( bp, body_part_filter::equivalent ) ) {
4078 debugmsg( "INFO: Tried to check encumbrance of a bodypart that does not exist." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "4078", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "INFO: Tried to check encumbrance of a bodypart that does not exist."
);
4079 return 0;
4080 }
4081 return get_part_encumbrance_data( bp ).encumbrance;
4082}
4083
4084void Character::apply_mut_encumbrance( std::map<bodypart_id, encumbrance_data> &vals ) const
4085{
4086 const std::vector<trait_id> all_muts = get_mutations();
4087 std::map<bodypart_str_id, float> total_enc;
4088
4089 // Lower penalty for bps covered only by XL or unrestricted armor
4090 // Initialized on demand for performance reasons:
4091 // (calculation is costly, most of players and npcs are don't have encumbering mutations)
4092
4093 for( const trait_id &mut : all_muts ) {
4094 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, int> &enc : mut->encumbrance_always ) {
4095 total_enc[enc.first] += enc.second;
4096 }
4097 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, int> &enc : mut->encumbrance_covered ) {
4098 if( wearing_fitting_on( enc.first ) ) {
4099 total_enc[enc.first] += enc.second;
4100 }
4101 }
4102 }
4103
4104 for( const trait_id &mut : all_muts ) {
4105 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, float> &enc : mut->encumbrance_multiplier_always ) {
4106 total_enc[enc.first] *= enc.second;
4107 }
4108 }
4109
4110 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, float> &enc : total_enc ) {
4111 vals[enc.first.id()].encumbrance += enc.second;
4112 }
4113}
4114
4115void Character::mut_cbm_encumb( std::map<bodypart_id, encumbrance_data> &vals ) const
4116{
4117
4118 for( const bionic_id &bid : get_bionics() ) {
4119 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, int> &element : bid->encumbrance ) {
4120 vals[element.first.id()].encumbrance += element.second;
4121 }
4122 }
4123
4124 if( has_active_bionic( bio_shock_absorber ) ) {
4125 for( std::pair<const bodypart_id, encumbrance_data> &val : vals ) {
4126 val.second.encumbrance += 3; // Slight encumbrance to all parts except eyes
4127 }
4128 vals[body_part_eyes].encumbrance -= 3;
4129 }
4130
4131 apply_mut_encumbrance( vals );
4132}
4133
4134void Character::calc_bmi_encumb( std::map<bodypart_id, encumbrance_data> &vals ) const
4135{
4136 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : get_body() ) {
4137 int penalty = std::floor( elem.second.get_bmi_encumbrance_scalar() * std::max( 0.0f,
4138 get_bmi_fat() - static_cast<float>( elem.second.get_bmi_encumbrance_threshold() ) ) );
4139 vals[elem.first.id()].encumbrance += penalty;
4140 }
4141}
4142
4143body_part_set Character::exclusive_flag_coverage( const flag_id &flag ) const
4144{
4145 body_part_set ret;
4146 ret.fill( get_all_body_parts() );
4147 return worn.exclusive_flag_coverage( ret, flag );
4148}
4149
4150/*
4151 * Innate stats getters
4152 */
4153
4154// get_stat() always gets total (current) value, NEVER just the base
4155// get_stat_bonus() is always just the bonus amount
4156int Character::get_str() const
4157{
4158 return std::max( 0, get_str_base() + str_bonus );
4159}
4160int Character::get_dex() const
4161{
4162 return std::max( 0, get_dex_base() + dex_bonus );
4163}
4164int Character::get_per() const
4165{
4166 return std::max( 0, get_per_base() + per_bonus );
4167}
4168int Character::get_int() const
4169{
4170 return std::max( 0, get_int_base() + int_bonus );
4171}
4172
4173int Character::get_str_base() const
4174{
4175 return str_max;
4176}
4177int Character::get_dex_base() const
4178{
4179 return dex_max;
4180}
4181int Character::get_per_base() const
4182{
4183 return per_max;
4184}
4185int Character::get_int_base() const
4186{
4187 return int_max;
4188}
4189
4190int Character::get_str_bonus() const
4191{
4192 return str_bonus;
4193}
4194int Character::get_dex_bonus() const
4195{
4196 return dex_bonus;
4197}
4198int Character::get_per_bonus() const
4199{
4200 return per_bonus;
4201}
4202int Character::get_int_bonus() const
4203{
4204 return int_bonus;
4205}
4206
4207static int get_speedydex_bonus( const int dex )
4208{
4209 static const std::string speedydex_min_dex( "SPEEDYDEX_MIN_DEX" );
4210 static const std::string speedydex_dex_speed( "SPEEDYDEX_DEX_SPEED" );
4211 // this is the number to be multiplied by the increment
4212 const int modified_dex = std::max( dex - get_option<int>( speedydex_min_dex ), 0 );
4213 return modified_dex * get_option<int>( speedydex_dex_speed );
4214}
4215
4216int Character::get_enchantment_speed_bonus() const
4217{
4218 return enchantment_speed_bonus;
4219}
4220
4221int Character::get_speed() const
4222{
4223 if( has_flag( json_flag_STEADY ) ) {
4224 return get_speed_base() + std::max( 0, get_speed_bonus() );
4225 }
4226 return Creature::get_speed();
4227}
4228
4229int Character::get_arm_str() const
4230{
4231 return str_cur * get_modifier( character_modifier_limb_str_mod );
4232}
4233
4234int Character::get_eff_per() const
4235{
4236 return ( Character::get_per() + int( Character::has_proficiency(
4237 proficiency_prof_spotting ) ) *
4238 Character::get_per_base() ) * get_limb_score( limb_score_vision ) ;
4239}
4240
4241int Character::ranged_dex_mod() const
4242{
4243 ///\EFFECT_DEX <20 increases ranged penalty
4244 return std::max( ( 20.0 - get_dex() ) * 0.5, 0.0 );
4245}
4246
4247int Character::ranged_per_mod() const
4248{
4249 ///\EFFECT_PER <20 increases ranged aiming penalty.
4250 return std::max( ( 20.0 - get_per() ) * 1.2, 0.0 );
4251}
4252
4253int Character::get_lifestyle() const
4254{
4255 // gets your health_tally variable + the factor of your bmi on your healthiness.
4256
4257 // being over or underweight makes your "effective healthiness" lower.
4258 // for example, you have a lifestyle of 0 and a bmi_fat of 15 (border between obese and very obese)
4259 // 0 - 25 - 0 = -25. So your "effective lifestyle" is -25 (feel a little cruddy)
4260 // ex2 you have a lifestyle of 50 and a bmi_fat of 15 because you get exercise and eat well
4261 // 50 - 25 - 0 = 25. So your "effective lifestyle" is 25 (feel decent despite being obese)
4262 // ex3 you have a lifestyle of -50 and a bmi_fat of 15 because you eat candy and don't exercise
4263 // -50 - 25 - 0 = -75. So your "effective lifestyle" is -75 (you'd feel crappy normally but because of your weight you feel worse)
4264
4265 const float bmi = get_bmi_fat();
4266 int over_factor = std::round( std::max( 0.0f,
4267 5 * ( bmi - character_weight_category::obese ) ) );
4268 int under_factor = std::round( std::max( 0.0f,
4269 50 * ( character_weight_category::normal - bmi ) ) );
4270 return std::max( lifestyle - ( over_factor + under_factor ), -200 );
4271}
4272
4273int Character::get_daily_health() const
4274{
4275 return daily_health;
4276}
4277
4278int Character::get_health_tally() const
4279{
4280 return health_tally;
4281}
4282
4283/*
4284 * Innate stats setters
4285 */
4286
4287void Character::set_str_bonus( int nstr )
4288{
4289 str_bonus = nstr;
4290 str_cur = std::max( 0, str_max + str_bonus );
4291}
4292void Character::set_dex_bonus( int ndex )
4293{
4294 dex_bonus = ndex;
4295 dex_cur = std::max( 0, dex_max + dex_bonus );
4296}
4297void Character::set_per_bonus( int nper )
4298{
4299 per_bonus = nper;
4300 per_cur = std::max( 0, per_max + per_bonus );
4301}
4302void Character::set_int_bonus( int nint )
4303{
4304 int_bonus = nint;
4305 int_cur = std::max( 0, int_max + int_bonus );
4306}
4307void Character::mod_str_bonus( int nstr )
4308{
4309 str_bonus += nstr;
4310 str_cur = std::max( 0, str_max + str_bonus );
4311}
4312void Character::mod_dex_bonus( int ndex )
4313{
4314 dex_bonus += ndex;
4315 dex_cur = std::max( 0, dex_max + dex_bonus );
4316}
4317void Character::mod_per_bonus( int nper )
4318{
4319 per_bonus += nper;
4320 per_cur = std::max( 0, per_max + per_bonus );
4321}
4322void Character::mod_int_bonus( int nint )
4323{
4324 int_bonus += nint;
4325 int_cur = std::max( 0, int_max + int_bonus );
4326}
4327
4328namespace io
4329{
4330template<>
4331std::string enum_to_string<character_stat>( character_stat data )
4332{
4333 switch( data ) {
4334 // *INDENT-OFF*
4335 case character_stat::STRENGTH: return "STR";
4336 case character_stat::DEXTERITY: return "DEX";
4337 case character_stat::INTELLIGENCE: return "INT";
4338 case character_stat::PERCEPTION: return "PER";
4339
4340 // *INDENT-ON*
4341 case character_stat::DUMMY_STAT:
4342 break;
4343 }
4344 cata_fatal( "Invalid character_stat" )do { realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "4344", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid character_stat"); std
::abort(); } while( false );
4345}
4346} // namespace io
4347
4348void Character::set_lifestyle( int nhealthy )
4349{
4350 lifestyle = nhealthy;
4351}
4352void Character::mod_livestyle( int nhealthy )
4353{
4354 float mut_rate = 1.0f;
4355 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
4356 mut_rate *= mut.obj().healthy_rate;
4357 }
4358 lifestyle += nhealthy * mut_rate;
4359 // Clamp lifestyle between [-200, 200]
4360 lifestyle = std::max( lifestyle, -200 );
4361 lifestyle = std::min( lifestyle, 200 );
4362}
4363void Character::set_daily_health( int nhealthy_mod )
4364{
4365 daily_health = nhealthy_mod;
4366}
4367void Character::mod_daily_health( int nhealthy_mod, int cap )
4368{
4369 // TODO: This really should be a full morale-like system, with per-effect caps
4370 // and durations. This version prevents any single effect from exceeding its
4371 // intended ceiling, but multiple effects will overlap instead of adding.
4372
4373 // Cap indicates how far the mod is allowed to shift in this direction.
4374 // It can have a different sign to the mod, e.g. for items that treat
4375 // extremely low health, but can't make you healthy.
4376 if( nhealthy_mod == 0 || cap == 0 ) {
4377 return;
4378 }
4379 int low_cap;
4380 int high_cap;
4381 if( nhealthy_mod < 0 ) {
4382 low_cap = cap;
4383 high_cap = 200;
4384 } else {
4385 low_cap = -200;
4386 high_cap = cap;
4387 }
4388
4389 // If we're already out-of-bounds, we don't need to do anything.
4390 if( ( daily_health <= low_cap && nhealthy_mod < 0 ) ||
4391 ( daily_health >= high_cap && nhealthy_mod > 0 ) ) {
4392 return;
4393 }
4394
4395 daily_health += nhealthy_mod;
4396
4397 // Since we already bailed out if we were out-of-bounds, we can
4398 // just clamp to the boundaries here.
4399 daily_health = std::min( daily_health, high_cap );
4400 daily_health = std::max( daily_health, low_cap );
4401}
4402
4403void Character::mod_health_tally( int mod )
4404{
4405 health_tally += mod;
4406}
4407
4408int Character::get_stored_kcal() const
4409{
4410 return stored_calories / 1000;
4411}
4412
4413int Character::kcal_speed_penalty() const
4414{
4415 static const std::vector<std::pair<float, float>> starv_thresholds = { {
4416 std::make_pair( 0.0f, -90.0f ),
4417 std::make_pair( character_weight_category::emaciated, -50.f ),
4418 std::make_pair( character_weight_category::underweight, -25.0f ),
4419 std::make_pair( character_weight_category::normal, 0.0f )
4420 }
4421 };
4422 if( get_kcal_percent() > 0.95f ) {
4423 return 0;
4424 } else {
4425 return std::round( multi_lerp( starv_thresholds, get_bmi_fat() ) );
4426 }
4427}
4428
4429std::string Character::activity_level_str( float level ) const
4430{
4431 for( const std::pair<const float, std::string> &member : activity_levels_str_map ) {
4432 if( level <= member.first ) {
4433 return member.second;
4434 }
4435 }
4436 return ( --activity_levels_str_map.end() )->second;
4437}
4438
4439std::string Character::debug_weary_info() const
4440{
4441 int amt = activity_history.weariness();
4442 std::string max_act = activity_level_str( maximum_exertion_level() );
4443 float move_mult = exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( EXTRA_EXERCISE );
4444
4445 int bmr = base_bmr();
4446 std::string weary_internals = activity_history.debug_weary_info();
4447 int cardio_mult = get_cardiofit();
4448 int thresh = weary_threshold();
4449 int current = weariness_level();
4450 int morale = get_morale_level();
4451 int weight = units::to_gram<int>( bodyweight() );
4452 float bmi = get_bmi();
4453
4454 return string_format( "Weariness: %s Max Full Exert: %s Mult: %g\n BMR: %d CARDIO FITNESS: %d\n %s Thresh: %d At: %d\n Kcal: %d/%d Fatigue: %d Morale: %d Wgt: %d (BMI %.1f)",
4455 amt, max_act, move_mult, bmr, cardio_mult, weary_internals, thresh, current,
4456 get_stored_kcal(), get_healthy_kcal(), fatigue, morale, weight, bmi );
4457}
4458
4459void Character::mod_stored_kcal( int nkcal, const bool ignore_weariness )
4460{
4461 if( needs_food() ) {
4462 mod_stored_calories( nkcal * 1000, ignore_weariness );
4463 }
4464}
4465
4466void Character::mod_stored_calories( int ncal, const bool ignore_weariness )
4467{
4468 int nkcal = ncal / 1000;
4469 if( nkcal > 0 ) {
4470 add_gained_calories( nkcal );
4471 } else {
4472 add_spent_calories( -nkcal );
4473 }
4474
4475 if( !ignore_weariness ) {
4476 activity_history.calorie_adjust( ncal );
4477 }
4478 if( ncal < 0 || std::numeric_limits<int>::max() - ncal > stored_calories ) {
4479 set_stored_calories( stored_calories + ncal );
4480 }
4481}
4482
4483void Character::set_stored_kcal( int kcal )
4484{
4485 set_stored_calories( kcal * 1000 );
4486}
4487
4488void Character::set_stored_calories( int cal )
4489{
4490 if( stored_calories != cal ) {
4491 int cached_bmi = std::floor( get_bmi_fat() );
4492 stored_calories = cal;
4493
4494 //some mutant change their max_hp according to their bmi
4495 recalc_hp();
4496 //need to check obesity penalties when this happens if BMI changed
4497 if( std::floor( get_bmi_fat() ) != cached_bmi ) {
4498 calc_encumbrance();
4499 }
4500 }
4501}
4502
4503int Character::get_healthy_kcal() const
4504{
4505 float healthy_weight = get_cached_organic_size() * 5.0f * std::pow( height() / 100.0f, 2 );
4506 return std::floor( KCAL_PER_KG * healthy_weight );
4507}
4508
4509float Character::get_kcal_percent() const
4510{
4511 return static_cast<float>( get_stored_kcal() ) / static_cast<float>( get_healthy_kcal() );
4512}
4513
4514int Character::get_hunger() const
4515{
4516 return hunger;
4517}
4518
4519void Character::mod_hunger( int nhunger )
4520{
4521 if( needs_food() ) {
4522 set_hunger( hunger + nhunger );
4523 }
4524}
4525
4526void Character::set_hunger( int nhunger )
4527{
4528 if( hunger != nhunger ) {
4529 // cap hunger at 300, just below famished
4530 hunger = std::min( 300, nhunger );
4531 on_stat_change( "hunger", hunger );
4532 }
4533}
4534
4535// this is a translation from a legacy value
4536int Character::get_starvation() const
4537{
4538 static const std::vector<std::pair<float, float>> starv_thresholds = { {
4539 std::make_pair( 0.0f, 6000.0f ),
4540 std::make_pair( 0.8f, 300.0f ),
4541 std::make_pair( 0.95f, 100.0f )
4542 }
4543 };
4544 if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.95f ) {
4545 return std::round( multi_lerp( starv_thresholds, get_kcal_percent() ) );
4546 }
4547 return 0;
4548}
4549
4550int Character::get_thirst() const
4551{
4552 return thirst;
4553}
4554
4555int Character::get_instant_thirst() const
4556{
4557 return thirst - std::max( units::to_milliliter<int>
4558 ( stomach.get_water() / 10 ), 0 );
4559}
4560
4561void Character::mod_thirst( int nthirst )
4562{
4563 if( has_flag( json_flag_NO_THIRST ) || !needs_food() ) {
4564 return;
4565 }
4566 set_thirst( std::max( -100, thirst + nthirst ) );
4567}
4568
4569void Character::set_thirst( int nthirst )
4570{
4571 if( thirst != nthirst ) {
4572 thirst = nthirst;
4573 on_stat_change( "thirst", thirst );
4574 }
4575}
4576
4577void Character::mod_fatigue( int nfatigue )
4578{
4579 set_fatigue( fatigue + nfatigue );
4580}
4581
4582void Character::mod_sleep_deprivation( int nsleep_deprivation )
4583{
4584 set_sleep_deprivation( sleep_deprivation + nsleep_deprivation );
4585}
4586
4587void Character::set_fatigue( int nfatigue )
4588{
4589 nfatigue = std::max( nfatigue, -1000 );
4590 if( fatigue != nfatigue ) {
4591 fatigue = nfatigue;
4592 on_stat_change( "fatigue", fatigue );
4593 }
4594}
4595
4596void Character::set_fatigue( fatigue_levels nfatigue )
4597{
4598 set_fatigue( static_cast<int>( nfatigue ) );
4599}
4600
4601void Character::set_sleep_deprivation( int nsleep_deprivation )
4602{
4603 sleep_deprivation = std::min( static_cast< int >( SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MASSIVE ), std::max( 0,
4604 nsleep_deprivation ) );
4605}
4606
4607time_duration Character::get_daily_sleep() const
4608{
4609 return daily_sleep;
4610}

4612void Character::mod_daily_sleep( time_duration mod )
4613{
4614 daily_sleep += mod;
4615}
4616
4617void Character::reset_daily_sleep()
4618{
4619 daily_sleep = 0_turns;
4620}
4621
4622time_duration Character::get_continuous_sleep() const
4623{
4624 return continuous_sleep;
4625}
4626
4627void Character::mod_continuous_sleep( time_duration mod )
4628{
4629 continuous_sleep += mod;
4630}
4631
4632void Character::reset_continuous_sleep()
4633{
4634 continuous_sleep = 0_turns;
4635}
4636
4637int Character::get_fatigue() const
4638{
4639 return fatigue;
4640}
4641
4642int Character::get_sleep_deprivation() const
4643{
4644 return sleep_deprivation;
4645}
4646
4647bool Character::is_deaf() const
4648{
4649 return get_effect_int( effect_deaf ) > 2 || worn_with_flag( flag_DEAF ) ||
4650 has_flag( json_flag_DEAF ) || has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ||
4651 ( has_trait( trait_M_SKIN3 ) && get_map().has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FUNGUS, pos() )
4652 && in_sleep_state() );
4653}
4654
4655bool Character::is_mute() const
4656{
4657 return get_effect_int( effect_mute ) || worn_with_flag( flag_MUTE ) ||
4658 ( has_trait( trait_PROF_FOODP ) && !( is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask ) ||
4659 is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask_on ) ) ) ||
4660 has_trait( trait_MUTE );
4661}
4662
4663void Character::on_damage_of_type( const effect_source &source, int adjusted_damage,
4664 const damage_type_id &dt, const bodypart_id &bp )
4665{
4666 // Handle bp onhit effects
4667 bodypart *body_part = get_part( bp );
4668 const bool is_minor = bp->main_part != bp->id;
4669 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Targeting limb %s with %d %s type damage", bp->name,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Targeting limb %s with %d %s type damage"
, bp->name, adjusted_damage, dt->name.translated() ) ) )
; } } while( false )
4670 adjusted_damage, dt->name.translated() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Targeting limb %s with %d %s type damage"
, bp->name, adjusted_damage, dt->name.translated() ) ) )
; } } while( false );
4671 // Damage as a percent of the limb's max hp or raw dmg for minor parts
4672 float dmg_ratio = is_minor ? adjusted_damage : 100 * adjusted_damage / body_part->get_hp_max();
4673 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Main BP max hp %d, damage ratio %.1f",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Main BP max hp %d, damage ratio %.1f"
, body_part->get_hp_max(), dmg_ratio ) ) ); } } while( false
)
4674 body_part->get_hp_max(), dmg_ratio )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Main BP max hp %d, damage ratio %.1f"
, body_part->get_hp_max(), dmg_ratio ) ) ); } } while( false
);
4675 for( const bp_onhit_effect &eff : body_part->get_onhit_effects( dt ) ) {
4676 if( dmg_ratio >= eff.dmg_threshold ) {
4677 float scaling = ( dmg_ratio - eff.dmg_threshold ) / eff.scale_increment;
4678 int scaled_chance = roll_remainder( std::max( static_cast<float>( eff.chance ),
4679 eff.chance + eff.chance_dmg_scaling * scaling ) );
4680 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Scaling factor %.1f, base chance %d%%, scaled chance %d%%",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Scaling factor %.1f, base chance %d%%, scaled chance %d%%"
, scaling, eff.chance, scaled_chance ) ) ); } } while( false )
4681 scaling, eff.chance, scaled_chance )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Scaling factor %.1f, base chance %d%%, scaled chance %d%%"
, scaling, eff.chance, scaled_chance ) ) ); } } while( false );
4682 if( x_in_y( scaled_chance, 100 ) ) {
4683
4684 // Scale based on damage done
4685 int scaled_dur = roll_remainder( std::max( static_cast<float>( eff.duration ),
4686 eff.duration + eff.duration_dmg_scaling * scaling ) );
4687 int scaled_int = roll_remainder( std::max( static_cast<float>( eff.intensity ),
4688 eff.intensity + eff.intensity_dmg_scaling * scaling ) );
4689
4690 // go through all effects. if they modify effect duration, scale dur accordingly.
4691 // obviously inefficient, but probably fast enough since this only is calculated once per attack.
4692 float eff_scale = 1.0f;
4693 for( const effect &e : get_effects() ) {
4694 for( const effect_dur_mod &eff_dur_mod : e.get_effect_dur_scaling() ) {
4695 // debugmsg( "Checking effect %s, with same_bp, modifier %f", eff.id.c_str(), eff_dur_mod.modifier);
4696 if( eff_dur_mod.effect_id == eff.id ) {
4697 if( eff_dur_mod.same_bp ) {
4698 if( e.get_bp() != body_part->get_id() ) {
4699 continue;
4700 }
4701 }
4702 eff_scale *= eff_dur_mod.modifier;
4703 }
4704 }
4705 }
4706
4707 scaled_dur = static_cast<int>( scaled_dur * eff_scale );
4708
4709 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Atempting to add effect %s, scaled duration %d turns, scaled intensity %d, effect scaling %f"
, eff.id.c_str(), scaled_dur, scaled_int, eff_scale ) ) ); } }
while( false )
4710 "Atempting to add effect %s, scaled duration %d turns, scaled intensity %d, effect scaling %f",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Atempting to add effect %s, scaled duration %d turns, scaled intensity %d, effect scaling %f"
, eff.id.c_str(), scaled_dur, scaled_int, eff_scale ) ) ); } }
while( false )
