4711 eff.id.c_str(),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Atempting to add effect %s, scaled duration %d turns, scaled intensity %d, effect scaling %f"
, eff.id.c_str(), scaled_dur, scaled_int, eff_scale ) ) ); } }
while( false )
4712 scaled_dur,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Atempting to add effect %s, scaled duration %d turns, scaled intensity %d, effect scaling %f"
, eff.id.c_str(), scaled_dur, scaled_int, eff_scale ) ) ); } }
while( false )
4713 scaled_int,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Atempting to add effect %s, scaled duration %d turns, scaled intensity %d, effect scaling %f"
, eff.id.c_str(), scaled_dur, scaled_int, eff_scale ) ) ); } }
while( false )
4714 eff_scale )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Atempting to add effect %s, scaled duration %d turns, scaled intensity %d, effect scaling %f"
, eff.id.c_str(), scaled_dur, scaled_int, eff_scale ) ) ); } }
while( false );
4715
4716 // Handle intensity/duration clamping
4717 if( eff.max_intensity != INT_MAX2147483647 ) {
4718 int prev_int = get_effect( eff.id, bp ).get_intensity();
4719 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Max intensity %d, current intensity %d"
, eff.max_intensity, prev_int ) ) ); } } while( false )
4720 "Max intensity %d, current intensity %d", eff.max_intensity, prev_int )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Max intensity %d, current intensity %d"
, eff.max_intensity, prev_int ) ) ); } } while( false );
4721 if( ( prev_int + scaled_int ) > eff.max_intensity ) {
4722 scaled_int = eff.max_intensity - prev_int;
4723 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Limiting added intensity to %d"
, scaled_int ) ) ); } } while( false )
4724 "Limiting added intensity to %d", scaled_int )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Limiting added intensity to %d"
, scaled_int ) ) ); } } while( false );
4725 }
4726 }
4727 if( eff.max_duration != INT_MAX2147483647 ) {
4728 int prev_dur = to_turns<int>( get_effect( eff.id, bp ).get_duration() );
4729 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Max duration %d, current duration %d"
, eff.max_duration, prev_dur ) ) ); } } while( false )
4730 "Max duration %d, current duration %d", eff.max_duration, prev_dur )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Max duration %d, current duration %d"
, eff.max_duration, prev_dur ) ) ); } } while( false );
4731 if( ( prev_dur + scaled_dur ) > eff.max_duration ) {
4732 scaled_dur = eff.max_duration - prev_dur;
4733 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Limiting added duration to %d seconds"
, scaled_dur ) ) ); } } while( false )
4734 "Limiting added duration to %d seconds", scaled_dur )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Limiting added duration to %d seconds"
, scaled_dur ) ) ); } } while( false );
4735 }
4736 }
4737 // Add the effect globally if defined
4738 add_effect( source, eff.id, 1_turns * scaled_dur, eff.global ? bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() : bp,
4739 false, scaled_int );
4740 }
4741 }
4742 }
4743 // Electrical damage has a chance to temporarily incapacitate bionics in the damaged body_part.
4744 if( dt == damage_electric ) {
4745 const time_duration min_disable_time = 10_turns * adjusted_damage;
4746 for( bionic &i : *my_bionics ) {
4747 if( !i.powered ) {
4748 // Unpowered bionics are protected from power surges.
4749 continue;
4750 }
4751 const bionic_data &info = i.info();
4752 if( info.has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_SHOCKPROOF" ) )(([]()-> const auto &{ using ExprType = std::decay_t<
decltype(static_argument_identity( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_SHOCKPROOF"
) ))>; using CachedType = std::conditional_t<std::is_same_v
<ExprType, const char*>, std::string, ExprType>; static
const CachedType _cached_expr = static_argument_identity( json_character_flag
( "BIONIC_SHOCKPROOF" ) ); return _cached_expr; })()) ) ||
4753 info.has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_FAULTY" ) )(([]()-> const auto &{ using ExprType = std::decay_t<
decltype(static_argument_identity( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_FAULTY"
) ))>; using CachedType = std::conditional_t<std::is_same_v
<ExprType, const char*>, std::string, ExprType>; static
const CachedType _cached_expr = static_argument_identity( json_character_flag
( "BIONIC_FAULTY" ) ); return _cached_expr; })()) ) ) {
4754 continue;
4755 }
4756 const std::map<bodypart_str_id, size_t> &bodyparts = info.occupied_bodyparts;
4757 if( bodyparts.find( bp.id() ) != bodyparts.end() ) {
4758 const int bp_hp = get_part_hp_cur( bp );
4759 // The chance to incapacitate is as high as 50% if the attack deals damage equal to one third of the body part's current health.
4760 if( x_in_y( adjusted_damage * 3, bp_hp ) && one_in( 2 ) ) {
4761 if( i.incapacitated_time == 0_turns ) {
4762 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s bionic shorts out!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s bionic shorts out!" )
) ), info.name );
4763 }
4764 i.incapacitated_time += rng( min_disable_time, 10 * min_disable_time );
4765 }
4766 }
4767 }
4768 }
4769}
4770
4771void Character::reset_bonuses()
4772{
4773 // Reset all bonuses to 0 and multipliers to 1.0
4774 str_bonus = 0;
4775 dex_bonus = 0;
4776 per_bonus = 0;
4777 int_bonus = 0;
4778
4779 Creature::reset_bonuses();
4780}
4781
4782int Character::get_max_healthy() const
4783{
4784 const float bmi = get_bmi_fat();
4785 int over_factor = std::round( std::max( 0.0f,
4786 25 * ( bmi - character_weight_category::overweight ) ) );
4787 int under_factor = std::round( std::max( 0.0f,
4788 200 * ( character_weight_category::normal - bmi ) ) );
4789 return std::max( 200 - over_factor - under_factor, -200 );
4790}
4791
4792void Character::regen( int rate_multiplier )
4793{
4794 int pain_ticks = std::max( 1, roll_remainder( enchantment_cache->modify_value(
4795 enchant_vals::mod::PAIN_REMOVE, rate_multiplier ) ) );
4796 while( get_pain() > 0 && pain_ticks-- > 0 ) {
4797 mod_pain( -roll_remainder( 0.2f + get_pain() / 50.0f ) );
4798 }
4799
4800 float rest = rest_quality();
4801 float heal_rate = healing_rate( rest ) * to_turns<int>( 5_minutes );
4802 if( heal_rate > 0.0f ) {
4803 healall( roll_remainder( rate_multiplier * heal_rate ) );
4804 } else if( heal_rate < 0.0f ) {
4805 int rot_rate = roll_remainder( rate_multiplier * -heal_rate );
4806 // Has to be in loop because some effects depend on rounding
4807 while( rot_rate-- > 0 ) {
4808 hurtall( 1, nullptr, false );
4809 }
4810 }
4811
4812 // include healing effects
4813 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
4814 float healing = healing_rate_medicine( rest, bp ) * to_turns<int>( 5_minutes );
4815 int healing_apply = roll_remainder( healing );
4816 mod_part_healed_total( bp, healing_apply );
4817 heal( bp, healing_apply );
4818 if( get_part_damage_bandaged( bp ) > 0 ) {
4819 mod_part_damage_bandaged( bp, -healing_apply );
4820 if( get_part_damage_bandaged( bp ) <= 0 ) {
4821 set_part_damage_bandaged( bp, 0 );
4822 remove_effect( effect_bandaged, bp );
4823 add_msg_if_player( _( "Bandaged wounds on your %s healed." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bandaged wounds on your %s healed."
) ) ), body_part_name( bp ) );
4824 }
4825 }
4826 if( get_part_damage_disinfected( bp ) > 0 ) {
4827 mod_part_damage_disinfected( bp, -healing_apply );
4828 if( get_part_damage_disinfected( bp ) <= 0 ) {
4829 set_part_damage_disinfected( bp, 0 );
4830 remove_effect( effect_disinfected, bp );
4831 add_msg_if_player( _( "Disinfected wounds on your %s healed." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Disinfected wounds on your %s healed."
) ) ), body_part_name( bp ) );
4832 }
4833 }
4834
4835 // remove effects if the limb was healed by other way
4836 if( has_effect( effect_bandaged, bp.id() ) && is_part_at_max_hp( bp ) ) {
4837 set_part_damage_bandaged( bp, 0 );
4838 remove_effect( effect_bandaged, bp );
4839 add_msg_if_player( _( "Bandaged wounds on your %s healed." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bandaged wounds on your %s healed."
) ) ), body_part_name( bp ) );
4840 }
4841 if( has_effect( effect_disinfected, bp.id() ) && is_part_at_max_hp( bp ) ) {
4842 set_part_damage_disinfected( bp, 0 );
4843 remove_effect( effect_disinfected, bp );
4844 add_msg_if_player( _( "Disinfected wounds on your %s healed." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Disinfected wounds on your %s healed."
) ) ), body_part_name( bp ) );
4845 }
4846 }
4847
4848 if( get_rad() > 0 ) {
4849 mod_rad( -roll_remainder( rate_multiplier / 50.0f ) );
4850 }
4851}
4852
4853void Character::update_health()
4854{
4855 // Limit daily_health to [-200, 200].
4856 // This also sets approximate bounds for the character's health.
4857 if( get_daily_health() > 200 ) {
4858 set_daily_health( 200 );
4859 } else if( get_daily_health() < -200 ) {
4860 set_daily_health( -200 );
4861 }
4862
4863 // Active leukocyte breeder will keep your mean health_tally near 100
4864 int effective_daily_health = enchantment_cache->modify_value(
4865 enchant_vals::mod::EFFECTIVE_HEALTH_MOD, 0 );
4866 if( effective_daily_health == 0 ) {
4867 effective_daily_health = get_daily_health();
4868 }
4869
4870 if( calendar::once_every( 1_days ) ) {
4871 mod_health_tally( effective_daily_health );
4872 int mean_daily_health = get_health_tally() / 7;
4873 mod_livestyle( mean_daily_health );
4874 mod_health_tally( -mean_daily_health );
4875 set_daily_health( 0 );
4876 }
4877 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Lifestyle: %d, Daily health: %d", get_lifestyle(),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Lifestyle: %d, Daily health: %d"
, get_lifestyle(), get_daily_health() ) ) ); } } while( false
)
4878 get_daily_health() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Lifestyle: %d, Daily health: %d"
, get_lifestyle(), get_daily_health() ) ) ); } } while( false
);
4879}
4880
4881int Character::weariness() const
4882{
4883 return activity_history.weariness();
4884}
4885
4886int Character::weary_threshold() const
4887{
4888 const int bmr = base_bmr();
4889 int threshold = bmr * get_option<float>( "WEARY_BMR_MULT" );
4890 // reduce by 1% per 14 points of fatigue after 150 points
4891 threshold *= 1.0f - ( ( std::max( fatigue, -20 ) - 150 ) / 1400.0f );
4892 // Each 2 points of morale increase or decrease by 1%
4893 threshold *= 1.0f + ( get_morale_level() / 200.0f );
4894 // TODO: Hunger effects this
4895
4896 return std::max( threshold, bmr / 10 );
4897}
4898
4899std::pair<int, int> Character::weariness_transition_progress() const
4900{
4901 // Mostly a duplicate of the below function. No real way to clean this up
4902 int amount = weariness();
4903 int threshold = weary_threshold();
4904 amount -= threshold * get_option<float>( "WEARY_INITIAL_STEP" );
4905 while( amount >= 0 ) {
4906 amount -= threshold;
4907 if( threshold > 20 ) {
4908 threshold *= get_option<float>( "WEARY_THRESH_SCALING" );
4909 }
4910 }
4911
4912 // If we return the absolute value of the amount, it will work better
4913 // Because as it decreases, we will approach a transition
4914 return {std::abs( amount ), threshold};
4915}
4916
4917int Character::weariness_level() const
4918{
4919 int amount = weariness();
4920 int threshold = weary_threshold();
4921 int level = 0;
4922 amount -= threshold * get_option<float>( "WEARY_INITIAL_STEP" );
4923 while( amount >= 0 ) {
4924 amount -= threshold;
4925 if( threshold > 20 ) {
4926 threshold *= get_option<float>( "WEARY_THRESH_SCALING" );
4927 }
4928 ++level;
4929 }
4930
4931 return level;
4932}
4933
4934int Character::weariness_transition_level() const
4935{
4936 int amount = weariness();
4937 int threshold = weary_threshold();
4938 amount -= threshold * get_option<float>( "WEARY_INITIAL_STEP" );
4939 while( amount >= 0 ) {
4940 amount -= threshold;
4941 if( threshold > 20 ) {
4942 threshold *= get_option<float>( "WEARY_THRESH_SCALING" );
4943 }
4944 }
4945
4946 return std::abs( amount );
4947}
4948
4949float Character::maximum_exertion_level() const
4950{
4951 switch( weariness_level() ) {
4952 case 0:
4953 return EXTRA_EXERCISE;
4954 case 1:
4955 return ACTIVE_EXERCISE;
4956 case 2:
4957 return BRISK_EXERCISE;
4958 case 3:
4959 return MODERATE_EXERCISE;
4960 case 4:
4961 return LIGHT_EXERCISE;
4962 case 5:
4963 default:
4964 return NO_EXERCISE;
4965 }
4966}
4967
4968float Character::exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( float level ) const
4969{
4970 // The default value for level is -1.0
4971 // And any values we get that are negative or 0
4972 // will cause incorrect behavior
4973 if( level <= 0 ) {
4974 level = activity_history.activity( in_sleep_state() );
4975 }
4976 const float max = maximum_exertion_level();
4977 if( level < max ) {
4978 return 1.0f;
4979 }
4980 return max / level;
4981}
4982
4983float Character::instantaneous_activity_level() const
4984{
4985 return activity_history.instantaneous_activity_level();
4986}
4987
4988int Character::activity_level_index() const
4989{
4990 // Activity levels are 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10
4991 // So we can easily cut them in half and round down for an index
4992 return std::floor( instantaneous_activity_level() / 2 );
4993}
4994
4995float Character::activity_level() const
4996{
4997 float max = maximum_exertion_level();
4998 float attempted_level = activity_history.activity( in_sleep_state() );
4999 return std::min( max, attempted_level );
5000}
5001
5002bool Character::needs_food() const
5003{
5004 return !( is_npc() && get_option<bool>( "NO_NPC_FOOD" ) );
5005}
5006
5007void Character::update_needs( int rate_multiplier )
5008{
5009 const int current_stim = get_stim();
5010 // Hunger, thirst, & fatigue up every 5 minutes
5011 effect &sleep = get_effect( effect_sleep );
5012 // No food/thirst/fatigue clock at all
5013 const bool debug_ls = has_trait( trait_DEBUG_LS );
5014 // No food/thirst, capped fatigue clock (only up to tired)
5015 const bool asleep = !sleep.is_null();
5016 const bool lying = asleep || has_effect( effect_lying_down ) ||
5017 activity.id() == ACT_TRY_SLEEP;
5018
5019 needs_rates rates = calc_needs_rates();
5020
5021 const bool wasnt_fatigued = get_fatigue() <= fatigue_levels::DEAD_TIRED;
5022 // Don't increase fatigue if sleeping or trying to sleep or if we're at the cap.
5023 if( get_fatigue() < 1050 && !asleep && !debug_ls ) {
5024 if( rates.fatigue > 0.0f ) {
5025 int fatigue_roll = roll_remainder( rates.fatigue * rate_multiplier );
5026 mod_fatigue( fatigue_roll );
5027
5028 // Synaptic regen bionic stops SD while awake and boosts it while sleeping
5029 if( !has_flag( json_flag_STOP_SLEEP_DEPRIVATION ) ) {
5030 // fatigue_roll should be around 1 - so the counter increases by 1 every minute on average,
5031 // but characters who need less sleep will also get less sleep deprived, and vice-versa.
5032
5033 // Note: Since needs are updated in 5-minute increments, we have to multiply the roll again by
5034 // 5. If rate_multiplier is > 1, fatigue_roll will be higher and this will work out.
5035 mod_sleep_deprivation( fatigue_roll * 5 );
5036 }
5037
5038 if( !needs_food() && get_fatigue() > fatigue_levels::TIRED ) {
5039 set_fatigue( fatigue_levels::TIRED );
5040 set_sleep_deprivation( 0 );
5041 }
5042 }
5043 } else if( asleep ) {
5044 if( rates.recovery > 0.0f ) {
5045 int recovered = roll_remainder( rates.recovery * rate_multiplier );
5046 if( get_fatigue() - recovered < -20 ) {
5047 // Should be wake up, but that could prevent some retroactive regeneration
5048 sleep.set_duration( 1_turns );
5049 mod_fatigue( -25 );
5050 } else {
5051 if( has_effect( effect_disrupted_sleep ) || has_effect( effect_recently_coughed ) ) {
5052 recovered *= .5;
5053 }
5054 mod_fatigue( -recovered );
5055
5056 // Sleeping on the ground, no bionic = 1x rest_modifier
5057 // Sleeping on a bed, no bionic = 2x rest_modifier
5058 // Sleeping on a comfy bed, no bionic= 3x rest_modifier
5059
5060 // Sleeping on the ground, bionic = 3x rest_modifier
5061 // Sleeping on a bed, bionic = 6x rest_modifier
5062 // Sleeping on a comfy bed, bionic = 9x rest_modifier
5063 float rest_modifier = ( has_flag( json_flag_STOP_SLEEP_DEPRIVATION ) ? 3 : 1 );
5064 // Melatonin supplements also add a flat bonus to recovery speed
5065 if( has_effect( effect_melatonin ) ) {
5066 rest_modifier += 1;
5067 }
5068
5069 const comfort_level comfort = base_comfort_value( pos_bub() ).level;
5070
5071 if( comfort >= comfort_level::very_comfortable ) {
5072 rest_modifier *= 3;
5073 } else if( comfort >= comfort_level::comfortable ) {
5074 rest_modifier *= 2.5;
5075 } else if( comfort >= comfort_level::slightly_comfortable ) {
5076 rest_modifier *= 2;
5077 }
5078
5079 // If we're just tired, we'll get a decent boost to our sleep quality.
5080 // The opposite is true for very tired characters.
5081 if( get_fatigue() < fatigue_levels::DEAD_TIRED ) {
5082 rest_modifier += 2;
5083 } else if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::EXHAUSTED ) {
5084 rest_modifier = ( rest_modifier > 2 ) ? rest_modifier - 2 : 1;
5085 }
5086
5087 // Recovered is multiplied by 2 as well, since we spend 1/3 of the day sleeping
5088 mod_sleep_deprivation( -rest_modifier * ( recovered * 2 ) );
5089
5090 }
5091 }
5092 map &here = get_map();
5093 if( calendar::once_every( 10_minutes ) && ( has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ||
5094 has_trait( trait_M_SKIN3 ) || has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP ) ||
5095 has_trait( trait_UNDINE_SLEEP_WATER ) ) &&
5096 here.is_outside( pos() ) ) {
5097 if( has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) && get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, pos() ) &&
5098 is_barefoot() ) {
5099 if( get_thirst() >= -40 ) {
5100 mod_thirst( -5 );
5101 }
5102 // Assuming eight hours of sleep, this will take care of Iron and Calcium needs
5103 vitamin_mod( vitamin_iron, 2 );
5104 vitamin_mod( vitamin_calcium, 2 );
5105 }
5106 if( has_trait( trait_M_SKIN3 ) ) {
5107 // Spores happen!
5108 if( here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FUNGUS, pos() ) ) {
5109 if( get_fatigue() >= 0 ) {
5110 mod_fatigue( -5 ); // Local guides need less sleep on fungal soil
5111 }
5112 if( calendar::once_every( 1_hours ) ) {
5113 spores(); // spawn some P O O F Y B O I S
5114 }
5115 }
5116 }
5117 if( has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP ) || has_trait( trait_UNDINE_SLEEP_WATER ) ) {
5118 mod_fatigue( -3 ); // Fish sleep less in water
5119 }
5120 }
5121 }
5122 if( is_avatar() && wasnt_fatigued && get_fatigue() > fatigue_levels::DEAD_TIRED && !lying ) {
5123 if( !activity ) {
5124 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You're feeling tired. %s to lie down for sleep." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You're feeling tired. %s to lie down for sleep."
) ) ),
5125 press_x( ACTION_SLEEP ) );
5126 } else {
5127 g->cancel_activity_query( _( "You're feeling tired." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You're feeling tired." ) ) ) );
5128 }
5129 }
5130
5131 if( current_stim < 0 ) {
5132 set_stim( std::min( current_stim + rate_multiplier, 0 ) );
5133 } else if( current_stim > 0 ) {
5134 set_stim( std::max( current_stim - rate_multiplier, 0 ) );
5135 }
5136
5137 if( get_painkiller() > 0 ) {
5138 mod_painkiller( -std::min( get_painkiller(), rate_multiplier ) );
5139 }
5140
5141 if( get_bp_effect_mod() > 0 ) {
5142 modify_bp_effect_mod( -std::min( get_bp_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5143 } else if( get_bp_effect_mod() < 0 ) {
5144 modify_bp_effect_mod( std::min( -get_bp_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5145 }
5146
5147 if( get_heartrate_effect_mod() > 0 ) {
5148 modify_heartrate_effect_mod( -std::min( get_heartrate_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5149 } else if( get_heartrate_effect_mod() < 0 ) {
5150 modify_heartrate_effect_mod( std::min( -get_heartrate_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5151 }
5152
5153 if( get_respiration_effect_mod() > 0 ) {
5154 modify_respiration_effect_mod( -std::min( get_respiration_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5155 } else if( get_respiration_effect_mod() < 0 ) {
5156 modify_respiration_effect_mod( std::min( -get_respiration_effect_mod(), rate_multiplier ) );
5157 }
5158
5159}
5160
5161needs_rates Character::calc_needs_rates() const
5162{
5163 const effect &sleep = get_effect( effect_sleep );
5164 const bool asleep = !sleep.is_null();
5165
5166 needs_rates rates;
5167 rates.hunger = metabolic_rate();
5168
5169 rates.kcal = get_bmr();
5170
5171 add_msg_debug_if( is_avatar(), debugmode::DF_CHAR_CALORIES, "Metabolic rate: %.2f", rates.hunger )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_CALORIES ) && ( is_avatar() ) ) { Messages::
add_msg( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Metabolic rate: %.2f"
, rates.hunger ) ) ); } } while( false );
5172
5173 static const std::string player_thirst_rate( "PLAYER_THIRST_RATE" );
5174 rates.thirst = get_option< float >( player_thirst_rate );
5175 static const std::string thirst_modifier( "thirst_modifier" );
5176 rates.thirst *= 1.0f + mutation_value( thirst_modifier );
5177 if( worn_with_flag( flag_SLOWS_THIRST ) ) {
5178 rates.thirst *= 0.7f;
5179 }
5180
5181 static const std::string player_fatigue_rate( "PLAYER_FATIGUE_RATE" );
5182 rates.fatigue = get_option< float >( player_fatigue_rate );
5183 static const std::string fatigue_modifier( "fatigue_modifier" );
5184 rates.fatigue *= 1.0f + mutation_value( fatigue_modifier );
5185
5186 if( asleep ) {
5187 calc_sleep_recovery_rate( rates );
5188 } else {
5189 rates.recovery = 0;
5190 }
5191
5192 if( has_activity( ACT_TREE_COMMUNION ) ) {
5193 // Much of the body's needs are taken care of by the trees.
5194 // Hair Roots don't provide any bodily needs.
5195 if( has_trait( trait_ROOTS2 ) || has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) {
5196 rates.hunger *= 0.5f;
5197 rates.thirst *= 0.5f;
5198 rates.fatigue *= 0.5f;
5199 }
5200 }
5201
5202 if( has_trait( trait_TRANSPIRATION ) ) {
5203 // Transpiration, the act of moving nutrients with evaporating water, can take a very heavy toll on your thirst when it's really hot.
5204 rates.thirst *= ( ( units::to_fahrenheit( get_weather().get_temperature(
5205 pos() ) ) - 32.5f ) / 40.0f );
5206 }
5207
5208 if( is_npc() ) {
5209 rates.hunger *= 0.25f;
5210 rates.thirst *= 0.25f;
5211 }
5212
5213 rates.hunger = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::HUNGER, rates.hunger );
5214 rates.fatigue = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::FATIGUE, rates.fatigue );
5215 rates.thirst = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::THIRST, rates.thirst );
5216
5217 return rates;
5218}
5219
5220void Character::calc_sleep_recovery_rate( needs_rates &rates ) const
5221{
5222 const effect &sleep = get_effect( effect_sleep );
5223 static const std::string fatigue_regen_modifier( "fatigue_regen_modifier" );
5224 rates.recovery = 1.0f + mutation_value( fatigue_regen_modifier );
5225
5226 // -5% sleep recovery rate for every main part below cold
5227 float temp_mod = 0.0f;
5228 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
5229 if( get_part_temp_cur( bp ) <= BODYTEMP_COLD ) {
5230 temp_mod -= 0.05f;
5231 }
5232 }
5233 rates.recovery += temp_mod;
5234
5235 if( !is_hibernating() ) {
5236 // Hunger and thirst advance more slowly while we sleep. This is the standard rate.
5237 rates.hunger *= 0.5f;
5238 rates.thirst *= 0.5f;
5239 const int intense = sleep.is_null() ? 0 : sleep.get_intensity();
5240 // Accelerated recovery capped to 2x over 2 hours
5241 // After 16 hours of activity, equal to 7.25 hours of rest
5242 const int accelerated_recovery_chance = 24 - intense + 1;
5243 const float accelerated_recovery_rate = 1.0f / accelerated_recovery_chance;
5244 rates.recovery += accelerated_recovery_rate;
5245 } else {
5246 // Hunger and thirst advance *much* more slowly whilst we hibernate.
5247 rates.hunger *= ( 2.0f / 7.0f );
5248 rates.thirst *= ( 2.0f / 7.0f );
5249 }
5250 rates.recovery -= static_cast<float>( get_perceived_pain() ) / 60;
5251}
5252
5253item Character::reduce_charges( item *it, int quantity )
5254{
5255 if( !has_item( *it ) ) {
5256 debugmsg( "invalid item (name %s) for reduce_charges", it->tname() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "5256", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "invalid item (name %s) for reduce_charges"
, it->tname());
5257 return item();
5258 }
5259 if( it->charges <= quantity ) {
5260 return i_rem( it );
5261 }
5262 it->mod_charges( -quantity );
5263 item result( *it );
5264 result.charges = quantity;
5265 return result;
5266}
5267
5268const profession *Character::get_profession() const
5269{
5270 return prof;
5271}
5272
5273std::set<const profession *> Character::get_hobbies() const
5274{
5275 return hobbies;
5276}
5277
5278bool Character::has_mission_item( int mission_id ) const
5279{
5280 return mission_id != -1 && has_item_with( has_mission_item_filter{ mission_id } );
5281}
5282
5283void Character::check_needs_extremes()
5284{
5285 // Check if we've overdosed... in any deadly way.
5286 if( get_stim() > 250 ) {
5287 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5288 _( "You have a sudden heart attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have a sudden heart attack!"
) ) ),
5289 _( "<npcname> has a sudden heart attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> has a sudden heart attack!"
) ) ) );
5290 get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), efftype_id() );
5291 set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5292 } else if( get_stim() < -200 || get_painkiller() > 240 ) {
5293 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5294 _( "Your breathing stops completely." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your breathing stops completely."
) ) ),
5295 _( "<npcname>'s breathing stops completely." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s breathing stops completely."
) ) ) );
5296 get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), efftype_id() );
5297 set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5298 } else if( has_effect( effect_jetinjector ) && get_effect_dur( effect_jetinjector ) > 40_minutes ) {
5299 if( !has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) ) {
5300 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5301 _( "Your heart spasms painfully and stops." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your heart spasms painfully and stops."
) ) ),
5302 _( "<npcname>'s heart spasms painfully and stops." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s heart spasms painfully and stops."
) ) ) );
5303 } else {
5304 add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "Your heart spasms and stops." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your heart spasms and stops."
) ) ),
5305 _( "<npcname>'s heart spasms and stops." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s heart spasms and stops."
) ) ) );
5306 }
5307 get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), effect_jetinjector );
5308 set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5309 } else if( get_effect_dur( effect_adrenaline ) > 50_minutes ) {
5310 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5311 _( "Your heart spasms and stops." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your heart spasms and stops."
) ) ),
5312 _( "<npcname>'s heart spasms and stops." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s heart spasms and stops."
) ) ) );
5313 get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), effect_adrenaline );
5314 set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5315 } else if( get_effect_int( effect_drunk ) > 4 ) {
5316 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5317 _( "Your breathing slows down to a stop." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your breathing slows down to a stop."
) ) ),
5318 _( "<npcname>'s breathing slows down to a stop." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s breathing slows down to a stop."
) ) ) );
5319 get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_from_drug_overdose>( getID(), effect_drunk );
5320 set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5321 }
5322
5323 // check if we've starved
5324 if( needs_food() ) {
5325 if( get_stored_kcal() <= 0 ) {
5326 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You have starved to death." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have starved to death." )
) ) );
5327 get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_of_starvation>( getID() );
5328 set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5329 } else {
5330 if( calendar::once_every( 12_hours ) ) {
5331 std::string category;
5332 if( stomach.contains() <= stomach.capacity( *this ) / 4 ) {
5333 if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.1f ) {
5334 category = "starving";
5335 } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.25f ) {
5336 category = "emaciated";
5337 } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.5f ) {
5338 category = "malnutrition";
5339 } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.8f ) {
5340 category = "low_cal";
5341 }
5342 } else {
5343 if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.1f ) {
5344 category = "empty_starving";
5345 } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.25f ) {
5346 category = "empty_emaciated";
5347 } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.5f ) {
5348 category = "empty_malnutrition";
5349 } else if( get_kcal_percent() < 0.8f ) {
5350 category = "empty_low_cal";
5351 }
5352 }
5353 if( !category.empty() ) {
5354 const translation message = SNIPPET.random_from_category( category ).value_or( translation() );
5355 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, message );
5356 }
5357
5358 }
5359 }
5360 }
5361
5362 // Check if we're dying of thirst
5363 if( needs_food() && get_thirst() >= 600 && ( stomach.get_water() == 0_ml ||
5364 guts.get_water() == 0_ml ) ) {
5365 if( get_thirst() >= 1200 ) {
5366 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You have died of dehydration." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have died of dehydration."
) ) ) );
5367 get_event_bus().send<event_type::dies_of_thirst>( getID() );
5368 set_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso, 0 );
5369 } else if( get_thirst() >= 1000 && calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5370 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Even your eyes feel dryâ¦" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Even your eyes feel dryâ¦" )
) ) );
5371 } else if( get_thirst() >= 800 && calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5372 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You are THIRSTY!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are THIRSTY!" ) ) ) );
5373 } else if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5374 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your mouth feels so dryâ¦" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your mouth feels so dryâ¦" )
) ) );
5375 }
5376 }
5377
5378 // Check if we're falling asleep, unless we're sleeping
5379 if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::EXHAUSTED + 25 && !in_sleep_state() ) {
5380 if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::MASSIVE_FATIGUE ) {
5381 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Survivor sleep now." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Survivor sleep now." ) ) ) );
5382 get_event_bus().send<event_type::falls_asleep_from_exhaustion>( getID() );
5383 mod_fatigue( -10 );
5384 fall_asleep();
5385 } else if( get_fatigue() >= 800 && calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5386 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Anywhere would be a good place to sleepâ¦" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Anywhere would be a good place to sleepâ¦"
) ) ) );
5387 } else if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5388 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You feel like you haven't slept in days." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You feel like you haven't slept in days."
) ) ) );
5389 }
5390 }
5391
5392 // Even if we're not Exhausted, we really should be feeling lack/sleep earlier
5393 // Penalties start at Dead Tired and go from there
5394 if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::DEAD_TIRED && !in_sleep_state() ) {
5395 if( get_fatigue() >= 700 ) {
5396 if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5397 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You're too physically tired to stop yawning." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You're too physically tired to stop yawning."
) ) ) );
5398 add_effect( effect_lack_sleep, 30_minutes + 1_turns );
5399 }
5400 /** @EFFECT_INT slightly decreases occurrence of short naps when dead tired */
5401 if( one_in( 50 + int_cur ) ) {
5402 // Rivet's idea: look out for microsleeps!
5403 fall_asleep( 30_seconds );
5404 }
5405 } else if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::EXHAUSTED ) {
5406 if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5407 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "How much longer until bedtime?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "How much longer until bedtime?"
) ) ) );
5408 add_effect( effect_lack_sleep, 30_minutes + 1_turns );
5409 }
5410 /** @EFFECT_INT slightly decreases occurrence of short naps when exhausted */
5411 if( one_in( 100 + int_cur ) ) {
5412 fall_asleep( 30_seconds );
5413 }
5414 } else if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::DEAD_TIRED && calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
5415 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "*yawn* You should really get some sleep." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "*yawn* You should really get some sleep."
) ) ) );
5416 add_effect( effect_lack_sleep, 30_minutes + 1_turns );
5417 }
5418 }
5419
5420 // Sleep deprivation kicks in if lack of sleep is avoided with stimulants or otherwise for long periods of time
5421 int sleep_deprivation = get_sleep_deprivation();
5422 float sleep_deprivation_pct = sleep_deprivation / static_cast<float>( SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MASSIVE );
5423
5424 if( sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_HARMLESS && !in_sleep_state() ) {
5425 if( calendar::once_every( 60_minutes ) ) {
5426 if( sleep_deprivation < SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MINOR ) {
5427 add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
5428 _( "Your mind feels tired. It's been a while since you've slept well." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your mind feels tired. It's been a while since you've slept well."
) ) ) );
5429 mod_fatigue( 1 );
5430 } else if( sleep_deprivation < SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_SERIOUS ) {
5431 add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
5432 _( "Your mind feels foggy from a lack of good sleep, and your eyes keep trying to close against your will." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your mind feels foggy from a lack of good sleep, and your eyes keep trying to close against your will."
) ) ) );
5433 mod_fatigue( 5 );
5434
5435 if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
5436 mod_daily_health( -1, -10 );
5437 }
5438 } else if( sleep_deprivation < SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MAJOR ) {
5439 add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
5440 _( "Your mind feels weary, and you dread every wakeful minute that passes. You crave sleep, and feel like you're about to collapse." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your mind feels weary, and you dread every wakeful minute that passes. You crave sleep, and feel like you're about to collapse."
) ) ) );
5441 mod_fatigue( 10 );
5442
5443 if( one_in( 5 ) ) {
5444 mod_daily_health( -2, -10 );
5445 }
5446 } else if( sleep_deprivation < SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MASSIVE ) {
5447 add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
5448 _( "You haven't slept decently for so long that your whole body is screaming for mercy. It's a miracle that you're still awake, but it feels more like a curse now." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You haven't slept decently for so long that your whole body is screaming for mercy. It's a miracle that you're still awake, but it feels more like a curse now."
) ) ) );
5449 mod_fatigue( 40 );
5450
5451 mod_daily_health( -5, -10 );
5452 }
5453 // else you pass out for 20 hours, guaranteed
5454
5455 // Microsleeps are slightly worse if you're sleep deprived, but not by much. (chance: 1 in (75 + int_cur) at lethal sleep deprivation)
5456 // Note: these can coexist with fatigue-related microsleeps
5457 /** @EFFECT_INT slightly decreases occurrence of short naps when sleep deprived */
5458 if( one_in( static_cast<int>( sleep_deprivation_pct * 75 ) + int_cur ) ) {
5459 fall_asleep( 30_seconds );
5460 }
5461
5462 // Stimulants can be used to stay awake a while longer, but after a while you'll just collapse.
5463 bool can_pass_out = ( get_stim() < 30 && sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MINOR ) ||
5464 sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MAJOR;
5465
5466 if( can_pass_out && calendar::once_every( 10_minutes ) ) {
5467 /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases resilience against passing out from sleep deprivation */
5468 if( one_in( static_cast<int>( ( 1 - sleep_deprivation_pct ) * 100 ) + per_cur ) ||
5469 sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MASSIVE ) {
5470 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
5471 _( "Your body collapses due to sleep deprivation, your neglected fatigue rushing back all at once, and you pass out on the spot." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your body collapses due to sleep deprivation, your neglected fatigue rushing back all at once, and you pass out on the spot."
) ) )
5472 , _( "<npcname> collapses to the ground from exhaustion." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> collapses to the ground from exhaustion."
) ) ) );
5473 if( get_fatigue() < fatigue_levels::EXHAUSTED ) {
5474 set_fatigue( fatigue_levels::EXHAUSTED );
5475 }
5476
5477 if( sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_MAJOR ) {
5478 fall_asleep( 20_hours );
5479 } else if( sleep_deprivation >= SLEEP_DEPRIVATION_SERIOUS ) {
5480 fall_asleep( 16_hours );
5481 } else {
5482 fall_asleep( 12_hours );
5483 }
5484 }
5485 }
5486
5487 }
5488 }
5489}
5490
5491void Character::get_sick( bool is_flu )
5492{
5493 // Health is in the range [-200,200].
5494 // Diseases are half as common for every 50 health you gain.
5495 const float health_factor = std::pow( 2.0f, get_lifestyle() / 50.0f );
5496 const float env_factor = 2.0f + std::pow( get_env_resist( body_part_mouth ), 0.3f );
5497 const int disease_rarity = static_cast<int>( health_factor + env_factor );
5498 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "disease_rarity = %d", disease_rarity )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "disease_rarity = %d"
, disease_rarity ) ) ); } } while( false );
5499
5500 if( one_in( disease_rarity ) ) {
5501 // Normal people get sick about 2-4 times/year. If they are disease resistant, it's 1 time per year.
5502 const int base_diseases_per_year = has_trait( trait_DISRESISTANT ) ? 1 : 3;
5503 const time_duration immunity_duration = calendar::season_length() * 4 / base_diseases_per_year;
5504
5505 bool already_has_flu = has_effect( effect_flu ) ||
5506 count_queued_effects( "pre_flu" ) ||
5507 count_queued_effects( "flu" );
5508 bool already_has_cold = has_effect( effect_common_cold ) ||
5509 count_queued_effects( "pre_common_cold" ) ||
5510 count_queued_effects( "common_cold" );
5511
5512 if( is_flu && !already_has_flu ) {
5513 // Total duration of symptoms
5514 time_duration total_duration = rng( 3_days, 10_days );
5515 // Time before first symptoms
5516 time_duration incubation_period = rng( 18_hours, 36_hours );
5517 // Time from first symptoms to full blown disease
5518 time_duration warning_period = std::min( rng( 18_hours, 36_hours ), total_duration );
5519
5520 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Queuing flu: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Queuing flu: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h"
, to_hours<int>( incubation_period ), to_hours<int>
( warning_period ), to_hours<int>( total_duration ) ) )
); } } while( false )
5521 to_hours<int>( incubation_period ),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Queuing flu: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h"
, to_hours<int>( incubation_period ), to_hours<int>
( warning_period ), to_hours<int>( total_duration ) ) )
); } } while( false )
5522 to_hours<int>( warning_period ),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Queuing flu: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h"
, to_hours<int>( incubation_period ), to_hours<int>
( warning_period ), to_hours<int>( total_duration ) ) )
); } } while( false )
5523 to_hours<int>( total_duration ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Queuing flu: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h"
, to_hours<int>( incubation_period ), to_hours<int>
( warning_period ), to_hours<int>( total_duration ) ) )
); } } while( false );
5524
5525 queue_effect( "pre_flu", incubation_period, warning_period );
5526 queue_effect( "flu", incubation_period + warning_period, total_duration - warning_period );
5527 queue_effect( "flushot", incubation_period + total_duration, immunity_duration );
5528
5529 } else if( !already_has_cold ) {
5530 // Total duration of symptoms
5531 time_duration total_duration = rng( 1_days, 14_days );
5532 // Time before first symptoms
5533 time_duration incubation_period = rng( 18_hours, 36_hours );
5534 // Time from first symptoms to full blown disease
5535 time_duration warning_period = std::min( rng( 18_hours, 36_hours ), total_duration );
5536
5537 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Queuing cold: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Queuing cold: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h"
, to_hours<int>( incubation_period ), to_hours<int>
( warning_period ), to_hours<int>( total_duration ) ) )
); } } while( false )
5538 to_hours<int>( incubation_period ),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Queuing cold: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h"
, to_hours<int>( incubation_period ), to_hours<int>
( warning_period ), to_hours<int>( total_duration ) ) )
); } } while( false )
5539 to_hours<int>( warning_period ),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Queuing cold: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h"
, to_hours<int>( incubation_period ), to_hours<int>
( warning_period ), to_hours<int>( total_duration ) ) )
); } } while( false )
5540 to_hours<int>( total_duration ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Queuing cold: incubation %d h, warning %d h, total %d h"
, to_hours<int>( incubation_period ), to_hours<int>
( warning_period ), to_hours<int>( total_duration ) ) )
); } } while( false );
5541
5542 queue_effect( "pre_common_cold", incubation_period, warning_period );
5543 queue_effect( "common_cold", incubation_period + warning_period, total_duration - warning_period );
5544 queue_effect( "common_cold_immunity", incubation_period + total_duration, immunity_duration );
5545 }
5546 }
5547}
5548
5549bool Character::is_hibernating() const
5550{
5551 // Hibernating only kicks in whilst Engorged; separate tracking for hunger/thirst here
5552 // as a safety catch. One test subject managed to get two Colds during hibernation;
5553 // since those add fatigue and dry out the character, the subject went for the full 10 days plus
5554 // a little, and came out of it well into Parched. Hibernating shouldn't endanger your
5555 // life like that--but since there's much less fluid reserve than food reserve,
5556 // simply using the same numbers won't work.
5557 return has_effect( effect_sleep ) && get_kcal_percent() > 0.8f &&
5558 get_thirst() <= 80 && has_active_mutation( trait_HIBERNATE );
5559}
5560
5561void Character::toolmod_add( item_location tool, item_location mod )
5562{
5563 if( !tool && !mod ) {
5564 debugmsg( "Tried toolmod installation but mod/tool not available" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "5564", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried toolmod installation but mod/tool not available"
);
5565 return;
5566 }
5567 // first check at least the minimum requirements are met
5568 if( !has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) && !can_use( *mod, *tool ) ) {
5569 return;
5570 }
5571
5572 if( !query_yn( _( "Permanently install your %1$s in your %2$s?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Permanently install your %1$s in your %2$s?"
) ) ),
5573 colorize( mod->tname(), mod->color_in_inventory() ),
5574 colorize( tool->tname(), tool->color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
5575 add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
5576 return; // player canceled installation
5577 }
5578
5579 assign_activity( ACT_TOOLMOD_ADD, 1, -1 );
5580 activity.targets.emplace_back( std::move( tool ) );
5581 activity.targets.emplace_back( std::move( mod ) );
5582}
5583
5584void Character::temp_equalizer( const bodypart_id &bp1, const bodypart_id &bp2 )
5585{
5586 // Body heat is moved around.
5587 // Shift in one direction only, will be shifted in the other direction separately.
5588 const units::temperature_delta diff = ( get_part_temp_cur( bp2 ) - get_part_temp_cur( bp1 ) ) *
5589 0.0001; // If bp1 is warmer, it will lose heat
5590 mod_part_temp_cur( bp1, diff );
5591}
5592
5593Character::comfort_response_t Character::base_comfort_value( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
5594{
5595 // Comfort of sleeping spots is "objective", while sleep_spot( p ) is "subjective"
5596 // As in the latter also checks for fatigue and other variables while this function
5597 // only looks at the base comfyness of something. It's still subjective, in a sense,
5598 // as arachnids who sleep in webs will find most places comfortable for instance.
5599 int comfort = 0;
5600
5601 comfort_response_t comfort_response;
5602
5603 bool plantsleep = has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH );
5604 bool fungaloid_cosplay = has_trait( trait_M_SKIN3 );
5605 bool websleep = has_trait( trait_WEB_WALKER );
5606 bool webforce = has_trait( trait_THRESH_SPIDER ) && ( has_trait( trait_WEB_SPINNER ) ||
5607 has_trait( trait_WEB_WEAVER ) );
5608 bool in_shell = has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL2 ) ||
5609 has_active_mutation( trait_SHELL3 );
5610 bool watersleep = has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP ) || has_trait( trait_UNDINE_SLEEP_WATER );
5611
5612 map &here = get_map();
5613 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( p );
5614 const maptile tile = here.maptile_at( p );
5615 const trap &trap_at_pos = tile.get_trap_t();
5616 const ter_id ter_at_pos = tile.get_ter();
5617 const furn_id furn_at_pos = tile.get_furn();
5618
5619 int web = here.get_field_intensity( p, fd_web );
5620
5621 // Some mutants have different comfort needs
5622 if( !plantsleep && !webforce ) {
5623 if( in_shell ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
5624 comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5625 // Note: shelled individuals can still use sleeping aids!
5626 } else if( vp ) {
5627 if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> cargo = vp.cargo() ) {
5628 for( const item &items_it : cargo->items() ) {
5629 if( items_it.has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID ) ) {
5630 // Note: BED + SLEEP_AID = 9 pts, or 1 pt below very_comfortable
5631 comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5632 comfort_response.aid = &items_it;
5633 break; // prevents using more than 1 sleep aid
5634 }
5635 if( items_it.has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID_CONTAINER ) ) {
5636 bool found = false;
5637 if( items_it.num_item_stacks() > 1 ) {
5638 // Only one item is allowed, so we don't fill our pillowcase with nails
5639 continue;
5640 }
5641 for( const item *it : items_it.all_items_top() ) {
5642 if( it->has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID ) ) {
5643 // Note: BED + SLEEP_AID = 9 pts, or 1 pt below very_comfortable
5644 comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5645 comfort_response.aid = &items_it;
5646 found = true;
5647 break; // prevents using more than 1 sleep aid
5648 }
5649 }
5650 // Only 1 sleep aid
5651 if( found ) {
5652 break;
5653 }
5654 }
5655 }
5656 }
5657 if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> board = vp.part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true ) ) {
5658 comfort += board->info().comfort;
5659 } else {
5660 comfort -= here.move_cost( p );
5661 }
5662 if( has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
5663 comfort = static_cast<int>( comfort_level::impossible );
5664 }
5665 }
5666 // Not in a vehicle, start checking furniture/terrain/traps at this point in decreasing order
5667 else if( furn_at_pos != f_null ) {
5668 comfort += 0 + furn_at_pos.obj().comfort;
5669 }
5670 // Web sleepers can use their webs if better furniture isn't available
5671 else if( websleep && web >= 3 ) {
5672 comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5673 } else if( !trap_at_pos.is_null() ) {
5674 comfort += 0 + trap_at_pos.comfort;
5675 } else {
5676 // Not a comfortable sleeping spot
5677 comfort -= here.move_cost( p );
5678 // Include comfort from terrain, if any
5679 comfort += ter_at_pos.obj().comfort;
5680 }
5681
5682 if( comfort_response.aid == nullptr ) {
5683 const map_stack items = here.i_at( p );
5684 for( const item &items_it : items ) {
5685 if( items_it.has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID ) ) {
5686 // Note: BED + SLEEP_AID = 9 pts, or 1 pt below very_comfortable
5687 comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5688 comfort_response.aid = &items_it;
5689 break; // prevents using more than 1 sleep aid
5690 }
5691 if( items_it.has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID_CONTAINER ) ) {
5692 bool found = false;
5693 if( items_it.num_item_stacks() > 1 ) {
5694 // Only one item is allowed, so we don't fill our pillowcase with nails
5695 continue;
5696 }
5697 for( const item *it : items_it.all_items_top() ) {
5698 if( it->has_flag( flag_SLEEP_AID ) ) {
5699 // Note: BED + SLEEP_AID = 9 pts, or 1 pt below very_comfortable
5700 comfort += 1 + static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable );
5701 comfort_response.aid = &items_it;
5702 found = true;
5703 break; // prevents using more than 1 sleep aid
5704 }
5705 }
5706 // Only 1 sleep aid
5707 if( found ) {
5708 break;
5709 }
5710 }
5711 }
5712 }
5713 if( ( fungaloid_cosplay && here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FUNGUS, pos() ) ) ||
5714 ( watersleep && here.has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, pos() ) ) ) {
5715 comfort += static_cast<int>( comfort_level::very_comfortable );
5716 }
5717 } else if( plantsleep ) {
5718 if( vp || furn_at_pos != f_null ) {
5719 // Sleep ain't happening in a vehicle or on furniture
5720 comfort = static_cast<int>( comfort_level::impossible );
5721 } else {
5722 // It's very easy for Chloromorphs to get to sleep on soil!
5723 if( ter_at_pos == t_dirt || ter_at_pos == t_pit || ter_at_pos == t_dirtmound ||
5724 ter_at_pos == t_pit_shallow ) {
5725 comfort += static_cast<int>( comfort_level::very_comfortable );
5726 }
5727 // Not as much if you have to dig through stuff first
5728 else if( ter_at_pos == t_grass ) {
5729 comfort += static_cast<int>( comfort_level::comfortable );
5730 }
5731 // Sleep ain't happening
5732 else {
5733 comfort = static_cast<int>( comfort_level::impossible );
5734 }
5735 }
5736 // Has webforce
5737 } else {
5738 if( web >= 3 ) {
5739 // Thick Web and you're good to go
5740 comfort += static_cast<int>( comfort_level::very_comfortable );
5741 } else {
5742 comfort = static_cast<int>( comfort_level::impossible );
5743 }
5744 }
5745
5746 if( comfort > static_cast<int>( comfort_level::comfortable ) ) {
5747 comfort_response.level = comfort_level::very_comfortable;
5748 } else if( comfort > static_cast<int>( comfort_level::slightly_comfortable ) ) {
5749 comfort_response.level = comfort_level::comfortable;
5750 } else if( comfort > static_cast<int>( comfort_level::neutral ) ) {
5751 comfort_response.level = comfort_level::slightly_comfortable;
5752 } else if( comfort == static_cast<int>( comfort_level::neutral ) ) {
5753 comfort_response.level = comfort_level::neutral;
5754 } else {
5755 comfort_response.level = comfort_level::uncomfortable;
5756 }
5757 return comfort_response;
5758}
5759
5760float Character::get_dodge_base() const
5761{
5762 /** @EFFECT_DEX increases dodge base */
5763 /** @EFFECT_DODGE increases dodge_base */
5764 return get_dex() / 2.0f + get_skill_level( skill_dodge );
5765}
5766float Character::get_hit_base() const
5767{
5768 /** @EFFECT_DEX increases hit base, slightly */
5769 return get_dex() / 4.0f;
5770}
5771
5772std::string Character::get_name() const
5773{
5774 return play_name.value_or( name );
5775}
5776
5777std::vector<std::string> Character::get_grammatical_genders() const
5778{
5779 if( male ) {
5780 return { "m" };
5781 } else {
5782 return { "f" };
5783 }
5784}
5785
5786nc_color Character::symbol_color() const
5787{
5788 nc_color basic = basic_symbol_color();
5789
5790 if( has_effect( effect_downed ) ) {
5791 return hilite( basic );
5792 } else if( has_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
5793 return cyan_background( basic );
5794 }
5795
5796 const field &fields = get_map().field_at( pos() );
5797
5798 // Priority: electricity, fire, acid, gases
5799 bool has_elec = false;
5800 bool has_fire = false;
5801 bool has_acid = false;
5802 bool has_fume = false;
5803 for( const auto &field : fields ) {
5804 has_elec = field.first.obj().has_elec;
5805 if( has_elec ) {
5806 return hilite( basic );
5807 }
5808 has_fire = field.first.obj().has_fire;
5809 has_acid = field.first.obj().has_acid;
5810 has_fume = field.first.obj().has_fume;
5811 }
5812 if( has_fire ) {
5813 return red_background( basic );
5814 }
5815 if( has_acid ) {
5816 return green_background( basic );
5817 }
5818 if( has_fume ) {
5819 return white_background( basic );
5820 }
5821 if( in_sleep_state() ) {
5822 return hilite( basic );
5823 }
5824 return basic;
5825}
5826
5827bool Character::check_immunity_data( const field_immunity_data &ft ) const
5828{
5829 for( const json_character_flag &flag : ft.immunity_data_flags ) {
5830 if( has_flag( flag ) ) {
5831 return true;
5832 }
5833 }
5834 bool immune_by_body_part_resistance = !ft.immunity_data_body_part_env_resistance.empty();
5835 for( const std::pair<body_part_type::type, int> &fide :
5836 ft.immunity_data_body_part_env_resistance ) {
5837 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( fide.first ) ) {
5838 if( get_env_resist( bp ) < fide.second ) {
5839 // If any one of a bodypart type is unprotected disregard this immunity type
5840 // TODO: mitigate effect strength based on protected:unprotected ratio?
5841 immune_by_body_part_resistance = false;
5842 break;
5843 }
5844 }
5845 }
5846 if( immune_by_body_part_resistance ) {
5847 return true;
5848 }
5849
5850 bool immune_by_worn_flags = !ft.immunity_data_part_item_flags.empty();
5851 // Check if all worn flags are fulfilled
5852 for( const std::pair<body_part_type::type, flag_id> &fide :
5853 ft.immunity_data_part_item_flags ) {
5854 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( fide.first ) ) {
5855 if( !worn_with_flag( fide.second, bp ) ) {
5856 // If any one of a bodypart type is unprotected disregard this immunity type
5857 // TODO: mitigate effect strength based on protected:unprotected ratio?
5858 immune_by_worn_flags = false;
5859 break;
5860 }
5861 }
5862 }
5863
5864 if( immune_by_worn_flags ) {
5865 return true;
5866 }
5867
5868 // Check if the optional worn flags are fulfilled
5869 for( const std::pair<body_part_type::type, flag_id> &fide :
5870 ft.immunity_data_part_item_flags_any ) {
5871 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( fide.first ) ) {
5872 if( worn_with_flag( fide.second, bp ) ) {
5873 // For now a single flag will protect all limbs, TODO: handle optional flags for multiples of the same limb type
5874 return true;
5875 }
5876 }
5877 }
5878
5879 return false;
5880}
5881
5882bool Character::is_immune_field( const field_type_id &fid ) const
5883{
5884 // Obviously this makes us invincible
5885 if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
5886 return true;
5887 }
5888
5889 // Check to see if we are immune
5890 const field_type &ft = fid.obj();
5891
5892 if( check_immunity_data( ft.immunity_data ) ) {
5893 return true;
5894 }
5895
5896 if( ft.has_elec ) {
5897 return is_elec_immune();
5898 }
5899 if( ft.has_fire ) {
5900 return has_flag( json_flag_HEATSINK ) || is_wearing( itype_rm13_armor_on );
5901 }
5902 if( ft.has_acid ) {
5903 return !is_on_ground() && get_env_resist( body_part_foot_l ) >= 15 &&
5904 get_env_resist( body_part_foot_r ) >= 15 &&
5905 get_env_resist( body_part_leg_l ) >= 15 &&
5906 get_env_resist( body_part_leg_r ) >= 15 &&
5907 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
5908 get_armor_type( damage_acid, body_part_foot_l ) >= 5 &&
5909 get_armor_type( damage_acid, body_part_foot_r ) >= 5 &&
5910 get_armor_type( damage_acid, body_part_leg_l ) >= 5 &&
5911 get_armor_type( damage_acid, body_part_leg_r ) >= 5;
5912 }
5913 // If we haven't found immunity yet fall up to the next level
5914 return Creature::is_immune_field( fid );
5915}
5916
5917// FIXME: Relies on hardcoded damage type
5918bool Character::is_elec_immune() const
5919{
5920 return is_immune_damage( damage_electric );
5921}
5922
5923bool Character::is_immune_effect( const efftype_id &eff ) const
5924{
5925 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage types
5926 if( eff == effect_downed ) {
5927 return is_knockdown_immune();
5928 } else if( eff == effect_onfire ) {
5929 return is_immune_damage( damage_heat );
5930 } else if( eff == effect_deaf ) {
5931 return worn_with_flag( flag_DEAF ) || has_flag( json_flag_DEAF ) ||
5932 worn_with_flag( flag_PARTIAL_DEAF ) ||
5933 has_flag( json_flag_IMMUNE_HEARING_DAMAGE ) ||
5934 is_wearing( itype_rm13_armor_on ) || is_deaf();
5935 } else if( eff == effect_mute ) {
5936 return has_bionic( bio_voice );
5937 } else if( eff == effect_corroding ) {
5938 return is_immune_damage( damage_acid ) || has_trait( trait_SLIMY ) ||
5939 has_trait( trait_VISCOUS );
5940 }
5941 for( const json_character_flag &flag : eff->immune_flags ) {
5942 if( has_flag( flag ) ) {
5943 return true;
5944 }
5945 }
5946 return false;
5947}
5948
5949bool Character::is_immune_damage( const damage_type_id &dt ) const
5950{
5951 if( dt.is_null() ) {
5952 return true;
5953 }
5954 for( const std::string &fl : dt->immune_flags ) {
5955 if( has_flag( json_character_flag( fl ) ) || worn_with_flag( flag_id( fl ) ) ) {
5956 return true;
5957 }
5958 }
5959 return false;
5960}
5961
5962bool Character::is_rad_immune() const
5963{
5964 bool has_helmet = false;
5965 return ( is_wearing_power_armor( &has_helmet ) && has_helmet ) || worn_with_flag( flag_RAD_PROOF );
5966}
5967
5968bool Character::is_knockdown_immune() const
5969{
5970 // hard code for old tentacle mutation
5971 bool knockdown_immune = has_trait( trait_LEG_TENT_BRACE ) && is_barefoot();
5972
5973 // if we have 1.0 or greater knockdown resist
5974 knockdown_immune |= calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0, enchant_vals::mod::KNOCKDOWN_RESIST ) >= 1;
5975 return knockdown_immune;
5976}
5977
5978int Character::throw_range( const item &it ) const
5979{
5980 if( it.is_null() ) {
5981 return -1;
5982 }
5983
5984 item tmp = it;
5985
5986 if( tmp.count_by_charges() && tmp.charges > 1 ) {
5987 tmp.charges = 1;
5988 }
5989
5990 int str = get_arm_str();
5991
5992 /** @ARM_STR determines maximum weight that can be thrown */
5993 if( ( tmp.weight() / 113_gram ) > str * 15 ) {
5994 return 0;
5995 }
5996 // Increases as weight decreases until 150 g, then decreases again
5997 /** @ARM_STR increases throwing range, vs item weight (high or low) */
5998 if( is_mounted() ) {
5999 auto *mons = mounted_creature.get();
6000 str = mons->mech_str_addition() != 0 ? mons->mech_str_addition() : str;
6001 }
6002 int ret = ( str * 10 ) / ( tmp.weight() >= 150_gram ? tmp.weight() / 113_gram : 10 -
6003 static_cast<int>(
6004 tmp.weight() / 15_gram ) );
6005 ret -= tmp.volume() / 1_liter;
6006 if( has_active_bionic( bio_railgun ) && tmp.made_of_any( ferric ) ) {
6007 ret *= 2;
6008 }
6009 if( ret < 1 ) {
6010 return 1;
6011 }
6012 // Cap at double our strength + skill
6013 /** @EFFECT_STR caps throwing range */
6014
6015 /** @EFFECT_THROW caps throwing range */
6016 if( ret > round( str * 3 + get_skill_level( skill_throw ) ) ) {
6017 return round( str * 3 + get_skill_level( skill_throw ) );
6018 }
6019
6020 return ret;
6021}
6022
6023const std::vector<material_id> Character::fleshy = { material_flesh, material_hflesh };
6024bool Character::made_of( const material_id &m ) const
6025{
6026 // TODO: check for mutations that change this.
6027 return std::find( fleshy.begin(), fleshy.end(), m ) != fleshy.end();
6028}
6029bool Character::made_of_any( const std::set<material_id> &ms ) const
6030{
6031 // TODO: check for mutations that change this.
6032 return std::any_of( fleshy.begin(), fleshy.end(), [&ms]( const material_id & e ) {
6033 return ms.count( e );
6034 } );
6035}
6036
6037bool Character::is_blind() const
6038{
6039 return worn_with_flag( flag_BLIND ) ||
6040 has_flag( json_flag_BLIND ) || get_limb_score( limb_score_vision ) <= 0;
6041}
6042
6043bool Character::is_invisible() const
6044{
6045 return has_flag( json_flag_INVISIBLE ) ||
6046 is_wearing_active_optcloak() ||
6047 has_trait( trait_DEBUG_CLOAK );
6048}
6049
6050int Character::visibility( bool, int ) const
6051{
6052 // 0-100 %
6053 if( is_invisible() ) {
6054 return 0;
6055 }
6056 // TODO:
6057 // if ( dark_clothing() && light check ...
6058 int stealth_modifier = std::floor( mutation_value( "stealth_modifier" ) );
6059 stealth_modifier = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::STEALTH_MODIFIER,
6060 stealth_modifier );
6061 return clamp( 100 - stealth_modifier, 40, 160 );
6062}
6063
6064/*
6065 * Calculate player brightness based on the brightest active item, as
6066 * per itype tag LIGHT_* and optional CHARGEDIM ( fade starting at 20% charge )
6067 * item.light.* is -unimplemented- for the moment, as it is a custom override for
6068 * applying light sources/arcs with specific angle and direction.
6069 */
6070float Character::active_light() const
6071{
6072 float lumination = 0.0f;
6073
6074 int maxlum = 0;
6075 cache_visit_items_with( "is_emissive", &item::is_emissive, [&maxlum]( const item & it ) {
6076 const int lumit = it.getlight_emit();
6077 if( maxlum < lumit ) {
6078 maxlum = lumit;
6079 }
6080 } );
6081
6082 lumination = static_cast<float>( maxlum );
6083
6084 float mut_lum = 0.0f;
6085 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
6086 float curr_lum = 0.0f;
6087 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, float> &elem : mut->lumination ) {
6088 const float lum_coverage = worn.coverage_with_flags_exclude( elem.first.id(),
6089 { flag_ALLOWS_NATURAL_ATTACKS, flag_SEMITANGIBLE, flag_PERSONAL } ) / 100.0f;
6090 curr_lum += elem.second * ( 1 - lum_coverage );
6091 }
6092 mut_lum += curr_lum;
6093 }
6094
6095 lumination = std::max( lumination, mut_lum );
6096
6097 lumination = std::max( lumination,
6098 static_cast<float>( enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::LUMINATION, 0 ) ) );
6099
6100 if( lumination < 5 && ( has_effect( effect_glowing ) || has_effect( effect_glowy_led ) ) ) {
6101 lumination = 5;
6102 }
6103 return lumination;
6104}
6105
6106bool Character::sees_with_specials( const Creature &critter ) const
6107{
6108 const double sight_range_electric = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6109 enchant_vals::mod::SIGHT_RANGE_ELECTRIC );
6110 const double motion_vision_range = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6111 enchant_vals::mod::MOTION_VISION_RANGE );
6112 const double sight_range_fae = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6113 enchant_vals::mod::SIGHT_RANGE_FAE );
6114 const double sight_range_nether = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6115 enchant_vals::mod::SIGHT_RANGE_NETHER );
6116 const double sight_range_minds = calculate_by_enchantment( 0.0,
6117 enchant_vals::mod::SIGHT_RANGE_MINDS );
6118 if( critter.is_electrical() && rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= sight_range_electric ) {
6119 return true;
6120 }
6121 if( critter.is_fae() && rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= sight_range_fae ) {
6122 return true;
6123 }
6124 if( critter.is_nether() && rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= sight_range_nether ) {
6125 return true;
6126 }
6127 if( critter.has_mind() && rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= sight_range_minds ) {
6128 return true;
6129 }
6130 if( rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= motion_vision_range ) {
6131 return true;
6132 }
6133
6134 if( critter.digging() && has_active_bionic( bio_ground_sonar ) ) {
6135 // Bypass the check below, the bionic sonar also bypasses the sees(point) check because
6136 // walls don't block sonar which is transmitted in the ground, not the air.
6137 // TODO: this might need checks whether the player is in the air, or otherwise not connected
6138 // to the ground. It also might need a range check.
6139 return true;
6140 }
6141
6142 return false;
6143}
6144
6145bool Character::pour_into( item_location &container, item &liquid, bool ignore_settings )
6146{
6147 std::string err;
6148 int max_remaining_capacity = container->get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid( liquid, *this, &err );
6149 int amount = container->all_pockets_rigid() ? max_remaining_capacity :
6150 std::min( max_remaining_capacity, container.max_charges_by_parent_recursive( liquid ).value() );
6151
6152 if( !err.empty() ) {
6153 if( !container->has_item_with( [&liquid]( const item & it ) {
6154 return it.typeId() == liquid.typeId();
6155 } ) ) {
6156 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, err );
6157 } else {
6158 //~ you filled <container> to the brim with <liquid>
6159 add_msg_if_player( _( "You filled %1$s to the brim with %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You filled %1$s to the brim with %2$s."
) ) ), container->tname(),
6160 liquid.tname() );
6161 }
6162 return false;
6163 }
6164
6165 if( amount == 0 ) {
6166 add_msg_if_player( _( "%1$s can't to expand to add any more %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s can't to expand to add any more %2$s."
) ) ), container->tname(),
6167 liquid.tname() );
6168 return false;
6169 }
6170
6171 // get_remaining_capacity_for_liquid doesn't consider the current amount of liquid
6172 if( liquid.count_by_charges() ) {
6173 amount = std::min( amount, liquid.charges );
6174 }
6175
6176 add_msg_if_player( _( "You pour %1$s into the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You pour %1$s into the %2$s."
) ) ), liquid.tname(), container->tname() );
6177
6178 liquid.charges -= container->fill_with( liquid, amount, false, false, ignore_settings );
6179 inv->unsort();
6180
6181 if( liquid.charges > 0 ) {
6182 add_msg_if_player( _( "There's some left over!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's some left over!" ) )
) );
6183 }
6184
6185 get_avatar().invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
6186
6187 return true;
6188}
6189
6190bool Character::pour_into( const vpart_reference &vp, item &liquid ) const
6191{
6192 if( !vp.part().fill_with( liquid ) ) {
6193 return false;
6194 }
6195
6196 //~ $1 - vehicle name, $2 - part name, $3 - liquid type
6197 add_msg_if_player( _( "You refill the %1$s's %2$s with %3$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You refill the %1$s's %2$s with %3$s."
) ) ),
6198 vp.vehicle().name, vp.part().name(), liquid.type_name() );
6199
6200 if( liquid.charges > 0 ) {
6201 add_msg_if_player( _( "There's some left over!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's some left over!" ) )
) );
6202 }
6203 return true;
6204}
6205
6206float Character::rest_quality() const
6207{
6208 map &here = get_map();
6209 const tripoint your_pos = pos();
6210 float rest = 0.0f;
6211 // Negative morales are penalties
6212 int cold_penalty = -has_morale( morale_cold );
6213 int heat_penalty = -has_morale( morale_hot );
6214 if( cold_penalty > 0 || heat_penalty > 0 ) {
6215 // Extreme temperatures have the body working harder to fight them, with less energy dedicated to healing, even just laying around will have you shivering or sweating.
6216 rest -= cold_penalty / 10.0f;
6217 rest -= heat_penalty / 10.0f;
6218 }
6219
6220 if( has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
6221 // Beds should normally have a maximum of 2C warmth, rest == 1.0 on a pristine bed. Less comfortable beds provide less rest quality.
6222 // Cannot be lower than 0, even though some beds(like *the bare ground*) have negative floor_bedding_warmth. Maybe this should change?
6223 rest += ( std::max( units::to_kelvin_delta( floor_bedding_warmth( your_pos ) ), 0.f ) / 2.0f ) ;
6224 return std::max( rest, 0.0f );
6225 }
6226 const optional_vpart_position veh_part = here.veh_at( your_pos );
6227 bool has_vehicle_seat = !!veh_part.part_with_feature( "SEAT", true );
6228 if( activity_level() <= LIGHT_EXERCISE ) {
6229 rest += 0.1f;
6230 if( here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "CAN_SIT", your_pos.xy() ) || has_vehicle_seat ) {
6231 // If not performing any real exercise (not even moving around), chairs allow you to rest a little bit.
6232 rest += 0.2f;
6233 } else if( floor_bedding_warmth( your_pos ) > 0_C_delta ) {
6234 // Any comfortable bed can substitute for a chair, but only if you don't have one.
6235 rest += 0.2f * ( units::to_celsius_delta( floor_bedding_warmth( your_pos ) ) / 2.0f );
6236 }
6237 if( activity_level() <= NO_EXERCISE ) {
6238 rest += 0.2f;
6239 }
6240 }
6241 // These stack!
6242 if( activity_level() >= BRISK_EXERCISE ) {
6243 rest -= 0.1f;
6244 }
6245 if( activity_level() >= ACTIVE_EXERCISE ) {
6246 rest -= 0.2f;
6247 }
6248 if( activity_level() >= EXTRA_EXERCISE ) {
6249 rest -= 0.3f;
6250 }
6251 return rest;
6252}
6253
6254std::string Character::extended_description() const
6255{
6256 std::string ss;
6257 if( is_avatar() ) {
6258 // <bad>This is me, <player_name>.</bad>
6259 ss += string_format( _( "This is you - %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This is you - %s." ) ) ), get_name() );
6260 } else {
6261 ss += string_format( _( "This is %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This is %s." ) ) ), get_name() );
6262 }
6263
6264 ss += "\n--\n";
6265
6266 const std::vector<bodypart_id> &bps = get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main );
6267 // Find length of bp names, to align
6268 // accumulate looks weird here, any better function?
6269 int longest = std::accumulate( bps.begin(), bps.end(), 0,
6270 []( int m, bodypart_id bp ) {
6271 return std::max( m, utf8_width( body_part_name_as_heading( bp, 1 ) ) );
6272 } );
6273
6274 // This is a stripped-down version of the body_window function
6275 // This should be extracted into a separate function later on
6276 for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
6277 const std::string &bp_heading = body_part_name_as_heading( bp, 1 );
6278
6279 const nc_color state_col = display::limb_color( *this, bp, true, true, true );
6280 nc_color name_color = state_col;
6281 std::pair<std::string, nc_color> hp_bar = get_hp_bar( get_part_hp_cur( bp ), get_part_hp_max( bp ),
6282 false );
6283
6284 ss += colorize( left_justify( bp_heading, longest ), name_color );
6285 ss += colorize( hp_bar.first, hp_bar.second );
6286 // Trailing bars. UGLY!
6287 // TODO: Integrate into get_hp_bar somehow
6288 ss += colorize( std::string( 5 - utf8_width( hp_bar.first ), '.' ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) );
6289 ss += "\n";
6290 }
6291
6292 ss += "--\n";
6293 ss += _( "Wielding:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Wielding:" ) ) ) + std::string( " " );
6294 if( weapon.is_null() ) {
6295 ss += _( "Nothing" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nothing" ) ) );
6296 } else {
6297 ss += weapon.tname();
6298 }
6299
6300 ss += "\n";
6301 ss += _( "Wearing:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Wearing:" ) ) ) + std::string( " " );
6302
6303 const std::list<item> visible_worn_items = get_visible_worn_items();
6304 std::string worn_string = enumerate_as_string( visible_worn_items.begin(), visible_worn_items.end(),
6305 []( const item & it ) {
6306 return it.tname();
6307 } );
6308 ss += !worn_string.empty() ? worn_string : _( "Nothing" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nothing" ) ) );
6309
6310 return replace_colors( ss );
6311}
6312
6313social_modifiers Character::get_mutation_bionic_social_mods() const
6314{
6315 social_modifiers mods;
6316 for( const mutation_branch *mut : cached_mutations ) {
6317 mods += mut->social_mods;
6318 }
6319 for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
6320 mods += bio.info().social_mods;
6321 }
6322 return mods;
6323}
6324
6325template <std::optional<float> mutation_branch::*member>
6326float calc_mutation_value( const std::vector<const mutation_branch *> &mutations )
6327{
6328 float lowest = 0.0f;
6329 float highest = 0.0f;
6330 for( const mutation_branch *mut : mutations ) {
6331 if( ( mut->*member ).has_value() ) {
6332 float val = ( mut->*member ).value();
6333 lowest = std::min( lowest, val );
