6334 highest = std::max( highest, val );
6335 }
6336 }
6337
6338 return std::min( 0.0f, lowest ) + std::max( 0.0f, highest );
6339}
6340
6341template <std::optional<float> mutation_branch::*member>
6342float calc_mutation_value_additive( const std::vector<const mutation_branch *> &mutations )
6343{
6344 float ret = 0.0f;
6345 for( const mutation_branch *mut : mutations ) {
6346 if( ( mut->*member ).has_value() ) {
6347 ret += ( mut->*member ).value();
6348 }
6349 }
6350 return ret;
6351}
6352
6353template <std::optional<float> mutation_branch::*member>
6354float calc_mutation_value_multiplicative( const std::vector<const mutation_branch *> &mutations )
6355{
6356 float ret = 1.0f;
6357 for( const mutation_branch *mut : mutations ) {
6358 if( ( mut->*member ).has_value() ) {
6359 ret *= ( mut->*member ).value();
6360 }
6361 }
6362 return ret;
6363}
6364
6365static const std::map<std::string, std::function <float( std::vector<const mutation_branch *> )>>
6366mutation_value_map = {
6367 { "healing_awake", calc_mutation_value<&mutation_branch::healing_awake> },
6368 { "pain_modifier", calc_mutation_value<&mutation_branch::pain_modifier> },
6369 { "healing_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::healing_multiplier> },
6370 { "mending_modifier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::mending_modifier> },
6371 { "temperature_speed_modifier", calc_mutation_value<&mutation_branch::temperature_speed_modifier> },
6372 { "metabolism_modifier", calc_mutation_value<&mutation_branch::metabolism_modifier> },
6373 { "thirst_modifier", calc_mutation_value<&mutation_branch::thirst_modifier> },
6374 { "fatigue_regen_modifier", calc_mutation_value<&mutation_branch::fatigue_regen_modifier> },
6375 { "fatigue_modifier", calc_mutation_value<&mutation_branch::fatigue_modifier> },
6376 { "stamina_regen_modifier", calc_mutation_value<&mutation_branch::stamina_regen_modifier> },
6377 { "stealth_modifier", calc_mutation_value<&mutation_branch::stealth_modifier> },
6378 { "mana_modifier", calc_mutation_value_additive<&mutation_branch::mana_modifier> },
6379 { "mana_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::mana_multiplier> },
6380 { "mana_regen_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::mana_regen_multiplier> },
6381 { "bionic_mana_penalty", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::bionic_mana_penalty> },
6382 { "casting_time_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::casting_time_multiplier> },
6383 { "attackcost_modifier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::attackcost_modifier> },
6384 { "cardio_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::cardio_multiplier> },
6385 { "weight_capacity_modifier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::weight_capacity_modifier> },
6386 { "noise_modifier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::noise_modifier> },
6387 { "overmap_sight", calc_mutation_value_additive<&mutation_branch::overmap_sight> },
6388 { "overmap_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::overmap_multiplier> },
6389 { "reading_speed_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::reading_speed_multiplier> },
6390 { "skill_rust_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::skill_rust_multiplier> },
6391 { "crafting_speed_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::crafting_speed_multiplier> },
6392 { "obtain_cost_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::obtain_cost_multiplier> },
6393 { "stomach_size_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::stomach_size_multiplier> },
6394 { "vomit_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::vomit_multiplier> },
6395 { "consume_time_modifier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::consume_time_modifier> },
6396 { "sweat_multiplier", calc_mutation_value_multiplicative<&mutation_branch::sweat_multiplier> },
6397};
6398
6399float Character::mutation_value( const std::string &val ) const
6400{
6401 // Syntax similar to tuple get<n>()
6402 const auto found = mutation_value_map.find( val );
6403
6404 if( found == mutation_value_map.end() ) {
6405 debugmsg( "Invalid mutation value name %s", val )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "6405", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid mutation value name %s"
, val);
6406 return 0.0f;
6407 } else {
6408 return found->second( cached_mutations );
6409 }
6410}
6411
6412namespace
6413{
6414float _hp_modified_rate( Character const &who, float rate )
6415{
6416 float const primary_hp_mod = who.enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( enchant_vals::mod::MAX_HP );
6417 if( primary_hp_mod < 0.0f ) {
6418 cata_assert( primary_hp_mod >= -1.0f )(static_cast <bool> (primary_hp_mod >= -1.0f) ? void
(0) : __assert_fail ("primary_hp_mod >= -1.0f", "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, 6418, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6419 return rate * ( 1.0f + primary_hp_mod );
6420 }
6421
6422 return rate;
6423}
6424} // namespace
6425
6426float Character::healing_rate( float at_rest_quality ) const
6427{
6428 float const rest = clamp( at_rest_quality, 0.0f, 1.0f );
6429 // TODO: Cache
6430 float const base_heal_rate = is_avatar() ? get_option<float>( "PLAYER_HEALING_RATE" )
6431 : get_option<float>( "NPC_HEALING_RATE" );
6432 float const heal_rate =
6433 base_heal_rate * mutation_value( "healing_multiplier" );
6434 float const awake_rate = ( 1.0f - rest ) * heal_rate * mutation_value( "healing_awake" );
6435 float const asleep_rate = rest * heal_rate * ( 1.0f + get_lifestyle() / 200.0f );
6436 float final_rate = awake_rate + asleep_rate;
6437 final_rate = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::REGEN_HP, final_rate );
6438 // Most common case: awake player with no regenerative abilities
6439 // ~7e-5 is 1 hp per day, anything less than that is totally negligible
6440 static constexpr float eps = 0.000007f;
6441 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "%s healing: %.6f", get_name(), final_rate )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%s healing: %.6f"
, get_name(), final_rate ) ) ); } } while( false );
6442 if( std::abs( final_rate ) < eps ) {
6443 return 0.0f;
6444 }
6445
6446 return final_rate;
6447}
6448
6449float Character::healing_rate_medicine( float at_rest_quality, const bodypart_id &bp ) const
6450{
6451 float rate_medicine = 0.0f;
6452
6453 for( const auto &elem : *effects ) {
6454 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_id, effect> &i : elem.second ) {
6455 if( i.first != bp ) {
6456 continue;
6457 }
6458 const effect &eff = i.second;
6459 float tmp_rate = static_cast<float>( eff.get_amount( "HEAL_RATE" ) ) / to_turns<int>
6460 ( 24_hours );
6461
6462 if( bp == body_part_head ) {
6463 tmp_rate *= eff.get_amount( "HEAL_HEAD" ) / 100.0f;
6464 }
6465 if( bp == body_part_torso ) {
6466 tmp_rate *= eff.get_amount( "HEAL_TORSO" ) / 100.0f;
6467 }
6468 rate_medicine += tmp_rate;
6469 }
6470 }
6471
6472 rate_medicine *= mutation_value( "healing_multiplier" );
6473 rate_medicine *= 1.0f + clamp( at_rest_quality, 0.0f, 1.0f );
6474
6475 // increase healing if character has both effects
6476 if( has_effect( effect_bandaged ) && has_effect( effect_disinfected ) ) {
6477 rate_medicine *= 1.25;
6478 }
6479
6480 if( get_lifestyle() > 0.0f ) {
6481 rate_medicine *= 1.0f + get_lifestyle() / 200.0f;
6482 } else {
6483 rate_medicine *= 1.0f + get_lifestyle() / 400.0f;
6484 }
6485 return _hp_modified_rate( *this, rate_medicine );
6486}
6487
6488float Character::get_bmi() const
6489{
6490 return get_bmi_lean() + get_bmi_fat();
6491}
6492
6493float Character::get_bmi_lean() const
6494{
6495 //strength BMIs decrease to zero as you starve (muscle atrophy)
6496 if( get_bmi_fat() < character_weight_category::normal ) {
6497 const int str_penalty = std::floor( ( 1.0f - ( get_bmi_fat() /
6498 character_weight_category::normal ) ) * str_max );
6499 return 12.0f + get_str_base() - str_penalty;
6500 }
6501 return 12.0f + get_str_base();
6502}
6503
6504float Character::get_bmi_fat() const
6505{
6506 return ( get_stored_kcal() / KCAL_PER_KG ) / ( std::pow( height() / 100.0f,
6507 2 ) * get_cached_organic_size() );
6508}
6509
6510units::mass Character::bodyweight() const
6511{
6512 return bodyweight_fat() + bodyweight_lean();
6513}
6514
6515units::mass Character::bodyweight_fat() const
6516{
6517 return units::from_kilogram( get_stored_kcal() / KCAL_PER_KG );
6518}
6519
6520units::mass Character::bodyweight_lean() const
6521{
6522 //12 plus base strength gives non fat bmi, adjusted by starvation in get_bmi_lean()
6523 //this is multiplied by our total hit size from mutated body parts (or lack of parts thereof)
6524 //for example a tail with a hit size of 10 means our lean mass is 10% greater
6525 //or if we chop off our arms and legs to get bionic replacements, we're down to about 42% of our original lean mass
6526 return get_cached_organic_size() * units::from_kilogram( get_bmi_lean() * std::pow(
6527 height() / 100.0f,
6528 2 ) );
6529}
6530
6531float Character::fat_ratio() const
6532{
6533 return bodyweight_fat() / bodyweight();
6534}
6535
6536units::mass Character::bionics_weight() const
6537{
6538 units::mass bio_weight = 0_gram;
6539 for( const bionic_id &bid : get_bionics() ) {
6540 if( !bid->included ) {
6541 bio_weight += item::find_type( bid->itype() )->weight;
6542 }
6543 }
6544 return bio_weight;
6545}
6546
6547void Character::reset_chargen_attributes()
6548{
6549 init_age = 25;
6550 init_height = 175;
6551}
6552
6553int Character::base_age() const
6554{
6555 return init_age;
6556}
6557
6558void Character::set_base_age( int age )
6559{
6560 init_age = age;
6561}
6562
6563void Character::mod_base_age( int mod )
6564{
6565 init_age += mod;
6566}
6567
6568int Character::age( time_point when ) const
6569{
6570 int years_since_cataclysm = to_turns<int>( when - calendar::turn_zero ) /
6571 to_turns<int>( calendar::year_length() );
6572 return init_age + years_since_cataclysm;
6573}
6574
6575std::string Character::age_string( time_point when ) const
6576{
6577 //~ how old the character is in years. try to limit number of characters to fit on the screen
6578 std::string unformatted = _( "%d years" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%d years" ) ) );
6579 return string_format( unformatted, age( when ) );
6580}
6581
6582struct HeightLimits {
6583 int min_height = 0;
6584 int base_height = 0;
6585 int max_height = 0;
6586};
6587
6588/** Min and max heights in cm for each size category */
6589static const std::map<creature_size, HeightLimits> size_category_height_limits {
6590 { creature_size::tiny, { 58, 70, 87 } },
6591 { creature_size::small, { 88, 122, 144 } },
6592 { creature_size::medium, { 145, 175, 200 } }, // minimum is 2 std. deviations below average female height
6593 { creature_size::large, { 201, 227, 250 } },
6594 { creature_size::huge, { 251, 280, 320 } },
6595};
6596
6597int Character::min_height( creature_size size_category )
6598{
6599 return size_category_height_limits.at( size_category ).min_height;
6600}
6601
6602int Character::default_height( creature_size size_category )
6603{
6604 return size_category_height_limits.at( size_category ).base_height;
6605}
6606
6607int Character::max_height( creature_size size_category )
6608{
6609 return size_category_height_limits.at( size_category ).max_height;
6610}
6611
6612int Character::base_height() const
6613{
6614 return init_height;
6615}
6616
6617void Character::set_base_height( int height )
6618{
6619 init_height = height;
6620}
6621
6622void Character::mod_base_height( int mod )
6623{
6624 init_height += mod;
6625}
6626
6627std::string Character::height_string() const
6628{
6629 const bool metric = get_option<std::string>( "DISTANCE_UNITS" ) == "metric";
6630
6631 if( metric ) {
6632 std::string metric_string = _( "%d cm" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%d cm" ) ) );
6633 return string_format( metric_string, height() );
6634 }
6635
6636 int total_inches = std::round( height() / 2.54 );
6637 int feet = std::floor( total_inches / 12 );
6638 int remainder_inches = total_inches % 12;
6639 return string_format( "%d\'%d\"", feet, remainder_inches );
6640}
6641
6642int Character::height() const
6643{
6644 const double base_height_deviation = base_height() / static_cast< double >
6645 ( Character::default_height() );
6646 const HeightLimits &limits = size_category_height_limits.at( get_size() );
6647 return clamp<int>( std::round( base_height_deviation * limits.base_height ),
6648 limits.min_height, limits.max_height );
6649}
6650
6651int Character::base_bmr() const
6652{
6653 /**
6654 Values are for males, and average!
6655 */
6656 const int equation_constant = 5;
6657 const int weight_factor = units::to_gram<int>( bodyweight() / 100.0 );
6658 const int height_factor = 6.25 * height();
6659 const int age_factor = 5 * age();
6660 return metabolic_rate_base() * ( weight_factor + height_factor - age_factor + equation_constant );
6661}
6662
6663int Character::get_bmr() const
6664{
6665 int base_bmr_calc = base_bmr();
6666 base_bmr_calc *= clamp( activity_history.average_activity(), NO_EXERCISE,
6667 maximum_exertion_level() );
6668 return std::ceil( enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::METABOLISM, base_bmr_calc ) );
6669}
6670
6671void Character::set_activity_level( float new_level )
6672{
6673 if( new_level <= NO_EXERCISE && in_sleep_state() ) {
6674 new_level = std::min( new_level, SLEEP_EXERCISE );
6675 }
6676
6677 activity_history.log_activity( new_level );
6678}
6679
6680void Character::reset_activity_level()
6681{
6682 activity_history.reset_activity_level();
6683}
6684
6685std::string Character::activity_level_str() const
6686{
6687 return activity_history.activity_level_str();
6688}
6689
6690void Character::mend_item( item_location &&obj, bool interactive )
6691{
6692 if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
6693 uilist menu;
6694 menu.text = _( "Toggle which fault?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Toggle which fault?" ) ) );
6695 std::vector<std::pair<fault_id, bool>> opts;
6696 for( const auto &f : obj->faults_potential() ) {
6697 opts.emplace_back( f, !!obj->faults.count( f ) );
6698 menu.addentry( -1, true, -1, string_format(
6699 opts.back().second ? pgettext( "fault", "Mend: %s" ) : pgettext( "fault", "Set: %s" ),
6700 f.obj().name() ) );
6701 }
6702 if( opts.empty() ) {
6703 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't have any faults to toggle." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s doesn't have any faults to toggle."
) ) ), obj->tname() );
6704 return;
6705 }
6706 menu.query();
6707 if( menu.ret >= 0 ) {
6708 if( opts[menu.ret].second ) {
6709 obj->faults.erase( opts[menu.ret].first );
6710 } else {
6711 obj->faults.insert( opts[menu.ret].first );
6712 }
6713 }
6714 return;
6715 }
6716
6717 const inventory &inv = crafting_inventory();
6718
6719 struct mending_option {
6720 fault_id fault;
6721 std::reference_wrapper<const fault_fix> fix;
6722 bool doable;
6723 time_duration time_to_fix = 1_hours;
6724 };
6725
6726 std::vector<mending_option> mending_options;
6727 for( const fault_id &f : obj->faults ) {
6728 for( const fault_fix_id &fix_id : f->get_fixes() ) {
6729 const fault_fix &fix = *fix_id;
6730 mending_option opt{ f, fix, true };
6731 for( const auto &[skill_id, level] : fix.skills ) {
6732 if( get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_id ) < level ) {
6733 opt.doable = false;
6734 break;
6735 }
6736 }
6737 opt.doable &= fix.get_requirements().can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component );
6738 mending_options.emplace_back( opt );
6739 }
6740 }
6741
6742 if( mending_options.empty() ) {
6743 if( interactive ) {
6744 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't have any faults to mend." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s doesn't have any faults to mend."
) ) ), obj->tname() );
6745 if( obj->damage() > obj->degradation() ) {
6746 const std::set<itype_id> &rep = obj->repaired_with();
6747 if( rep.empty() ) {
6748 add_msg( m_info, _( "It is damaged, but cannot be repaired." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It is damaged, but cannot be repaired."
) ) ) );
6749 } else {
6750 const std::string repair_options =
6751 enumerate_as_string( rep.begin(), rep.end(), []( const itype_id & e ) {
6752 return item::nname( e );
6753 }, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
6754
6755 add_msg( m_info, _( "It is damaged, and could be repaired with %s. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It is damaged, and could be repaired with %s. "
"%s to use one of those items." ) ) )
6756 "%s to use one of those items." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It is damaged, and could be repaired with %s. "
"%s to use one of those items." ) ) ),
6757 repair_options, press_x( ACTION_USE ) );
6758 }
6759 }
6760 }
6761 return;
6762 }
6763
6764 int sel = 0;
6765 if( interactive ) {
6766 uilist menu;
6767 menu.text = _( "Mend which fault?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Mend which fault?" ) ) );
6768 menu.desc_enabled = true;
6769 menu.desc_lines_hint = 0; // Let uilist handle description height
6770
6771 constexpr int fold_width = 80;
6772
6773 for( mending_option &opt : mending_options ) {
6774 const fault_fix &fix = opt.fix;
6775 const nc_color col = opt.doable ? c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
6776
6777 const requirement_data &reqs = fix.get_requirements();
6778 auto tools = reqs.get_folded_tools_list( fold_width, col, inv );
6779 auto comps = reqs.get_folded_components_list( fold_width, col, inv, is_crafting_component );
6780
6781 std::string descr = word_rewrap( opt.fault->description(), 80 ) + "\n\n";
6782 for( const fault_id &fid : fix.faults_removed ) {
6783 if( obj->has_fault( fid ) ) {
6784 descr += string_format( _( "Removes fault: <color_green>%s</color>\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Removes fault: <color_green>%s</color>\n"
) ) ), fid->name() );
6785 } else {
6786 descr += string_format( _( "Removes fault: <color_light_gray>%s</color>\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Removes fault: <color_light_gray>%s</color>\n"
) ) ), fid->name() );
6787 }
6788 }
6789 for( const fault_id &fid : fix.faults_added ) {
6790 descr += string_format( _( "Adds fault: <color_yellow>%s</color>\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Adds fault: <color_yellow>%s</color>\n"
) ) ), fid->name() );
6791 }
6792 if( fix.mod_damage > 0 ) {
6793 descr += string_format( _( "<color_green>Repairs</color> %d damage.\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_green>Repairs</color> %d damage.\n"
) ) ), fix.mod_damage );
6794 } else if( fix.mod_damage < 0 ) {
6795 descr += string_format( _( "<color_red>Applies</color> %d damage.\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_red>Applies</color> %d damage.\n"
) ) ), -fix.mod_damage );
6796 }
6797
6798 opt.time_to_fix = fix.time;
6799 // if an item has a time saver flag multiply total time by that flag's time factor
6800 for( const auto &[flag_id, mult] : fix.time_save_flags ) {
6801 if( obj->has_flag( flag_id ) ) {
6802 opt.time_to_fix *= mult;
6803 }
6804 }
6805 // if you have a time saver prof multiply total time by that prof's time factor
6806 for( const auto &[proficiency_id, mult] : fix.time_save_profs ) {
6807 if( has_proficiency( proficiency_id ) ) {
6808 opt.time_to_fix *= mult;
6809 }
6810 }
6811 descr += string_format( _( "Time required: <color_cyan>%s</color>\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Time required: <color_cyan>%s</color>\n"
) ) ),
6812 to_string_approx( opt.time_to_fix ) );
6813 if( fix.skills.empty() ) {
6814 descr += string_format( _( "Skills: <color_cyan>none</color>\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Skills: <color_cyan>none</color>\n"
) ) ) );
6815 } else {
6816 descr += string_format( _( "Skills: %s\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Skills: %s\n" ) ) ), enumerate_as_string(
6817 fix.skills.begin(), fix.skills.end(), [this]( const std::pair<skill_id, int> &sk ) {
6818 if( get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( sk.first ) >= sk.second ) {
6819 return string_format( pgettext( "skill requirement",
6820 //~ %1$s: skill name, %2$s: current skill level, %3$s: required skill level
6821 "<color_cyan>%1$s</color> <color_green>(%2$d/%3$d)</color>" ),
6822 sk.first->name(), static_cast<int>( get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( sk.first ) ), sk.second );
6823 } else {
6824 return string_format( pgettext( "skill requirement",
6825 //~ %1$s: skill name, %2$s: current skill level, %3$s: required skill level
6826 "<color_cyan>%1$s</color> <color_red>(%2$d/%3$d)</color>" ),
6827 sk.first->name(), static_cast<int>( get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( sk.first ) ), sk.second );
6828 }
6829 } ) );
6830 }
6831
6832 for( const std::string &line : tools ) {
6833 descr += line + "\n";
6834 }
6835 for( const std::string &line : comps ) {
6836 descr += line + "\n";
6837 }
6838
6839 menu.addentry_desc( -1, true, -1, fix.name.translated(), colorize( descr, col ) );
6840 }
6841 menu.query();
6842 if( menu.ret < 0 ) {
6843 add_msg( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
6844 return;
6845 }
6846 sel = menu.ret;
6847 }
6848
6849 if( sel >= 0 ) {
6850 const mending_option &opt = mending_options[sel];
6851 if( !opt.doable ) {
6852 if( interactive ) {
6853 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are currently unable to mend the %s this way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are currently unable to mend the %s this way."
) ) ), obj->tname() );
6854 }
6855 return;
6856 }
6857
6858 const fault_fix &fix = opt.fix;
6859 assign_activity( ACT_MEND_ITEM, to_moves<int>( opt.time_to_fix ) );
6860 activity.name = opt.fault.str();
6861 activity.str_values.emplace_back( fix.id_ );
6862 activity.targets.push_back( std::move( obj ) );
6863 }
6864}
6865
6866int Character::get_stim() const
6867{
6868 return stim;
6869}
6870
6871void Character::set_stim( int new_stim )
6872{
6873 stim = new_stim;
6874}
6875
6876void Character::mod_stim( int mod )
6877{
6878 stim += mod;
6879}
6880
6881int Character::get_rad() const
6882{
6883 return radiation;
6884}
6885
6886void Character::set_rad( int new_rad )
6887{
6888 if( radiation != new_rad ) {
6889 radiation = new_rad;
6890 on_stat_change( "radiation", radiation );
6891 }
6892}
6893
6894void Character::mod_rad( int mod )
6895{
6896 if( has_flag( json_flag_NO_RADIATION ) ) {
6897 return;
6898 }
6899 set_rad( std::max( 0, get_rad() + mod ) );
6900}
6901
6902void Character::calculate_leak_level()
6903{
6904 float ret = 0.0f;
6905 // This is bad way to calculate radiation and should be rewritten some day.
6906 for( const item_location &item_loc : const_cast<Character *>( this )->all_items_loc() ) {
6907 const item *it = item_loc.get_item();
6908 if( it->has_flag( flag_RADIOACTIVE ) ) {
6909 if( it->has_flag( flag_LEAK_ALWAYS ) ) {
6910 ret += to_gram( it->weight() ) / 250.f;
6911 } else if( it->has_flag( flag_LEAK_DAM ) ) {
6912 ret += it->damage_level();
6913 }
6914 }
6915 }
6916 leak_level_dirty = false;
6917 leak_level = ret;
6918}
6919
6920float Character::get_leak_level() const
6921{
6922 return leak_level;
6923}
6924
6925void Character::invalidate_leak_level_cache()
6926{
6927 leak_level_dirty = true;
6928}
6929
6930int Character::get_stamina() const
6931{
6932 if( is_npc() ) {
6933 // No point in doing a bunch of checks on NPCs for now since they can't use stamina.
6934 return get_stamina_max();
6935 }
6936 return stamina;
6937}
6938
6939int Character::get_stamina_max() const
6940{
6941 if( is_npc() ) {
6942 // No point in doing a bunch of checks on NPCs for now since they can't use stamina.
6943 return 10000;
6944 }
6945 // Since adding cardio, 'player_max_stamina' is really 'base max stamina' and gets further modified
6946 // by your CV fitness. Name has been kept this way to avoid needing to change the code.
6947 // Default base maximum stamina and cardio scaling are defined in data/core/game_balance.json
6948 static const std::string player_max_stamina( "PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA_BASE" );
6949 static const std::string player_cardiofit_stamina_scale( "PLAYER_CARDIOFIT_STAMINA_SCALING" );
6950
6951 // Cardiofit stamina mod defaults to 5, and get_cardiofit() should return a value in the vicinity
6952 // of 1000-3000, so this should add somewhere between 3000 to 15000 stamina.
6953 int max_stamina = get_option<int>( player_max_stamina ) +
6954 get_option<int>( player_cardiofit_stamina_scale ) * get_cardiofit();
6955 max_stamina = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::MAX_STAMINA, max_stamina );
6956
6957 return max_stamina;
6958}
6959
6960void Character::set_stamina( int new_stamina )
6961{
6962 stamina = new_stamina;
6963}
6964
6965int Character::get_arms_power_use() const
6966{
6967 // millijoules
6968 return arms_power_use;
6969}
6970
6971int Character::get_legs_power_use() const
6972{
6973 // millijoules
6974 return legs_power_use;
6975}
6976
6977float Character::get_arms_stam_mult() const
6978{
6979 return arms_stam_mult;
6980}
6981
6982float Character::get_legs_stam_mult() const
6983{
6984 return legs_stam_mult;
6985}
6986
6987void Character::recalc_limb_energy_usage()
6988{
6989 // calculate energy usage of arms
6990 float total_limb_count = 0.0f;
6991 float bionic_limb_count = 0.0f;
6992 float bionic_powercost = 0;
6993 body_part_type::type arm_type = body_part_type::type::arm;
6994 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( arm_type ) ) {
6995 total_limb_count++;
6996 if( bp->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
6997 bionic_powercost += bp->power_efficiency;
6998 bionic_limb_count++;
6999 }
7000 }
7001 arms_power_use = bionic_powercost;
7002 if( bionic_limb_count > 0 ) {
7003 arms_stam_mult = 1 - ( bionic_limb_count / total_limb_count );
7004 } else {
7005 arms_stam_mult = 1.0f;
7006 }
7007 //sanity check ourselves in debug
7008 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Total arms in use: %.1f, Bionic arms: %.1f",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Total arms in use: %.1f, Bionic arms: %.1f"
, total_limb_count, bionic_limb_count ) ) ); } } while( false
)
7009 total_limb_count,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Total arms in use: %.1f, Bionic arms: %.1f"
, total_limb_count, bionic_limb_count ) ) ); } } while( false
)
7010 bionic_limb_count )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Total arms in use: %.1f, Bionic arms: %.1f"
, total_limb_count, bionic_limb_count ) ) ); } } while( false
);
7011 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "bionic power per arms stamina: %d", arms_power_use )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "bionic power per arms stamina: %d"
, arms_power_use ) ) ); } } while( false );
7012 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "arms stam usage mult by %.1f", arms_stam_mult )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "arms stam usage mult by %.1f"
, arms_stam_mult ) ) ); } } while( false );
7013
7014 // calculate energy usage of legs
7015 total_limb_count = 0.0f;
7016 bionic_limb_count = 0.0f;
7017 bionic_powercost = 0;
7018 body_part_type::type leg_type = body_part_type::type::leg;
7019 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts_of_type( leg_type ) ) {
7020 total_limb_count++;
7021 if( bp->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
7022 bionic_powercost += bp->power_efficiency;
7023 bionic_limb_count++;
7024 }
7025 }
7026 legs_power_use = bionic_powercost;
7027 if( bionic_limb_count > 0 ) {
7028 legs_stam_mult = 1 - ( bionic_limb_count / total_limb_count );
7029 } else {
7030 legs_stam_mult = 1.0f;
7031 }
7032 //sanity check ourselves in debug
7033 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Total legs in use: %.1f, Bionic legs: %.1f",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Total legs in use: %.1f, Bionic legs: %.1f"
, total_limb_count, bionic_limb_count ) ) ); } } while( false
)
7034 total_limb_count,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Total legs in use: %.1f, Bionic legs: %.1f"
, total_limb_count, bionic_limb_count ) ) ); } } while( false
)
7035 bionic_limb_count )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Total legs in use: %.1f, Bionic legs: %.1f"
, total_limb_count, bionic_limb_count ) ) ); } } while( false
);
7036 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "bionic power per legs stamina: %d", legs_power_use )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "bionic power per legs stamina: %d"
, legs_power_use ) ) ); } } while( false );
7037 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "legs stam usage mult by %.1f", legs_stam_mult )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "legs stam usage mult by %.1f"
, legs_stam_mult ) ) ); } } while( false );
7038}
7039
7040void Character::burn_energy_arms( int mod )
7041{
7042 mod_stamina( mod * get_arms_stam_mult() );
7043 if( get_arms_power_use() > 0 ) {
7044 mod_power_level( units::from_millijoule( mod * get_arms_power_use() ) );
7045 }
7046}
7047
7048void Character::burn_energy_legs( int mod )
7049{
7050 mod_stamina( mod * get_legs_stam_mult() );
7051 if( get_legs_power_use() > 0 ) {
7052 mod_power_level( units::from_millijoule( mod * get_legs_power_use() ) );
7053 }
7054}
7055
7056void Character::burn_energy_all( int mod )
7057{
7058 mod_stamina( mod * ( get_arms_stam_mult() + get_legs_stam_mult() ) * 0.5f );
7059 if( ( get_arms_power_use() + get_legs_power_use() ) > 0 ) {
7060 mod_power_level( units::from_millijoule( mod * ( get_arms_power_use() + get_legs_power_use() ) ) );
7061 }
7062}
7063
7064void Character::mod_stamina( int mod )
7065{
7066 // TODO: Make NPCs smart enough to use stamina
7067 if( is_npc() || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_STAMINA ) ) {
7068 return;
7069 }
7070
7071 float quarter_thresh = 0.25 * get_stamina_max();
7072 float half_thresh = 0.5 * get_stamina_max();
7073
7074 std::string quarter_stam_counter_str = get_value( "quarter_stam_counter" );
7075 int quarter_stam_counter = quarter_stam_counter_str.empty() ? 0 : std::stoi(
7076 quarter_stam_counter_str );
7077
7078 if( stamina > half_thresh && stamina + mod < half_thresh ) {
7079 set_value( "got_to_half_stam", "true" );
7080 }
7081
7082 if( stamina > quarter_thresh && stamina + mod < quarter_thresh && quarter_stam_counter < 5 ) {
7083 quarter_stam_counter++;
7084 set_value( "quarter_stam_counter", std::to_string( quarter_stam_counter ) );
7085 mod_daily_health( 1, 5 );
7086 }
7087
7088 stamina += mod;
7089 if( stamina < 0 ) {
7090 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
7091 if( !bp->windage_effect.is_null() ) {
7092 add_effect( bp->windage_effect, 10_turns );
7093 }
7094 }
7095 }
7096 stamina = clamp( stamina, 0, get_stamina_max() );
7097}
7098
7099void Character::burn_move_stamina( int moves )
7100{
7101 int overburden_percentage = 0;
7102 //add half the difference between current stored kcal weight and healthy stored kcal weight to weight of carried gear
7103 units::mass fat_penalty = units::from_kilogram( 0.5f * std::max( 0.0f,
7104 ( get_healthy_kcal() - get_stored_kcal() ) / KCAL_PER_KG ) );
7105 units::mass current_weight = weight_carried() + fat_penalty;
7106 // Make it at least 1 gram to avoid divide-by-zero warning
7107 units::mass max_weight = std::max( weight_capacity(), 1_gram );
7108 if( current_weight > max_weight ) {
7109 overburden_percentage = ( current_weight - max_weight ) * 100 / max_weight;
7110 }
7111
7112 int burn_ratio = get_option<int>( "PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_BURN_RATE" );
7113 for( const bionic_id &bid : get_bionic_fueled_with_muscle() ) {
7114 if( has_active_bionic( bid ) ) {
7115 burn_ratio = burn_ratio * 2 - 3;
7116 }
7117 }
7118 burn_ratio += overburden_percentage;
7119
7120 ///\EFFECT_SWIMMING decreases stamina burn when swimming
7121 //Appropriate traits let you walk along the bottom without getting as tired
7122 if( get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, pos() ) &&
7123 ( !has_flag( json_flag_WALK_UNDERWATER ) ||
7124 get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_DOWN, pos() ) ) &&
7125 !get_map().has_flag_furn( "BRIDGE", pos() ) &&
7126 !( in_vehicle && get_map().veh_at( pos() )->vehicle().can_float() ) ) {
7127 burn_ratio += 100 / std::pow( 1.1, get_skill_level( skill_swimming ) );
7128 }
7129
7130 burn_ratio *= move_mode->stamina_mult();
7131 burn_energy_legs( -( ( moves * burn_ratio ) / 100.0 ) * get_modifier(
7132 character_modifier_stamina_move_cost_mod ) * get_modifier(
7133 character_modifier_move_mode_move_cost_mod ) );
7134 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Stamina burn: %d", -( ( moves * burn_ratio ) / 100 ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Stamina burn: %d"
, -( ( moves * burn_ratio ) / 100 ) ) ) ); } } while( false );
7135 // Chance to suffer pain if overburden and stamina runs out or has trait BADBACK
7136 // Starts at 1 in 25, goes down by 5 for every 50% more carried
7137 if( ( current_weight > max_weight ) && ( has_trait( trait_BADBACK ) || get_stamina() == 0 ) &&
7138 one_in( 35 - 5 * current_weight / ( max_weight / 2 ) ) ) {
7139 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your body strains under the weight!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your body strains under the weight!"
) ) ) );
7140 // 1 more pain for every 800 grams more (5 per extra STR needed)
7141 if( ( ( current_weight - max_weight ) / 800_gram > get_pain() && get_pain() < 100 ) ) {
7142 mod_pain( 1 );
7143 }
7144 }
7145}
7146
7147void Character::update_stamina( int turns )
7148{
7149 static const std::string player_base_stamina_regen_rate( "PLAYER_BASE_STAMINA_REGEN_RATE" );
7150 const float base_regen_rate = get_option<float>( player_base_stamina_regen_rate );
7151 // Your stamina regen rate works as a function of how fit you are compared to your body size.
7152 // This allows it to scale more quickly than your stamina, so that at higher fitness levels you
7153 // recover stamina faster.
7154 const float effective_regen_rate = base_regen_rate * get_cardiofit() / get_cardio_acc_base();
7155 const int current_stim = get_stim();
7156 // Mutations can affect stamina regen via stamina_regen_modifier (0.0 is normal)
7157 // Values above or below normal will increase or decrease stamina regen
7158 const float mod_regen = mutation_value( "stamina_regen_modifier" );
7159 // Mutated stamina works even when winded
7160 const float base_multiplier = mod_regen + ( has_effect( effect_winded ) ? 0.1f : 1.0f );
7161 // Ensure multiplier is at least 0.1
7162 const float stamina_multiplier = std::max<float>( 0.1f, base_multiplier );
7163
7164 // Recover some stamina every turn. Start with zero, then increase recovery factor based on
7165 // mutations, stimulants, and bionics before rolling random recovery based on this factor.
7166 float stamina_recovery = 0.0f;
7167 // But mouth encumbrance interferes, even with mutated stamina.
7168 stamina_recovery += stamina_multiplier * std::max( 1.0f,
7169 effective_regen_rate * get_modifier( character_modifier_stamina_recovery_breathing_mod ) );
7170 // only apply stim-related and mutant stamina boosts if you don't have bionic lungs
7171 if( !has_bionic( bio_synlungs ) ) {
7172 stamina_recovery = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::REGEN_STAMINA,
7173 stamina_recovery );
7174 // TODO: recovering stamina causes hunger/thirst/fatigue.
7175 // TODO: Tiredness slowing recovery
7176
7177 // stim recovers stamina (or impairs recovery)
7178 if( current_stim > 0 ) {
7179 // TODO: Make stamina recovery with stims cost health
7180 stamina_recovery += std::min( 5.0f, current_stim / 15.0f );
7181 } else if( current_stim < 0 ) {
7182 // Affect it less near 0 and more near full
7183 // Negative stim kill at -200
7184 // At -100 stim it inflicts -20 malus to regen at 100% stamina,
7185 // effectivly countering stamina gain of default 20,
7186 // at 50% stamina its -10 (50%), cuts by 25% at 25% stamina
7187 stamina_recovery += current_stim / 5.0f * get_stamina() / get_stamina_max();
7188 }
7189 }
7190 const int max_stam = get_stamina_max();
7191 if( get_power_level() >= 3_kJ && has_active_bionic( bio_gills ) ) {
7192 int bonus = std::min<int>( units::to_kilojoule( get_power_level() ) / 3,
7193 max_stam - get_stamina() - stamina_recovery * turns );
7194 // so the effective recovery is up to 5x default
7195 bonus = std::min( bonus, 4 * static_cast<int>( effective_regen_rate ) );
7196 if( bonus > 0 ) {
7197 stamina_recovery += bonus;
7198 bonus /= 10;
7199 bonus = std::max( bonus, 1 );
7200 mod_power_level( units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( -bonus ) ) );
7201 }
7202 }
7203
7204 // Roll to determine actual stamina recovery over this period
7205 int recover_amount = std::ceil( stamina_recovery * turns );
7206 mod_stamina( recover_amount );
7207 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Stamina recovery: %d", recover_amount )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Stamina recovery: %d"
, recover_amount ) ) ); } } while( false );
7208
7209 // Cap at max
7210 set_stamina( std::min( std::max( get_stamina(), 0 ), max_stam ) );
7211}
7212
7213int Character::get_cardiofit() const
7214{
7215 if( is_npc() ) {
7216 // No point in doing a bunch of checks on NPCs for now since they can't use cardio.
7217 return 2 * get_cardio_acc_base();
7218 }
7219
7220 if( has_bionic( bio_synlungs ) ) {
7221 // If you have the synthetic lungs bionic your cardioacc is forced to a specific value
7222 return 3 * get_cardio_acc_base();
7223 }
7224
7225 const int cardio_base = get_cardio_acc();
7226
7227 // Mut mod contains the base 1.0f for all modifiers
7228 const float mut_mod = mutation_value( "cardio_multiplier" );
7229 // 1 point of athletics skill = 1% more cardio, up to 10% cardio
7230 const float athletics_mod = get_skill_level( skill_swimming ) / 100.0f;
7231 // At some point we might have proficiencies that affect this.
7232 const float prof_mod = 0.0f;
7233 // 10 points of health = 1% cardio, up to 20% cardio
7234 float health_mod = get_lifestyle() / 1000.0f;
7235
7236 // Negative effects of health are doubled, up to 40% cardio
7237 if( health_mod < 0.0f ) {
7238 health_mod *= 2.0f;
7239 }
7240
7241 // Add up all of our cardio mods.
7242 float cardio_modifier = mut_mod + athletics_mod + prof_mod + health_mod;
7243
7244 // Modify cardio accumulator by our cardio mods.
7245 const int cardio_fitness = static_cast<int>( cardio_base * cardio_modifier );
7246
7247 return cardio_fitness;
7248}
7249
7250int Character::get_cardio_acc() const
7251{
7252 return cardio_acc;
7253}
7254
7255void Character::set_cardio_acc( int ncardio_acc )
7256{
7257 cardio_acc = ncardio_acc;
7258}
7259
7260void Character::reset_cardio_acc()
7261{
7262 set_cardio_acc( get_cardio_acc_base() );
7263}
7264
7265int Character::get_cardio_acc_base() const
7266{
7267 return base_cardio_acc;
7268}
7269
7270bool Character::invoke_item( item *used )
7271{
7272 return invoke_item( used, pos() );
7273}
7274
7275bool Character::invoke_item( item *, const tripoint &, int )
7276{
7277 return false;
7278}
7279
7280bool Character::invoke_item( item *used, const std::string &method )
7281{
7282 return invoke_item( used, method, pos() );
7283}
7284
7285bool Character::invoke_item( item *used, const std::string &method, const tripoint &pt,
7286 int pre_obtain_moves )
7287{
7288 if( method.empty() ) {
7289 return invoke_item( used, pt, pre_obtain_moves );
7290 }
7291
7292 if( used->is_broken() ) {
7293 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s was broken and won't turn on." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s was broken and won't turn on."
) ) ), used->tname() );
7294 return false;
7295 }
7296 if( !used->ammo_sufficient( this, method ) ) {
7297 int ammo_req = used->ammo_required();
7298 std::string it_name = used->tname();
7299 if( used->has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
7300 add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7301 n_gettext( "Your %s needs %d charge from some UPS.",
7302 "Your %s needs %d charges from some UPS.",
7303 ammo_req ),
7304 it_name, ammo_req );
7305 } else if( used->has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
7306 add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7307 n_gettext( "Your %s needs %d kJ of bionic power.",
7308 "Your %s needs %d kJ of bionic power.",
7309 ammo_req ),
7310 it_name, ammo_req );
7311 } else {
7312 int ammo_rem = used->ammo_remaining();
7313 add_msg_if_player( m_info,
7314 n_gettext( "Your %s has %d charge, but needs %d.",
7315 "Your %s has %d charges, but needs %d.",
7316 ammo_rem ),
7317 it_name, ammo_rem, ammo_req );
7318 }
7319 moves = pre_obtain_moves;
7320 return false;
7321 }
7322
7323 item *actually_used = used->get_usable_item( method );
7324 if( actually_used == nullptr ) {
7325 debugmsg( "Tried to invoke a method %s on item %s, which doesn't have this method",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "7326", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to invoke a method %s on item %s, which doesn't have this method"
, method.c_str(), used->tname())
7326 method.c_str(), used->tname() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "7326", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to invoke a method %s on item %s, which doesn't have this method"
, method.c_str(), used->tname());
7327 moves = pre_obtain_moves;
7328 return false;
7329 }
7330
7331 std::optional<int> charges_used = actually_used->type->invoke( this, *actually_used,
7332 pt, method );
7333 if( !charges_used.has_value() ) {
7334 moves = pre_obtain_moves;
7335 return false;
7336 }
7337
7338 if( charges_used.value() == 0 ) {
7339 // Not really used.
7340 // The item may also have been deleted
7341 return false;
7342 }
7343
7344 if( actually_used->is_comestible() ) {
7345 const bool ret = consume_effects( *used );
7346 const int consumed = used->activation_consume( charges_used.value(), pt, this );
7347 if( consumed == 0 ) {
7348 // Nothing was consumed from within the item. "Eat" the item itself away.
7349 i_rem( actually_used );
7350 }
7351 return ret;
7352 }
7353
7354 actually_used->activation_consume( charges_used.value(), pt, this );
7355
7356 if( actually_used->has_flag( flag_SINGLE_USE ) || actually_used->is_bionic() ||
7357 actually_used->is_deployable() ) {
7358 i_rem( actually_used );
7359 return true;
7360 }
7361
7362 return false;
7363}
7364
7365bool Character::consume_charges( item &used, int qty )
7366{
7367 if( qty < 0 ) {
7368 debugmsg( "Tried to consume negative charges" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "7368", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to consume negative charges"
);
7369 return false;
7370 }
7371
7372 if( qty == 0 ) {
7373 return false;
7374 }
7375
7376 if( !used.is_tool() && !used.is_food() && !used.is_medication() ) {
7377 debugmsg( "Tried to consume charges for non-tool, non-food, non-med item" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "7377", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to consume charges for non-tool, non-food, non-med item"
);
7378 return false;
7379 }
7380
7381 // Consume comestibles destroying them if no charges remain
7382 if( used.is_food() || used.is_medication() ) {
7383 used.charges -= qty;
7384 if( used.charges <= 0 ) {
7385 i_rem( &used );
7386 return true;
7387 }
7388 return false;
7389 }
7390
7391 // Tools which don't require ammo are instead destroyed
7392 if( used.is_tool() && !used.ammo_required() ) {
7393 if( has_item( used ) ) {
7394 i_rem( &used );
7395 } else {
7396 map_stack items = get_map().i_at( pos() );
7397 for( item_stack::iterator iter = items.begin(); iter != items.end(); iter++ ) {
7398 if( &( *iter ) == &used ) {
7399 iter = items.erase( iter );
7400 break;
7401 }
7402 }
7403 }
7404 return true;
7405 }
7406
7407 used.ammo_consume( qty, pos(), this );
7408 return false;
7409}
7410
7411int Character::item_handling_cost( const item &it, bool penalties, int base_cost,
7412 int charges_in_it, bool bulk_cost ) const
7413{
7414 int mv = base_cost;
7415 if( penalties ) {
7416 // 40 moves per liter, up to 200 at 5 liters
7417 mv += std::min( 200, it.volume( false, false, charges_in_it ) / 20_ml );
7418 }
7419
7420 if( weapon.typeId() == itype_e_handcuffs ) {
7421 mv *= 4;
7422 } else if( penalties && has_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
7423 // Grabbed penalty scales for grabbed arms/hands
7424 int pen = 2;
7425 for( const effect &eff : get_effects_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
7426 if( eff.get_bp()->primary_limb_type() == body_part_type::type::arm ||
7427 eff.get_bp()->primary_limb_type() == body_part_type::type::hand ) {
7428 pen++;
7429 }
7430 }
7431 mv *= pen;
7432 }
7433
7434 // The following is considered as overhead and is not included in the cost when handling multiple items at once.
7435 if( !bulk_cost ) {
7436 // For single handed items use the least encumbered hand
7437 if( it.is_two_handed( *this ) ) {
7438 for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::hand ) ) {
7439 mv += encumb( part );
7440 }
7441 } else {
7442 int min_encumb = INT_MAX2147483647;
7443 for( const bodypart_id &part : get_all_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::hand ) ) {
7444 min_encumb = std::min( min_encumb, encumb( part ) );
7445 }
7446 mv += min_encumb;
7447 }
7448 }
7449
7450 return std::max( mv, 0 );
7451}
7452
7453int Character::item_store_cost( const item &it, const item & /* container */, bool penalties,
7454 int base_cost ) const
7455{
7456 /** @EFFECT_PISTOL decreases time taken to store a pistol */
7457 /** @EFFECT_SMG decreases time taken to store an SMG */
7458 /** @EFFECT_RIFLE decreases time taken to store a rifle */
7459 /** @EFFECT_SHOTGUN decreases time taken to store a shotgun */
7460 /** @EFFECT_LAUNCHER decreases time taken to store a launcher */
7461 /** @EFFECT_STABBING decreases time taken to store a stabbing weapon */
7462 /** @EFFECT_CUTTING decreases time taken to store a cutting weapon */
7463 /** @EFFECT_BASHING decreases time taken to store a bashing weapon */
7464 float lvl = get_skill_level( it.is_gun() ? it.gun_skill() : it.melee_skill() );
7465 return item_handling_cost( it, penalties, base_cost ) / ( ( lvl + 10.0f ) / 10.0f );
7466}
7467
7468int Character::item_retrieve_cost( const item &it, const item &container, bool penalties,
7469 int base_cost ) const
7470{
7471 // Drawing from an holster use the same formula as storing an item for now
7472 /**
7473 * @EFFECT_PISTOL decreases time taken to draw pistols from holsters
7474 * @EFFECT_SMG decreases time taken to draw smgs from holsters
7475 * @EFFECT_RIFLE decreases time taken to draw rifles from holsters
7476 * @EFFECT_SHOTGUN decreases time taken to draw shotguns from holsters
7477 * @EFFECT_LAUNCHER decreases time taken to draw launchers from holsters
7478 * @EFFECT_STABBING decreases time taken to draw stabbing weapons from sheathes
7479 * @EFFECT_CUTTING decreases time taken to draw cutting weapons from scabbards
7480 * @EFFECT_BASHING decreases time taken to draw bashing weapons from holsters
7481 */
7482 return item_store_cost( it, container, penalties, base_cost );
7483}
7484
7485void Character::cough( bool harmful, int loudness )
7486{
7487 if( has_effect( effect_cough_suppress ) ) {
7488 return;
7489 }
7490
7491 if( harmful ) {
7492 const int stam = get_stamina();
7493 const int malus = get_stamina_max() * 0.05; // 5% max stamina
7494 mod_stamina( -malus );
7495 if( stam < malus && x_in_y( malus - stam, malus ) && one_in( 6 ) ) {
7496 apply_damage( nullptr, body_part_torso, 1 );
7497 }
7498 }
7499
7500 if( !is_npc() ) {
7501 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You cough heavily." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cough heavily." ) ) ) );
7502 }
7503 sounds::sound( pos(), loudness, sounds::sound_t::speech, _( "a hacking cough." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a hacking cough." ) ) ), false, "misc",
7504 "cough" );
7505
7506 moves -= 80;
7507
7508 add_effect( effect_disrupted_sleep, 5_minutes );
7509}
7510
7511void Character::wake_up()
7512{
7513 //Can't wake up if under anesthesia
7514 if( has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
7515 return;
7516 }
7517
7518 // Do not remove effect_sleep or effect_alarm_clock now otherwise it invalidates an effect
7519 // iterator in player::process_effects().
7520 // We just set it for later removal (also happening in player::process_effects(), so no side
7521 // effects) with a duration of 0 turns.
7522
7523 if( has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
7524 get_effect( effect_sleep ).set_duration( 0_turns );
7525 get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_wakes_up>( getID() );
7526 }
7527 remove_effect( effect_slept_through_alarm );
7528 remove_effect( effect_lying_down );
7529 if( has_effect( effect_alarm_clock ) ) {
7530 get_effect( effect_alarm_clock ).set_duration( 0_turns );
7531 }
7532 recalc_sight_limits();
7533
7534 if( movement_mode_is( move_mode_prone ) ) {
7535 set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
7536 }
7537}
7538
7539int Character::get_shout_volume() const
7540{
7541 int base = 10;
7542 int shout_multiplier = 2;
7543
7544 base = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SHOUT_NOISE_BASE, base );
7545 shout_multiplier = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SHOUT_NOISE_STR_MULT,
7546 shout_multiplier );
7547
7548 // You can't shout without your face
7549 if( has_trait( trait_PROF_FOODP ) && !( is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask ) ||
7550 is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask_on ) ) ) {
7551 base = 0;
7552 shout_multiplier = 0;
7553 }
7554
7555 // Masks and such dampen the sound
7556 // Balanced around whisper for wearing bondage mask
7557 // and noise ~= 10 (door smashing) for wearing dust mask for character with strength = 8
7558 /** @EFFECT_STR increases shouting volume */
7559 int noise = ( base + str_cur * shout_multiplier ) * get_limb_score( limb_score_breathing );
7560
7561 // Minimum noise volume possible after all reductions.
7562 // Volume 1 can't be heard even by player
7563 constexpr int minimum_noise = 2;
7564
7565 if( noise <= base ) {
7566 noise = std::max( minimum_noise, noise );
7567 }
7568
7569 noise = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SHOUT_NOISE, noise );
7570
7571 // Screaming underwater is not good for oxygen and harder to do overall
7572 if( underwater ) {
7573 noise = std::max( minimum_noise, noise / 2 );
7574 }
7575 return noise;
7576}
7577
7578void Character::shout( std::string msg, bool order )
7579{
7580 int base = 10;
7581 std::string shout;
7582
7583 // You can't shout without your face
7584 if( has_trait( trait_PROF_FOODP ) && !( is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask ) ||
7585 is_wearing( itype_foodperson_mask_on ) ) ) {
7586 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You try to shout, but you have no face!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You try to shout, but you have no face!"
) ) ) );
7587 return;
7588 }
7589
7590 // Mutations make shouting louder, they also define the default message
7591 if( has_trait( trait_SHOUT3 ) ) {
7592 base = 20;
7593 if( msg.empty() ) {
7594 msg = is_avatar() ? _( "yourself let out a piercing howl!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "yourself let out a piercing howl!"
) ) ) : _( "a piercing howl!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a piercing howl!" ) ) );
7595 shout = "howl";
7596 }
7597 } else if( has_trait( trait_SHOUT2 ) ) {
7598 base = 15;
7599 if( msg.empty() ) {
7600 msg = is_avatar() ? _( "yourself scream loudly!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "yourself scream loudly!" ) )
) : _( "a loud scream!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a loud scream!" ) ) );
7601 shout = "scream";
7602 }
7603 }
7604
7605 if( msg.empty() ) {
7606 msg = is_avatar() ? _( "yourself shout loudly!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "yourself shout loudly!" ) ) ) : _( "a loud shout!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a loud shout!" ) ) );
7607 shout = "default";
7608 }
7609 int noise = get_shout_volume();
7610
7611 // Minimum noise volume possible after all reductions.
7612 // Volume 1 can't be heard even by player
7613 constexpr int minimum_noise = 2;
7614
7615 if( noise <= base ) {
7616 std::wstring wstr( utf8_to_wstr( msg ) );
7617 std::transform( wstr.begin(), wstr.end(), wstr.begin(), towlower );
7618 msg = wstr_to_utf8( wstr );
7619 }
7620
7621 // Screaming underwater is not good for oxygen and harder to do overall
7622 if( underwater ) {
7623 if( !has_trait( trait_GILLS ) && !has_trait( trait_GILLS_CEPH ) ) {
7624 mod_stat( "oxygen", -noise );
7625 }
7626 }
7627
7628 // TODO: indistinct noise descriptions should be handled in the sounds code
7629 if( noise <= minimum_noise ) {
7630 add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
7631 _( "The sound of your voice is almost completely muffled!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The sound of your voice is almost completely muffled!"
) ) ) );
7632 msg = is_avatar() ? _( "your muffled shout" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "your muffled shout" ) ) ) : _( "an indistinct voice" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "an indistinct voice" ) ) );
7633 } else if( get_limb_score( limb_score_breathing ) < 0.5f ) {
7634 // The shout's volume is 1/2 or lower of what it would be without the penalty
7635 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The sound of your voice is significantly muffled!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The sound of your voice is significantly muffled!"
) ) ) );
7636 }
7637
7638 sounds::sound( pos(), noise, order ? sounds::sound_t::order : sounds::sound_t::alert, msg, false,
7639 "shout", shout );
7640}
7641
7642void Character::signal_nemesis()
7643{
7644 const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = global_omt_location();
7645 const tripoint_abs_sm smpos = project_to<coords::sm>( ompos );
7646 overmap_buffer.signal_nemesis( smpos );
7647}
7648
7649void Character::vomit()
7650{
7651 get_event_bus().send<event_type::throws_up>( getID() );
7652
7653 if( stomach.contains() != 0_ml ) {
7654 get_map().add_field( adjacent_tile(), fd_bile, 1 );
7655 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You throw up heavily!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You throw up heavily!" ) ) ), _( "<npcname> throws up heavily!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> throws up heavily!"
) ) ) );
7656 }
7657 // needed to ensure digesting vitamin_type::DRUGs are also emptied, even on an empty stomach.
7658 stomach.empty();
7659
7660
7661 if( !has_effect( effect_nausea ) ) { // Prevents never-ending nausea
7662 const effect dummy_nausea( effect_source( this ), &effect_nausea.obj(), 0_turns,
7663 bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID(), false, 1, calendar::turn );
7664 add_effect( effect_nausea, std::max( dummy_nausea.get_max_duration() * units::to_milliliter(
7665 stomach.contains() ) / 21, dummy_nausea.get_int_dur_factor() ) );
7666 }
7667
7668 mod_moves( -100 );
7669 for( auto &elem : *effects ) {
7670 for( auto &_effect_it : elem.second ) {
7671 effect &it = _effect_it.second;
7672 if( it.get_id() == effect_foodpoison ) {
7673 it.mod_duration( -30_minutes );
7674 } else if( it.get_id() == effect_drunk ) {
7675 it.mod_duration( rng( -10_minutes, -50_minutes ) );
7676 }
7677 }
7678 }
7679 remove_effect( effect_pkill1_generic );
7680 remove_effect( effect_pkill1_acetaminophen );
7681 remove_effect( effect_pkill1_nsaid );
7682 remove_effect( effect_pkill2 );
7683 remove_effect( effect_pkill3 );
7684 // Don't wake up when just retching
7685 if( stomach.contains() > 0_ml ) {
7686 wake_up();
7687 }
7688}
7689
7690// adjacent_tile() returns a safe, unoccupied adjacent tile. If there are no such tiles, returns player position instead.
7691tripoint Character::adjacent_tile() const
7692{
7693 std::vector<tripoint> ret;
7694 int dangerous_fields = 0;
7695 map &here = get_map();
7696 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
7697 for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
7698 if( p == pos() ) {
7699 // Don't consider player position
7700 continue;
7701 }
7702 if( creatures.creature_at( p ) != nullptr ) {
7703 continue;
7704 }
7705 if( here.impassable( p ) ) {
7706 continue;
7707 }
7708 const trap &curtrap = here.tr_at( p );
7709 // If we don't known a trap here, the spot "appears" to be good, so consider it.
7710 // Same if we know a benign trap (as it's not dangerous).
7711 if( curtrap.can_see( p, *this ) && !curtrap.is_benign() ) {
7712 continue;
7713 }
7714 // Only consider tile if unoccupied, passable and has no traps
7715 dangerous_fields = 0;
7716 field &tmpfld = here.field_at( p );
7717 for( auto &fld : tmpfld ) {
7718 const field_entry &cur = fld.second;
7719 if( cur.is_dangerous() ) {
7720 dangerous_fields++;
7721 }
7722 }
7723
7724 if( dangerous_fields == 0 ) {
7725 ret.push_back( p );
7726 }
7727 }
7728
7729 return random_entry( ret, pos() ); // player position if no valid adjacent tiles
7730}
7731
7732void Character::set_fac_id( const std::string &my_fac_id )
7733{
7734 fac_id = faction_id( my_fac_id );
7735}
7736
7737std::string get_stat_name( character_stat Stat )
7738{
7739 switch( Stat ) {
7740 // *INDENT-OFF*
7741 case character_stat::STRENGTH: return pgettext( "strength stat", "STR" );
7742 case character_stat::DEXTERITY: return pgettext( "dexterity stat", "DEX" );
7743 case character_stat::INTELLIGENCE: return pgettext( "intelligence stat", "INT" );
7744 case character_stat::PERCEPTION: return pgettext( "perception stat", "PER" );
7745 // *INDENT-ON*
7746 default:
7747 break;
7748 }
7749 return pgettext( "fake stat there's an error", "ERR" );
7750}
7751
7752int Character::mutation_height( const trait_id &mut )
7753{
7754 const mutation_branch &mdata = mut.obj();
7755 int height_prereqs = 0;
7756 int height_prereqs2 = 0;
7757 for( const trait_id &prereq : mdata.prereqs ) {
7758 height_prereqs = std::max( mutation_height( prereq ), height_prereqs );
7759 }
7760 for( const trait_id &prereq : mdata.prereqs2 ) {
7761 height_prereqs2 = std::max( mutation_height( prereq ), height_prereqs2 );
7762 }
7763 return std::max( height_prereqs, height_prereqs2 ) + 1;
7764}
7765
7766void Character::calc_mutation_levels()
7767{
7768 mutation_category_level.clear();
7769 // This intentionally counts multiple leads_to mutations
7770 // from the same root mutation as having full height
7771
7772 // For each of our mutations...
7773 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
7774 const mutation_branch &mdata = mut.obj();
7775 if( mdata.threshold ) {
7776 // Thresholds are worth 10, and technically support multiple categories
7777 for( const mutation_category_id &cat : mdata.category ) {
7778 mutation_category_level[cat] += 10;
7779 }
7780 continue;
7781 }
7782 // ... if we don't have a valid addititive version...
7783 bool have_upgrade = false;
7784 for( const trait_id &upgrade : mdata.additions ) {
7785 const mutation_branch &upgradedata = upgrade.obj();
7786 if( has_trait( upgrade ) && !upgradedata.flags.count( json_flag_NON_THRESH ) ) {
7787 have_upgrade = true;
7788 break;
7789 }
7790 }
7791 if( !have_upgrade && !mdata.flags.count( json_flag_NON_THRESH ) ) {
7792 // ... find the mutations distance from normalcy...
7793 int mut_height = mutation_height( mut );
7794 // ... and for each category it falls in...
7795 for( const mutation_category_id &cat : mdata.category ) {
7796 // ... add the height and a constant value
7797 mutation_category_level[cat] += mut_height + 2;
7798 }
7799 }
7800 }
7801}
7802
7803void Character::drench_mut_calc()
7804{
7805 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
7806 int ignored = 0;
7807 int neutral = 0;
7808 int good = 0;
7809
7810 for( const trait_id &iter : get_mutations() ) {
7811 const mutation_branch &mdata = iter.obj();
7812 const auto wp_iter = mdata.protection.find( bp.id() );
7813 if( wp_iter != mdata.protection.end() ) {
7814 ignored += wp_iter->second.x;
7815 neutral += wp_iter->second.y;
7816 good += wp_iter->second.z;
7817 }
7818 }
7819 set_part_mut_drench( bp, { WT_GOOD, good } );
7820 set_part_mut_drench( bp, { WT_NEUTRAL, neutral } );
7821 set_part_mut_drench( bp, { WT_IGNORED, ignored } );
7822 }
7823}
7824
7825/// Returns a weighted list of all mutation categories with current blood vitamin levels
7826weighted_int_list<mutation_category_id> Character::get_vitamin_weighted_categories() const
7827{
7828 weighted_int_list<mutation_category_id> weighted_output;
7829 const std::map<mutation_category_id, mutation_category_trait> &mutation_categories =
7830 mutation_category_trait::get_all();
7831 for( const auto &elem : mutation_categories ) {
7832 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MUTATION, "get_vitamin_weighted_categories: category %s weight %d",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_MUTATION ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "get_vitamin_weighted_categories: category %s weight %d"
, elem.second.id.c_str(), vitamin_get( elem.second.vitamin ) )
) ); } } while( false )
7833 elem.second.id.c_str(), vitamin_get( elem.second.vitamin ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_MUTATION ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "get_vitamin_weighted_categories: category %s weight %d"
, elem.second.id.c_str(), vitamin_get( elem.second.vitamin ) )
) ); } } while( false );
7834 weighted_output.add( elem.first, vitamin_get( elem.second.vitamin ) );
7835 }
7836 return weighted_output;
7837}
7838
7839int Character::vitamin_RDA( const vitamin_id &vitamin, int ammount ) const
7840{
7841 const double multiplier = vitamin_rate( vitamin ) / 1_days * 100;
7842 return std::lround( ammount * multiplier );
7843}
7844
7845void Character::recalculate_bodyparts()
7846{
7847 body_part_set body_set;
7848 for( const bodypart_id &bp : creature_anatomy->get_bodyparts() ) {
7849 body_set.set( bp.id() );
7850 }
7851 body_set = enchantment_cache->modify_bodyparts( body_set );
7852 // first come up with the bodyparts that need to be removed from body
7853 for( auto bp_iter = body.begin(); bp_iter != body.end(); ) {
7854 if( !body_set.test( bp_iter->first ) ) {
7855 bp_iter = body.erase( bp_iter );
7856 } else {
7857 ++bp_iter;
7858 }
7859 }
7860 // then add the parts in bodyset that are missing from body
7861 for( const bodypart_str_id &bp : body_set ) {
7862 if( body.find( bp ) == body.end() ) {
7863 body[bp] = bodypart( bp );
7864 }
7865 }
7866 tally_organic_size();
7867 recalc_limb_energy_usage();
7868
7869 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ANATOMY_BP, "New healthy kcal %d",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ANATOMY_BP ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "New healthy kcal %d"
, get_healthy_kcal() ) ) ); } } while( false )
7870 get_healthy_kcal() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ANATOMY_BP ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "New healthy kcal %d"
, get_healthy_kcal() ) ) ); } } while( false );
7871 calc_encumbrance();
7872 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ANATOMY_BP, "New stored kcal %d",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ANATOMY_BP ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "New stored kcal %d"
, get_stored_kcal() ) ) ); } } while( false )
7873 get_stored_kcal() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ANATOMY_BP ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "New stored kcal %d"
, get_stored_kcal() ) ) ); } } while( false );
7874 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ANATOMY_BP, "New organic size %.1f",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ANATOMY_BP ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "New organic size %.1f"
, get_cached_organic_size() ) ) ); } } while( false )
7875 get_cached_organic_size() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ANATOMY_BP ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "New organic size %.1f"
, get_cached_organic_size() ) ) ); } } while( false );
7876}
7877
7878void Character::recalculate_enchantment_cache()
7879{
7880 // start by resetting the cache to all inventory items
7881 *enchantment_cache = inv->get_active_enchantment_cache( *this );
7882
7883 cache_visit_items_with( "is_relic", &item::is_relic, [this]( const item & it ) {
7884 for( const enchant_cache &ench : it.get_proc_enchantments() ) {
7885 if( ench.is_active( *this, it ) ) {
7886 enchantment_cache->force_add( ench );
7887 }
7888 }
7889 for( const enchantment &ench : it.get_defined_enchantments() ) {
7890 if( ench.is_active( *this, it ) ) {
7891 enchantment_cache->force_add( ench, *this );
7892 }
7893 }
7894 } );
7895
7896 // get from traits/ mutations
7897 for( const std::pair<const trait_id, trait_data> &mut_map : my_mutations ) {
7898 const mutation_branch &mut = mut_map.first.obj();
7899
7900 for( const enchantment_id &ench_id : mut.enchantments ) {
7901 const enchantment &ench = ench_id.obj();
7902 if( ench.is_active( *this, mut.activated && mut_map.second.powered ) ) {
7903 enchantment_cache->force_add( ench, *this );
7904 }
7905 }
7906 }
7907
7908 for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
7909 const bionic_id &bid = bio.id;
7910
7911 for( const enchantment_id &ench_id : bid->enchantments ) {
7912 const enchantment &ench = ench_id.obj();
7913 if( ench.is_active( *this, bio.powered &&
7914 bid->has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_TOGGLED" ) )(([]()-> const auto &{ using ExprType = std::decay_t<
decltype(static_argument_identity( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_TOGGLED"
) ))>; using CachedType = std::conditional_t<std::is_same_v
<ExprType, const char*>, std::string, ExprType>; static
const CachedType _cached_expr = static_argument_identity( json_character_flag
( "BIONIC_TOGGLED" ) ); return _cached_expr; })()) ) ) ) {
7915 enchantment_cache->force_add( ench, *this );
7916 }
7917 }
7918 }
7919
7920 for( const auto &elem : *effects ) {
7921 for( const enchantment_id &ench_id : elem.first->enchantments ) {
7922 const enchantment &ench = ench_id.obj();
7923 if( ench.is_active( *this, true ) ) {
7924 enchantment_cache->force_add( ench, *this );
7925 }
7926 }
7927 }
7928
7929 if( enchantment_cache->modifies_bodyparts() ) {
7930 recalculate_bodyparts();
7931 }
7932 recalc_hp();
7933}
7934
7935double Character::calculate_by_enchantment( double modify, enchant_vals::mod value,
7936 bool round_output ) const
7937{
7938 modify += enchantment_cache->get_value_add( value );
7939 modify *= 1.0 + enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( value );
7940 if( round_output ) {
7941 modify = std::round( modify );
7942 }
7943 return modify;
7944}
7945
7946void Character::passive_absorb_hit( const bodypart_id &bp, damage_unit &du ) const
7947{
7948 // >0 check because some mutations provide negative armor
7949 // Thin skin check goes before subdermal armor plates because SUBdermal
7950 if( du.amount > 0.0f ) {
7951 du.amount -= mutation_armor( bp, du );
7952 du.amount -= bp->damage_resistance( du );
7953 }
7954 du.amount -= bionic_armor_bonus( bp, du.type ); //Check for passive armor bionics
7955 du.amount -= mabuff_armor_bonus( du.type );
7956 du.amount = std::max( 0.0f, du.amount );
7957}
7958
7959void Character::did_hit( Creature &target )
7960{
7961 enchantment_cache->cast_hit_you( *this, target );
7962}
7963
7964ret_val<void> Character::can_wield( const item &it ) const
7965{
7966 if( has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
7967 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield anything while incorporeal." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't wield anything while incorporeal."
) ) ) );
7968 }
7969 if( !has_min_manipulators() ) {
7970 return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
7971 _( "You need at least one arm available to even consider wielding something." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need at least one arm available to even consider wielding something."
) ) ) );
7972 }
7973 if( it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
7974 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield spilt liquids." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't wield spilt liquids."
) ) ) );
7975 }
7976 if( it.made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7977 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield loose gases." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't wield loose gases."
) ) ) );
7978 }
7979 if( it.is_frozen_liquid() && !it.has_flag( flag_SHREDDED ) ) {
7980 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield unbroken frozen liquids." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't wield unbroken frozen liquids."
) ) ) );
7981 }
7982 if( it.has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) ) {
7983 if( get_wielded_item() && get_wielded_item().get_item() == &it ) {
7984 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't unwield this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't unwield this." ) )
) );
7985 }
7986 return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
7987 _( "You can't wield this. Wielding it would make it impossible to unwield it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't wield this. Wielding it would make it impossible to unwield it."
) ) ) );
7988 }
7989 if( it.has_flag( flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) ) {
7990 return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
7991 _( "You can't wield this. It looks like it has to be attached to a bionic." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't wield this. It looks like it has to be attached to a bionic."
) ) ) );
7992 }
7993
7994 if( is_armed() && !can_unwield( weapon ).success() ) {
7995 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "The %s prevents you from wielding the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s prevents you from wielding the %s."
) ) ),
7996 weapname(), it.tname() );
7997 }
7998 monster *mount = mounted_creature.get();
7999 if( it.is_two_handed( *this ) && ( !has_two_arms_lifting() ||
8000 worn_with_flag( flag_RESTRICT_HANDS ) ) &&
8001 !( is_mounted() && mount->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
8002 mount->type->mech_weapon && it.typeId() == mount->type->mech_weapon ) ) {
8003 if( worn_with_flag( flag_RESTRICT_HANDS ) ) {
8004 return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
8005 _( "Something you are wearing hinders the use of both hands." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Something you are wearing hinders the use of both hands."
) ) ) );
8006 } else if( it.has_flag( flag_ALWAYS_TWOHAND ) ) {
8007 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't wield the %s with only one arm." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't wield the %s with only one arm."
) ) ),
8008 it.tname() );
8009 } else {
8010 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You are too weak to wield the %s with only one arm." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are too weak to wield the %s with only one arm."
) ) ),
8011 it.tname() );
8012 }
8013 }
8014 if( is_mounted() && mount->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
8015 mount->type->mech_weapon && it.typeId() != mount->type->mech_weapon ) {
8016 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You cannot wield anything while piloting a mech." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot wield anything while piloting a mech."
) ) ) );
8017 }
8018
8019 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
8020}
8021
8022bool Character::has_wield_conflicts( const item &it ) const
8023{
8024 return is_wielding( it ) || ( is_armed() && !it.can_combine( weapon ) );
8025}
8026
8027bool Character::unwield()
8028{
8029 if( weapon.is_null() ) {
8030 return true;
8031 }
8032
8033 if( !can_unwield( weapon ).success() ) {
8034 return false;
8035 }
8036
8037 // currently the only way to unwield NO_UNWIELD weapon is if it's a bionic that can be deactivated
8038 if( weapon.has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) ) {
8039 std::optional<bionic *> bio_opt = find_bionic_by_uid( get_weapon_bionic_uid() );
8040 return bio_opt && can_deactivate_bionic( **bio_opt ).success();
8041 }
8042
8043 const std::string query = string_format( _( "Stop wielding %s?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stop wielding %s?" ) ) ), weapon.tname() );
8044
8045 if( !dispose_item( item_location( *this, &weapon ), query ) ) {
8046 return false;
8047 }
8048
8049 inv->unsort();
8050
8051 return true;
8052}
8053
8054std::string Character::weapname() const
8055{
8056 std::string name = weapname_simple();
8057 const std::string mode = weapname_mode();
8058 const std::string ammo = weapname_ammo();
8059
8060 if( !mode.empty() ) {
8061 name = string_format( "%s %s", mode, name );
8062 }
8063 if( !ammo.empty() ) {
8064 name = string_format( "%s %s", name, ammo );
8065 }
8066
8067 return name;
8068}
8069
8070std::string Character::weapname_simple() const
8071{
8072 //To make wield state consistent, gun_nam; when calling tname, is disabling 'with_collapsed' flag
8073 if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
8074 gun_mode current_mode = weapon.gun_current_mode();
8075 const bool no_mode = !current_mode.target;
8076 tname::segment_bitset segs( tname::default_tname );
8077 segs.set( tname::segments::TAGS, false );
8078 std::string gun_name = no_mode ? weapon.display_name() : current_mode->tname( 1, segs );
8079 return gun_name;
8080
8081 } else if( !is_armed() ) {
