8082 return _( "fists" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "fists" ) ) );
8083 } else {
8084 return weapon.tname();
8085 }
8086}
8087
8088std::string Character::weapname_mode() const
8089{
8090 if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
8091 gun_mode current_mode = weapon.gun_current_mode();
8092 const bool no_mode = !current_mode.target;
8093 std::string gunmode;
8094 if( !no_mode && current_mode->gun_all_modes().size() > 1 ) {
8095 gunmode = current_mode.tname();
8096 }
8097 return gunmode;
8098 } else {
8099 return "";
8100 }
8101}
8102
8103std::string Character::weapname_ammo() const
8104{
8105 if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
8106 gun_mode current_mode = weapon.gun_current_mode();
8107 const bool no_mode = !current_mode.target;
8108 // only required for empty mags and empty guns
8109 std::string mag_ammo;
8110
8111 if( !no_mode && ( current_mode->uses_magazine() || current_mode->magazine_integral() ) ) {
8112 if( current_mode->uses_magazine() && !current_mode->magazine_current() ) {
8113 mag_ammo = _( "(empty)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "(empty)" ) ) );
8114 } else {
8115 int cur_ammo = current_mode->ammo_remaining();
8116 int max_ammo;
8117 if( cur_ammo == 0 ) {
8118 max_ammo = current_mode->ammo_capacity( item( current_mode->ammo_default() ).ammo_type() );
8119 } else {
8120 max_ammo = current_mode->ammo_capacity( current_mode->loaded_ammo().ammo_type() );
8121 }
8122
8123 const double ratio = static_cast<double>( cur_ammo ) / static_cast<double>( max_ammo );
8124 nc_color charges_color;
8125 if( cur_ammo == 0 ) {
8126 charges_color = c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
8127 } else if( cur_ammo == max_ammo ) {
8128 charges_color = c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white);
8129 } else if( ratio < 1.0 / 3.0 ) {
8130 charges_color = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
8131 } else if( ratio < 2.0 / 3.0 ) {
8132 charges_color = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
8133 } else {
8134 charges_color = c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green);
8135 }
8136 mag_ammo = string_format( "(%s)", colorize( string_format( "%i/%i", cur_ammo, max_ammo ),
8137 charges_color ) );
8138 }
8139 }
8140
8141 return mag_ammo;
8142
8143 } else {
8144 return "";
8145 }
8146}
8147
8148// Tests to see if a character has room to enter a vehicle tile.
8149bool Character::move_in_vehicle( Creature *c, const tripoint &dest_loc ) const
8150{
8151 map &m = get_map();
8152 const optional_vpart_position vp_there = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
8153 if( vp_there ) {
8154 vehicle &veh = vp_there->vehicle();
8155 units::volume capacity = 0_ml;
8156 units::volume free_cargo = 0_ml;
8157 auto cargo_parts = veh.get_parts_at( dest_loc, "CARGO", part_status_flag::any );
8158 for( vehicle_part *&part : cargo_parts ) {
8159 vehicle_stack contents = veh.get_items( *part );
8160 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
8161 // Check for obstacles and appliances to prevent squishing when the part is
8162 // not a vehicle or when the player is not actually entering the tile IE grabbing.
8163 if( !vp.part_with_feature( "CARGO_PASSABLE", false ) &&
8164 !vp.part_with_feature( "APPLIANCE", false ) && !vp.part_with_feature( "OBSTACLE", false ) ) {
8165 capacity += contents.max_volume();
8166 free_cargo += contents.free_volume();
8167 }
8168 }
8169 if( capacity > 0_ml ) {
8170 // First, we'll try to squeeze in. Open-topped vehicle parts have more room for us.
8171 if( !veh.enclosed_at( dest_loc ) ) {
8172 free_cargo *= 1.2;
8173 }
8174 const creature_size size = get_size();
8175 if( ( size == creature_size::tiny && free_cargo < 15625_ml ) ||
8176 ( size == creature_size::small && free_cargo < 31250_ml ) ||
8177 ( size == creature_size::medium && free_cargo < 62500_ml ) ||
8178 ( size == creature_size::large && free_cargo < 125000_ml ) ||
8179 ( size == creature_size::huge && free_cargo < 250000_ml ) ) {
8180 if( ( size == creature_size::tiny && free_cargo < 11719_ml ) ||
8181 ( size == creature_size::small && free_cargo < 23438_ml ) ||
8182 ( size == creature_size::medium && free_cargo < 46875_ml ) ||
8183 ( size == creature_size::large && free_cargo < 93750_ml ) ||
8184 ( size == creature_size::huge && free_cargo < 187500_ml ) ) {
8185 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "There's not enough room for you to fit there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's not enough room for you to fit there."
) ) ) );
8186 return false; // Even if we squeeze, there's no room.
8187 }
8188 c->add_effect( effect_cramped_space, 2_turns, true );
8189 return true;
8190 }
8191 }
8192 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
8193 // Sufficiently gigantic characters aren't comfortable in stock seats, roof or no.
8194 if( in_vehicle && get_size() == creature_size::huge && !vp.part_with_feature( "AISLE", false ) &&
8195 !vp.part_with_feature( "HUGE_OK", false ) && !has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
8196 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You barely fit in this tiny human vehicle." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You barely fit in this tiny human vehicle."
) ) ) );
8197 add_msg_if_npc( m_warning, _( "%s has to really cram their huge body to fit." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s has to really cram their huge body to fit."
) ) ), c->disp_name() );
8198 c->add_effect( effect_cramped_space, 2_turns, true );
8199 return true;
8200 }
8201 }
8202 return true;
8203}
8204
8205void Character::on_hit( Creature *source, bodypart_id bp_hit,
8206 float /*difficulty*/, dealt_projectile_attack const *const proj )
8207{
8208 check_dead_state();
8209 if( source == nullptr || proj != nullptr ) {
8210 return;
8211 }
8212
8213 // Creature attacking an invisible player will remain aware of their location as long as they keep hitting something
8214 if( is_avatar() && source->is_monster() && source->has_effect( effect_stumbled_into_invisible ) ) {
8215 source->as_monster()->stumble_invis( *this, false );
8216 }
8217
8218 if( is_npc() ) {
8219 as_npc()->on_attacked( *source );
8220 }
8221
8222 bool u_see = get_player_view().sees( *this );
8223 const units::energy trigger_cost_base = bio_ods->power_trigger;
8224 if( has_active_bionic( bio_ods ) && get_power_level() > ( 5 * trigger_cost_base ) ) {
8225 if( is_avatar() ) {
8226 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your offensive defense system shocks %s in mid-attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your offensive defense system shocks %s in mid-attack!"
) ) ),
8227 source->disp_name() );
8228 } else if( u_see ) {
8229 add_msg( _( "%1$s's offensive defense system shocks %2$s in mid-attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s's offensive defense system shocks %2$s in mid-attack!"
) ) ),
8230 disp_name(),
8231 source->disp_name() );
8232 }
8233 int shock = rng( 1, 4 );
8234 mod_power_level( -shock * trigger_cost_base );
8235 damage_instance ods_shock_damage;
8236 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8237 ods_shock_damage.add_damage( damage_electric, shock * 5 );
8238 // Should hit body part used for attack
8239 source->deal_damage( this, body_part_torso, ods_shock_damage );
8240 }
8241 if( !wearing_something_on( bp_hit ) &&
8242 ( has_trait( trait_SPINES ) || has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ) ) {
8243 int spine = rng( 1, has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ? 20 : 8 );
8244 if( !is_avatar() ) {
8245 if( u_see ) {
8246 add_msg( _( "%1$s's %2$s puncture %3$s in mid-attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s's %2$s puncture %3$s in mid-attack!"
) ) ), get_name(),
8247 ( has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ? _( "quills" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "quills" ) ) ) : _( "spines" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "spines" ) ) ) ),
8248 source->disp_name() );
8249 }
8250 } else {
8251 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your %1$s puncture %2$s in mid-attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %1$s puncture %2$s in mid-attack!"
) ) ),
8252 ( has_trait( trait_QUILLS ) ? _( "quills" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "quills" ) ) ) : _( "spines" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "spines" ) ) ) ),
8253 source->disp_name() );
8254 }
8255 damage_instance spine_damage;
8256 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8257 spine_damage.add_damage( damage_stab, spine );
8258 source->deal_damage( this, body_part_torso, spine_damage );
8259 }
8260 if( ( !wearing_something_on( bp_hit ) ) && has_trait( trait_THORNS ) &&
8261 ( !source->has_weapon() ) ) {
8262 if( !is_avatar() ) {
8263 if( u_see ) {
8264 add_msg( _( "%1$s's %2$s scrape %3$s in mid-attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s's %2$s scrape %3$s in mid-attack!"
) ) ), get_name(),
8265 _( "thorns" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "thorns" ) ) ), source->disp_name() );
8266 }
8267 } else {
8268 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your thorns scrape %s in mid-attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your thorns scrape %s in mid-attack!"
) ) ), source->disp_name() );
8269 }
8270 int thorn = rng( 1, 4 );
8271 damage_instance thorn_damage;
8272 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8273 thorn_damage.add_damage( damage_cut, thorn );
8274 // In general, critters don't have separate limbs
8275 // so safer to target the torso
8276 source->deal_damage( this, body_part_torso, thorn_damage );
8277 }
8278 if( ( !wearing_something_on( bp_hit ) ) && has_trait( trait_CF_HAIR ) ) {
8279 if( !is_avatar() ) {
8280 if( u_see ) {
8281 add_msg( _( "%1$s gets a load of %2$s's %3$s stuck in!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s gets a load of %2$s's %3$s stuck in!"
) ) ), source->disp_name(),
8282 get_name(), _( "hair" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "hair" ) ) ) );
8283 }
8284 } else {
8285 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your hairs detach into %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your hairs detach into %s!" )
) ), source->disp_name() );
8286 }
8287 source->add_effect( effect_stunned, 2_turns );
8288 if( one_in( 3 ) ) { // In the eyes!
8289 source->add_effect( effect_blind, 2_turns );
8290 }
8291 }
8292
8293 map &here = get_map();
8294 const optional_vpart_position veh_part = here.veh_at( pos() );
8295 bool in_skater_vehicle = in_vehicle && veh_part.part_with_feature( "SEAT_REQUIRES_BALANCE", false );
8296
8297 if( ( worn_with_flag( flag_REQUIRES_BALANCE ) || in_skater_vehicle ) && !is_on_ground() ) {
8298 int rolls = 4;
8299 if( worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_ONE ) && !in_skater_vehicle ) {
8300 rolls += 2;
8301 }
8302 if( has_trait( trait_PROF_SKATER ) ) {
8303 rolls--;
8304 }
8305 if( has_trait( trait_DEFT ) ) {
8306 rolls--;
8307 }
8308 if( has_trait( trait_CLUMSY ) ) {
8309 rolls++;
8310 }
8311
8312 if( stability_roll() < dice( rolls, 10 ) ) {
8313 if( !is_avatar() ) {
8314 if( u_see ) {
8315 add_msg( _( "%1$s loses their balance while being hit!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s loses their balance while being hit!"
) ) ), get_name() );
8316 }
8317 } else {
8318 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You lose your balance while being hit!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You lose your balance while being hit!"
) ) ) );
8319 }
8320 if( in_skater_vehicle ) {
8321 g->fling_creature( this, rng_float( 0_degrees, 360_degrees ), 10 );
8322 }
8323 // This kind of downing is not subject to immunity.
8324 add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns, false, 0, true );
8325 }
8326 }
8327
8328 enchantment_cache->cast_hit_me( *this, source );
8329}
8330
8331
8332/*
8333 Where damage to character is actually applied to hit body parts
8334 Might be where to put bleed stuff rather than in player::deal_damage()
8335 */
8336void Character::apply_damage( Creature *source, bodypart_id hurt, int dam,
8337 const bool bypass_med )
8338{
8339 if( is_dead_state() || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
8340 // don't do any more damage if we're already dead
8341 // Or if we're debugging and don't want to die
8342 // Or we are intangible
8343 return;
8344 }
8345
8346 if( hurt == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
8347 debugmsg( "Wacky body part hurt!" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "8347", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Wacky body part hurt!");
8348 hurt = body_part_torso;
8349 }
8350
8351 if( !hurt->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
8352 mod_pain( dam / 2 );
8353 }
8354
8355 const bodypart_id &part_to_damage = hurt->main_part;
8356
8357 const int dam_to_bodypart = std::min( dam, get_part_hp_cur( part_to_damage ) );
8358
8359 mod_part_hp_cur( part_to_damage, - dam_to_bodypart );
8360 get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_takes_damage>( getID(), dam_to_bodypart );
8361
8362 if( !weapon.is_null() && !can_wield( weapon ).success() &&
8363 can_drop( weapon ).success() ) {
8364 add_msg_if_player( _( "You are no longer able to wield your %s and drop it!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are no longer able to wield your %s and drop it!"
) ) ),
8365 weapon.display_name() );
8366 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { weapon } );
8367 i_rem( &weapon );
8368 }
8369 if( has_effect( effect_mending, part_to_damage.id() ) && ( source == nullptr ||
8370 !source->is_hallucination() ) ) {
8371 effect &e = get_effect( effect_mending, part_to_damage );
8372 float remove_mend = dam / 20.0f;
8373 e.mod_duration( -e.get_max_duration() * remove_mend );
8374 }
8375
8376 if( dam > get_painkiller() ) {
8377 on_hurt( source );
8378 }
8379
8380 if( !bypass_med ) {
8381 // remove healing effects if damaged
8382 int remove_med = roll_remainder( dam / 5.0f );
8383 if( remove_med > 0 && has_effect( effect_bandaged, part_to_damage.id() ) ) {
8384 remove_med -= reduce_healing_effect( effect_bandaged, remove_med, part_to_damage );
8385 }
8386 if( remove_med > 0 && has_effect( effect_disinfected, part_to_damage.id() ) ) {
8387 reduce_healing_effect( effect_disinfected, remove_med, part_to_damage );
8388 }
8389 }
8390}
8391
8392dealt_damage_instance Character::deal_damage( Creature *source, bodypart_id bp,
8393 const damage_instance &d, const weakpoint_attack &attack )
8394{
8395 if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
8396 return dealt_damage_instance();
8397 }
8398
8399 //damage applied here
8400 dealt_damage_instance dealt_dams = Creature::deal_damage( source, bp, d, attack );
8401 //block reduction should be by applied this point
8402 int dam = dealt_dams.total_damage();
8403
8404 // TODO: Pre or post blit hit tile onto "this"'s location here
8405 if( dam > 0 && get_player_view().sees( pos() ) ) {
8406 g->draw_hit_player( *this, dam );
8407
8408 if( is_avatar() && source ) {
8409 //monster hits player melee
8410 SCT.add( point( posx(), posy() ),
8411 direction_from( point_zero, point( posx() - source->posx(), posy() - source->posy() ) ),
8412 get_hp_bar( dam, get_hp_max( bp ) ).first, m_bad, body_part_name( bp ), m_neutral );
8413 }
8414 }
8415
8416 // And slimespawners too
8417 if( has_trait( trait_SLIMESPAWNER ) && ( dam >= 10 ) && one_in( 20 - dam ) ) {
8418 if( monster *const slime = g->place_critter_around( mon_player_blob, pos(), 1 ) ) {
8419 slime->friendly = -1;
8420 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "A mass of slime is torn from you, and moves on its own!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "A mass of slime is torn from you, and moves on its own!"
) ) ) );
8421 }
8422 }
8423
8424 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
8425 //Acid blood effects.
8426 bool u_see = player_character.sees( *this );
8427 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8428 int cut_dam = dealt_dams.type_damage( damage_cut );
8429 if( source && has_flag( json_flag_ACIDBLOOD ) && !bp->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) &&
8430 !one_in( 3 ) &&
8431 ( dam >= 4 || cut_dam > 0 ) && ( rl_dist( player_character.pos(), source->pos() ) <= 1 ) ) {
8432 if( is_avatar() ) {
8433 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your acidic blood splashes %s in mid-attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your acidic blood splashes %s in mid-attack!"
) ) ),
8434 source->disp_name() );
8435 } else if( u_see ) {
8436 add_msg( _( "%1$s's acidic blood splashes on %2$s in mid-attack!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s's acidic blood splashes on %2$s in mid-attack!"
) ) ),
8437 disp_name(), source->disp_name() );
8438 }
8439 damage_instance acidblood_damage;
8440 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8441 acidblood_damage.add_damage( damage_acid, rng( 4, 16 ) );
8442 if( !one_in( 4 ) ) {
8443 source->deal_damage( this, body_part_arm_l, acidblood_damage );
8444 source->deal_damage( this, body_part_arm_r, acidblood_damage );
8445 } else {
8446 source->deal_damage( this, body_part_torso, acidblood_damage );
8447 source->deal_damage( this, body_part_head, acidblood_damage );
8448 }
8449 }
8450
8451 int recoil_mul = 100;
8452
8453 if( bp == body_part_hand_l || bp == body_part_arm_l ||
8454 bp == body_part_hand_r || bp == body_part_arm_r ) {
8455 recoil_mul = 200;
8456 } else if( bp == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
8457 debugmsg( "Wacky body part hit!" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "8457", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Wacky body part hit!");
8458 }
8459
8460 // TODO: Scale with damage in a way that makes sense for power armors, plate armor and naked skin.
8461 recoil += recoil_mul * weapon.volume() / 250_ml;
8462 recoil = std::min( MAX_RECOIL, recoil );
8463
8464 int sum_cover = 0;
8465 bool dealt_melee = false;
8466 bool dealt_ranged = false;
8467 for( const damage_unit &du : d ) {
8468 if( !du.type->physical ) {
8469 continue;
8470 }
8471 // Assume that ranged == getting shot
8472 if( !du.type->melee_only ) {
8473 dealt_ranged = true;
8474 } else {
8475 dealt_melee = true;
8476 }
8477 }
8478 sum_cover += worn.sum_filthy_cover( dealt_ranged, dealt_melee, bp );
8479
8480 // Chance of infection is damage (with cut and stab x4) * sum of coverage on affected body part, in percent.
8481 // i.e. if the body part has a sum of 100 coverage from filthy clothing,
8482 // each point of damage has a 1% change of causing infection.
8483 // if the bodypart doesn't bleed, it doesn't have blood, and cannot get infected
8484 if( sum_cover > 0 && !bp->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
8485 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage types
8486 const int cut_type_dam = dealt_dams.type_damage( damage_cut ) +
8487 dealt_dams.type_damage( damage_stab );
8488 const int combined_dam = dealt_dams.type_damage( damage_bash ) + ( cut_type_dam * 4 );
8489 const int infection_chance = ( combined_dam * sum_cover ) / 100;
8490 if( x_in_y( infection_chance, 100 ) ) {
8491 if( has_effect( effect_bite, bp.id() ) ) {
8492 add_effect( effect_bite, 40_minutes, bp, true );
8493 } else if( has_effect( effect_infected, bp.id() ) ) {
8494 add_effect( effect_infected, 25_minutes, bp, true );
8495 } else {
8496 add_effect( effect_bite, 1_turns, bp, true );
8497 }
8498 add_msg_if_player( _( "Filth from your clothing has been embedded deep in the wound." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Filth from your clothing has been embedded deep in the wound."
) ) ) );
8499 }
8500 }
8501
8502 on_hurt( source );
8503 return dealt_dams;
8504}
8505
8506int Character::reduce_healing_effect( const efftype_id &eff_id, int remove_med,
8507 const bodypart_id &hurt )
8508{
8509 effect &e = get_effect( eff_id, hurt );
8510 int intensity = e.get_intensity();
8511 if( remove_med < intensity ) {
8512 if( eff_id == effect_bandaged ) {
8513 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Bandages on your %s were damaged!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bandages on your %s were damaged!"
) ) ), body_part_name( hurt ) );
8514 } else if( eff_id == effect_disinfected ) {
8515 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You got some filth on your disinfected %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You got some filth on your disinfected %s!"
) ) ),
8516 body_part_name( hurt ) );
8517 }
8518 } else {
8519 if( eff_id == effect_bandaged ) {
8520 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Bandages on your %s were destroyed!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bandages on your %s were destroyed!"
) ) ),
8521 body_part_name( hurt ) );
8522 } else if( eff_id == effect_disinfected ) {
8523 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s is no longer disinfected!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s is no longer disinfected!"
) ) ), body_part_name( hurt ) );
8524 }
8525 }
8526 e.mod_duration( -6_hours * remove_med );
8527 return intensity;
8528}
8529
8530void Character::heal_bp( bodypart_id bp, int dam )
8531{
8532 heal( bp, dam );
8533}
8534
8535void Character::heal( const bodypart_id &healed, int dam )
8536{
8537 if( !is_limb_broken( healed ) && ( dam != 0 || healed->has_flag( json_flag_ALWAYS_HEAL ) ) ) {
8538 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Base healing of %s = %d", body_part_name( healed ),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Base healing of %s = %d"
, body_part_name( healed ), dam ) ) ); } } while( false )
8539 dam )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Base healing of %s = %d"
, body_part_name( healed ), dam ) ) ); } } while( false );
8540 if( healed->has_flag( json_flag_HEAL_OVERRIDE ) ) {
8541 dam = healed->heal_bonus;
8542 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Heal override, new healing %d", dam )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Heal override, new healing %d"
, dam ) ) ); } } while( false );
8543 } else {
8544 dam += healed->heal_bonus;
8545 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Healing after bodypart heal bonus %d", dam )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Healing after bodypart heal bonus %d"
, dam ) ) ); } } while( false );
8546 }
8547 int effective_heal = std::min( dam,
8548 get_part_hp_max( healed ) - get_part_hp_cur( healed ) ) ;
8549 mod_part_hp_cur( healed, effective_heal );
8550 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHAR_HEALTH, "Final healing of %s = %d", body_part_name( healed ),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Final healing of %s = %d"
, body_part_name( healed ), dam ) ) ); } } while( false )
8551 dam )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHAR_HEALTH ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Final healing of %s = %d"
, body_part_name( healed ), dam ) ) ); } } while( false );
8552 get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_heals_damage>( getID(), effective_heal );
8553 }
8554}
8555
8556void Character::healall( int dam )
8557{
8558 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
8559 heal( bp, dam );
8560 mod_part_healed_total( bp, dam );
8561 }
8562}
8563
8564void Character::hurtall( int dam, Creature *source, bool disturb /*= true*/ )
8565{
8566 if( is_dead_state() || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ||
8567 dam <= 0 ) {
8568 return;
8569 }
8570
8571 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
8572 // Don't use apply_damage here or it will annoy the player with 6 queries
8573 const int dam_to_bodypart = std::min( dam, get_part_hp_cur( bp ) );
8574 mod_part_hp_cur( bp, - dam_to_bodypart );
8575 get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_takes_damage>( getID(), dam_to_bodypart );
8576 }
8577
8578 // Low pain: damage is spread all over the body, so not as painful as 6 hits in one part
8579 mod_pain( dam );
8580 on_hurt( source, disturb );
8581}
8582
8583int Character::hitall( int dam, int vary, Creature *source )
8584{
8585 int damage_taken = 0;
8586 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
8587 int ddam = vary ? dam * rng( 100 - vary, 100 ) / 100 : dam;
8588 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
8589 damage_instance damage( damage_bash, ddam );
8590 damage_taken += deal_damage( source, bp, damage ).total_damage();
8591 }
8592 return damage_taken;
8593}
8594
8595void Character::on_hurt( Creature *source, bool disturb /*= true*/ )
8596{
8597 if( has_trait( trait_ADRENALINE ) && !has_effect( effect_adrenaline ) &&
8598 ( get_part_hp_cur( body_part_head ) < 25 ||
8599 get_part_hp_cur( body_part_torso ) < 15 ) ) {
8600 add_effect( effect_adrenaline, 20_minutes );
8601 }
8602
8603 if( disturb ) {
8604 if( has_effect( effect_sleep ) && !has_bionic( bio_sleep_shutdown ) ) {
8605 wake_up();
8606 }
8607 if( uistate.distraction_attack && !is_npc() && !has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
8608 if( source != nullptr ) {
8609 if( sees( *source ) ) {
8610 g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::attacked,
8611 string_format( _( "You were attacked by %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You were attacked by %s!" ) )
), source->disp_name() ) );
8612 } else {
8613 g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::attacked,
8614 _( "You were attacked by something you can't see!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You were attacked by something you can't see!"
) ) ) );
8615 }
8616 } else {
8617 g->cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::attacked, _( "You were hurt!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You were hurt!" ) ) ) );
8618 }
8619 }
8620 }
8621
8622 if( is_dead_state() ) {
8623 set_killer( source );
8624 }
8625}
8626
8627bool Character::crossed_threshold() const
8628{
8629 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
8630 if( mut->threshold ) {
8631 return true;
8632 }
8633 }
8634 return false;
8635}
8636
8637mutation_category_id Character::get_threshold_category() const
8638{
8639 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
8640 if( mut->threshold && !mut->category.empty() ) {
8641 return mut->category[0];
8642 }
8643 }
8644 return mutation_category_id::NULL_ID();
8645}
8646
8647void Character::update_type_of_scent( bool init )
8648{
8649 scenttype_id new_scent = scent_sc_human;
8650 for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
8651 if( mut.obj().scent_typeid ) {
8652 new_scent = mut.obj().scent_typeid.value();
8653 }
8654 }
8655
8656 if( !init && new_scent != get_type_of_scent() ) {
8657 get_scent().reset();
8658 }
8659 set_type_of_scent( new_scent );
8660}
8661
8662void Character::update_type_of_scent( const trait_id &mut, bool gain )
8663{
8664 const std::optional<scenttype_id> &mut_scent = mut->scent_typeid;
8665 if( mut_scent ) {
8666 if( gain && mut_scent.value() != get_type_of_scent() ) {
8667 set_type_of_scent( mut_scent.value() );
8668 get_scent().reset();
8669 } else {
8670 update_type_of_scent();
8671 }
8672 }
8673}
8674
8675void Character::set_type_of_scent( const scenttype_id &id )
8676{
8677 type_of_scent = id;
8678}
8679
8680scenttype_id Character::get_type_of_scent() const
8681{
8682 return type_of_scent;
8683}
8684
8685void Character::restore_scent()
8686{
8687 const std::string prev_scent = get_value( "prev_scent" );
8688 if( !prev_scent.empty() ) {
8689 remove_effect( effect_masked_scent );
8690 set_type_of_scent( scenttype_id( prev_scent ) );
8691 remove_value( "prev_scent" );
8692 remove_value( "waterproof_scent" );
8693 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You smell like yourself again." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You smell like yourself again."
) ) ) );
8694 }
8695}
8696
8697void Character::spores()
8698{
8699 map &here = get_map();
8700 fungal_effects fe;
8701 //~spore-release sound
8702 sounds::sound( pos(), 10, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Pouf!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Pouf!" ) ) ), false, "misc", "puff" );
8703 for( const tripoint &sporep : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
8704 if( sporep == pos() ) {
8705 continue;
8706 }
8707 fe.fungalize( sporep, this, 0.25 );
8708 }
8709}
8710
8711void Character::blossoms()
8712{
8713 // Player blossoms are shorter-ranged, but you can fire much more frequently if you like.
8714 sounds::sound( pos(), 10, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Pouf!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Pouf!" ) ) ), false, "misc", "puff" );
8715 map &here = get_map();
8716 for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 2 ) ) {
8717 here.add_field( tmp, fd_fungal_haze, rng( 1, 2 ) );
8718 }
8719}
8720
8721void Character::update_vitamins( const vitamin_id &vit )
8722{
8723 if( is_npc() && vit->type() != vitamin_type::COUNTER ) {
8724 return; // NPCs cannot develop vitamin diseases, bypass for special
8725 }
8726
8727 efftype_id def = vit.obj().deficiency();
8728 efftype_id exc = vit.obj().excess();
8729
8730 int lvl = vit.obj().severity( vitamin_get( vit ) );
8731 if( lvl <= 0 ) {
8732 remove_effect( def );
8733 }
8734 if( lvl >= 0 ) {
8735 remove_effect( exc );
8736 }
8737 if( lvl > 0 ) {
8738 if( has_effect( def ) ) {
8739 get_effect( def ).set_intensity( lvl, is_avatar() );
8740 } else {
8741 add_effect( def, 1_turns, true, lvl );
8742 }
8743 }
8744 if( lvl < 0 ) {
8745 if( has_effect( exc ) ) {
8746 get_effect( exc ).set_intensity( -lvl, is_avatar() );
8747 } else {
8748 add_effect( exc, 1_turns, true, -lvl );
8749 }
8750 }
8751}
8752
8753void Character::rooted_message() const
8754{
8755 if( ( has_trait( trait_ROOTS2 ) || has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) &&
8756 get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, pos() ) &&
8757 is_barefoot() ) {
8758 add_msg( m_info, _( "You sink your roots into the soil." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You sink your roots into the soil."
) ) ) );
8759 }
8760}
8761
8762void Character::rooted()
8763// This assumes that daily Iron, Calcium, and Thirst needs should be filled at the same rate.
8764// Baseline humans need 96 Iron and Calcium, and 288 Thirst per day.
8765// Thirst level -40 puts it right in the middle of the 'Hydrated' zone.
8766// TODO: The rates for iron, calcium, and thirst should probably be pulled from the nutritional data rather than being hardcoded here, so that future balance changes don't break this.
8767{
8768 if( ( has_trait( trait_ROOTS2 ) || has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) &&
8769 get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, pos() ) && is_barefoot() ) {
8770 int time_to_full = 43200; // 12 hours
8771 if( has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) {
8772 time_to_full += -14400; // -4 hours
8773 }
8774 if( x_in_y( 96, time_to_full ) ) {
8775 vitamin_mod( vitamin_iron, 1 );
8776 vitamin_mod( vitamin_calcium, 1 );
8777 mod_daily_health( 5, 50 );
8778 }
8779 if( get_thirst() > -40 && x_in_y( 288, time_to_full ) ) {
8780 mod_thirst( -1 );
8781 }
8782 }
8783}
8784
8785std::vector<item *> Character::inv_dump()
8786{
8787 std::vector<item *> ret;
8788 if( is_armed() && can_drop( weapon ).success() ) {
8789 ret.push_back( &weapon );
8790 }
8791 worn.inv_dump( ret );
8792 inv->dump( ret );
8793 return ret;
8794}
8795
8796std::vector<const item *> Character::inv_dump() const
8797{
8798 std::vector<const item *> ret;
8799 if( is_armed() && can_drop( weapon ).success() ) {
8800 ret.push_back( &weapon );
8801 }
8802 worn.inv_dump( ret );
8803 inv->dump( ret );
8804 return ret;
8805}
8806
8807bool Character::covered_with_flag( const flag_id &f, const body_part_set &parts ) const
8808{
8809 if( parts.none() ) {
8810 return true;
8811 }
8812
8813 return worn.covered_with_flag( f, parts );
8814}
8815
8816bool Character::is_waterproof( const body_part_set &parts ) const
8817{
8818 return covered_with_flag( flag_WATERPROOF, parts );
8819}
8820
8821units::volume Character::free_space() const
8822{
8823 units::volume volume_capacity = 0_ml;
8824 volume_capacity += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8825 for( const item_pocket *pocket : weapon.get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
8826 if( pocket->contains_phase( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
8827 for( const item *it : pocket->all_items_top() ) {
8828 volume_capacity -= it->volume();
8829 }
8830 } else if( !pocket->empty() ) {
8831 volume_capacity -= pocket->volume_capacity();
8832 }
8833 }
8834 volume_capacity += weapon.check_for_free_space();
8835 volume_capacity += worn.free_space();
8836 return volume_capacity;
8837}
8838
8839units::mass Character::free_weight_capacity() const
8840{
8841 units::mass weight_capacity = 0_gram;
8842 weight_capacity += weapon.get_remaining_weight_capacity();
8843 weight_capacity += worn.free_weight_capacity();
8844 return weight_capacity;
8845}
8846
8847units::volume Character::holster_volume() const
8848{
8849 units::volume holster_volume = 0_ml;
8850 if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8851 holster_volume += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8852 }
8853 holster_volume += worn.holster_volume();
8854 return holster_volume;
8855}
8856
8857int Character::empty_holsters() const
8858{
8859 int e_holsters = 0;
8860 if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8861 e_holsters += 1;
8862 }
8863 e_holsters += worn.empty_holsters();
8864 return e_holsters;
8865}
8866
8867int Character::used_holsters() const
8868{
8869 int e_holsters = 0;
8870 if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8871 e_holsters += weapon.get_used_holsters();
8872 }
8873 e_holsters += worn.used_holsters();
8874 return e_holsters;
8875}
8876
8877int Character::total_holsters() const
8878{
8879 int e_holsters = 0;
8880 if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8881 e_holsters += weapon.get_total_holsters();
8882 }
8883 e_holsters += worn.total_holsters();
8884 return e_holsters;
8885}
8886
8887units::volume Character::free_holster_volume() const
8888{
8889 units::volume holster_volume = 0_ml;
8890 if( weapon.is_holster() ) {
8891 holster_volume += weapon.get_total_holster_volume() - weapon.get_used_holster_volume();
8892 }
8893 holster_volume += worn.free_holster_volume();
8894 return holster_volume;
8895}
8896
8897units::volume Character::small_pocket_volume( const units::volume &threshold ) const
8898{
8899 units::volume small_spaces = 0_ml;
8900 if( weapon.get_total_capacity() <= threshold ) {
8901 small_spaces += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8902 }
8903 small_spaces += worn.small_pocket_volume( threshold );
8904 return small_spaces;
8905}
8906
8907units::volume Character::volume_capacity() const
8908{
8909 units::volume volume_capacity = 0_ml;
8910 volume_capacity += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8911 volume_capacity += worn.volume_capacity();
8912 return volume_capacity;
8913}
8914
8915units::volume Character::volume_capacity_with_tweaks( const
8916 std::vector<std::pair<item_location, int>>
8917 &locations ) const
8918{
8919 std::map<const item *, int> dropping;
8920 for( const std::pair<item_location, int> &location_pair : locations ) {
8921 dropping.emplace( location_pair.first.get_item(), location_pair.second );
8922 }
8923 return volume_capacity_with_tweaks( item_tweaks( { dropping } ) );
8924}
8925
8926units::volume Character::volume_capacity_with_tweaks( const item_tweaks &tweaks ) const
8927{
8928 const std::map<const item *, int> empty;
8929 const std::map<const item *, int> &without = tweaks.without_items ? tweaks.without_items->get() :
8930 empty;
8931
8932 units::volume volume_capacity = 0_ml;
8933
8934 if( !without.count( &weapon ) ) {
8935 volume_capacity += weapon.get_total_capacity();
8936 }
8937
8938 volume_capacity += worn.volume_capacity_with_tweaks( without );
8939
8940 return volume_capacity;
8941}
8942
8943units::volume Character::volume_carried() const
8944{
8945 return volume_capacity() - free_space();
8946}
8947
8948void Character::toggle_hauling()
8949{
8950 map &here = get_map();
8951
8952 if( hauling ) {
8953 stop_hauling();
8954 } else {
8955 std::vector<item_location> items = here.get_haulable_items( pos() );
8956 if( items.empty() ) {
8957 add_msg( m_info, _( "There are no items to haul here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There are no items to haul here."
) ) ) );
8958 return;
8959 }
8960 start_hauling( items );
8961 start_autohaul();
8962 }
8963}
8964
8965void Character::start_hauling( const std::vector<item_location> &items_to_haul = {} )
8966{
8967 map &here = get_map();
8968
8969 if( here.veh_at( pos() ) ) {
8970 add_msg( m_info, _( "You cannot haul inside vehicles." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot haul inside vehicles."
) ) ) );
8971 return;
8972 } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, pos() ) ) {
8973 add_msg( m_info, _( "You cannot haul while in deep water." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot haul while in deep water."
) ) ) );
8974 return;
8975 } else if( !here.can_put_items( pos() ) ) {
8976 add_msg( m_info, _( "You cannot haul items here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot haul items here."
) ) ) );
8977 return;
8978 }
8979
8980 add_msg( _( "You start hauling items along the ground." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You start hauling items along the ground."
) ) ) );
8981 if( is_armed() ) {
8982 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your hands are not free, which makes hauling slower." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your hands are not free, which makes hauling slower."
) ) ) );
8983 }
8984
8985 hauling = true;
8986 haul_list = items_to_haul;
8987}
8988
8989void Character::stop_hauling()
8990{
8991 if( hauling ) {
8992 add_msg( _( "You stop hauling items." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You stop hauling items." ) )
) );
8993 hauling = false;
8994 autohaul = false;
8995 haul_list.clear();
8996 }
8997 if( has_activity( ACT_MOVE_ITEMS ) ) {
8998 cancel_activity();
8999 }
9000}
9001
9002bool Character::is_hauling() const
9003{
9004 return hauling;
9005}
9006
9007void Character::start_autohaul()
9008{
9009 autohaul = true;
9010 if( !is_hauling() ) {
9011 start_hauling();
9012 }
9013}
9014
9015void Character::stop_autohaul()
9016{
9017 autohaul = false;
9018 if( haul_list.empty() ) {
9019 stop_hauling();
9020 }
9021}
9022
9023bool Character::is_autohauling() const
9024{
9025 return autohaul;
9026}
9027
9028bool Character::trim_haul_list( const std::vector<item_location> &valid_items )
9029{
9030 size_t qty_before = haul_list.size();
9031 haul_list.erase( std::remove_if( haul_list.begin(),
9032 haul_list.end(), [&valid_items]( const item_location & it ) {
9033 return std::count( valid_items.begin(), valid_items.end(), it ) == 0;
9034 } ), haul_list.end() );
9035
9036 return qty_before != haul_list.size();
9037}
9038
9039bool Character::knows_creature_type( const Creature *c ) const
9040{
9041 if( const monster *mon = dynamic_cast<const monster *>( c ) ) {
9042 return knows_creature_type( mon->type->id );
9043 }
9044 return false;
9045}
9046
9047bool Character::knows_creature_type( const mtype_id &c ) const
9048{
9049 return known_monsters.count( c ) > 0;
9050}
9051
9052void Character::set_knows_creature_type( const Creature *c )
9053{
9054 if( const monster *mon = dynamic_cast<const monster *>( c ) ) {
9055 set_knows_creature_type( mon->type->id );
9056 }
9057}
9058
9059void Character::set_knows_creature_type( const mtype_id &c )
9060{
9061 known_monsters.emplace( c );
9062}
9063
9064void Character::assign_activity( const activity_id &type, int moves, int index, int pos,
9065 const std::string &name )
9066{
9067 assign_activity( player_activity( type, moves, index, pos, name ) );
9068}
9069
9070void Character::assign_activity( const activity_actor &actor )
9071{
9072 assign_activity( player_activity( actor ) );
9073}
9074
9075void Character::assign_activity( const player_activity &act )
9076{
9077 bool resuming = false;
9078 if( !backlog.empty() && backlog.front().can_resume_with( act, *this ) ) {
9079 resuming = true;
9080 add_msg_if_player( _( "You resume your task." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You resume your task." ) ) ) );
9081 activity = backlog.front();
9082 backlog.pop_front();
9083 } else {
9084 if( activity ) {
9085 backlog.push_front( activity );
9086 }
9087
9088 activity = act;
9089 }
9090
9091 activity.start_or_resume( *this, resuming );
9092
9093 if( is_npc() ) {
9094 cancel_stashed_activity();
9095 npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( this );
9096 guy->set_attitude( NPCATT_ACTIVITY );
9097 guy->set_mission( NPC_MISSION_ACTIVITY );
9098 guy->current_activity_id = activity.id();
9099 }
9100}
9101
9102bool Character::has_activity( const activity_id &type ) const
9103{
9104 return activity.id() == type;
9105}
9106
9107bool Character::has_activity( const std::vector<activity_id> &types ) const
9108{
9109 return std::find( types.begin(), types.end(), activity.id() ) != types.end();
9110}
9111
9112void Character::cancel_activity()
9113{
9114 activity.canceled( *this );
9115 if( has_activity( ACT_MOVE_ITEMS ) && is_hauling() ) {
9116 stop_hauling();
9117 }
9118 // Clear any backlog items that aren't auto-resume.
9119 // but keep only one instance of ACT_ADV_INVENTORY
9120 // FIXME: this is required by the legacy code in advanced_inventory::move_all_items()
9121 bool has_adv_inv = has_activity( ACT_ADV_INVENTORY );
9122 for( auto backlog_item = backlog.begin(); backlog_item != backlog.end(); ) {
9123 if( backlog_item->auto_resume &&
9124 ( !has_adv_inv || backlog_item->id() != ACT_ADV_INVENTORY ) ) {
9125 has_adv_inv |= backlog_item->id() == ACT_ADV_INVENTORY;
9126 backlog_item++;
9127 } else {
9128 backlog_item = backlog.erase( backlog_item );
9129 }
9130 }
9131
9132 // act wait stamina interrupts an ongoing activity.
9133 // and automatically puts auto_resume = true on it
9134 // we don't want that to persist if there is another interruption.
9135 // and player moves elsewhere.
9136 if( has_activity( ACT_WAIT_STAMINA ) && !backlog.empty() &&
9137 backlog.front().auto_resume ) {
9138 backlog.front().auto_resume = false;
9139 }
9140 if( activity && activity.can_resume() ) {
9141 activity.allow_distractions();
9142 backlog.push_front( activity );
9143 }
9144 sfx::end_activity_sounds(); // kill activity sounds when canceled
9145 activity = player_activity();
9146}
9147
9148void Character::resume_backlog_activity()
9149{
9150 if( !backlog.empty() && backlog.front().auto_resume ) {
9151 activity = backlog.front();
9152 activity.auto_resume = false;
9153 activity.allow_distractions();
9154 backlog.pop_front();
9155 }
9156}
9157
9158void Character::fall_asleep()
9159{
9160 // Communicate to the player that he is using items on the floor
9161 std::string item_name = is_snuggling();
9162 if( item_name == "many" ) {
9163 if( one_in( 15 ) ) {
9164 add_msg_if_player( _( "You nestle into your pile of clothes for warmth." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You nestle into your pile of clothes for warmth."
) ) ) );
9165 } else {
9166 add_msg_if_player( _( "You use your pile of clothes for warmth." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You use your pile of clothes for warmth."
) ) ) );
9167 }
9168 } else if( item_name != "nothing" ) {
9169 if( one_in( 15 ) ) {
9170 add_msg_if_player( _( "You snuggle your %s to keep warm." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You snuggle your %s to keep warm."
) ) ), item_name );
9171 } else {
9172 add_msg_if_player( _( "You use your %s to keep warm." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You use your %s to keep warm."
) ) ), item_name );
9173 }
9174 }
9175 if( has_bionic( bio_sleep_shutdown ) ) {
9176 add_msg_if_player( _( "Sleep Mode activated. Disabling sensory response." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Sleep Mode activated. Disabling sensory response."
) ) ) );
9177 }
9178 if( has_active_mutation( trait_HIBERNATE ) &&
9179 get_kcal_percent() > 0.8f ) {
9180 if( is_avatar() ) {
9181 get_memorial().add( pgettext( "memorial_male", "Entered hibernation." ),
9182 pgettext( "memorial_female", "Entered hibernation." ) );
9183 }
9184 // some days worth of round-the-clock Snooze. Cata seasons default to 91 days.
9185 fall_asleep( 10_days );
9186 // If you're not fatigued enough for 10 days, you won't sleep the whole thing.
9187 // In practice, the fatigue from filling the tank from (no msg) to Time For Bed
9188 // will last about 8 days.
9189 } else {
9190 fall_asleep( 10_hours ); // default max sleep time.
9191 }
9192}
9193
9194void Character::fall_asleep( const time_duration &duration )
9195{
9196 if( activity ) {
9197 if( activity.id() == ACT_TRY_SLEEP ) {
9198 activity.set_to_null();
9199 } else {
9200 cancel_activity();
9201 }
9202 }
9203 add_effect( effect_sleep, duration );
9204 get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_falls_asleep>( getID(), to_seconds<int>( duration ) );
9205}
9206
9207void Character::migrate_items_to_storage( bool disintegrate )
9208{
9209 inv->visit_items( [&]( const item * it, item * ) {
9210 if( disintegrate ) {
9211 if( try_add( *it, /*avoid=*/nullptr, it ) == item_location::nowhere ) {
9212 std::string profession_id = prof->ident().str();
9213 debugmsg( "ERROR: Could not put %s (%s) into inventory. Check if the "realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "9215", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ERROR: Could not put %s (%s) into inventory. Check if the "
"profession (%s) has enough space.", it->tname(), it->
typeId().str(), profession_id)
9214 "profession (%s) has enough space.",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "9215", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ERROR: Could not put %s (%s) into inventory. Check if the "
"profession (%s) has enough space.", it->tname(), it->
typeId().str(), profession_id)
9215 it->tname(), it->typeId().str(), profession_id )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "9215", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ERROR: Could not put %s (%s) into inventory. Check if the "
"profession (%s) has enough space.", it->tname(), it->
typeId().str(), profession_id);
9216 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
9217 }
9218 } else {
9219 item_location added = i_add( *it, true, /*avoid=*/nullptr,
9220 it, /*allow_drop=*/false, /*allow_wield=*/!has_wield_conflicts( *it ) );
9221 if( added == item_location::nowhere ) {
9222 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { *it } );
9223 }
9224 }
9225 return VisitResponse::SKIP;
9226 } );
9227 inv->clear();
9228}
9229
9230std::string Character::is_snuggling() const
9231{
9232 map &here = get_map();
9233 map_stack items_here = here.i_at( pos() );
9234 item_stack::const_iterator begin = items_here.begin();
9235 item_stack::const_iterator end = items_here.end();
9236
9237 if( in_vehicle ) {
9238 if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( pos() ).cargo() ) {
9239 const vehicle_stack vs = ovp->items();
9240 begin = vs.begin();
9241 end = vs.end();
9242 }
9243 }
9244 const item *floor_armor = nullptr;
9245 int ticker = 0;
9246
9247 // If there are no items on the floor, return nothing
9248 if( begin == end ) {
9249 return "nothing";
9250 }
9251
9252 for( auto candidate = begin; candidate != end; ++candidate ) {
9253 if( !candidate->is_armor() ) {
9254 continue;
9255 } else if( candidate->volume() > 250_ml && candidate->get_warmth() > 0 &&
9256 ( candidate->covers( body_part_torso ) || candidate->covers( body_part_leg_l ) ||
9257 candidate->covers( body_part_leg_r ) ) ) {
9258 floor_armor = &*candidate;
9259 ticker++;
9260 }
9261 }
9262
9263 if( ticker == 0 ) {
9264 return "nothing";
9265 } else if( ticker == 1 ) {
9266 return floor_armor->type_name();
9267 } else if( ticker > 1 ) {
9268 return "many";
9269 }
9270
9271 return "nothing";
9272}
9273
9274// If the player is not wielding anything big, check if hands can be put in pockets
9275bool Character::can_use_pockets() const
9276{
9277 // TODO Check that the pocket actually has enough space for the wielded item?
9278 return weapon.volume() < 500_ml;
9279}
9280
9281// If the player's head is not encumbered, check if hood can be put up
9282bool Character::can_use_hood() const
9283{
9284 return encumb( body_part_head ) < 10;
9285}
9286
9287// If the player's mouth is not encumbered, check if collar can be put up
9288bool Character::can_use_collar() const
9289{
9290 return encumb( body_part_mouth ) < 10;
9291}
9292
9293std::map<bodypart_id, int> Character::bonus_item_warmth() const
9294{
9295 const int pocket_warmth = worn.pocket_warmth();
9296 const int hood_warmth = worn.hood_warmth();
9297 const int collar_warmth = worn.collar_warmth();
9298
9299 std::map<bodypart_id, int> ret;
9300 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
9301 ret.emplace( bp, 0 );
9302
9303 if( ( bp == body_part_hand_l || bp == body_part_hand_r ) && can_use_pockets() ) {
9304 ret[bp] += pocket_warmth;
9305 }
9306
9307 if( bp == body_part_head && can_use_hood() ) {
9308 ret[bp] += hood_warmth;
9309 }
9310
9311 if( bp == body_part_mouth && can_use_collar() ) {
9312 ret[bp] += collar_warmth;
9313 }
9314 }
9315
9316 return ret;
9317}
9318
9319bool Character::can_use_floor_warmth() const
9320{
9321 return in_sleep_state() ||
9322 has_activity( ACT_WAIT ) ||
9323 has_activity( ACT_WAIT_NPC ) ||
9324 has_activity( ACT_WAIT_STAMINA ) ||
9325 has_activity( ACT_AUTODRIVE ) ||
9326 has_activity( ACT_READ ) ||
9327 has_activity( ACT_SOCIALIZE ) ||
9328 has_activity( ACT_MEDITATE ) ||
9329 has_activity( ACT_FISH ) ||
9330 has_activity( ACT_GAME ) ||
9331 has_activity( ACT_HAND_CRANK ) ||
9332 has_activity( ACT_HEATING ) ||
9333 has_activity( ACT_VIBE ) ||
9334 has_activity( ACT_TRY_SLEEP ) ||
9335 has_activity( ACT_OPERATION ) ||
9336 has_activity( ACT_TREE_COMMUNION ) ||
9337 has_activity( ACT_EAT_MENU ) ||
9338 has_activity( ACT_CONSUME_FOOD_MENU ) ||
9339 has_activity( ACT_CONSUME_DRINK_MENU ) ||
9340 has_activity( ACT_CONSUME_MEDS_MENU ) ||
9341 has_activity( ACT_VIEW_RECIPE ) ||
9342 has_activity( ACT_STUDY_SPELL );
9343}
9344
9345units::temperature_delta Character::floor_bedding_warmth( const tripoint &pos )
9346{
9347 map &here = get_map();
9348 const trap &trap_at_pos = here.tr_at( pos );
9349 const ter_id ter_at_pos = here.ter( pos );
9350 const furn_id furn_at_pos = here.furn( pos );
9351
9352 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pos );
9353 const std::optional<vpart_reference> boardable = vp.part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true );
9354 // Search the floor for bedding
9355 if( furn_at_pos != f_null ) {
9356 return furn_at_pos.obj().floor_bedding_warmth;
9357 } else if( !trap_at_pos.is_null() ) {
9358 return trap_at_pos.floor_bedding_warmth;
9359 } else if( boardable ) {
9360 return boardable->info().floor_bedding_warmth;
9361 } else {
9362 return ter_at_pos.obj().floor_bedding_warmth - 4_C_delta;
9363 }
9364}
9365
9366units::temperature_delta Character::floor_item_warmth( const tripoint &pos )
9367{
9368 units::temperature_delta item_warmth = 0_C_delta;
9369
9370 const auto warm = [&item_warmth]( const auto & stack ) {
9371 for( const item &elem : stack ) {
9372 if( !elem.is_armor() ) {
9373 continue;
9374 }
9375 // Items that are big enough and covers the torso are used to keep warm.
9376 // Smaller items don't do as good a job
9377 if( elem.volume() > 250_ml &&
9378 ( elem.covers( body_part_torso ) || elem.covers( body_part_leg_l ) ||
9379 elem.covers( body_part_leg_r ) ) ) {
9380 item_warmth += 0.12_C_delta * elem.get_warmth() * ( elem.volume() / 2500_ml );
9381 }
9382 }
9383 };
9384
9385 map &here = get_map();
9386
9387 if( const optional_vpart_position veh_here = here.veh_at( pos ) ) {
9388 if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = veh_here.cargo() ) {
9389 warm( ovp->items() );
9390 }
9391 } else {
9392 warm( here.i_at( pos ) );
9393 }
9394 return item_warmth;
9395}
9396
9397units::temperature_delta Character::floor_warmth( const tripoint &pos ) const
9398{
9399 const units::temperature_delta item_warmth = floor_item_warmth( pos );
9400 units::temperature_delta bedding_warmth = floor_bedding_warmth( pos );
9401
9402 // If the PC has fur, etc, that will apply too
9403 const units::temperature_delta floor_mut_warmth = bodytemp_modifier_traits_floor();
9404 // DOWN does not provide floor insulation, though.
9405 // Better-than-light fur or being in one's shell does.
9406 if( ( !has_trait( trait_DOWN ) ) && ( floor_mut_warmth >= 2_C_delta ) ) {
9407 bedding_warmth = std::max( 0_C_delta, bedding_warmth );
9408 }
9409 return item_warmth + bedding_warmth + floor_mut_warmth;
9410}
9411
9412units::temperature_delta Character::bodytemp_modifier_traits( bool overheated ) const
9413{
9414 units::temperature_delta mod = 0_C_delta;
9415 for( const trait_id &iter : get_mutations() ) {
9416 mod += overheated ? iter->bodytemp_min : iter->bodytemp_max;
9417 }
9418 return mod;
9419}
9420
9421units::temperature_delta Character::bodytemp_modifier_traits_floor() const
9422{
9423 units::temperature_delta mod = 0_C_delta;
9424 for( const trait_id &iter : get_mutations() ) {
9425 mod += iter->bodytemp_sleep;
9426 }
9427 return mod;
9428}
9429
9430units::temperature Character::temp_corrected_by_climate_control( units::temperature temperature,
9431 int heat_strength, int chill_strength ) const
9432{
9433 const units::temperature_delta base_variation = BODYTEMP_NORM - 27_C;
9434 const units::temperature_delta variation_heat = base_variation * ( heat_strength / 100.0f );
9435 const units::temperature_delta variation_chill = -base_variation * ( chill_strength / 100.0f );
9436
9437 if( temperature > BODYTEMP_NORM ) {
9438 return std::max( BODYTEMP_NORM, temperature + variation_chill );
9439 } else {
9440 return std::min( BODYTEMP_NORM, temperature + variation_heat );
9441 }
9442}
9443
9444bool Character::in_sleep_state() const
9445{
9446 return Creature::in_sleep_state() || activity.id() == ACT_TRY_SLEEP;
9447}
9448
9449void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const itype_id &type,
9450 const std::function<void( item & )> &do_func )
9451{
9452 cache_visit_items_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, do_func );
9453}
9454
9455void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9456 const std::function<void( item & )> &do_func )
9457{
9458 cache_visit_items_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr, do_func );
9459}
9460
9461void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const std::string &key, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9462 const std::function<void( item & )> &do_func )
9463{
9464 cache_visit_items_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, do_func );
9465}
9466
9467void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const std::string &key, const itype_id &type,
9468 const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9469 const std::function<void( item & )> &do_func )
9470{
9471 // If the cache already exists, use it. Remove all invalid item references.
9472 auto found_cache = inv_search_caches.find( key );
9473 if( found_cache != inv_search_caches.end() ) {
9474 inv_search_caches[key].items.erase( std::remove_if( inv_search_caches[key].items.begin(),
9475 inv_search_caches[key].items.end(), [&do_func]( const safe_reference<item> &it ) {
9476 if( it ) {
9477 do_func( *it );
9478 return false;
9479 }
9480 return true;
9481 } ), inv_search_caches[key].items.end() );
9482 return;
9483 } else {
9484 // Otherwise, add a new cache and populate with all appropriate items in the inventory. Empty lists are still created.
9485 inv_search_caches[key].type = type;
9486 inv_search_caches[key].type_flag = type_flag;
9487 inv_search_caches[key].filter_func = filter_func;
9488 visit_items( [&]( item * it, item * ) {
9489 if( ( !type.is_valid() || it->typeId() == type ) &&
9490 ( !type_flag.is_valid() || it->type->has_flag( type_flag ) ) &&
9491 ( filter_func == nullptr || ( it->*filter_func )() ) ) {
9492
9493 inv_search_caches[key].items.push_back( it->get_safe_reference() );
9494 do_func( *it );
9495 }
9496 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
9497 } );
9498 }
9499}
9500
9501void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const itype_id &type,
9502 const std::function<void( const item & )> &do_func ) const
9503{
9504 cache_visit_items_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, do_func );
9505}
9506
9507void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9508 const std::function<void( const item & )> &do_func ) const
9509{
9510 cache_visit_items_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr, do_func );
9511}
9512
9513void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const std::string &key, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9514 const std::function<void( const item & )> &do_func ) const
9515{
9516 cache_visit_items_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, do_func );
9517}
9518
9519void Character::cache_visit_items_with( const std::string &key, const itype_id &type,
9520 const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9521 const std::function<void( const item & )> &do_func ) const
9522{
9523 // If the cache already exists, use it. Remove all invalid item references.
9524 auto found_cache = inv_search_caches.find( key );
9525 if( found_cache != inv_search_caches.end() ) {
9526 inv_search_caches[key].items.erase( std::remove_if( inv_search_caches[key].items.begin(),
9527 inv_search_caches[key].items.end(), [&do_func]( const safe_reference<item> &it ) {
9528 if( it ) {
9529 do_func( *it );
9530 return false;
9531 }
9532 return true;
9533 } ), inv_search_caches[key].items.end() );
9534 return;
9535 } else {
9536 // Otherwise, add a new cache and populate with all appropriate items in the inventory. Empty lists are still created.
9537 inv_search_caches[key].type = type;
9538 inv_search_caches[key].type_flag = type_flag;
9539 inv_search_caches[key].filter_func = filter_func;
9540 visit_items( [&]( item * it, item * ) {
9541 if( ( !type.is_valid() || it->typeId() == type ) &&
9542 ( !type_flag.is_valid() || it->type->has_flag( type_flag ) ) &&
9543 ( filter_func == nullptr || ( it->*filter_func )() ) ) {
9544
9545 inv_search_caches[key].items.push_back( it->get_safe_reference() );
9546 do_func( *it );
9547 }
9548 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
9549 } );
9550 }
9551}
9552
9553bool Character::cache_has_item_with( const itype_id &type,
9554 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9555{
9556 return cache_has_item_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, check_func );
9557}
9558
9559bool Character::cache_has_item_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9560 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9561{
9562 return cache_has_item_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr, check_func );
9563}
9564
9565bool Character::cache_has_item_with( const std::string &key, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9566 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9567{
9568 return cache_has_item_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, check_func );
9569}
9570
9571bool Character::cache_has_item_with( const std::string &key, const itype_id &type,
9572 const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9573 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9574{
9575 bool aborted = false;
9576
9577 // If the cache already exists, use it. Stop iterating if the check_func ever returns true. Remove any invalid item references encountered.
9578 auto found_cache = inv_search_caches.find( key );
9579 if( found_cache != inv_search_caches.end() ) {
9580 for( auto iter = found_cache->second.items.begin();
9581 iter != found_cache->second.items.end(); ) {
9582 if( *iter ) {
9583 if( check_func( **iter ) ) {
9584 aborted = true;
9585 break;
9586 }
9587 ++iter;
9588 } else {
9589 iter = inv_search_caches[found_cache->first].items.erase( iter );
9590 }
9591 }
9592 } else {
9593 // Otherwise, add a new cache and populate with all appropriate items in the inventory. Empty lists are still created.
9594 inv_search_caches[key].type = type;
9595 inv_search_caches[key].type_flag = type_flag;
9596 inv_search_caches[key].filter_func = filter_func;
9597 visit_items( [&]( item * it, item * ) {
9598 if( ( !type.is_valid() || it->typeId() == type ) &&
9599 ( !type_flag.is_valid() || it->type->has_flag( type_flag ) ) &&
9600 ( filter_func == nullptr || ( it->*filter_func )() ) ) {
9601
9602 inv_search_caches[key].items.push_back( it->get_safe_reference() );
9603 // If check_func returns true, stop running it but keep populating the cache.
9604 if( !aborted && check_func( *it ) ) {
9605 aborted = true;
9606 }
9607 }
9608 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
9609 } );
9610 }
9611 return aborted;
9612}
9613
9614bool Character::has_item_with_flag( const flag_id &flag, bool need_charges ) const
9615{
9616 return has_item_with( [&flag, &need_charges, this]( const item & it ) {
9617 return it.has_flag( flag ) && ( !need_charges || !it.is_tool() ||
9618 it.type->tool->max_charges == 0 || it.ammo_remaining( this ) > 0 );
9619 } );
9620}
9621
9622bool Character::cache_has_item_with_flag( const flag_id &type_flag, bool need_charges ) const
9623{
9624 return cache_has_item_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr,
9625 [this, &need_charges]( const item & it ) {
9626 return !need_charges || !it.is_tool() || it.type->tool->max_charges == 0 ||
9627 it.ammo_remaining( this ) > 0;
9628 } );
9629}
9630
9631std::vector<item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const itype_id &type,
9632 const std::function<bool( item & )> &do_and_check_func )
9633{
9634 return cache_get_items_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, do_and_check_func );
9635}
9636
9637std::vector<item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9638 const std::function<bool( item & )> &do_and_check_func )
9639{
9640 return cache_get_items_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr,
9641 do_and_check_func );
9642}
9643
9644std::vector<item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const std::string &key,
9645 bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9646 const std::function<bool( item & )> &do_and_check_func )
9647{
9648 return cache_get_items_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, do_and_check_func );
9649}
9650
9651std::vector<item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const std::string &key, const itype_id &type,
9652 const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9653 const std::function<bool( item & )> &do_and_check_func )
9654{
9655 std::vector<item *> ret;
9656 cache_visit_items_with( key, type, type_flag, filter_func, [&ret, &do_and_check_func]( item & it ) {
9657 if( do_and_check_func( it ) ) {
9658 ret.push_back( &it );
9659 }
9660 } );
9661 return ret;
9662}
9663
9664std::vector<const item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const itype_id &type,
9665 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9666{
9667 return cache_get_items_with( "HAS TYPE " + type.str(), type, {}, nullptr, check_func );
9668}
9669
9670std::vector<const item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const flag_id &type_flag,
9671 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9672{
9673 return cache_get_items_with( "HAS FLAG " + type_flag.str(), {}, type_flag, nullptr, check_func );
9674}
9675
9676std::vector<const item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const std::string &key,
9677 bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9678 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9679{
9680 return cache_get_items_with( key, {}, {}, filter_func, check_func );
9681}
9682
9683std::vector<const item *> Character::cache_get_items_with( const std::string &key,
9684 const itype_id &type, const flag_id &type_flag, bool( item::*filter_func )() const,
9685 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &check_func ) const
9686{
9687 std::vector<const item *> ret;
9688 cache_visit_items_with( key, type, type_flag, filter_func, [&ret, &check_func]( const item & it ) {
9689 if( check_func( it ) ) {
9690 ret.push_back( &it );
9691 }
9692 } );
9693 return ret;
9694}
9695
9696void Character::add_to_inv_search_caches( item &it ) const
9697{
9698 for( auto &cache : inv_search_caches ) {
9699 if( ( cache.second.type.is_valid() && it.typeId() != cache.second.type ) ||
9700 ( cache.second.type_flag.is_valid() && !it.type->has_flag( cache.second.type_flag ) ) ||
9701 ( cache.second.filter_func && !( it.*cache.second.filter_func )() ) ) {
9702 continue;
9703 }
9704
9705 // If item is already in the cache, remove it so it can be re-added in its current state.
9706 for( auto iter = cache.second.items.begin(); iter != cache.second.items.end(); ) {
9707 if( *iter && iter->get() == &it ) {
9708 iter = inv_search_caches[cache.first].items.erase( iter );
9709 } else {
9710 ++iter;
9711 }
9712 }
9713
9714 cache.second.items.push_back( it.get_safe_reference() );
9715 }
9716}
9717
9718bool Character::has_charges( const itype_id &it, int quantity,
9719 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter ) const
9720{
9721 if( it == itype_fire || it == itype_apparatus ) {
9722 return has_fire( quantity );
9723 }
9724 return charges_of( it, quantity, filter ) == quantity;
9725}
9726
9727std::list<item> Character::use_amount( const itype_id &it, int quantity,
9728 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter, bool select_ind )
9729{
9730 std::list<item> ret;
9731 if( select_ind && !it->count_by_charges() ) {
9732 std::vector<item *> tmp = items_with( [&it, &filter]( const item & itm ) -> bool {
9733 return filter( itm ) && itm.typeId() == it;
9734 } );
9735 while( quantity != static_cast<int>( tmp.size() ) && quantity > 0 && !tmp.empty() ) {
9736 uilist imenu;
9737 //~ Select components from inventory to consume. %d = number of components left to consume.
9738 imenu.title = string_format( _( "Select which component to use (%d left)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select which component to use (%d left)"
) ) ), quantity );
9739 for( const item *itm : tmp ) {
9740 imenu.addentry( itm->display_name() );
9741 }
9742 imenu.query();
9743 if( imenu.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( imenu.ret ) >= tmp.size() ) {
9744 break;
9745 }
9746 if( tmp[imenu.ret]->use_amount( it, quantity, ret, filter ) ) {
9747 remove_item( *tmp[imenu.ret] );
9748 }
9749 tmp.erase( tmp.begin() + imenu.ret );
9750 }
9751 }
9752 if( quantity > 0 && weapon.use_amount( it, quantity, ret ) ) {
9753 remove_weapon();
9754 }
9755 ret = worn.use_amount( it, quantity, ret, filter, *this );
9756
9757 if( quantity <= 0 ) {
9758 return ret;
9759 }
9760 std::list<item> tmp = inv->use_amount( it, quantity, filter );
9761 ret.splice( ret.end(), tmp );
9762 return ret;
9763}
9764
9765bool Character::use_charges_if_avail( const itype_id &it, int quantity )
9766{
9767 if( has_charges( it, quantity ) ) {
9768 use_charges( it, quantity );
9769 return true;
9770 }
9771 return false;
9772}
9773
9774units::energy Character::available_ups() const
9775{
9776 units::energy available_charges = 0_kJ;
9777
9778 if( is_mounted() && mounted_creature.get()->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
9779 auto *mons = mounted_creature.get();
9780 available_charges += units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>
9781 ( mons->battery_item->ammo_remaining() ) );
9782 }
9783
9784 bool has_bio_powered_ups = false;
9785 cache_visit_items_with( flag_IS_UPS, [&has_bio_powered_ups]( const item & it ) {
9786 if( it.has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) && !has_bio_powered_ups ) {
9787 has_bio_powered_ups = true;
9788 }
9789 } );
9790 if( has_active_bionic( bio_ups ) || has_bio_powered_ups ) {
9791 available_charges += get_power_level();
9792 }
9793
9794 cache_visit_items_with( flag_IS_UPS, [&available_charges]( const item & it ) {
9795 available_charges += units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( it.ammo_remaining() ) );
9796 } );
9797
9798 return available_charges;
9799}
9800
9801units::energy Character::consume_ups( units::energy qty, const int radius )
9802{
9803 const units::energy wanted_qty = qty;
9804
9805 // UPS from mounted mech
9806 if( qty != 0_kJ && is_mounted() && mounted_creature.get()->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
9807 mounted_creature.get()->battery_item ) {
9808 auto *mons = mounted_creature.get();
9809 qty -= mons->use_mech_power( qty );
9810 }
9811
9812 // UPS from bionic
9813 bool has_bio_powered_ups = false;
9814 cache_visit_items_with( flag_IS_UPS, [&has_bio_powered_ups]( const item & it ) {
9815 if( it.has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) && !has_bio_powered_ups ) {
9816 has_bio_powered_ups = true;
9817 }
9818 } );
9819 if( qty != 0_kJ && has_power() && ( has_active_bionic( bio_ups ) || has_bio_powered_ups ) ) {
9820 units::energy bio = std::min( get_power_level(), qty );
9821 mod_power_level( -bio );
9822 qty -= std::min( qty, bio );
9823 }
9824
9825 // UPS from inventory
9826 if( qty != 0_kJ ) {
9827 cache_visit_items_with( flag_IS_UPS, [&qty]( item & it ) {
9828 if( it.is_tool() && it.type->tool->fuel_efficiency >= 0 ) {
9829 qty -= it.energy_consume( qty, tripoint_zero, nullptr,
9830 it.type->tool->fuel_efficiency );
9831 } else {
9832 qty -= it.energy_consume( qty, tripoint_zero, nullptr );
9833 }
9834 } );
9835 }
9836
9837 // UPS from nearby map
9838 if( qty != 0_kJ && radius > 0 ) {
9839 qty -= get_map().consume_ups( pos(), radius, qty );
9840 }
9841
9842 return wanted_qty - qty;
9843}
9844
9845std::list<item> Character::use_charges( const itype_id &what, int qty, const int radius,
9846 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter, bool in_tools )
9847{
9848 std::list<item> res;
9849 inventory inv = crafting_inventory( pos(), radius, true );
9850
9851 if( qty <= 0 ) {
9852 return res;
9853 }
9854
9855 if( what == itype_fire ) {
9856 use_fire( qty );
9857 return res;
9858
9859 } else if( what == itype_UPS ) {
9860 // Fairly sure that nothing comes here. But handle it anyways.
9861 debugmsg( _( "This UPS use needs updating. Create issue on github." ) )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "9861", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ( ( []( const auto & arg )
{ static auto cache = detail::get_local_translation_cache( arg
); return cache( arg ); } )( translation_argument_identity( "This UPS use needs updating. Create issue on github."
) ) ));
9862 consume_ups( units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( qty ) ), radius );
9863 return res;
9864 }
9865
9866 std::vector<item *> del;
9867
9868 bool has_tool_with_UPS = false;
9869 // Detection of UPS tool
9870 inv.visit_items( [ &what, &qty, &has_tool_with_UPS, &filter]( item * e, item * ) {
9871 if( filter( *e ) && e->typeId() == what && e->has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
9872 has_tool_with_UPS = true;
9873 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
9874 }
9875 return qty > 0 ? VisitResponse::NEXT : VisitResponse::ABORT;
9876 } );
9877
9878 if( radius >= 0 ) {
9879 get_map().use_charges( pos(), radius, what, qty, return_true<item>, nullptr, in_tools );
9880 }
9881 if( qty > 0 ) {
9882 visit_items( [this, &what, &qty, &res, &del, &filter, &in_tools]( item * e, item * ) {
9883 if( e->use_charges( what, qty, res, pos(), filter, this, in_tools ) ) {
9884 del.push_back( e );
9885 }
9886 return qty > 0 ? VisitResponse::NEXT : VisitResponse::ABORT;
9887 } );
9888 }
9889
9890 for( item *e : del ) {
9891 remove_item( *e );
9892 }
9893
9894 if( has_tool_with_UPS ) {
9895 consume_ups( units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( qty ) ), radius );
9896 }
9897
9898 return res;
9899}
9900
9901std::list<item> Character::use_charges( const itype_id &what, int qty,
9902 const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter )
9903{
9904 return use_charges( what, qty, -1, filter );
9905}
9906
9907item Character::find_firestarter_with_charges( const int quantity ) const
9908{
9909 item ret;
9910 cache_has_item_with( flag_FIRESTARTER, [&]( const item & it ) {
9911 if( !it.typeId()->can_have_charges() ) {
9912 const use_function *usef = it.type->get_use( "firestarter" );
9913 if( usef != nullptr && usef->get_actor_ptr() != nullptr ) {
9914 const firestarter_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
9915 if( actor->can_use( *this->as_character(), it, tripoint_zero ).success() ) {
9916 ret = it;
9917 return true;
9918 }
9919 }
9920 } else if( it.ammo_sufficient( this, quantity ) ) {
9921 ret = it;
9922 return true;
9923 }
9924 return false;
9925 } );
9926 return ret;
9927}
9928
9929bool Character::has_fire( const int quantity ) const
9930{
9931 // TODO: Replace this with a "tool produces fire" flag.
9932
9933 if( get_map().has_nearby_fire( pos() ) ) {
9934 return true;
9935 }
9936 if( cache_has_item_with( flag_FIRE ) ) {
9937 return true;
9938 }
9939 if( !find_firestarter_with_charges( quantity ).is_null() ) {
9940 return true;
9941 }
9942 if( is_npc() ) {
9943 // HACK: A hack to make NPCs use their Molotovs
9944 return true;
9945 }
9946
9947 return false;
9948}
9949
9950void Character::mod_painkiller( int npkill )
9951{
9952 set_painkiller( pkill + npkill );
9953}
9954
9955void Character::set_painkiller( int npkill )
9956{
9957 npkill = std::max( npkill, 0 );
9958 if( pkill != npkill ) {
9959 const int prev_pain = get_perceived_pain();
9960 pkill = npkill;
9961 on_stat_change( "pkill", pkill );
9962 const int cur_pain = get_perceived_pain();
9963
9964 if( cur_pain != prev_pain ) {
9965 react_to_felt_pain( cur_pain - prev_pain );
9966 on_stat_change( "perceived_pain", cur_pain );
9967 }
9968 }
9969}
9970
9971int Character::get_painkiller() const
9972{
9973 return pkill;
9974}
9975
9976void Character::clear_moncams()
9977{
9978 moncams.clear();
9979}
9980
9981void Character::remove_moncam( const mtype_id &moncam_id )
9982{
9983 moncams.erase( moncam_id );
9984}
9985
9986void Character::add_moncam( const std::pair<mtype_id, int> &moncam )
9987{
9988 moncams.insert( moncam );
9989}
9990
9991void Character::set_moncams( std::map<mtype_id, int> nmoncams )
9992{
9993 moncams = std::move( nmoncams );
9994}
9995
9996std::map<mtype_id, int> const &Character::get_moncams() const
9997{
9998 return moncams;
9999}
10000
10001Character::moncam_cache_t Character::get_active_moncams() const
10002{
10003 moncam_cache_t ret;
10004 for( monster const &mon : g->all_monsters() ) {
10005 for( std::pair<mtype_id, int> const moncam : get_moncams() ) {
10006 if( mon.type->id == moncam.first && mon.friendly != 0 &&
10007 rl_dist( get_avatar().get_location(), mon.get_location() ) < moncam.second ) {
10008 ret.insert( { &mon, mon.get_location() } );
10009 }
10010 }
10011 }
10012 return ret;
10013}
10014
10015void Character::use_fire( const int quantity )
10016{
10017 //Okay, so checks for nearby fires first,
10018 //then held lit torch or candle, bionic tool/lighter/laser
10019 //tries to use 1 charge of lighters, matches, flame throwers
10020 //If there is enough power, will use power of one activation of the bio_lighter, bio_tools and bio_laser
10021 // (home made, military), hotplate, welder in that order.
10022 // bio_lighter, bio_laser, bio_tools, has_active_bionic("bio_tools"
10023
10024 if( get_map().has_nearby_fire( pos() ) ) {
10025 return;
10026 }
10027 if( cache_has_item_with( flag_FIRE ) ) {
10028 return;
