10029 }
10030
10031 const item firestarter = find_firestarter_with_charges( quantity );
10032 if( firestarter.is_null() ) {
10033 return;
10034 }
10035 if( firestarter.type->has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
10036 mod_power_level( -quantity * 5_kJ );
10037 return;
10038 }
10039 if( firestarter.ammo_sufficient( this, quantity ) ) {
10040 use_charges( firestarter.typeId(), quantity );
10041 return;
10042 }
10043}
10044
10045int Character::heartrate_bpm() const
10046{
10047 //Dead have no heartbeat usually and no heartbeat in omnicell
10048 if( is_dead_state() || has_trait( trait_SLIMESPAWNER ) ) {
10049 return 0;
10050 }
10051
10052 int average_heartbeat = avg_nat_bpm * get_heartrate_index();
10053
10054 // minor moment-to-moment variation
10055 average_heartbeat += rng( -5, 5 );
10056
10057 //Chemical imbalance makes this less predictable. It's possible this range needs tweaking
10058 if( has_trait( trait_CHEMIMBALANCE ) ) {
10059 average_heartbeat += rng( -15, 15 );
10060 }
10061
10062 return average_heartbeat;
10063}
10064
10065void Character::on_worn_item_washed( const item &it )
10066{
10067 if( is_worn( it ) ) {
10068 morale->on_worn_item_washed( it );
10069 }
10070}
10071
10072void Character::on_worn_item_soiled( const item &it )
10073{
10074 if( is_worn( it ) ) {
10075 morale->on_worn_item_soiled( it );
10076 }
10077}
10078
10079
10080void Character::on_item_wear( const item &it )
10081{
10082 invalidate_inventory_validity_cache();
10083 invalidate_leak_level_cache();
10084 for( const trait_id &mut : it.mutations_from_wearing( *this ) ) {
10085 // flag these mutations to be added at the start of the next turn
10086 // without doing this you still count as wearing the item providing
10087 // the traits so most the calcs don't work in mutation_loss_effect
10088 mutations_to_add.push_back( mut );
10089 }
10090 morale->on_item_wear( it );
10091}
10092
10093void Character::on_item_takeoff( const item &it )
10094{
10095 invalidate_inventory_validity_cache();
10096 invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
10097 invalidate_leak_level_cache();
10098 for( const trait_id &mut : it.mutations_from_wearing( *this, true ) ) {
10099 // flag these mutations to be removed at the start of the next turn
10100 // without doing this you still count as wearing the item providing
10101 // the traitssdd so most the calcs don't work in mutation_loss_effect
10102 mutations_to_remove.push_back( mut );
10103
10104 }
10105 morale->on_item_takeoff( it );
10106}
10107
10108void Character::enchantment_wear_change()
10109{
10110 recalc_sight_limits();
10111 calc_encumbrance();
10112 if( get_stamina() > get_stamina_max() ) {
10113 set_stamina( get_stamina_max() );
10114 }
10115}
10116
10117void Character::on_item_acquire( const item &it )
10118{
10119 bool check_for_zoom = is_avatar();
10120 bool update_overmap_seen = false;
10121
10122 it.visit_items( [this, &check_for_zoom, &update_overmap_seen]( item * cont_it, item * ) {
10123 add_to_inv_search_caches( *cont_it );
10124 if( check_for_zoom && !update_overmap_seen && cont_it->has_flag( flag_ZOOM ) ) {
10125 update_overmap_seen = true;
10126 }
10127 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
10128 } );
10129
10130 invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
10131
10132 if( update_overmap_seen ) {
10133 g->update_overmap_seen();
10134 }
10135}
10136
10137void Character::on_effect_int_change( const efftype_id &eid, int intensity,
10138 const bodypart_id &bp )
10139{
10140 // Adrenaline can reduce perceived pain (or increase it when you enter comedown).
10141 // See @ref get_perceived_pain()
10142 if( eid == effect_adrenaline ) {
10143 // Note that calling this does no harm if it wasn't changed.
10144 on_stat_change( "perceived_pain", get_perceived_pain() );
10145 }
10146
10147 morale->on_effect_int_change( eid, intensity, bp );
10148}
10149
10150void Character::on_mutation_gain( const trait_id &mid )
10151{
10152 morale->on_mutation_gain( mid );
10153 magic->on_mutation_gain( mid, *this );
10154 update_type_of_scent( mid );
10155 recalculate_enchantment_cache(); // mutations can have enchantments
10156 effect_on_conditions::process_reactivate( *this );
10157 if( is_avatar() ) {
10158 as_avatar()->character_mood_face( true );
10159 }
10160}
10161
10162void Character::on_mutation_loss( const trait_id &mid )
10163{
10164 morale->on_mutation_loss( mid );
10165 magic->on_mutation_loss( mid );
10166 update_type_of_scent( mid, false );
10167 recalculate_enchantment_cache(); // mutations can have enchantments
10168 effect_on_conditions::process_reactivate( *this );
10169 if( is_avatar() ) {
10170 as_avatar()->character_mood_face( true );
10171 }
10172}
10173
10174void Character::on_stat_change( const std::string &stat, int value )
10175{
10176 morale->on_stat_change( stat, value );
10177}
10178
10179bool Character::has_opposite_trait( const trait_id &flag ) const
10180{
10181 return !get_opposite_traits( flag ).empty();
10182}
10183
10184std::unordered_set<trait_id> Character::get_opposite_traits( const trait_id &flag ) const
10185{
10186 std::unordered_set<trait_id> traits;
10187 for( const trait_id &i : flag->cancels ) {
10188 if( has_trait( i ) ) {
10189 traits.insert( i );
10190 }
10191 }
10192 for( const std::pair<const trait_id, trait_data> &mut : my_mutations ) {
10193 for( const trait_id &canceled_trait : mut.first->cancels ) {
10194 if( canceled_trait == flag ) {
10195 traits.insert( mut.first );
10196 }
10197 }
10198 }
10199 return traits;
10200}
10201
10202float Character::adjust_for_focus( float amount ) const
10203{
10204 int effective_focus = get_focus();
10205 effective_focus = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::LEARNING_FOCUS,
10206 effective_focus );
10207 effective_focus *= 1.0 + ( 0.01f * ( get_int() -
10208 get_option<int>( "INT_BASED_LEARNING_BASE_VALUE" ) ) *
10209 get_option<int>( "INT_BASED_LEARNING_FOCUS_ADJUSTMENT" ) );
10210 effective_focus = std::max( effective_focus, 1 );
10211 return amount * ( effective_focus / 100.0f );
10212}
10213
10214std::unordered_set<tripoint> Character::get_path_avoid() const
10215{
10216 std::unordered_set<tripoint> ret;
10217 for( npc &guy : g->all_npcs() ) {
10218 if( sees( guy ) ) {
10219 ret.insert( guy.pos() );
10220 }
10221 }
10222
10223 // TODO: Add known traps in a way that doesn't destroy performance
10224
10225 return ret;
10226}
10227
10228const pathfinding_settings &Character::get_pathfinding_settings() const
10229{
10230 return *path_settings;
10231}
10232
10233ret_val<crush_tool_type> Character::can_crush_frozen_liquid( item_location const &loc ) const
10234{
10235 crush_tool_type tool_type = CRUSH_NO_TOOL;
10236 bool success = false;
10237 if( !loc.has_parent() || !loc.parent_pocket()->get_pocket_data()->rigid ) {
10238 tool_type = CRUSH_HAMMER;
10239 success = has_quality( qual_HAMMER );
10240 } else {
10241 bool enough_quality = false;
10242 tool_type = CRUSH_DRILL_OR_HAMMER_AND_SCREW;
10243 if( has_quality( qual_DRILL ) ) {
10244 enough_quality = true;
10245 } else if( has_quality( qual_HAMMER ) && has_quality( qual_SCREW ) ) {
10246 int num_hammer_tools = 0;
10247 int num_screw_tools = 0;
10248 int num_both_tools = 0;
10249 for( item_location &tool : const_cast<Character *>( this )->all_items_loc() ) {
10250 bool can_hammer = false;
10251 bool can_screw = false;
10252 if( tool->has_quality_nonrecursive( qual_HAMMER ) ) {
10253 can_hammer = true;
10254 num_hammer_tools++;
10255 }
10256 if( tool->has_quality_nonrecursive( qual_SCREW ) ) {
10257 can_screw = true;
10258 num_screw_tools++;
10259 }
10260 if( can_hammer && can_screw ) {
10261 num_both_tools++;
10262 }
10263 }
10264 if( num_hammer_tools > 0 && num_screw_tools > 0 &&
10265 // Only one tool that fulfils both requirements: can't hammer itself
10266 !( num_hammer_tools == 1 && num_screw_tools == 1 && num_both_tools == 1 ) ) {
10267 enough_quality = true;
10268 }
10269 }
10270 success = enough_quality;
10271 }
10272 if( success ) {
10273 return ret_val<crush_tool_type>::make_success( tool_type );
10274 } else {
10275 return ret_val<crush_tool_type>::make_failure( tool_type,
10276 _( "You don't have the tools to crush frozen liquids." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't have the tools to crush frozen liquids."
) ) ) );;
10277 }
10278}
10279
10280bool Character::crush_frozen_liquid( item_location loc )
10281{
10282 ret_val<crush_tool_type> can_crush = can_crush_frozen_liquid( loc );
10283 bool done_crush = false;
10284 if( can_crush.success() ) {
10285 done_crush = true;
10286 if( can_crush.value() == CRUSH_HAMMER ) {
10287 item &hammering_item = best_item_with_quality( qual_HAMMER );
10288 //~ %1$s: item to be crushed, %2$s: hammer name
10289 if( query_yn( _( "Do you want to crush up %1$s with your %2$s?\n"( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Do you want to crush up %1$s with your %2$s?\n"
"<color_red>Be wary of fragile items nearby!</color>"
) ) )
10290 "<color_red>Be wary of fragile items nearby!</color>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Do you want to crush up %1$s with your %2$s?\n"
"<color_red>Be wary of fragile items nearby!</color>"
) ) ),
10291 loc.get_item()->display_name(), hammering_item.tname() ) ) {
10292
10293 //Risk smashing tile with hammering tool, risk is lower with higher dex, damage lower with lower strength
10294 if( one_in( 1 + dex_cur / 4 ) ) {
10295 add_msg_if_player( colorize( _( "You swing your %s wildly!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You swing your %s wildly!" )
) ), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) ),
10296 hammering_item.tname() );
10297 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
10298 const int smashskill = get_arm_str() + hammering_item.damage_melee( damage_bash );
10299 get_map().bash( loc.position(), smashskill );
10300 }
10301 } else {
10302 done_crush = false;
10303 }
10304 }
10305 } else {
10306 std::string need_str = _( "somethings" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "somethings" ) ) );
10307
10308 switch( can_crush.value() ) {
10309 case CRUSH_HAMMER:
10310 need_str = _( "a hammering tool" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a hammering tool" ) ) );
10311 break;
10312 case CRUSH_DRILL_OR_HAMMER_AND_SCREW:
10313 need_str = _( "a drill or both hammering tool and screwdriver" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a drill or both hammering tool and screwdriver"
) ) );
10314 break;
10315 default:
10316 break;
10317 }
10318 add_msg_if_player( string_format( _( "You need %s to crush up frozen liquids in rigid container!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need %s to crush up frozen liquids in rigid container!"
) ) ),
10319 need_str ) );
10320 }
10321 if( done_crush ) {
10322 add_msg_if_player( _( "You crush up %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You crush up %s." ) ) ), loc.get_item()->display_name() );
10323 }
10324 return done_crush;
10325}
10326
10327float Character::power_rating() const
10328{
10329 int dmg = 0;
10330 for( const damage_type &dt : damage_type::get_all() ) {
10331 if( dt.melee_only ) {
10332 int tdmg = weapon.damage_melee( dt.id );
10333 dmg = dmg < tdmg ? tdmg : dmg;
10334 }
10335 }
10336
10337 int ret = 2;
10338 // Small guns can be easily hidden from view
10339 if( weapon.volume() <= 250_ml ) {
10340 ret = 2;
10341 } else if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
10342 ret = 4;
10343 } else if( dmg > 12 ) {
10344 ret = 3; // Melee weapon or weapon-y tool
10345 }
10346 if( get_size() == creature_size::huge ) {
10347 ret += 1;
10348 }
10349 if( is_wearing_power_armor( nullptr ) ) {
10350 ret = 5; // No mercy!
10351 }
10352 return ret;
10353}
10354
10355float Character::speed_rating() const
10356{
10357 float ret = get_speed() / 100.0f;
10358 ret *= 100.0f / run_cost( 100, false );
10359 // Adjustment for player being able to run, but not doing so at the moment
10360 if( !is_running() ) {
10361 ret *= 1.0f + ( static_cast<float>( get_stamina() ) / static_cast<float>( get_stamina_max() ) );
10362 }
10363 return ret;
10364}
10365
10366item &Character::best_item_with_quality( const quality_id &qid )
10367{
10368 int max_lvl_found = INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1);
10369 std::vector<item *> items = items_with( [qid, &max_lvl_found]( const item & it ) {
10370 int qlvl = it.get_quality_nonrecursive( qid );
10371 if( qlvl > max_lvl_found ) {
10372 max_lvl_found = qlvl;
10373 return true;
10374 }
10375 return false;
10376 } );
10377 if( max_lvl_found > INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) {
10378 return *items.back();
10379 }
10380 return null_item_reference();
10381}
10382
10383int Character::run_cost( int base_cost, bool diag ) const
10384{
10385 float movecost = static_cast<float>( base_cost );
10386 if( diag ) {
10387 movecost /= M_SQRT21.41421356237309504880; // because effect logic assumes 100 base cost
10388 }
10389 run_cost_effects( movecost );
10390 if( diag ) {
10391 movecost *= M_SQRT21.41421356237309504880;
10392 }
10393 return static_cast<int>( movecost );
10394}
10395
10396std::vector<run_cost_effect> Character::run_cost_effects( float &movecost ) const
10397{
10398 std::vector<run_cost_effect> effects;
10399
10400 auto run_cost_effect_add = [&movecost, &effects]( float mod, const std::string & desc ) {
10401 if( mod != 0 ) {
10402 run_cost_effect effect { desc, 1.0, mod };
10403 effects.push_back( effect );
10404 movecost += mod;
10405 }
10406 };
10407
10408 auto run_cost_effect_mul = [&movecost, &effects]( float mod, const std::string & desc ) {
10409 if( mod != 1.0 ) {
10410 run_cost_effect effect { desc, mod, 0.0 };
10411 effects.push_back( effect );
10412 movecost *= mod;
10413 }
10414 };
10415
10416 const bool flatground = movecost < 105;
10417 map &here = get_map();
10418 // The "FLAT" tag includes soft surfaces, so not a good fit.
10419 const bool on_road = flatground && here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROAD, pos() );
10420 const bool on_fungus = here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FUNGUS, pos() );
10421
10422 if( is_mounted() ) {
10423 return effects;
10424 }
10425
10426 if( movecost > 105 ) {
10427 float obstacle_mult = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::MOVECOST_OBSTACLE_MOD,
10428 1 );
10429 run_cost_effect_mul( obstacle_mult, _( "Obstacle Muts." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Obstacle Muts." ) ) ) );
10430
10431 if( has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ) {
10432 run_cost_effect_mul( 0.5, _( "Parkour" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Parkour" ) ) ) );
10433 }
10434
10435 if( movecost < 100 ) {
10436 run_cost_effect effect { _( "Bonuses Capped" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bonuses Capped" ) ) ) };
10437 effects.push_back( effect );
10438 movecost = 100;
10439 }
10440 }
10441 if( has_trait( trait_M_IMMUNE ) && on_fungus ) {
10442 if( movecost > 75 ) {
10443 // Mycal characters are faster on their home territory, even through things like shrubs
10444 run_cost_effect_add( 75 - movecost, _( "Mycus on Fungus" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Mycus on Fungus" ) ) ) );
10445 }
10446 }
10447
10448 if( is_prone() ) {
10449 run_cost_effect_mul( get_modifier( character_modifier_crawl_speed_movecost_mod ),
10450 _( "Crawling" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Crawling" ) ) ) );
10451 } else {
10452 run_cost_effect_mul( get_modifier( character_modifier_limb_run_cost_mod ),
10453 _( "Encum./Wounds" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Encum./Wounds" ) ) ) );
10454 }
10455
10456 if( flatground ) {
10457 float flatground_mult = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::MOVECOST_FLATGROUND_MOD,
10458 1 );
10459 run_cost_effect_mul( flatground_mult, _( "Flat Ground Mut." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Flat Ground Mut." ) ) ) );
10460 }
10461
10462 if( has_trait( trait_PADDED_FEET ) && is_barefoot() ) {
10463 run_cost_effect_mul( 0.9f, _( "Bare Padded Feet" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bare Padded Feet" ) ) ) );
10464 }
10465
10466 if( worn_with_flag( flag_SLOWS_MOVEMENT ) ) {
10467 run_cost_effect_mul( 1.1f, _( "Tight Clothing" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Tight Clothing" ) ) ) );
10468 }
10469
10470 if( worn_with_flag( flag_FIN ) ) {
10471 run_cost_effect_mul( 1.5f, _( "Swim Fins" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Swim Fins" ) ) ) );
10472 }
10473
10474 if( worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_INLINE ) ) {
10475 if( on_road ) {
10476 if( is_running() ) {
10477 run_cost_effect_mul( 0.5f, _( "Inline Skates" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Inline Skates" ) ) ) );
10478 } else if( is_walking() ) {
10479 run_cost_effect_mul( 0.85f, _( "Inline Skates" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Inline Skates" ) ) ) );
10480 }
10481 } else {
10482 run_cost_effect_mul( 1.5f, _( "Inline Skates" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Inline Skates" ) ) ) );
10483 }
10484 }
10485
10486 // Quad skates might be more stable than inlines,
10487 // but that also translates into a slower speed when on good surfaces.
10488 if( worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_QUAD ) ) {
10489 if( on_road ) {
10490 if( is_running() ) {
10491 run_cost_effect_mul( 0.7f, _( "Roller Skates" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Roller Skates" ) ) ) );
10492 } else if( is_walking() ) {
10493 run_cost_effect_mul( 0.85f, _( "Roller Skates" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Roller Skates" ) ) ) );
10494 }
10495 } else {
10496 run_cost_effect_mul( 1.3f, _( "Roller Skates" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Roller Skates" ) ) ) );
10497 }
10498 }
10499
10500 // Skates with only one wheel (roller shoes) are fairly less stable
10501 // and fairly slower as well
10502 if( worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_ONE ) ) {
10503 if( on_road ) {
10504 if( is_running() ) {
10505 run_cost_effect_mul( 0.85f, _( "Heelys" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Heelys" ) ) ) );
10506 } else if( is_walking() ) {
10507 run_cost_effect_mul( 0.9f, _( "Heelys" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Heelys" ) ) ) );
10508 }
10509 } else {
10510 run_cost_effect_mul( 1.1f, _( "Heelys" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Heelys" ) ) ) );
10511 }
10512 }
10513
10514 // ROOTS3 does slow you down as your roots are probing around for nutrients,
10515 // whether you want them to or not. ROOTS1 is just too squiggly without shoes
10516 // to give you some stability. Plants are a bit of a slow-mover. Deal.
10517 const bool mutfeet = has_flag( json_flag_TOUGH_FEET ) || worn_with_flag( flag_TOUGH_FEET );
10518 bool no_left_shoe = false;
10519 bool no_right_shoe = false;
10520 if( !is_wearing_shoes( side::LEFT ) && !mutfeet ) {
10521 no_left_shoe = true;
10522 }
10523 if( !is_wearing_shoes( side::RIGHT ) && !mutfeet ) {
10524 no_right_shoe = true;
10525 }
10526 if( no_left_shoe && no_right_shoe ) {
10527 run_cost_effect_add( 16, _( "No Shoes" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No Shoes" ) ) ) );
10528 } else if( no_left_shoe ) {
10529 run_cost_effect_add( 8, _( "No Left Shoe" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No Left Shoe" ) ) ) );
10530 } else if( no_right_shoe ) {
10531 run_cost_effect_add( 8, _( "No Right Shoe" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No Right Shoe" ) ) ) );
10532 }
10533
10534 if( ( has_trait( trait_ROOTS3 ) || has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) ) &&
10535 here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DIGGABLE, pos() ) && is_barefoot() ) {
10536 run_cost_effect_add( 10, _( "Roots" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Roots" ) ) ) );
10537 }
10538
10539 run_cost_effect_add( enchantment_cache->get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::MOVE_COST ),
10540 _( "Enchantments" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Enchantments" ) ) ) );
10541 run_cost_effect_mul( 1.0 + enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( enchant_vals::mod::MOVE_COST ),
10542 _( "Enchantments" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Enchantments" ) ) ) );
10543
10544 run_cost_effect_mul( 1.0 / get_modifier( character_modifier_stamina_move_cost_mod ),
10545 _( "Stamina" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stamina" ) ) ) );
10546
10547 run_cost_effect_mul( 1.0 / get_modifier( character_modifier_move_mode_move_cost_mod ),
10548 //TODO get these strings from elsewhere
10549 is_running() ? _( "Running" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Running" ) ) ) :
10550 is_crouching() ? _( "Crouching" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Crouching" ) ) ) :
10551 is_prone() ? _( "Prone" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Prone" ) ) ) : _( "Walking" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Walking" ) ) )
10552 );
10553
10554 if( !is_mounted() && !is_prone() && has_effect( effect_downed ) ) {
10555 run_cost_effect_mul( get_modifier( character_modifier_crawl_speed_movecost_mod ) * 2.5,
10556 _( "Downed" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Downed" ) ) ) );
10557 }
10558
10559 return effects;
10560}
10561
10562void Character::place_corpse()
10563{
10564 //If the character/NPC is on a distant mission, don't drop their their gear when they die since they still have a local pos
10565 if( !death_drops ) {
10566 return;
10567 }
10568 std::vector<item *> tmp = inv_dump();
10569 item body = item::make_corpse( mtype_id::NULL_ID(), calendar::turn, get_name() );
10570 body.set_item_temperature( units::from_celsius( 37 ) );
10571 map &here = get_map();
10572 for( item *itm : tmp ) {
10573 body.force_insert_item( *itm, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
10574 }
10575 for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
10576 if( item::type_is_defined( bio.info().itype() ) ) {
10577 item cbm( bio.id.str(), calendar::turn );
10578 cbm.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
10579 cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_STERILE );
10580 cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_PACKED );
10581 cbm.faults.emplace( fault_bionic_salvaged );
10582 body.put_in( cbm, pocket_type::CORPSE );
10583 }
10584 }
10585
10586 here.add_item_or_charges( pos(), body );
10587}
10588
10589void Character::place_corpse( const tripoint_abs_omt &om_target )
10590{
10591 tinymap bay;
10592 bay.load( project_to<coords::sm>( om_target ), false );
10593 point fin( rng( 1, SEEX * 2 - 2 ), rng( 1, SEEX * 2 - 2 ) );
10594 // This makes no sense at all. It may find a random tile without furniture, but
10595 // if the first try to find one fails, it will go through all tiles of the map
10596 // and essentially select the last one that has no furniture.
10597 // Q: Why check for furniture? (Check for passable or can-place-items seems more useful.)
10598 // Q: Why not grep a random point out of all the possible points (e.g. via random_entry)?
10599 // Q: Why use furn_str_id instead of f_null?
10600 // TODO: fix it, see above.
10601 if( bay.furn( fin ) != furn_f_null ) {
10602 for( const tripoint &p : bay.points_on_zlevel() ) {
10603 if( bay.furn( p ) == furn_f_null ) {
10604 fin.x = p.x;
10605 fin.y = p.y;
10606 }
10607 }
10608 }
10609
10610 std::vector<item *> tmp = inv_dump();
10611 item body = item::make_corpse( mtype_id::NULL_ID(), calendar::turn, get_name() );
10612 for( item *itm : tmp ) {
10613 body.force_insert_item( *itm, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
10614 }
10615 for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
10616 if( item::type_is_defined( bio.info().itype() ) ) {
10617 body.put_in( item( bio.id.str(), calendar::turn ), pocket_type::CORPSE );
10618 }
10619 }
10620
10621 bay.add_item_or_charges( fin, body );
10622}
10623
10624bool Character::sees_with_infrared( const Creature &critter ) const
10625{
10626 if( !vision_mode_cache[IR_VISION] || !critter.is_warm() ) {
10627 return false;
10628 }
10629
10630 map &here = get_map();
10631
10632 return here.sees( pos(), critter.pos(), unimpaired_range(), false );
10633}
10634
10635bool Character::is_visible_in_range( const Creature &critter, const int range ) const
10636{
10637 return sees( critter ) && rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= range;
10638}
10639
10640std::vector<Creature *> Character::get_visible_creatures( const int range ) const
10641{
10642 return g->get_creatures_if( [this, range]( const Creature & critter ) -> bool {
10643 return this != &critter && pos() != critter.pos() && // TODO: get rid of fake npcs (pos() check)
10644 rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() ) <= range && sees( critter );
10645 } );
10646}
10647
10648std::vector<Creature *> Character::get_targetable_creatures( const int range, bool melee ) const
10649{
10650 map &here = get_map();
10651 return g->get_creatures_if( [this, range, melee, &here]( const Creature & critter ) -> bool {
10652 //the call to map.sees is to make sure that even if we can see it through walls
10653 //via a mutation or cbm we only attack targets with a line of sight
10654 bool can_see = ( ( sees( critter ) || sees_with_infrared( critter ) ) && here.sees( pos(), critter.pos(), 100 ) );
10655 if( can_see && melee ) //handles the case where we can see something with glass in the way for melee attacks
10656 {
10657 std::vector<tripoint> path = here.find_clear_path( pos(), critter.pos() );
10658 for( const tripoint &point : path ) {
10659 if( here.impassable( point ) &&
10660 !( weapon.has_flag( flag_SPEAR ) && // Fences etc. Spears can stab through those
10661 here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_THIN_OBSTACLE,
10662 point ) ) ) { //this mirrors melee.cpp function reach_attack
10663 can_see = false;
10664 break;
10665 }
10666 }
10667 }
10668 bool in_range = std::round( rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) ) <= range;
10669 // TODO: get rid of fake npcs (pos() check)
10670 bool valid_target = this != &critter && pos() != critter.pos() && attitude_to( critter ) != Creature::Attitude::FRIENDLY;
10671 return valid_target && in_range && can_see;
10672 } );
10673}
10674
10675int Character::get_mutation_visibility_cap( const Character *observed ) const
10676{
10677 // as of now, visibility of mutations is between 0 and 10
10678 // 10 perception and 10 distance would see all mutations - cap 0
10679 // 10 perception and 30 distance - cap 5, some mutations visible
10680 // 3 perception and 3 distance would see all mutations - cap 0
10681 // 3 perception and 15 distance - cap 5, some mutations visible
10682 // 3 perception and 20 distance would be barely able to discern huge antlers on a person - cap 10
10683 const int dist = rl_dist( pos(), observed->pos() );
10684 int visibility_cap;
10685 if( per_cur <= 1 ) {
10686 visibility_cap = INT_MAX2147483647;
10687 } else {
10688 visibility_cap = std::round( dist * dist / 20.0 / ( per_cur - 1 ) );
10689 }
10690 return visibility_cap;
10691}
10692
10693std::vector<Creature *> Character::get_hostile_creatures( int range ) const
10694{
10695 return g->get_creatures_if( [this, range]( const Creature & critter ) -> bool {
10696 // Fixes circular distance range for ranged attacks
10697 float dist_to_creature = std::round( rl_dist_exact( pos(), critter.pos() ) );
10698 return this != &critter && pos() != critter.pos() && // TODO: get rid of fake npcs (pos() check)
10699 dist_to_creature <= range && critter.attitude_to( *this ) == Creature::Attitude::HOSTILE
10700 && sees( critter );
10701 } );
10702}
10703
10704void Character::echo_pulse()
10705{
10706 map &here = get_map();
10707 int echo_volume = 0;
10708 int pulse_range = 10;
10709 // Sound travels farther underwater
10710 if( has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) && is_underwater() ) {
10711 pulse_range = 16;
10712 sounds::sound( this->pos(), 5, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "boop." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "boop." ) ) ), true,
10713 "none", "none" );
10714 } else if( !has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) && is_underwater() ) {
10715 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You can't echolocate underwater!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't echolocate underwater!"
) ) ) );
10716 return;
10717 } else {
10718 sounds::sound( this->pos(), 5, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "chirp." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "chirp." ) ) ), true,
10719 "none", "none" );
10720 }
10721 for( tripoint origin : points_in_radius( pos(), pulse_range ) ) {
10722 if( here.move_cost( origin ) == 0 && here.sees( pos(), origin, pulse_range, false ) ) {
10723 sounds::sound( origin, 5, sounds::sound_t::sensory, _( "clack." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "clack." ) ) ), true,
10724 "none", "none" );
10725 // This only counts obstacles which can be moved through, so the echo is pretty quiet.
10726 } else if( is_obstacle( origin ) && here.sees( pos(), origin, pulse_range, false ) ) {
10727 sounds::sound( origin, 1, sounds::sound_t::sensory, _( "click." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "click." ) ) ), true,
10728 "none", "none" );
10729 }
10730 const trap &tr = here.tr_at( origin );
10731 if( !knows_trap( origin ) && tr.detected_by_echolocation() ) {
10732 const std::string direction = direction_name( direction_from( pos(), origin ) );
10733 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You detect a %1$s to the %2$s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You detect a %1$s to the %2$s!"
) ) ),
10734 tr.name(), direction );
10735 add_known_trap( origin, tr );
10736 }
10737 Creature *critter = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( origin, true );
10738 if( critter && here.sees( pos(), origin, pulse_range, false ) ) {
10739 switch( critter->get_size() ) {
10740 case creature_size::tiny:
10741 echo_volume = 1;
10742 break;
10743 case creature_size::small:
10744 echo_volume = 2;
10745 break;
10746 case creature_size::medium:
10747 echo_volume = 3;
10748 break;
10749 case creature_size::large:
10750 echo_volume = 4;
10751 break;
10752 case creature_size::huge:
10753 echo_volume = 5;
10754 break;
10755 case creature_size::num_sizes:
10756 debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid Creature size class." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "10756", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ERROR: Invalid Creature size class."
);
10757 break;
10758 }
10759 // Some monsters are harder to get a read on
10760 if( critter->has_flag( mon_flag_PLASTIC ) ) {
10761 echo_volume -= std::max( 1, 1 );
10762 }
10763 if( critter->has_flag( mon_flag_HARDTOSHOOT ) ) {
10764 echo_volume -= std::max( 1, 1 );
10765 }
10766 const char *echo_string = nullptr;
10767 // bio_targeting has a visual HUD and automatically interprets the raw audio data,
10768 // but only for electronic SONAR. Its designers didn't anticipate bat mutations
10769 if( has_bionic( bio_targeting ) && has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) ) {
10770 switch( echo_volume ) {
10771 case 1:
10772 echo_string = _( "Target [Tiny]." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Target [Tiny]." ) ) );
10773 break;
10774 case 2:
10775 echo_string = _( "Target [Small]." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Target [Small]." ) ) );
10776 break;
10777 case 3:
10778 echo_string = _( "Target [Medium]." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Target [Medium]." ) ) );
10779 break;
10780 case 4:
10781 echo_string = _( "Warning! Target [Large]." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Warning! Target [Large]." )
) );
10782 break;
10783 case 5:
10784 echo_string = _( "Warning! Target [Huge]." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Warning! Target [Huge]." ) )
);
10785 break;
10786 default:
10787 debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid echo string." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "10787", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ERROR: Invalid echo string."
);
10788 break;
10789 }
10790 } else if( !has_bionic( bio_targeting ) && has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) ) {
10791 switch( echo_volume ) {
10792 case 1:
10793 echo_string = _( "tick." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "tick." ) ) );
10794 break;
10795 case 2:
10796 echo_string = _( "pii." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "pii." ) ) );
10797 break;
10798 case 3:
10799 echo_string = _( "ping." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "ping." ) ) );
10800 break;
10801 case 4:
10802 echo_string = _( "pong." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "pong." ) ) );
10803 break;
10804 case 5:
10805 echo_string = _( "bloop." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "bloop." ) ) );
10806 break;
10807 default:
10808 debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid echo string." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "10808", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ERROR: Invalid echo string."
);
10809 break;
10810 }
10811 } else {
10812 switch( echo_volume ) {
10813 case 1:
10814 echo_string = _( "ch." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "ch." ) ) );
10815 break;
10816 case 2:
10817 echo_string = _( "chk." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "chk." ) ) );
10818 break;
10819 case 3:
10820 echo_string = _( "chhk." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "chhk." ) ) );
10821 break;
10822 case 4:
10823 echo_string = _( "chkch." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "chkch." ) ) );
10824 break;
10825 case 5:
10826 echo_string = _( "chkchh." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "chkchh." ) ) );
10827 break;
10828 default:
10829 debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid echo string." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "10829", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ERROR: Invalid echo string."
);
10830 break;
10831 }
10832 }
10833 // It's not moving. Must be an obstacle
10834 if( critter->has_flag( mon_flag_IMMOBILE ) ) {
10835 echo_string = _( "click." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "click." ) ) );
10836 }
10837 sounds::sound( origin, echo_volume, sounds::sound_t::sensory, _( echo_string )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( echo_string ) ) ), false,
10838 "none", "none" );
10839 }
10840 }
10841}
10842
10843bool Character::knows_trap( const tripoint &pos ) const
10844{
10845 const tripoint p = get_map().getabs( pos );
10846 return known_traps.count( p ) > 0;
10847}
10848
10849void Character::add_known_trap( const tripoint &pos, const trap &t )
10850{
10851 const tripoint p = get_map().getabs( pos );
10852 if( t.is_null() ) {
10853 known_traps.erase( p );
10854 } else {
10855 // TODO: known_traps should map to a trap_str_id
10856 known_traps[p] = t.id.str();
10857 }
10858}
10859
10860bool Character::can_hear( const tripoint &source, const int volume ) const
10861{
10862 if( is_deaf() ) {
10863 return false;
10864 }
10865
10866 // source is in-ear and at our square, we can hear it
10867 if( source == pos() && volume == 0 ) {
10868 return true;
10869 }
10870 const int dist = rl_dist( source, pos() );
10871 const float volume_multiplier = hearing_ability();
10872 return ( volume - get_weather().weather_id->sound_attn ) * volume_multiplier >= dist;
10873}
10874
10875float Character::hearing_ability() const
10876{
10877 float volume_multiplier = 1.0f;
10878
10879 volume_multiplier = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::HEARING_MULT,
10880 volume_multiplier );
10881
10882 if( has_effect( effect_deaf ) ) {
10883 // Scale linearly up to 30 minutes
10884 volume_multiplier *= ( 30_minutes - get_effect_dur( effect_deaf ) ) / 30_minutes;
10885 }
10886
10887 return volume_multiplier;
10888}
10889
10890std::vector<std::string> Character::short_description_parts() const
10891{
10892 std::vector<std::string> result;
10893
10894 if( is_armed() ) {
10895 result.push_back( _( "Wielding: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Wielding: " ) ) ) + weapon.tname() );
10896 }
10897 const std::list<item> visible_worn_items = get_visible_worn_items();
10898 const std::string worn_str = enumerate_as_string( visible_worn_items.begin(),
10899 visible_worn_items.end(),
10900 []( const item & it ) {
10901 return it.tname();
10902 } );
10903 if( !worn_str.empty() ) {
10904 result.push_back( _( "Wearing: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Wearing: " ) ) ) + worn_str );
10905 }
10906 const int visibility_cap = 0; // no cap
10907 const std::string trait_str = visible_mutations( visibility_cap );
10908 if( !trait_str.empty() ) {
10909 result.push_back( _( "Traits: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Traits: " ) ) ) + trait_str );
10910 }
10911 return result;
10912}
10913
10914std::string Character::short_description() const
10915{
10916 return string_join( short_description_parts(), "; " );
10917}
10918
10919void Character::process_one_effect( effect &it, bool is_new )
10920{
10921 bool reduced = resists_effect( it );
10922 double mod = 1;
10923 const bodypart_id &bp = it.get_bp();
10924 int val = 0;
10925
10926 // Still hardcoded stuff, do this first since some modify their other traits
10927 int str = get_str_bonus();
10928 int dex = get_dex_bonus();
10929 int intl = get_int_bonus();
10930 int per = get_per_bonus();
10931 hardcoded_effects( it );
10932 str_bonus_hardcoded += get_str_bonus() - str;
10933 dex_bonus_hardcoded += get_dex_bonus() - dex;
10934 int_bonus_hardcoded += get_int_bonus() - intl;
10935 per_bonus_hardcoded += get_per_bonus() - per;
10936
10937 const auto get_effect = [&it, is_new]( const std::string & arg, bool reduced ) {
10938 if( is_new ) {
10939 return it.get_amount( arg, reduced );
10940 }
10941 return it.get_mod( arg, reduced );
10942 };
10943
10944 // Handle miss messages
10945 const std::vector<std::pair<translation, int>> &msgs = it.get_miss_msgs();
10946 for( const auto &i : msgs ) {
10947 add_miss_reason( i.first.translated(), static_cast<unsigned>( i.second ) );
10948 }
10949
10950 // Handle vitamins
10951 for( const vitamin_applied_effect &vit : it.vit_effects( reduced ) ) {
10952 if( vit.tick && vit.rate && calendar::once_every( *vit.tick ) ) {
10953 const int mod = rng( vit.rate->first, vit.rate->second );
10954 vitamin_mod( vit.vitamin, mod );
10955 }
10956 }
10957
10958 // Handle health mod
10959 val = get_effect( "H_MOD", reduced );
10960 if( val != 0 ) {
10961 mod = 1;
10962 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "H_MOD", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10963 int bounded = bound_mod_to_vals(
10964 get_daily_health(), val, it.get_max_val( "H_MOD", reduced ),
10965 it.get_min_val( "H_MOD", reduced ) );
10966 // This already applies bounds, so we pass them through.
10967 mod_daily_health( bounded, get_daily_health() + bounded );
10968 }
10969 }
10970
10971 // Handle health
10972 val = get_effect( "HEALTH", reduced );
10973 if( val != 0 ) {
10974 mod = 1;
10975 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HEALTH", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10976 mod_livestyle( bound_mod_to_vals( get_lifestyle(), val,
10977 it.get_max_val( "HEALTH", reduced ), it.get_min_val( "HEALTH", reduced ) ) );
10978 }
10979 }
10980
10981 // Handle stim
10982 val = get_effect( "STIM", reduced );
10983 if( val != 0 ) {
10984 mod = 1;
10985 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "STIM", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10986 mod_stim( bound_mod_to_vals( get_stim(), val, it.get_max_val( "STIM", reduced ),
10987 it.get_min_val( "STIM", reduced ) ) );
10988 }
10989 }
10990
10991 // Handle hunger
10992 val = get_effect( "HUNGER", reduced );
10993 if( val != 0 ) {
10994 mod = 1;
10995 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HUNGER", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
10996 mod_hunger( bound_mod_to_vals( get_hunger(), val, it.get_max_val( "HUNGER", reduced ),
10997 it.get_min_val( "HUNGER", reduced ) ) );
10998 }
10999 }
11000
11001 // Handle thirst
11002 val = get_effect( "THIRST", reduced );
11003 if( val != 0 ) {
11004 mod = 1;
11005 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "THIRST", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11006 mod_thirst( bound_mod_to_vals( get_thirst(), val, it.get_max_val( "THIRST", reduced ),
11007 it.get_min_val( "THIRST", reduced ) ) );
11008 }
11009 }
11010
11011 // Handle perspiration
11012 val = get_effect( "PERSPIRATION", reduced );
11013 if( val != 0 ) {
11014 mod = 1;
11015 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "PERSPIRATION", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11016 // multiplier to balance values around drench capacity of different body parts
11017 int mult = mutation_value( "sweat_multiplier" ) * get_part_drench_capacity( bp ) / 100;
11018 mod_part_wetness( bp, bound_mod_to_vals( get_part_wetness( bp ), val * mult,
11019 it.get_max_val( "PERSPIRATION", reduced ) * mult,
11020 it.get_min_val( "PERSPIRATION", reduced ) * mult ) );
11021 }
11022 }
11023
11024 // Handle fatigue
11025 val = get_effect( "FATIGUE", reduced );
11026 // Prevent ongoing fatigue effects while asleep.
11027 // These are meant to change how fast you get tired, not how long you sleep.
11028 if( val != 0 && !in_sleep_state() ) {
11029 mod = 1;
11030 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "FATIGUE", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11031 mod_fatigue( bound_mod_to_vals( get_fatigue(), val, it.get_max_val( "FATIGUE", reduced ),
11032 it.get_min_val( "FATIGUE", reduced ) ) );
11033 }
11034 }
11035
11036 // Handle Radiation
11037 val = get_effect( "RAD", reduced );
11038 if( val != 0 ) {
11039 mod = 1;
11040 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "RAD", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11041 mod_rad( bound_mod_to_vals( get_rad(), val, it.get_max_val( "RAD", reduced ), 0 ) );
11042 // Radiation can't go negative
11043 if( get_rad() < 0 ) {
11044 set_rad( 0 );
11045 }
11046 }
11047 }
11048
11049 // Handle Pain
11050 val = get_effect( "PAIN", reduced );
11051 if( val != 0 ) {
11052 mod = 1;
11053 if( it.get_sizing( "PAIN" ) ) {
11054 if( has_trait( trait_FAT ) ) {
11055 mod *= 1.5;
11056 }
11057 if( get_size() == creature_size::large ) {
11058 mod *= 2;
11059 }
11060 if( get_size() == creature_size::huge ) {
11061 mod *= 3;
11062 }
11063 }
11064 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "PAIN", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11065 int pain_inc = bound_mod_to_vals( get_pain(), val, it.get_max_val( "PAIN", reduced ), 0 );
11066 mod_pain( pain_inc );
11067 if( pain_inc > 0 ) {
11068 add_pain_msg( val, bp );
11069 }
11070 }
11071 }
11072
11073 // Handle Damage
11074 val = get_effect( "HURT", reduced );
11075 if( val != 0 ) {
11076 mod = 1;
11077 if( it.get_sizing( "HURT" ) ) {
11078 if( has_trait( trait_FAT ) ) {
11079 mod *= 1.5;
11080 }
11081 if( get_size() == creature_size::large ) {
11082 mod *= 2;
11083 }
11084 if( get_size() == creature_size::huge ) {
11085 mod *= 3;
11086 }
11087 }
11088 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HURT", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11089 if( bp == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
11090 if( val > 5 ) {
11091 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s HURTS!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s HURTS!" ) ) ), body_part_name( body_part_torso ) );
11092 } else if( val > 0 ) {
11093 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s hurts!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s hurts!" ) ) ), body_part_name( body_part_torso ) );
11094 }
11095 apply_damage( nullptr, body_part_torso, val, true );
11096 } else {
11097 if( val > 5 ) {
11098 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s HURTS!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s HURTS!" ) ) ), body_part_name( bp ) );
11099 } else if( val > 0 ) {
11100 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %s hurts!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s hurts!" ) ) ), body_part_name( bp ) );
11101 }
11102 apply_damage( nullptr, bp, val, true );
11103 }
11104 }
11105 }
11106
11107 // Handle Sleep
11108 val = get_effect( "SLEEP", reduced );
11109 if( val != 0 ) {
11110 mod = 1;
11111 if( ( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "SLEEP", val, reduced, mod ) ) &&
11112 !has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
11113 add_msg_if_player( _( "You pass out!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You pass out!" ) ) ) );
11114 fall_asleep( time_duration::from_turns( val ) );
11115 }
11116 }
11117
11118 // Handle painkillers
11119 val = get_effect( "PKILL", reduced );
11120 if( val != 0 ) {
11121 mod = it.get_addict_mod( "PKILL", addiction_level( addiction_opiate ) );
11122 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "PKILL", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11123 mod_painkiller( bound_mod_to_vals( get_painkiller(), val, it.get_max_val( "PKILL", reduced ), 0 ) );
11124 }
11125 }
11126
11127 // Handle Blood Pressure
11128 val = get_effect( "BLOOD_PRESSURE", reduced );
11129 if( val != 0 ) {
11130 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "BLOOD_PRESSURE", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11131 modify_bp_effect_mod( bound_mod_to_vals( get_bp_effect_mod(), val, it.get_max_val( "BLOOD_PRESSURE",
11132 reduced ), 0 ) );
11133 }
11134 }
11135
11136 // handle heart rate
11137 val = get_effect( "HEART_RATE", reduced );
11138 if( val != 0 ) {
11139 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HEART_RATE", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11140 modify_heartrate_effect_mod( bound_mod_to_vals( get_heartrate_effect_mod(), val,
11141 it.get_max_val( "HEART_RATE", reduced ), 0 ) );
11142 }
11143 }
11144 // handle perspiration rate
11145 val = get_effect( "RESPIRATION_RATE", reduced );
11146 if( val != 0 ) {
11147 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "RESPIRATION_RATE", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11148 modify_respiration_effect_mod( bound_mod_to_vals( get_respiration_effect_mod(), val,
11149 it.get_max_val( "RESPIRATION_RATE", reduced ), 0 ) );
11150 }
11151 }
11152
11153
11154 // Handle coughing
11155 mod = 1;
11156 val = 0;
11157 if( it.activated( calendar::turn, "COUGH", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11158 cough( it.get_harmful_cough() );
11159 }
11160
11161 // Handle vomiting
11162 mod = vomit_mod();
11163 val = 0;
11164 if( it.activated( calendar::turn, "VOMIT", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11165 vomit();
11166 }
11167
11168 // Handle stamina
11169 val = get_effect( "STAMINA", reduced );
11170 if( val != 0 ) {
11171 mod = 1;
11172 if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "STAMINA", val, reduced, mod ) ) {
11173 mod_stamina( bound_mod_to_vals( get_stamina(), val,
11174 it.get_max_val( "STAMINA", reduced ),
11175 it.get_min_val( "STAMINA", reduced ) ) );
11176 }
11177 }
11178
11179 // Speed and stats are handled in recalc_speed_bonus and reset_stats respectively
11180}
11181
11182void Character::process_effects()
11183{
11184 //Special Removals
11185 if( has_effect( effect_darkness ) && g->is_in_sunlight( pos() ) ) {
11186 remove_effect( effect_darkness );
11187 }
11188 if( has_trait( trait_M_IMMUNE ) && has_effect( effect_fungus ) ) {
11189 vomit();
11190 remove_effect( effect_fungus );
11191 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "We have mistakenly colonized a local guide! Purging now." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "We have mistakenly colonized a local guide! Purging now."
) ) ) );
11192 }
11193 if( has_trait( trait_PARAIMMUNE ) && ( has_effect( effect_dermatik ) ||
11194 has_effect( effect_tapeworm ) ||
11195 has_effect( effect_blood_spiders ) ||
11196 has_effect( effect_bloodworms ) || has_effect( effect_brainworms ) ||
11197 has_effect( effect_paincysts ) ) ) {
11198 remove_effect( effect_dermatik );
11199 remove_effect( effect_tapeworm );
11200 remove_effect( effect_bloodworms );
11201 remove_effect( effect_blood_spiders );
11202 remove_effect( effect_brainworms );
11203 remove_effect( effect_paincysts );
11204 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Something writhes inside of you as it dies." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Something writhes inside of you as it dies."
) ) ) );
11205 }
11206 if( has_flag( json_flag_ACIDBLOOD ) && ( has_effect( effect_dermatik ) ||
11207 has_effect( effect_bloodworms ) ||
11208 has_effect( effect_blood_spiders ) ||
11209 has_effect( effect_brainworms ) ) ) {
11210 remove_effect( effect_dermatik );
11211 remove_effect( effect_bloodworms );
11212 remove_effect( effect_blood_spiders );
11213 remove_effect( effect_brainworms );
11214 }
11215 if( has_trait( trait_EATHEALTH ) && has_effect( effect_tapeworm ) ) {
11216 remove_effect( effect_tapeworm );
11217 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your bowels gurgle as something inside them dies." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your bowels gurgle as something inside them dies."
) ) ) );
11218 }
11219 if( has_flag( json_flag_INFECTION_IMMUNE ) && ( has_effect( effect_bite ) ||
11220 has_effect( effect_infected ) ||
11221 has_effect( effect_recover ) ) ) {
11222 remove_effect( effect_bite );
11223 remove_effect( effect_infected );
11224 remove_effect( effect_recover );
11225 }
11226
11227 //Clear hardcoded bonuses from last turn
11228 //Recalculated in process_one_effect
11229 str_bonus_hardcoded = 0;
11230 dex_bonus_hardcoded = 0;
11231 int_bonus_hardcoded = 0;
11232 per_bonus_hardcoded = 0;
11233 //Human only effects
11234 for( std::pair<const efftype_id, std::map<bodypart_id, effect>> &elem : *effects ) {
11235 for( std::pair<const bodypart_id, effect> &_effect_it : elem.second ) {
11236 process_one_effect( _effect_it.second, false );
11237 }
11238 }
11239
11240 // Apply new effects from effect->effect chains
11241 while( !scheduled_effects.empty() ) {
11242 const scheduled_effect_t &effect = scheduled_effects.front();
11243
11244 add_effect( effect_source::empty(),
11245 effect.eff_id,
11246 effect.dur,
11247 effect.bp,
11248 effect.permanent,
11249 effect.intensity,
11250 effect.force,
11251 effect.deferred );
11252
11253 scheduled_effects.pop();
11254 }
11255
11256 // Perform immediate effect removals
11257 while( !terminating_effects.empty() ) {
11258
11259 const terminating_effect_t &effect = terminating_effects.front();
11260
11261 remove_effect( effect.eff_id, effect.bp );
11262
11263 terminating_effects.pop();
11264 }
11265
11266 // Being stuck in tight spaces sucks. TODO: could be expanded to apply to non-vehicle conditions.
11267 if( has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
11268 map &here = get_map();
11269 const tripoint your_pos = pos();
11270 const optional_vpart_position vp_there = here.veh_at( your_pos );
11271 if( !vp_there ) {
11272 remove_effect( effect_cramped_space );
11273 return;
11274 }
11275 if( is_npc() && !has_effect( effect_narcosis ) && has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
11276 npc &as_npc = dynamic_cast<npc &>( *this );
11277 as_npc.complain_about( "cramped_vehicle", 30_minutes, "<cramped_vehicle>", false );
11278 }
11279 bool is_cramped_space = false;
11280 vehicle &veh = vp_there->vehicle();
11281 units::volume capacity = 0_ml;
11282 units::volume free_cargo = 0_ml;
11283 auto cargo_parts = veh.get_parts_at( your_pos, "CARGO", part_status_flag::any );
11284 for( vehicle_part *&part : cargo_parts ) {
11285 vehicle_stack contents = veh.get_items( *part );
11286 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( your_pos );
11287 if( !vp.part_with_feature( "CARGO_PASSABLE", false ) ) {
11288 capacity += contents.max_volume();
11289 free_cargo += contents.free_volume();
11290 }
11291 const creature_size size = get_size();
11292 if( capacity > 0_ml ) {
11293 // Open-topped vehicle parts have more room.
11294 if( !veh.enclosed_at( your_pos ) ) {
11295 free_cargo *= 1.2;
11296 }
11297 if( ( size == creature_size::tiny && free_cargo < 15625_ml ) ||
11298 ( size == creature_size::small && free_cargo < 31250_ml ) ||
11299 ( size == creature_size::medium && free_cargo < 62500_ml ) ||
11300 ( size == creature_size::large && free_cargo < 125000_ml ) ||
11301 ( size == creature_size::huge && free_cargo < 250000_ml ) ) {
11302 is_cramped_space = true;
11303 }
11304 }
11305 if( get_size() == creature_size::huge && !vp.part_with_feature( "AISLE", false ) &&
11306 !vp.part_with_feature( "HUGE_OK", false ) ) {
11307 is_cramped_space = true;
11308 }
11309 }
11310 if( !is_cramped_space ) {
11311 remove_effect( effect_cramped_space );
11312 }
11313 }
11314
11315 if( has_effect( effect_boomered ) && ( is_avatar() || is_npc() ) && one_in( 10 ) &&
11316 !has_trait( trait_COMPOUND_EYES ) && !has_effect( effect_pre_conjunctivitis_bacterial ) &&
11317 !has_effect( effect_pre_conjunctivitis_viral ) && !has_effect( effect_conjunctivitis_bacterial ) &&
11318 !has_effect( effect_conjunctivitis_viral ) ) {
11319 //Washing your eyes out in time may save you from getting pinkeye.
11320 float checked_health = get_lifestyle() + 200.0;
11321 //Some animal eyes are more vulnerable to infection.
11322 if( has_trait_flag( json_flag_EYE_MEMBRANE ) ) {
11323 checked_health -= 50;
11324 }
11325 //Ditto for contact lenses.
11326 if( has_effect( effect_contacts ) || has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) ) {
11327 checked_health -= 50;
11328 }
11329 if( has_trait( trait_INFRESIST ) ) {
11330 checked_health += 50;
11331 }
11332 float pinkeye_chance = 4.0 + 6.0 / 25.0 * checked_health;
11333 if( one_in( pinkeye_chance ) ) {
11334 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
11335 add_effect( effect_pre_conjunctivitis_bacterial, 70_hours );
11336 } else {
11337 add_effect( effect_pre_conjunctivitis_viral, 70_hours );
11338 }
11339 }
11340 }
11341
11342 map &here = get_map();
11343 if( has_effect( effect_slippery_terrain ) && !is_on_ground() && !is_crouching() &&
11344 here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAT, pos() ) ) {
11345 int rolls = 0;
11346 bool u_see = get_player_view().sees( *this );
11347 //ROAD tiles are hard, flat surfaces, so they are extra slippery.
11348 if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROAD, pos() ) ) {
11349 rolls++;
11350 }
11351 if( has_trait( trait_DEFT ) ) {
11352 rolls--;
11353 }
11354 if( is_running() || ( ( worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_ONE ) || worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_INLINE ) ||
11355 worn_with_flag( flag_ROLLER_QUAD ) ) && !has_trait( trait_PROF_SKATER ) ) ) {
11356 rolls++;
11357 }
11358 //Slimy people are used to everything being slippery.
11359 if( has_trait( trait_SLIMY ) || has_trait( trait_AQUEOUS ) || has_trait( trait_MUCUS_SECRETION ) ) {
11360 rolls--;
11361 }
11362 if( has_trait( trait_CLUMSY ) ) {
11363 rolls++;
11364 }
11365 int intensity = get_effect_int( effect_slippery_terrain );
11366 rolls += intensity;
11367 //A healthy unencumbered person with 18 dex can usually walk across a moderately slippery surface without issue.
11368 //Survivors rarely meet those qualifications in practice.
11369 if( balance_roll() < dice( rolls, 6 ) ) {
11370 if( !is_avatar() ) {
11371 if( u_see ) {
11372 add_msg( _( "%1$s slips and falls!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s slips and falls!" ) ) ), get_name() );
11373 }
11374 } else {
11375 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You lose your balance and fall on the slippery ground!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You lose your balance and fall on the slippery ground!"
) ) ) );
11376 }
11377 add_effect( effect_downed, rng( 1_turns, 2_turns ) );
11378 }
11379 }
11380 Creature::process_effects();
11381}
11382
11383void Character::gravity_check()
11384{
11385 if( get_map().tr_at( pos() ) == tr_ledge && !has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GLIDING ) ) {
11386 get_map().tr_at( pos() ).trigger( pos(), *this );
11387 get_map().update_visibility_cache( pos().z );
11388 }
11389}
11390
11391void Character::stagger()
11392{
11393 map &here = get_map();
11394 std::vector<tripoint> valid_stumbles;
11395 valid_stumbles.reserve( 11 );
11396 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
11397 if( dest != pos() ) {
11398 if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_DOWN, dest ) ) {
11399 valid_stumbles.emplace_back( dest.xy(), dest.z - 1 );
11400 } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_UP, dest ) ) {
11401 valid_stumbles.emplace_back( dest.xy(), dest.z + 1 );
11402 } else {
11403 valid_stumbles.push_back( dest );
11404 }
11405 }
11406 }
11407 const tripoint below( posx(), posy(), posz() - 1 );
11408 if( here.valid_move( pos(), below, false, true ) ) {
11409 valid_stumbles.push_back( below );
11410 }
11411 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
11412 while( !valid_stumbles.empty() ) {
11413 bool blocked = false;
11414 const tripoint dest = random_entry_removed( valid_stumbles );
11415 const optional_vpart_position vp_there = here.veh_at( dest );
11416 if( vp_there ) {
11417 vehicle &veh = vp_there->vehicle();
11418 if( veh.enclosed_at( dest ) ) {
11419 blocked = true;
11420 }
11421 }
11422 if( here.passable( dest ) && !blocked &&
11423 ( creatures.creature_at( dest, is_hallucination() ) == nullptr ) ) {
11424 avatar &player_avatar = get_avatar();
11425 if( is_avatar() && player_avatar.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE ) {
11426 player_avatar.grab( object_type::NONE );
11427 }
11428 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
11429 _( "You stumble!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You stumble!" ) ) ),
11430 _( "<npcname> stumbles!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> stumbles!" )
) ) );
11431 setpos( dest );
11432 mod_moves( -100 );
11433 break;
11434 }
11435 }
11436}
11437
11438double Character::vomit_mod()
11439{
11440 double mod = 1;
11441 mod *= mutation_value( "vomit_multiplier" );
11442
11443 mod = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::VOMIT_MUL, mod );
11444
11445 // If you're already nauseous, any food in your stomach greatly
11446 // increases chance of vomiting. Liquids don't provoke vomiting, though.
11447 if( stomach.contains() != 0_ml && has_effect( effect_nausea ) ) {
11448 mod *= get_effect_int( effect_nausea );
11449 }
11450 return mod;
11451}
11452
11453int Character::sleep_spot( const tripoint_bub_ms &p ) const
11454{
11455 const int current_stim = get_stim();
11456 const comfort_response_t comfort_info = base_comfort_value( p );
11457 if( comfort_info.aid != nullptr ) {
11458 add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You use your %s for comfort." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You use your %s for comfort."
) ) ), comfort_info.aid->tname() );
11459 }
11460
11461 int sleepy = static_cast<int>( comfort_info.level );
11462 bool watersleep = has_trait( trait_WATERSLEEP ) || has_trait( trait_UNDINE_SLEEP_WATER );
11463
11464 if( has_addiction( addiction_sleeping_pill ) ) {
11465 sleepy -= 4;
11466 }
11467
11468 sleepy = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SLEEPY, sleepy );
11469
11470 if( watersleep && get_map().has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, pos() ) ) {
11471 sleepy += 10; //comfy water!
11472 }
11473
11474 if( has_trait( trait_CHLOROMORPH ) &&
11475 get_map().has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, pos() ) ) {
11476 sleepy += 25; // It's time for a nice nap.
11477 }
11478
11479 if( get_fatigue() < fatigue_levels::TIRED + 1 ) {
11480 sleepy -= static_cast<int>( ( fatigue_levels::TIRED + 1 - get_fatigue() ) / 4 );
11481 } else {
11482 sleepy += static_cast<int>( ( get_fatigue() - fatigue_levels::TIRED + 1 ) / 16 );
11483 }
11484
11485 if( current_stim > 0 || !has_trait( trait_INSOMNIA ) ) {
11486 sleepy -= 2 * current_stim;
11487 } else {
11488 // Make it harder for insomniac to get around the trait
11489 sleepy -= current_stim;
11490 }
11491
11492 return sleepy;
11493}
11494
11495bool Character::can_sleep()
11496{
11497 if( has_effect( effect_meth ) ) {
11498 // Sleep ain't happening until that meth wears off completely.
11499 return false;
11500 }
11501
11502 // Since there's a bit of randomness to falling asleep, we want to
11503 // prevent exploiting this if can_sleep() gets called over and over.
11504 // Only actually check if we can fall asleep no more frequently than
11505 // every 30 minutes. We're assuming that if we return true, we'll
11506 // immediately be falling asleep after that.
11507 //
11508 // Also if player debug menu'd time backwards this breaks, just do the
11509 // check anyway, this will reset the timer if 'dur' is negative.
11510 const time_point now = calendar::turn;
11511 const time_duration dur = now - last_sleep_check;
11512 if( dur >= 0_turns && dur < 30_minutes ) {
11513 return false;
11514 }
11515 last_sleep_check = now;
11516
11517 int sleepy = sleep_spot( pos_bub() );
11518 sleepy += rng( -8, 8 );
11519 bool result = sleepy > 0;
11520
11521 if( has_active_bionic( bio_soporific ) ) {
11522 if( bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check && !has_power() ) {
11523 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your soporific inducer runs out of power!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your soporific inducer runs out of power!"
) ) ) );
11524 } else if( !bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check && has_power() ) {
11525 add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your soporific inducer starts back up." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your soporific inducer starts back up."
) ) ) );
11526 }
11527 bio_soporific_powered_at_last_sleep_check = has_power();
11528 }
11529
11530 return result;
11531}
11532
11533void Character::shift_destination( const point &shift )
11534{
11535 if( next_expected_position ) {
11536 *next_expected_position += shift;
11537 }
11538
11539 for( tripoint_bub_ms &elem : auto_move_route ) {
11540 elem += shift;
11541 }
11542}
11543
11544bool Character::has_weapon() const
11545{
11546 return !unarmed_attack();
11547}
11548
11549int Character::get_lowest_hp() const
11550{
11551 // Set lowest_hp to an arbitrarily large number.
11552 int lowest_hp = 999;
11553 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : get_body() ) {
11554 const int cur_hp = elem.second.get_hp_cur();
11555 if( cur_hp < lowest_hp ) {
11556 lowest_hp = cur_hp;
11557 }
11558 }
11559 return lowest_hp;
11560}
11561
11562Creature::Attitude Character::attitude_to( const Creature &other ) const
11563{
11564 const monster *m = dynamic_cast<const monster *>( &other );
11565 if( m != nullptr ) {
11566 if( m->friendly != 0 ) {
11567 return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
11568 }
11569 switch( m->attitude( const_cast<Character *>( this ) ) ) {
11570 // player probably does not want to harm them, but doesn't care much at all.
11571 case MATT_FOLLOW:
11572 case MATT_FPASSIVE:
11573 case MATT_IGNORE:
11574 case MATT_FLEE:
11575 return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
11576 // player does not want to harm those.
11577 case MATT_FRIEND:
11578 return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
11579 case MATT_ATTACK:
11580 return Attitude::HOSTILE;
11581 case MATT_NULL:
11582 case NUM_MONSTER_ATTITUDES:
11583 break;
11584 }
11585
11586 return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
11587 }
11588
11589 const npc *p = dynamic_cast<const npc *>( &other );
11590 if( p != nullptr ) {
11591 if( p->is_enemy() ) {
11592 return Attitude::HOSTILE;
11593 } else if( p->is_player_ally() ) {
11594 return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
11595 } else {
11596 return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
11597 }
11598 } else if( &other == this ) {
11599 return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
11600 }
11601
11602 return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
11603}
11604
11605npc_attitude Character::get_attitude() const
11606{
11607 return NPCATT_NULL;
11608}
11609
11610bool Character::sees( const tripoint &t, bool, int ) const
11611{
11612 const int wanted_range = rl_dist( pos(), t );
11613 bool can_see = is_avatar() ? get_map().pl_sees( t, std::min( sight_max, wanted_range ) ) :
11614 Creature::sees( t );
11615 // Clairvoyance is now pretty cheap, so we can check it early
11616 if( wanted_range < MAX_CLAIRVOYANCE && wanted_range < clairvoyance() ) {
11617 return true;
11618 }
11619
11620 return can_see;
11621}
11622
11623bool Character::sees( const tripoint_bub_ms &t, bool is_avatar, int range_mod ) const
11624{
11625 return sees( t.raw(), is_avatar, range_mod );
11626}
11627
11628bool Character::sees( const Creature &critter ) const
11629{
11630 // This handles only the player/npc specific stuff (monsters don't have traits or bionics).
11631 const int dist = rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() );
11632 if( std::abs( pos().z - critter.pos().z ) > fov_3d_z_range ) {
11633 return false;
11634 }
11635 if( dist <= 3 && has_active_mutation( trait_ANTENNAE ) ) {
11636 return true;
11637 }
11638 if( dist < MAX_CLAIRVOYANCE && dist < clairvoyance() ) {
11639 return true;
11640 }
11641 // Only players can spot creatures through clairvoyance fields
11642 if( is_avatar() && field_fd_clairvoyant.is_valid() &&
11643 get_map().get_field( critter.pos(), field_fd_clairvoyant ) ) {
11644 return true;
11645 }
11646 return Creature::sees( critter );
11647}
11648
11649void Character::set_destination( const std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &route,
11650 const player_activity &new_destination_activity )
11651{
11652 auto_move_route = route;
11653 set_destination_activity( new_destination_activity );
11654 destination_point.emplace( get_map().getabs( route.back() ) );
11655}
11656
11657void Character::clear_destination()
11658{
11659 auto_move_route.clear();
11660 clear_destination_activity();
11661 destination_point = std::nullopt;
11662 next_expected_position = std::nullopt;
11663}
11664
11665bool Character::has_distant_destination() const
11666{
11667 return has_destination() && !get_destination_activity().is_null() &&
11668 get_destination_activity().id() == ACT_TRAVELLING && !omt_path.empty();
11669}
11670
11671bool Character::is_auto_moving() const
11672{
11673 return destination_point.has_value();
11674}
11675
11676bool Character::has_destination() const
11677{
11678 return !auto_move_route.empty();
11679}
11680
11681bool Character::has_destination_activity() const
11682{
11683 return !get_destination_activity().is_null() && destination_point &&
11684 pos() == get_map().getlocal( *destination_point );
11685}
11686
11687void Character::start_destination_activity()
11688{
11689 if( !has_destination_activity() ) {
11690 debugmsg( "Tried to start invalid destination activity" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "11690", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to start invalid destination activity"
);
11691 return;
11692 }
11693
11694 assign_activity( get_destination_activity() );
11695 clear_destination();
11696}
11697
11698std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &Character::get_auto_move_route()
11699{
11700 return auto_move_route;
11701}
11702
11703action_id Character::get_next_auto_move_direction()
11704{
11705 if( !has_destination() ) {
11706 return ACTION_NULL;
11707 }
11708
11709 if( next_expected_position ) {
11710 if( pos_bub() != *next_expected_position ) {
11711 // We're off course, possibly stumbling or stuck, cancel auto move
11712 return ACTION_NULL;
11713 }
11714 }
11715
11716 next_expected_position.emplace( auto_move_route.front() );
11717 auto_move_route.erase( auto_move_route.begin() );
11718
11719 tripoint_rel_ms dp = *next_expected_position - pos_bub();
11720
11721 // Make sure the direction is just one step and that
11722 // all diagonal moves have 0 z component
11723 if( std::abs( dp.x() ) > 1 || std::abs( dp.y() ) > 1 || std::abs( dp.z() ) > 1 ||
11724 ( dp.z() != 0 && ( dp.x() != 0 || dp.y() != 0 ) ) ) {
11725 // Should never happen, but check just in case
11726 return ACTION_NULL;
11727 }
11728 // TODO: fix point types
11729 return get_movement_action_from_delta( dp.raw(), iso_rotate::yes );
11730}
11731
11732int Character::persuade_skill() const
11733{
11734 /** @EFFECT_INT slightly increases talking skill */
11735 /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases talking skill */
11736 /** @EFFECT_SPEECH increases talking skill */
11737 float ret = get_int() + get_per() + get_skill_level( skill_speech ) * 3;
11738 ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SOCIAL_PERSUADE, ret );
11739 return round( ret );
11740}
11741
11742int Character::lie_skill() const
11743{
11744 /** @EFFECT_INT slightly increases talking skill */
11745 /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases talking skill */
11746 /** @EFFECT_SPEECH increases talking skill */
11747 float ret = get_int() + get_per() + get_skill_level( skill_speech ) * 3;
11748 ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SOCIAL_LIE, ret );
11749 return round( ret );
11750}
11751
11752int Character::intimidation() const
11753{
11754 /** @EFFECT_STR increases intimidation factor */
11755 int ret = get_str() * 2;
11756 if( weapon.is_gun() ) {
11757 ret += 10;
11758 }
11759 for( const damage_type &dt : damage_type::get_all() ) {
11760 if( dt.melee_only && weapon.damage_melee( dt.id ) >= 12 ) {
11761 ret += 5;
11762 break;
11763 }
11764 }
11765
11766 if( get_stim() > 20 ) {
11767 ret += 2;
11768 }
11769 if( has_effect( effect_drunk ) ) {
11770 ret -= 4;
11771 }
11772 ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::SOCIAL_INTIMIDATE, ret );
11773 return ret;
11774}
11775
11776bool Character::defer_move( const tripoint &next )
11777{
11778 // next must be adjacent to current pos
11779 if( square_dist( next, pos() ) != 1 ) {
11780 return false;
11781 }
11782 // next must be adjacent to subsequent move in any preexisting automove route
11783 // TODO: fix point types
11784 if( has_destination() && square_dist( auto_move_route.front().raw(), next ) != 1 ) {
11785 return false;
11786 }
11787 // TODO: fix point types
11788 auto_move_route.insert( auto_move_route.begin(), tripoint_bub_ms( next ) );
11789 next_expected_position = pos_bub();
11790 return true;
11791}
11792
11793bool Character::add_or_drop_with_msg( item &it, const bool /*unloading*/, const item *avoid,
11794 const item *original_inventory_item )
11795{
11796 if( it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
11797 liquid_handler::consume_liquid( it, 1, avoid );
11798 return it.charges <= 0;
11799 }
11800 if( !this->can_pickVolume( it, false, avoid ) ) {
11801 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::too_large, { it } );
11802 } else if( !this->can_pickWeight( it, !get_option<bool>( "DANGEROUS_PICKUPS" ) ) ) {
11803 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::too_heavy, { it } );
11804 } else {
11805 bool wielded_has_it = false;
11806 // Cannot use weapon.has_item(it) because it skips any pockets that
11807 // are not containers such as magazines and magazine wells.
11808 for( const item *scan_contents : weapon.all_items_top() ) {
11809 if( scan_contents == &it ) {
11810 wielded_has_it = true;
11811 break;
11812 }
11813 }
11814 const bool allow_wield = !wielded_has_it && weapon.magazine_current() != &it;
11815 const int prev_charges = it.charges;
11816 item_location ni = i_add( it, true, avoid,
11817 original_inventory_item, /*allow_drop=*/false, /*allow_wield=*/allow_wield );
11818 if( ni == item_location::nowhere ) {
11819 // failed to add
11820 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { it } );
11821 } else if( &*ni == &it ) {
11822 // merged into the original stack, restore original charges
11823 it.charges = prev_charges;
11824 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( *this, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { it } );
11825 } else {
11826 // successfully added
11827 add_msg( _( "You put the %s in your inventory." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You put the %s in your inventory."
) ) ), ni->tname() );
11828 add_msg( m_info, "%c - %s", ni->invlet == 0 ? ' ' : ni->invlet, ni->tname() );
11829 }
11830 }
11831 return true;
11832}
11833
11834bool Character::unload( item_location &loc, bool bypass_activity,
11835 const item_location &new_container )
11836{
11837 item &it = *loc;
11838 drop_locations locs;
11839 // Unload a container consuming moves per item successfully removed
11840 if( it.is_container() ) {
11841 if( it.empty() ) {
11842 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is already empty!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is already empty!" ) )
), it.tname() );
11843 return false;
11844 }
11845 if( !it.can_unload_liquid() ) {
11846 add_msg( m_info, _( "The liquid can't be unloaded in its current state!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The liquid can't be unloaded in its current state!"
) ) ) );
11847 return false;
11848 }
11849
11850 int moves = 0;
11851 item *prev_contained = nullptr;
11852
11853 for( pocket_type ptype : {
11854 pocket_type::CONTAINER,
11855 pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL,
11856 pocket_type::MAGAZINE
11857 } ) {
11858
11859 for( item *contained : it.all_items_top( ptype, true ) ) {
11860 if( new_container == item_location::nowhere ) {
