11861 if( prev_contained && prev_contained->stacks_with( *contained ) ) {
11862 moves += std::max( this->item_handling_cost( *contained, true, 0, -1, true ), 1 );
11863 } else {
11864 moves += this->item_handling_cost( *contained );
11865 }
11866 prev_contained = contained;
11867 } else {
11868 // redirect to insert actor
11869 const int count = contained->count_by_charges() ? contained->charges : 1;
11870 locs.emplace_back( item_location( loc, contained ), count );
11871 }
11872 }
11873
11874 }
11875 if( new_container == item_location::nowhere ) {
11876 assign_activity( unload_activity_actor( moves, loc ) );
11877 } else if( !locs.empty() ) {
11878 assign_activity( insert_item_activity_actor( new_container, locs, true ) );
11879 }
11880
11881 return true;
11882 }
11883
11884 // If item can be unloaded more than once (currently only guns) prompt user to choose
11885 std::vector<std::string> msgs( 1, it.tname() );
11886 std::vector<item *> opts( 1, &it );
11887
11888 for( item *e : it.gunmods() ) {
11889 if( ( e->is_gun() && !e->has_flag( flag_NO_UNLOAD ) &&
11890 ( e->magazine_current() || e->ammo_remaining() > 0 || e->casings_count() > 0 ) ) ||
11891 ( e->has_flag( flag_BRASS_CATCHER ) && !e->is_container_empty() ) ) {
11892 msgs.emplace_back( e->tname() );
11893 opts.emplace_back( e );
11894 }
11895 }
11896
11897 item *target = nullptr;
11898 item_location targloc;
11899 if( opts.size() > 1 ) {
11900 const int ret = uilist( _( "Unload what?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Unload what?" ) ) ), msgs );
11901 if( ret >= 0 ) {
11902 target = opts[ret];
11903 targloc = item_location( loc, opts[ret] );
11904 }
11905 } else {
11906 target = &it;
11907 targloc = loc;
11908 }
11909
11910 if( target == nullptr ) {
11911 return false;
11912 }
11913
11914 // Next check for any reasons why the item cannot be unloaded
11915 if( !target->has_flag( flag_BRASS_CATCHER ) ) {
11916 if( !target->is_magazine() && !target->uses_magazine() ) {
11917 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't unload a %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't unload a %s!" ) ) ), target->tname() );
11918 return false;
11919 }
11920
11921 if( target->has_flag( flag_NO_UNLOAD ) ) {
11922 if( target->has_flag( flag_RECHARGE ) || target->has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
11923 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't unload a rechargeable %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't unload a rechargeable %s!"
) ) ), target->tname() );
11924 } else {
11925 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't unload a %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't unload a %s!" ) ) ), target->tname() );
11926 }
11927 return false;
11928 }
11929
11930 if( !target->magazine_current() && target->ammo_remaining() <= 0 && target->casings_count() <= 0 ) {
11931 if( target->is_tool() ) {
11932 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your %s isn't charged." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s isn't charged." ) ) ), target->tname() );
11933 } else {
11934 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your %s isn't loaded." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s isn't loaded." ) ) ), target->tname() );
11935 }
11936 return false;
11937 }
11938 }
11939
11940 target->casings_handle( [&]( item & e ) {
11941 return this->i_add_or_drop( e );
11942 } );
11943
11944 invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
11945
11946 if( target->is_magazine() ) {
11947 if( bypass_activity ) {
11948 unload_activity_actor::unload( *this, targloc );
11949 } else {
11950 int mv = 0;
11951 for( const item *content : target->all_items_top() ) {
11952 // We use the same cost for both reloading and unloading
11953 mv += this->item_reload_cost( it, *content, content->charges );
11954 }
11955 if( it.is_ammo_belt() ) {
11956 // Disassembling ammo belts is easier than assembling them
11957 mv /= 2;
11958 }
11959 assign_activity( unload_activity_actor( mv, targloc ) );
11960 }
11961 return true;
11962
11963 } else if( target->magazine_current() ) {
11964 if( !this->add_or_drop_with_msg( *target->magazine_current(), true, nullptr,
11965 target->magazine_current() ) ) {
11966 return false;
11967 }
11968 // Eject magazine consuming half as much time as required to insert it
11969 this->moves -= this->item_reload_cost( *target, *target->magazine_current(), -1 ) / 2;
11970
11971 target->remove_items_with( [&target]( const item & e ) {
11972 return target->magazine_current() == &e;
11973 } );
11974
11975 } else if( target->ammo_remaining() ) {
11976 int qty = target->ammo_remaining();
11977
11978 // Construct a new ammo item and try to drop it
11979 item ammo( target->ammo_current(), calendar::turn, qty );
11980 if( target->is_filthy() ) {
11981 ammo.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
11982 }
11983
11984 if( ammo.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
11985 if( !this->add_or_drop_with_msg( ammo ) ) {
11986 qty -= ammo.charges; // only handled part (or none) of the liquid
11987 }
11988 if( qty <= 0 ) {
11989 return false; // no liquid was moved
11990 }
11991
11992 } else if( !this->add_or_drop_with_msg( ammo, qty > 1 ) ) {
11993 return false;
11994 }
11995
11996 // If successful remove appropriate qty of ammo consuming half as much time as required to load it
11997 this->moves -= this->item_reload_cost( *target, ammo, qty ) / 2;
11998
11999 target->ammo_set( target->ammo_current(), target->ammo_remaining() - qty );
12000 } else if( target->has_flag( flag_BRASS_CATCHER ) ) {
12001 target->spill_contents( get_player_character() );
12002 }
12003
12004 // Turn off any active tools
12005 if( target->is_tool() && target->active && target->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
12006 target->type->invoke( this, *target, this->pos() );
12007 }
12008
12009 add_msg( _( "You unload your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You unload your %s." ) ) ), target->tname() );
12010
12011 if( it.has_flag( flag_MAG_DESTROY ) && it.ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
12012 loc.remove_item();
12013 }
12014
12015 get_player_character().recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
12016
12017 return true;
12018}
12019
12020book_mastery Character::get_book_mastery( const item &book ) const
12021{
12022 if( !book.is_book() || !has_identified( book.typeId() ) ) {
12023 return book_mastery::CANT_DETERMINE;
12024 }
12025 // TODO: add illiterate check?
12026
12027 const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &type = book.type->book;
12028 const skill_id &skill = type->skill;
12029
12030 if( !skill ) {
12031 // book gives no skill
12032 return book_mastery::MASTERED;
12033 }
12034
12035 const int skill_level = get_knowledge_level( skill );
12036 const int skill_requirement = type->req;
12037 const int max_skill_learnable = type->level;
12038
12039 if( skill_requirement > skill_level ) {
12040 return book_mastery::CANT_UNDERSTAND;
12041 }
12042 if( skill_level >= max_skill_learnable ) {
12043 return book_mastery::MASTERED;
12044 }
12045 return book_mastery::LEARNING;
12046}
12047
12048bool Character::fun_to_read( const item &book ) const
12049{
12050 return book_fun_for( book, *this ) > 0;
12051}
12052
12053int Character::book_fun_for( const item &book, const Character &p ) const
12054{
12055 int fun_bonus = book.type->book->fun;
12056 if( !book.is_book() ) {
12057 debugmsg( "called avatar::book_fun_for with non-book" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "12057", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "called avatar::book_fun_for with non-book"
);
12058 return 0;
12059 }
12060
12061 // If you don't have a problem with eating humans, To Serve Man becomes rewarding
12062 if( ( p.has_trait( trait_CANNIBAL ) || p.has_trait( trait_PSYCHOPATH ) ||
12063 p.has_trait( trait_SAPIOVORE ) ) &&
12064 book.typeId() == itype_cookbook_human ) {
12065 fun_bonus = std::abs( fun_bonus );
12066 } else if( p.has_trait( trait_SPIRITUAL ) && book.has_flag( flag_INSPIRATIONAL ) ) {
12067 fun_bonus = std::abs( fun_bonus * 3 );
12068 }
12069
12070 if( has_trait( trait_LOVES_BOOKS ) ) {
12071 fun_bonus++;
12072 } else if( has_trait( trait_HATES_BOOKS ) ) {
12073 if( book.type->book->fun > 0 ) {
12074 fun_bonus = 0;
12075 } else {
12076 fun_bonus--;
12077 }
12078 }
12079
12080 if( fun_bonus > 1 && book.get_chapters() > 0 && book.get_remaining_chapters( p ) == 0 ) {
12081 fun_bonus /= 2;
12082 }
12083
12084 return fun_bonus;
12085}
12086
12087bool Character::has_bionic_with_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
12088{
12089 auto iter = bio_flag_cache.find( flag );
12090 if( iter != bio_flag_cache.end() ) {
12091 return iter->second;
12092 }
12093 for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
12094 if( bio.info().has_flag( flag ) ) {
12095 bio_flag_cache[flag] = true;
12096 return true;
12097 }
12098 if( bio.info().activated ) {
12099 if( ( bio.info().has_active_flag( flag ) && has_active_bionic( bio.id ) ) ||
12100 ( bio.info().has_inactive_flag( flag ) && !has_active_bionic( bio.id ) ) ) {
12101 bio_flag_cache[flag] = true;
12102 return true;
12103 }
12104 }
12105 }
12106 bio_flag_cache[flag] = false;
12107 return false;
12108}
12109
12110int Character::count_bionic_with_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
12111{
12112 int ret = 0;
12113 for( const bionic &bio : *my_bionics ) {
12114 if( bio.info().has_flag( flag ) ) {
12115 ret++;
12116 }
12117 if( bio.info().activated ) {
12118 if( ( bio.info().has_active_flag( flag ) && has_active_bionic( bio.id ) ) ||
12119 ( bio.info().has_inactive_flag( flag ) && !has_active_bionic( bio.id ) ) ) {
12120 ret++;
12121 }
12122 }
12123 }
12124
12125 return ret;
12126}
12127
12128bool Character::has_bodypart_with_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
12129{
12130 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : get_body() ) {
12131 if( elem.first->has_flag( flag ) ) {
12132 return true;
12133 }
12134 if( elem.second.has_conditional_flag( flag ) ) {
12135 return true;
12136 }
12137 }
12138 return false;
12139}
12140
12141int Character::count_bodypart_with_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
12142{
12143 int ret = 0;
12144 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
12145 if( bp->has_flag( flag ) ) {
12146 ret++;
12147 }
12148 if( get_part( bp )->has_conditional_flag( flag ) ) {
12149 ret++;
12150 }
12151 }
12152 return ret;
12153}
12154
12155bool Character::has_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
12156{
12157 // If this is a performance problem create a map of flags stored for a character and updated on trait, mutation, bionic add/remove, activate/deactivate, effect gain/loss
12158 return has_trait_flag( flag ) ||
12159 has_bionic_with_flag( flag ) ||
12160 has_effect_with_flag( flag ) ||
12161 has_bodypart_with_flag( flag ) ||
12162 has_mabuff_flag( flag );
12163}
12164
12165int Character::count_flag( const json_character_flag &flag ) const
12166{
12167 // If this is a performance problem create a map of flags stored for a character and updated on trait, mutation, bionic add/remove, activate/deactivate, effect gain/loss
12168 return count_trait_flag( flag ) +
12169 count_bionic_with_flag( flag ) +
12170 has_effect_with_flag( flag ) +
12171 count_bodypart_with_flag( flag ) +
12172 count_mabuff_flag( flag );
12173}
12174
12175bool Character::is_driving() const
12176{
12177 const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( pos() );
12178 return vp && vp->vehicle().is_moving() && vp->vehicle().player_in_control( *this );
12179}
12180
12181time_duration Character::estimate_effect_dur( const skill_id &relevant_skill,
12182 const efftype_id &effect, const time_duration &error_magnitude,
12183 const time_duration &minimum_error, int threshold, const Creature &target ) const
12184{
12185 const time_duration zero_duration = 0_turns;
12186
12187 int skill_lvl = get_skill_level( relevant_skill );
12188
12189 time_duration estimate = std::max( zero_duration, target.get_effect_dur( effect ) +
12190 rng_float( -1, 1 ) * ( minimum_error + ( error_magnitude - minimum_error ) *
12191 std::max( 0.0, static_cast<double>( threshold - skill_lvl ) / threshold ) ) );
12192 return estimate;
12193}
12194
12195void Character::invalidate_pseudo_items()
12196{
12197 pseudo_items_valid = false;
12198}
12199
12200bool Character::avoid_trap( const tripoint &pos, const trap &tr ) const
12201{
12202 /** @EFFECT_DEX increases chance to avoid traps */
12203
12204 /** @EFFECT_DODGE increases chance to avoid traps */
12205 int myroll = dice( 3, round( dex_cur + get_skill_level( skill_dodge ) * 1.5 ) );
12206 int traproll;
12207 if( tr.can_see( pos, *this ) ) {
12208 traproll = dice( 3, tr.get_avoidance() );
12209 } else {
12210 traproll = dice( 6, tr.get_avoidance() );
12211 }
12212
12213 if( has_trait( trait_LIGHTSTEP ) ) {
12214 myroll += dice( 2, 6 );
12215 }
12216
12217 if( has_trait( trait_CLUMSY ) ) {
12218 myroll -= dice( 2, 6 );
12219 }
12220
12221 return myroll >= traproll;
12222}
12223
12224bool Character::add_faction_warning( const faction_id &id ) const
12225{
12226 const auto it = warning_record.find( id );
12227 if( it != warning_record.end() ) {
12228 it->second.first += 1;
12229 if( it->second.second - calendar::turn > 5_minutes ) {
12230 it->second.first -= 1;
12231 }
12232 it->second.second = calendar::turn;
12233 if( it->second.first > 3 ) {
12234 return true;
12235 }
12236 } else {
12237 warning_record[id] = std::make_pair( 1, calendar::turn );
12238 }
12239 faction *fac = g->faction_manager_ptr->get( id );
12240 if( fac != nullptr && is_avatar() && fac->id != faction_no_faction ) {
12241 fac->likes_u -= 1;
12242 fac->respects_u -= 1;
12243 fac->trusts_u -= 1;
12244 }
12245 return false;
12246}
12247
12248int Character::current_warnings_fac( const faction_id &id )
12249{
12250 const auto it = warning_record.find( id );
12251 if( it != warning_record.end() ) {
12252 if( it->second.second - calendar::turn > 5_minutes ) {
12253 it->second.first = std::max( 0,
12254 it->second.first - 1 );
12255 }
12256 return it->second.first;
12257 }
12258 return 0;
12259}
12260
12261bool Character::beyond_final_warning( const faction_id &id )
12262{
12263 const auto it = warning_record.find( id );
12264 if( it != warning_record.end() ) {
12265 if( it->second.second - calendar::turn > 5_minutes ) {
12266 it->second.first = std::max( 0,
12267 it->second.first - 1 );
12268 }
12269 return it->second.first > 3;
12270 }
12271 return false;
12272}
12273
12274read_condition_result Character::check_read_condition( const item &book ) const
12275{
12276 read_condition_result result = read_condition_result::SUCCESS;
12277 if( !book.is_book() ) {
12278 result |= read_condition_result::NOT_BOOK;
12279 } else {
12280 const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( pos() );
12281 if( vp && vp->vehicle().player_in_control( *this ) ) {
12282 result |= read_condition_result::DRIVING;
12283 }
12284
12285 if( !fun_to_read( book ) && !has_morale_to_read() && has_identified( book.typeId() ) ) {
12286 result |= read_condition_result::MORALE_LOW;
12287 }
12288
12289 const book_mastery mastery = get_book_mastery( book );
12290 if( mastery == book_mastery::CANT_UNDERSTAND ) {
12291 result |= read_condition_result::CANT_UNDERSTAND;
12292 }
12293 if( mastery == book_mastery::MASTERED ) {
12294 result |= read_condition_result::MASTERED;
12295 }
12296
12297 const bool book_requires_intelligence = book.type->book->intel > 0;
12298 if( book_requires_intelligence && has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
12299 result |= read_condition_result::ILLITERATE;
12300 }
12301 if( has_flag( json_flag_HYPEROPIC ) &&
12302 !worn_with_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "FIX_FARSIGHT" ) )(([]()-> const auto &{ using ExprType = std::decay_t<
decltype(static_argument_identity( flag_id( "FIX_FARSIGHT" ) )
)>; using CachedType = std::conditional_t<std::is_same_v
<ExprType, const char*>, std::string, ExprType>; static
const CachedType _cached_expr = static_argument_identity( flag_id
( "FIX_FARSIGHT" ) ); return _cached_expr; })()) ) &&
12303 !has_effect( effect_contacts ) &&
12304 !has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
12305 !has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "ENHANCED_VISION" ) )(([]()-> const auto &{ using ExprType = std::decay_t<
decltype(static_argument_identity( json_character_flag( "ENHANCED_VISION"
) ))>; using CachedType = std::conditional_t<std::is_same_v
<ExprType, const char*>, std::string, ExprType>; static
const CachedType _cached_expr = static_argument_identity( json_character_flag
( "ENHANCED_VISION" ) ); return _cached_expr; })()) ) ) {
12306 result |= read_condition_result::NEED_GLASSES;
12307 }
12308 if( fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
12309 result |= read_condition_result::TOO_DARK;
12310 }
12311 if( is_blind() ) {
12312 result |= read_condition_result::BLIND;
12313 }
12314 }
12315 return result;
12316}
12317
12318const Character *Character::get_book_reader( const item &book,
12319 std::vector<std::string> &reasons ) const
12320{
12321 const Character *reader = nullptr;
12322
12323 if( !book.is_book() ) {
12324 reasons.push_back( is_avatar() ? string_format( _( "Your %s is not good reading material." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s is not good reading material."
) ) ),
12325 book.tname() ) :
12326 string_format( _( "The %s is not good reading material." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is not good reading material."
) ) ), book.tname() )
12327 );
12328 return nullptr;
12329 }
12330
12331 const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &type = book.type->book;
12332 const skill_id &book_skill = type->skill;
12333 const int book_skill_requirement = type->req;
12334
12335 // Check for conditions that immediately disqualify the player from reading:
12336 read_condition_result condition = check_read_condition( book );
12337 if( condition & read_condition_result::DRIVING ) {
12338 reasons.emplace_back( _( "It's a bad idea to read while driving!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's a bad idea to read while driving!"
) ) ) );
12339 return nullptr;
12340 }
12341 if( condition & read_condition_result::MORALE_LOW ) {
12342 // Low morale still permits skimming
12343 reasons.emplace_back( is_avatar() ?
12344 _( "What's the point of studying? (Your morale is too low!)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "What's the point of studying? (Your morale is too low!)"
) ) ) :
12345 string_format( _( "What's the point of studying? (%s)'s morale is too low!)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "What's the point of studying? (%s)'s morale is too low!)"
) ) ), disp_name() ) );
12346 return nullptr;
12347 }
12348 if( condition & read_condition_result::CANT_UNDERSTAND ) {
12349 reasons.push_back( is_avatar() ? string_format( _( "%s %d needed to understand. You have %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s %d needed to understand. You have %d"
) ) ),
12350 book_skill->name(), book_skill_requirement, get_knowledge_level( book_skill ) ) :
12351 string_format( _( "%s %d needed to understand. %s has %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s %d needed to understand. %s has %d"
) ) ), book_skill->name(),
12352 book_skill_requirement, disp_name(), get_knowledge_level( book_skill ) ) );
12353 return nullptr;
12354 }
12355
12356 // Check for conditions that disqualify us only if no other Characters can read to us
12357 if( condition & read_condition_result::ILLITERATE ) {
12358 reasons.emplace_back( is_avatar() ? _( "You're illiterate!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You're illiterate!" ) ) ) : string_format(
12359 _( "%s is illiterate!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s is illiterate!" ) ) ), disp_name() ) );
12360 } else if( condition & read_condition_result::NEED_GLASSES ) {
12361 reasons.emplace_back( is_avatar() ? _( "Your eyes won't focus without reading glasses." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your eyes won't focus without reading glasses."
) ) ) :
12362 string_format( _( "%s's eyes won't focus without reading glasses." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s's eyes won't focus without reading glasses."
) ) ), disp_name() ) );
12363 } else if( condition & read_condition_result::TOO_DARK ) {
12364 // Too dark to read only applies if the player can read to himself
12365 reasons.emplace_back( _( "It's too dark to read!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's too dark to read!" ) ) ) );
12366 return nullptr;
12367 } else {
12368 return this;
12369 }
12370
12371 if( ! is_avatar() ) {
12372 // NPCs are too proud to ask for help, perhaps someday they will not be
12373 return nullptr;
12374 }
12375
12376 //Check for other Characters to read for you, negates Illiterate and Far Sighted
12377 //The fastest-reading Character is chosen
12378 if( is_deaf() ) {
12379 reasons.emplace_back( _( "Maybe someone could read that to you, but you're deaf!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Maybe someone could read that to you, but you're deaf!"
) ) ) );
12380 return nullptr;
12381 }
12382
12383 time_duration time_taken = time_duration::from_turns( INT_MAX2147483647 );
12384 std::vector<Character *> candidates = get_crafting_helpers();
12385
12386 for( const Character *elem : candidates ) {
12387 // Check for disqualifying factors:
12388 condition = elem->check_read_condition( book );
12389 if( condition & read_condition_result::ILLITERATE ) {
12390 reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s is illiterate!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s is illiterate!" ) ) ),
12391 elem->disp_name() ) );
12392 } else if( condition & read_condition_result::CANT_UNDERSTAND ) {
12393 reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s %d needed to understand. %s has %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s %d needed to understand. %s has %d"
) ) ),
12394 book_skill->name(), book_skill_requirement, elem->disp_name(),
12395 elem->get_knowledge_level( book_skill ) ) );
12396 } else if( condition & read_condition_result::NEED_GLASSES ) {
12397 reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s needs reading glasses!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s needs reading glasses!" )
) ),
12398 elem->disp_name() ) );
12399 } else if( condition & read_condition_result::TOO_DARK ) {
12400 reasons.push_back( string_format(
12401 _( "It's too dark for %s to read!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's too dark for %s to read!"
) ) ),
12402 elem->disp_name() ) );
12403 } else if( !elem->sees( *this ) ) {
12404 reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s could read that to you, but they can't see you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s could read that to you, but they can't see you."
) ) ),
12405 elem->disp_name() ) );
12406 } else if( condition & read_condition_result::MORALE_LOW ) {
12407 // Low morale still permits skimming
12408 reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s morale is too low!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s morale is too low!" ) ) ), elem->disp_name( true ) ) );
12409 } else if( condition & read_condition_result::BLIND ) {
12410 reasons.push_back( string_format( _( "%s is blind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s is blind." ) ) ), elem->disp_name() ) );
12411 } else {
12412 time_duration proj_time = time_to_read( book, *elem );
12413 if( proj_time < time_taken ) {
12414 reader = elem;
12415 time_taken = proj_time;
12416 }
12417 }
12418 }
12419 //end for all candidates
12420 return reader;
12421}
12422
12423time_duration Character::time_to_read( const item &book, const Character &reader,
12424 const Character *learner ) const
12425{
12426 const auto &type = book.type->book;
12427 const skill_id &skill = type->skill;
12428 // The reader's reading speed has an effect only if they're trying to understand the book as they read it
12429 // Reading speed is assumed to be how well you learn from books (as opposed to hands-on experience)
12430 const bool try_understand = reader.fun_to_read( book ) ||
12431 reader.get_knowledge_level( skill ) < type->level;
12432 int reading_speed = try_understand ? std::max( reader.read_speed(), read_speed() ) : read_speed();
12433 if( learner ) {
12434 reading_speed = std::max( reading_speed, learner->read_speed() );
12435 }
12436
12437 time_duration retval = type->time * reading_speed / 100;
12438 retval *= std::min( fine_detail_vision_mod(), reader.fine_detail_vision_mod() );
12439
12440 const int effective_int = std::min( { get_int(), reader.get_int(), learner ? learner->get_int() : INT_MAX2147483647 } );
12441 if( type->intel > effective_int && !reader.has_trait( trait_PROF_DICEMASTER ) ) {
12442 retval += type->time * ( time_duration::from_seconds( type->intel - effective_int ) / 1_minutes );
12443 }
12444 if( !has_identified( book.typeId() ) ) {
12445 //skimming
12446 retval /= 10;
12447 }
12448 return retval;
12449}
12450
12451int Character::thirst_speed_penalty( int thirst )
12452{
12453 // We die at 1200 thirst
12454 // Start by dropping speed really fast, but then level it off a bit
12455 static const std::vector<std::pair<float, float>> thirst_thresholds = {{
12456 std::make_pair( 40.0f, 0.0f ),
12457 std::make_pair( 300.0f, -25.0f ),
12458 std::make_pair( 600.0f, -50.0f ),
12459 std::make_pair( 1200.0f, -75.0f )
12460 }
12461 };
12462 return static_cast<int>( multi_lerp( thirst_thresholds, thirst ) );
12463}
12464
12465std::vector<speed_bonus_effect> Character::get_speed_bonus_effects() const
12466{
12467 return speed_bonus_effects;
12468}
12469
12470void Character::mod_speed_bonus( int nspeed, const std::string &desc )
12471{
12472 if( nspeed != 0 ) {
12473 speed_bonus_effect effect { desc, nspeed };
12474 speed_bonus_effects.push_back( effect );
12475 speed_bonus += nspeed;
12476 }
12477}
12478
12479void Character::recalc_speed_bonus()
12480{
12481 speed_bonus_effects.clear();
12482 // Minus some for weight...
12483 int carry_penalty = 0;
12484 units::mass weight_cap = weight_capacity();
12485 if( weight_cap < 1_milligram ) {
12486 weight_cap = 1_milligram; //Prevent Clang warning about divide by zero
12487 }
12488 if( weight_carried() > weight_cap ) {
12489 carry_penalty = 25 * ( weight_carried() - weight_cap ) / weight_cap;
12490 }
12491 mod_speed_bonus( -carry_penalty, _( "Weight Carried" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Weight Carried" ) ) ) );
12492
12493 mod_speed_bonus( +get_speedydex_bonus( get_dex() ), _( "Dexterity" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dexterity" ) ) ) );
12494
12495 mod_speed_bonus( -get_pain_penalty().speed, _( "Pain" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Pain" ) ) ) );
12496
12497 if( get_thirst() > 40 ) {
12498 mod_speed_bonus( thirst_speed_penalty( get_thirst() ), _( "Thirst" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Thirst" ) ) ) );
12499 }
12500 // when underweight, you get slower. cumulative with hunger
12501 mod_speed_bonus( kcal_speed_penalty(), _( "Underweight" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Underweight" ) ) ) );
12502
12503 for( const auto &maps : *effects ) {
12504 for( const auto &i : maps.second ) {
12505 bool reduced = resists_effect( i.second );
12506 //TODO try disp_short_desc() or disp_short_desc(true) if disp_name doesn't work well
12507 mod_speed_bonus( i.second.get_mod( "SPEED", reduced ), i.second.disp_name() );
12508 }
12509 }
12510
12511 // add martial arts speed bonus
12512 mod_speed_bonus( mabuff_speed_bonus(), _( "Martial Art" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Martial Art" ) ) ) );
12513
12514 // Not sure why Sunlight Dependent is here, but OK
12515 // Ectothermic/COLDBLOOD4 is intended to buff folks in the Summer
12516 // Threshold-crossing has its charms ;-)
12517 if( g != nullptr ) {
12518 if( has_trait( trait_SUNLIGHT_DEPENDENT ) && !g->is_in_sunlight( pos() ) ) {
12519 //FIXME get trait name directly
12520 mod_speed_bonus( -( g->light_level( posz() ) >= 12 ? 5 : 10 ), _( "Sunlight Dependent" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Sunlight Dependent" ) ) ) );
12521 }
12522 const float temperature_speed_modifier = mutation_value( "temperature_speed_modifier" );
12523 if( temperature_speed_modifier != 0 ) {
12524 const int climate_control = climate_control_strength().first;
12525 const units::temperature player_local_temp = get_weather().get_temperature( pos() );
12526 if( has_flag( json_flag_ECTOTHERM ) ||
12527 player_local_temp < units::from_fahrenheit( 65 - climate_control ) ) {
12528 mod_speed_bonus( ( units::to_fahrenheit( player_local_temp ) - 65 + climate_control ) *
12529 temperature_speed_modifier, _( "Ectothermic" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Ectothermic" ) ) ) );
12530 }
12531 }
12532 }
12533 const int prev_speed_bonus = get_speed_bonus();
12534 const int speed_bonus_with_enchant = std::round( enchantment_cache->modify_value(
12535 enchant_vals::mod::SPEED,
12536 get_speed() ) - get_speed_base() );
12537 enchantment_speed_bonus = speed_bonus_with_enchant - prev_speed_bonus;
12538 mod_speed_bonus( enchantment_speed_bonus, _( "Bio/Mut/Etc Effects" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bio/Mut/Etc Effects" ) ) ) );
12539 // Speed cannot be less than 25% of base speed, so minimal speed bonus is -75% base speed.
12540 const int min_speed_bonus = static_cast<int>( -0.75 * get_speed_base() );
12541 if( get_speed_bonus() < min_speed_bonus ) {
12542 mod_speed_bonus( min_speed_bonus - get_speed_bonus(), _( "Penalty Cap" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Penalty Cap" ) ) ) );
12543 }
12544}
12545
12546double Character::recoil_vehicle() const
12547{
12548 // TODO: vary penalty dependent upon vehicle part on which player is boarded
12549
12550 if( in_vehicle ) {
12551 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( pos() ) ) {
12552 return static_cast<double>( std::abs( vp->vehicle().velocity ) ) * 3 / 100;
12553 }
12554 }
12555 return 0;
12556}
12557
12558double Character::recoil_total() const
12559{
12560 return recoil + recoil_vehicle();
12561}
12562
12563bool Character::is_hallucination() const
12564{
12565 return false;
12566}
12567
12568bool Character::is_electrical() const
12569{
12570 // for now this is false. In the future should have rules
12571 return false;
12572}
12573
12574bool Character::is_fae() const
12575{
12576 if( has_trait( trait_FAERIECREATURE ) ) {
12577 return true;
12578 }
12579 return false;
12580}
12581
12582bool Character::is_nether() const
12583{
12584 // for now this is false. In the future should have rules
12585 return false;
12586}
12587
12588bool Character::has_mind() const
12589{
12590 // Characters are all humans and thus have minds
12591 return true;
12592}
12593
12594void Character::set_underwater( bool u )
12595{
12596 if( underwater != u ) {
12597 underwater = u;
12598 recalc_sight_limits();
12599 }
12600}
12601
12602stat_mod Character::get_pain_penalty() const
12603{
12604 stat_mod ret;
12605 int pain = get_perceived_pain();
12606 if( pain <= 0 ) {
12607 return ret;
12608 }
12609
12610 int stat_penalty = std::floor( std::pow( pain, 0.8f ) / 10.0f );
12611
12612 bool ceno = has_trait( trait_CENOBITE );
12613 if( !ceno ) {
12614 ret.strength = stat_penalty;
12615 ret.dexterity = stat_penalty;
12616 }
12617
12618 if( !has_trait( trait_INT_SLIME ) ) {
12619 ret.intelligence = stat_penalty;
12620 } else {
12621 ret.intelligence = pain / 5;
12622 }
12623
12624 ret.perception = stat_penalty * 2 / 3;
12625
12626 ret.speed = std::pow( pain, 0.7f );
12627 if( ceno ) {
12628 ret.speed /= 2;
12629 }
12630
12631 ret.speed = std::min( ret.speed, 50 );
12632 return ret;
12633}
12634
12635int Character::get_lift_str() const
12636{
12637 int str = get_arm_str();
12638 if( has_trait( trait_STRONGBACK ) ) {
12639 str *= 1.35;
12640 } else if( has_trait( trait_BADBACK ) ) {
12641 str /= 1.35;
12642 }
12643 return str;
12644}
12645
12646int Character::get_lift_assist() const
12647{
12648 int result = 0;
12649 for( const Character *guy : get_crafting_helpers() ) {
12650 result += guy->get_lift_str();
12651 }
12652 return result;
12653}
12654
12655bool Character::immune_to( const bodypart_id &bp, damage_unit dam ) const
12656{
12657 if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_NODMG ) || is_immune_damage( dam.type ) ||
12658 has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
12659 return true;
12660 }
12661
12662 passive_absorb_hit( bp, dam );
12663
12664 worn.damage_mitigate( bp, dam );
12665
12666 return dam.amount <= 0;
12667}
12668
12669void Character::mod_pain( int npain )
12670{
12671 if( npain > 0 ) {
12672 double mult = enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( enchant_vals::mod::PAIN );
12673 if( has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) || has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
12674 return;
12675 }
12676 // if there is a positive multiplier we always want to add at least 1 pain
12677 if( mult > 0 ) {
12678 npain += std::max( 1, roll_remainder( npain * mult ) );
12679 }
12680 if( mult < 0 ) {
12681 npain = roll_remainder( npain * ( 1 + mult ) );
12682 }
12683 if( mutation_value( "pain_modifier" ) != 0 ) {
12684 npain = roll_remainder( npain + mutation_value( "pain_modifier" ) );
12685 if( npain < 0 ) {
12686 return;
12687 }
12688 }
12689 npain += enchantment_cache->get_value_add( enchant_vals::mod::PAIN );
12690
12691 // no matter how powerful the enchantment if we are gaining pain we don't lose any
12692 npain = std::max( 0, npain );
12693 }
12694 Creature::mod_pain( npain );
12695}
12696
12697void Character::set_pain( int npain )
12698{
12699 const int prev_pain = get_perceived_pain();
12700 Creature::set_pain( npain );
12701 const int cur_pain = get_perceived_pain();
12702
12703 if( cur_pain != prev_pain ) {
12704 react_to_felt_pain( cur_pain - prev_pain );
12705 on_stat_change( "perceived_pain", cur_pain );
12706 }
12707}
12708
12709int Character::get_perceived_pain() const
12710{
12711 if( get_effect_int( effect_adrenaline ) > 1 ) {
12712 return 0;
12713 }
12714
12715 return std::max( get_pain() - get_painkiller(), 0 );
12716}
12717
12718float Character::fall_damage_mod() const
12719{
12720 if( has_flag( json_flag_FEATHER_FALL ) ) {
12721 return 0.0f;
12722 }
12723 float ret = 1.0f;
12724
12725 // Ability to land properly is 2x as important as dexterity itself
12726 /** @EFFECT_DEX decreases damage from falling */
12727
12728 /** @EFFECT_DODGE decreases damage from falling */
12729 float dex_dodge = dex_cur / 2.0 + get_skill_level( skill_dodge );
12730 // Reactions, legwork and footing determine your landing
12731 dex_dodge *= get_modifier( character_modifier_limb_fall_mod );
12732 // But prevent it from increasing damage
12733 dex_dodge = std::max( 0.0f, dex_dodge ); // 0
12734 // 100% damage at 0, 75% at 10, 50% at 20 and so on
12735 ret *= ( 100.0f - ( dex_dodge * 4.0f ) ) / 100.0f;
12736
12737 if( has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ) {
12738 ret *= 2.0f / 3.0f;
12739 }
12740
12741 // TODO: Bonus for Judo, mutations. Penalty for heavy weight (including mutations)
12742
12743 ret = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::FALL_DAMAGE, ret );
12744
12745 return std::max( 0.0f, ret );
12746}
12747
12748// force is maximum damage to hp before scaling
12749int Character::impact( const int force, const tripoint &p )
12750{
12751 // Falls over ~30m are fatal more often than not
12752 // But that would be quite a lot considering 21 z-levels in game
12753 // so let's assume 1 z-level is comparable to 30 force
12754
12755 if( force <= 0 ) {
12756 return force;
12757 }
12758
12759 // Damage modifier (post armor)
12760 float mod = 1.0f;
12761 int effective_force = force;
12762 int cut = 0;
12763 // Percentage armor penetration - armor won't help much here
12764 // TODO: Make cushioned items like bike helmets help more
12765 float armor_eff = 1.0f;
12766 // Shock Absorber CBM heavily reduces damage
12767 const bool shock_absorbers = has_active_bionic( bio_shock_absorber );
12768
12769 // Being slammed against things rather than landing means we can't
12770 // control the impact as well
12771 const bool slam = p != pos();
12772 std::string target_name = "a swarm of bugs";
12773 Creature *critter = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( p );
12774 map &here = get_map();
12775 if( critter != this && critter != nullptr ) {
12776 target_name = critter->disp_name();
12777 // Slamming into creatures and NPCs
12778 // TODO: Handle spikes/horns and hard materials
12779 armor_eff = 0.5f; // 2x as much as with the ground
12780 // TODO: Modify based on something?
12781 mod = 1.0f;
12782 effective_force = force;
12783 } else if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( p ) ) {
12784 // Slamming into vehicles
12785 // TODO: Integrate it with vehicle collision function somehow
12786 target_name = vp->vehicle().disp_name();
12787 if( vp.part_with_feature( "SHARP", true ) ) {
12788 // Now we're actually getting impaled
12789 cut = force; // Lots of fun
12790 }
12791
12792 mod = slam ? 1.0f : fall_damage_mod();
12793 armor_eff = 0.25f; // Not much
12794 if( !slam && vp->part_with_feature( "ROOF", true ) ) {
12795 // Roof offers better landing than frame or pavement
12796 // TODO: Make this not happen with heavy-duty/plated roof
12797 effective_force /= 2;
12798 }
12799 } else {
12800 // Slamming into terrain/furniture
12801 target_name = here.disp_name( p );
12802 int hard_ground = here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DIGGABLE, p ) ? 0 : 3;
12803 armor_eff = 0.25f; // Not much
12804 // Get cut by stuff
12805 // This isn't impalement on metal wreckage, more like flying through a closed window
12806 cut = here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHARP, p ) ? 5 : 0;
12807 effective_force = force + hard_ground;
12808 mod = slam ? 1.0f : fall_damage_mod();
12809 if( here.has_furn( p ) ) {
12810 // TODO: Make furniture matter
12811 } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, p ) ) {
12812 const float swim_skill = get_skill_level( skill_swimming );
12813 effective_force /= 4.0f + 0.1f * swim_skill;
12814 if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, p ) ) {
12815 effective_force /= 1.5f;
12816 mod /= 1.0f + ( 0.1f * swim_skill );
12817 }
12818 }
12819 }
12820
12821 // Rescale for huge force
12822 // At >30 force, proper landing is impossible and armor helps way less
12823 if( effective_force > 30 ) {
12824 // Armor simply helps way less
12825 armor_eff *= 30.0f / effective_force;
12826 if( mod < 1.0f ) {
12827 // Everything past 30 damage gets a worse modifier
12828 const float scaled_mod = std::pow( mod, 30.0f / effective_force );
12829 const float scaled_damage = ( 30.0f * mod ) + scaled_mod * ( effective_force - 30.0f );
12830 mod = scaled_damage / effective_force;
12831 }
12832 }
12833
12834 if( !slam && mod < 1.0f && mod * force < 5 ) {
12835 // Perfect landing, no damage (regardless of armor)
12836 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You land on %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You land on %s." ) ) ), target_name );
12837 return 0;
12838 }
12839
12840 // Shock absorbers kick in only when they need to, so if our other protections fail, fall back on them
12841 if( shock_absorbers ) {
12842 effective_force -= 15; // Provide a flat reduction to force
12843 if( mod > 0.25f ) {
12844 mod = 0.25f; // And provide a 75% reduction against that force if we don't have it already
12845 }
12846 if( effective_force < 0 ) {
12847 effective_force = 0;
12848 }
12849 }
12850
12851 int total_dealt = 0;
12852 if( mod * effective_force >= 5 ) {
12853 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
12854 const int bash = effective_force * rng( 60, 100 ) / 100;
12855 damage_instance di;
12856 // FIXME: Hardcoded damage types
12857 di.add_damage( damage_bash, bash, 0, armor_eff, mod );
12858 // No good way to land on sharp stuff, so here modifier == 1.0f
12859 di.add_damage( damage_cut, cut, 0, armor_eff, 1.0f );
12860 total_dealt += deal_damage( nullptr, bp, di ).total_damage();
12861 }
12862 }
12863
12864 if( total_dealt > 0 && is_avatar() ) {
12865 // "You slam against the dirt" is fine
12866 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You are slammed against %1$s for %2$d damage." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are slammed against %1$s for %2$d damage."
) ) ),
12867 target_name, total_dealt );
12868 } else if( is_avatar() && shock_absorbers ) {
12869 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You are slammed against %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are slammed against %s!"
) ) ),
12870 target_name, total_dealt );
12871 add_msg( m_good, _( "â¦but your shock absorbers negate the damage!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "â¦but your shock absorbers negate the damage!"
) ) ) );
12872 } else if( slam ) {
12873 // Only print this line if it is a slam and not a landing
12874 // Non-players should only get this one: player doesn't know how much damage was dealt
12875 // and landing messages for each slammed creature would be too much
12876 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
12877 _( "You are slammed against %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are slammed against %s."
) ) ),
12878 _( "<npcname> is slammed against %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> is slammed against %s."
) ) ),
12879 target_name );
12880 } else {
12881 // No landing message for NPCs
12882 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You land on %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You land on %s." ) ) ), target_name );
12883 }
12884
12885 if( x_in_y( mod, 1.0f ) && !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, p ) ) {
12886 add_effect( effect_downed, rng( 1_turns, 1_turns + mod * 3_turns ) );
12887 }
12888
12889 return total_dealt;
12890}
12891
12892bool Character::can_fly()
12893{
12894 if( has_effect( effect_stunned ) || has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ||
12895 ( has_effect( effect_grabbed ) && !try_remove_grab() ) || movement_mode_is( move_mode_prone ) ||
12896 has_effect( effect_downed ) ) {
12897 return false;
12898 }
12899 // GLIDE is for artifacts or things like jetpacks that don't care if you're tired or hurt.
12900 if( has_trait_flag( json_flag_GLIDE ) ) {
12901 return true;
12902 }
12903 if( ( has_trait_flag( json_flag_WINGS_1 ) || has_trait_flag( json_flag_WINGS_2 ) ||
12904 has_trait_flag( json_flag_WING_GLIDE ) ) &&
12905 ( 100 * weight_carried() / weight_capacity() > 50 || get_str() < 4 ||
12906 has_effect( effect_winded ) ) ) {
12907 return false;
12908 }
12909 if( has_trait_flag( json_flag_WING_ARMS ) && get_working_arm_count() < 2 ) {
12910 return false;
12911 }
12912 return true;
12913}
12914
12915// FIXME: Relies on hardcoded bash damage type
12916void Character::knock_back_to( const tripoint &to )
12917{
12918 if( to == pos() ) {
12919 return;
12920 }
12921
12922 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
12923 // First, see if we hit a monster
12924 if( monster *const critter = creatures.creature_at<monster>( to ) ) {
12925 deal_damage( critter, bodypart_id( "torso" ), damage_instance( damage_bash,
12926 static_cast<float>( critter->type->size ) ) );
12927 add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
12928 /** @EFFECT_STR_MAX allows knocked back player to knock back, damage, stun some monsters */
12929 if( ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 > critter->type->size ) {
12930 critter->knock_back_from( pos() ); // Chain reaction!
12931 critter->apply_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 );
12932 critter->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
12933 } else if( ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 == critter->type->size ) {
12934 critter->apply_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), ( str_max - 6 ) / 4 );
12935 critter->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
12936 }
12937 critter->check_dead_state();
12938
12939 add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off a %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You bounce off a %s!" ) ) ), _( "<npcname> bounces off a %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> bounces off a %s!"
) ) ),
12940 critter->name() );
12941 return;
12942 }
12943
12944 if( npc *const np = creatures.creature_at<npc>( to ) ) {
12945 deal_damage( np, bodypart_id( "torso" ),
12946 damage_instance( damage_bash, static_cast<float>( np->get_size() ) ) );
12947 add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns );
12948 np->deal_damage( this, bodypart_id( "torso" ), damage_instance( damage_bash, 3 ) );
12949 add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You bounce off %s!" ) ) ), _( "<npcname> bounces off %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> bounces off %s!"
) ) ),
12950 np->get_name() );
12951 np->check_dead_state();
12952 return;
12953 }
12954
12955 map &here = get_map();
12956 // If we're still in the function at this point, we're actually moving a tile!
12957 if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUID, to ) &&
12958 here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, to ) ) {
12959 if( !is_npc() ) {
12960 avatar_action::swim( here, get_avatar(), to );
12961 }
12962 // TODO: NPCs can't swim!
12963 } else if( here.impassable( to ) ) { // Wait, it's a wall
12964
12965 // It's some kind of wall.
12966 // TODO: who knocked us back? Maybe that creature should be the source of the damage?
12967 apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 3 );
12968 add_effect( effect_stunned, 2_turns );
12969 add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You bounce off a %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You bounce off a %s!" ) ) ), _( "<npcname> bounces off a %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> bounces off a %s!"
) ) ),
12970 here.obstacle_name( to ) );
12971
12972 } else { // It's no wall
12973 setpos( to );
12974 }
12975}
12976
12977int Character::hp_percentage() const
12978{
12979 const bodypart_id head_id = bodypart_id( "head" );
12980 const bodypart_id torso_id = bodypart_id( "torso" );
12981 int total_cur = 0;
12982 int total_max = 0;
12983 // Head and torso HP are weighted 3x and 2x, respectively
12984 total_cur = get_part_hp_cur( head_id ) * 3 + get_part_hp_cur( torso_id ) * 2;
12985 total_max = get_part_hp_max( head_id ) * 3 + get_part_hp_max( torso_id ) * 2;
12986 for( const std::pair< const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : get_body() ) {
12987 total_cur += elem.second.get_hp_cur();
12988 total_max += elem.second.get_hp_max();
12989 }
12990
12991 return ( 100 * total_cur ) / total_max;
12992}
12993
12994void Character::on_worn_item_transform( const item &old_it, const item &new_it )
12995{
12996 morale->on_worn_item_transform( old_it, new_it );
12997}
12998
12999void Character::leak_items()
13000{
13001 std::vector<item_location> removed_items;
13002 if( weapon.is_container() ) {
13003 if( weapon.leak( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
13004 weapon.spill_contents( pos() );
13005 }
13006 } else if( weapon.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
13007 if( weapon.leak( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
13008 get_map().add_item_or_charges( pos(), weapon );
13009 removed_items.emplace_back( *this, &weapon );
13010 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "%s spilled from your hand." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s spilled from your hand." )
) ), weapon.tname() );
13011 }
13012 }
13013
13014 for( item_location it : top_items_loc() ) {
13015 if( !it || ( !it->is_container() && !it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) ) {
13016 continue;
13017 }
13018 if( it->leak( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
13019 it->spill_contents( pos() );
13020 removed_items.push_back( it );
13021 }
13022 }
13023 for( item_location removed : removed_items ) {
13024 removed.remove_item();
13025 }
13026}
13027
13028void Character::process_items()
13029{
13030 if( weapon.process( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
13031 weapon.spill_contents( pos() );
13032 remove_weapon();
13033 }
13034
13035 std::vector<item_location> removed_items;
13036 for( item_location it : top_items_loc() ) {
13037 if( !it ) {
13038 continue;
13039 }
13040 if( it->process( get_map(), this, pos() ) ) {
13041 it->spill_contents( pos() );
13042 removed_items.push_back( it );
13043 }
13044 }
13045 for( item_location removed : removed_items ) {
13046 removed.remove_item();
13047 }
13048
13049 // Active item processing done, now we're recharging.
13050 if( worn.check_item_encumbrance_flag( get_check_encumbrance() ) ) {
13051 calc_encumbrance();
13052 set_check_encumbrance( false );
13053 }
13054
13055 // Load all items that use the UPS and have their own battery to their minimal functional charge,
13056 // The tool is not really useful if its charges are below charges_to_use
13057 std::vector<item *> inv_use_ups = cache_get_items_with( flag_USE_UPS, []( item & it ) {
13058 return !!it.ammo_data();
13059 } );
13060 if( !inv_use_ups.empty() ) {
13061 const units::energy available_charges = available_ups();
13062 units::energy ups_used = 0_kJ;
13063 for( item * const &it : inv_use_ups ) {
13064 // For powered armor, an armor-powering bionic should always be preferred over UPS usage.
13065 if( it->is_power_armor() && can_interface_armor() && has_power() ) {
13066 // Bionic power costs are handled elsewhere
13067 continue;
13068 } else if( it->active && !it->ammo_sufficient( this ) ) {
13069 it->deactivate();
13070 } else if( available_charges - ups_used >= 1_kJ &&
13071 it->ammo_remaining() < it->ammo_capacity( ammo_battery ) ) {
13072 // Charge the battery in the UPS modded tool
13073 ups_used += 1_kJ;
13074 it->ammo_set( itype_battery, it->ammo_remaining() + 1 );
13075 }
13076 }
13077 if( ups_used > 0_kJ ) {
13078 consume_ups( ups_used );
13079 }
13080 }
13081}
13082
13083void Character::search_surroundings()
13084{
13085 if( controlling_vehicle ) {
13086 return;
13087 }
13088 if( has_effect( effect_subaquatic_sonar ) && is_underwater() && calendar::once_every( 4_turns ) ) {
13089 echo_pulse();
13090 }
13091 map &here = get_map();
13092 // Search for traps in a larger area than before because this is the only
13093 // way we can "find" traps that aren't marked as visible.
13094 // Detection formula takes care of likelihood of seeing within this range.
13095 for( const tripoint &tp : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 5 ) ) {
13096 const trap &tr = here.tr_at( tp );
13097 if( tr.is_null() || tp == pos() ) {
13098 continue;
13099 }
13100 // Note that echolocation and SONAR also do this separately in echo_pulse()
13101 if( has_active_bionic( bio_ground_sonar ) && !knows_trap( tp ) && tr.detected_by_ground_sonar() ) {
13102 const std::string direction = direction_name( direction_from( pos(), tp ) );
13103 add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your ground sonar detected a %1$s to the %2$s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your ground sonar detected a %1$s to the %2$s!"
) ) ),
13104 tr.name(), direction );
13105 add_known_trap( tp, tr );
13106 }
13107 if( !sees( tp ) ) {
13108 continue;
13109 }
13110 if( tr.can_see( tp, *this ) ) {
13111 // Already seen, or can never be seen
13112 continue;
13113 }
13114 // Chance to detect traps we haven't yet seen.
13115 if( tr.detect_trap( tp, *this ) ) {
13116 if( !tr.is_trivial_to_spot() ) {
13117 // Only bug player about traps that aren't trivial to spot.
13118 const std::string direction = direction_name(
13119 direction_from( pos(), tp ) );
13120 practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_spotting, 1_minutes );
13121 // Seeing a trap set properly gives you a little bonus to trapsetting profs.
13122 practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_traps, 10_seconds );
13123 practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_trapsetting, 10_seconds );
13124 add_msg_if_player( _( "You've spotted a %1$s to the %2$s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You've spotted a %1$s to the %2$s!"
) ) ),
13125 tr.name(), direction );
13126 }
13127 add_known_trap( tp, tr );
13128 }
13129 }
13130}
13131
13132bool Character::wield_contents( item &container, item *internal_item, bool penalties,
13133 int base_cost )
13134{
13135 // if index not specified and container has multiple items then ask the player to choose one
13136 if( internal_item == nullptr ) {
13137 debugmsg( "No valid target for wield contents." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "13137", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "No valid target for wield contents."
);
13138 return false;
13139 }
13140
13141 if( !container.has_item( *internal_item ) ) {
13142 debugmsg( "Tried to wield non-existent item from container (Character::wield_contents)" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/character.cpp"
, "13142", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to wield non-existent item from container (Character::wield_contents)"
);
13143 return false;
13144 }
13145
13146 const ret_val<void> ret = can_wield( *internal_item );
13147 if( !ret.success() ) {
13148 add_msg_if_player( m_info, "%s", ret.c_str() );
13149 return false;
13150 }
13151
13152 int mv = 0;
13153
13154 if( has_wield_conflicts( *internal_item ) ) {
13155 if( !unwield() ) {
13156 return false;
13157 }
13158 inv->unsort();
13159 }
13160
13161 // for holsters, we should not include the cost of wielding the holster itself
13162 // The cost of wielding the holster was already added earlier in avatar_action::use_item.
13163 // As we couldn't make sure back then what action was going to be used, we remove the cost now.
13164 item_location il = item_location( *this, &container );
13165 mv -= il.obtain_cost( *this );
13166 mv += item_retrieve_cost( *internal_item, container, penalties, base_cost );
13167
13168 if( internal_item->stacks_with( weapon, true ) ) {
13169 weapon.combine( *internal_item );
13170 } else {
13171 weapon = std::move( *internal_item );
13172 }
13173 container.remove_item( *internal_item );
13174 container.on_contents_changed();
13175
13176 inv->update_invlet( weapon );
13177 inv->update_cache_with_item( weapon );
13178 last_item = weapon.typeId();
13179
13180 moves -= mv;
13181
13182 weapon.on_wield( *this );
13183
13184 item_location loc( *this, &weapon );
13185 cata::event e = cata::event::make<event_type::character_wields_item>( getID(), weapon.typeId() );
13186 get_event_bus().send_with_talker( this, &loc, e );
13187
13188 return true;
13189}
13190
13191void Character::store( item &container, item &put, bool penalties, int base_cost,
13192 pocket_type pk_type, bool check_best_pkt )
13193{
13194 moves -= item_store_cost( put, container, penalties, base_cost );
13195 if( check_best_pkt && pk_type == pocket_type::CONTAINER &&
13196 container.get_all_contained_pockets().size() > 1 ) {
13197 // Bypass pocket settings (assuming the item is manually stored)
13198 container.fill_with( i_rem( &put ), put.count_by_charges() ? put.charges : 1, false, false, true );
13199 } else {
13200 container.put_in( i_rem( &put ), pk_type );
13201 }
13202 calc_encumbrance();
13203}
13204
13205void Character::store( item_pocket *pocket, item &put, bool penalties, int base_cost )
13206{
13207 if( !pocket ) {
13208 return;
13209 }
13210
13211 item_location char_item( *this, &null_item_reference() );
13212 item_pocket *pkt_best = pocket->best_pocket_in_contents( char_item, put, nullptr, false,
13213 false ).second;
13214 if( !!pkt_best && pocket->better_pocket( *pkt_best, put, true ) ) {
13215 pocket = pkt_best;
13216 }
13217 moves -= std::max( item_store_cost( put, null_item_reference(), penalties, base_cost ),
13218 pocket->obtain_cost( put ) );
13219 ret_val<item *> result = pocket->insert_item( i_rem( &put ) );
13220 result.value()->on_pickup( *this );
13221 calc_encumbrance();
13222}
13223
13224void Character::use_wielded()
13225{
13226 use( -1 );
13227}
13228
13229void Character::use( int inventory_position )
13230{
13231 item &used = i_at( inventory_position );
13232 item_location loc = item_location( *this, &used );
13233
13234 use( loc );
13235}
13236
13237void Character::use( item_location loc, int pre_obtain_moves, std::string const &method )
13238{
13239 if( has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
13240 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You can't use anything while incorporeal." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't use anything while incorporeal."
) ) ) );
13241 return;
13242 }
13243
13244 // if -1 is passed in we don't want to change moves at all
13245 if( pre_obtain_moves == -1 ) {
13246 pre_obtain_moves = moves;
13247 }
13248 if( !loc ) {
13249 add_msg( m_info, _( "You do not have that item." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You do not have that item." )
) ) );
13250 moves = pre_obtain_moves;
13251 return;
13252 }
13253
13254 item &used = *loc;
13255 last_item = used.typeId();
13256
13257 if( used.is_tool() ) {
13258 if( !used.type->has_use() ) {
13259 add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't do anything interesting with your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't do anything interesting with your %s."
) ) ), used.tname() );
13260 moves = pre_obtain_moves;
13261 return;
13262 }
13263 invoke_item( &used, method, loc.position(), pre_obtain_moves );
13264
13265 } else if( used.type->can_use( "PETFOOD" ) ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
13266 invoke_item( &used, method, loc.position(), pre_obtain_moves );
13267
13268 } else if( !used.is_craft() && ( used.is_medication() || ( !used.type->has_use() &&
13269 used.is_food() ) ) ) {
13270
13271 if( used.is_medication() && !can_use_heal_item( used ) ) {
13272 add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your biology is not compatible with that healing item." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your biology is not compatible with that healing item."
) ) ) );
13273 moves = pre_obtain_moves;
13274 return;
13275 }
13276
13277 if( avatar *u = as_avatar() ) {
13278 const ret_val<edible_rating> ret = u->will_eat( used, true );
13279 if( !ret.success() ) {
13280 moves = pre_obtain_moves;
13281 return;
13282 }
13283 u->assign_activity( consume_activity_actor( loc ) );
13284 } else {
13285 const time_duration &consume_time = get_consume_time( used );
13286 moves -= to_moves<int>( consume_time );
13287 consume( loc );
13288 }
13289 } else if( used.is_book() ) {
13290 // TODO: Handle this with dynamic dispatch.
13291 if( avatar *u = as_avatar() ) {
13292 u->read( loc );
13293 }
13294 } else if( used.type->has_use() ) {
13295 invoke_item( &used, method, loc.position(), pre_obtain_moves );
13296 } else if( used.has_flag( flag_SPLINT ) ) {
13297 ret_val<void> need_splint = can_wear( *loc );
13298 if( need_splint.success() ) {
13299 wear_item( used );
13300 loc.remove_item();
13301 } else {
13302 add_msg( m_info, need_splint.str() );
13303 }
13304 } else if( used.is_relic() ) {
13305 invoke_item( &used, method, loc.position(), pre_obtain_moves );
13306 } else {
13307 if( !is_armed() ) {
13308 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are not wielding anything you could use." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are not wielding anything you could use."
) ) ) );
13309 } else {
13310 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't do anything interesting with your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't do anything interesting with your %s."
) ) ), used.tname() );
13311 }
13312 moves = pre_obtain_moves;
13313 }
13314}
13315
13316int Character::climbing_cost( const tripoint &from, const tripoint &to ) const
13317{
13318 map &here = get_map();
13319 if( !here.valid_move( from, to, false, true ) ) {
13320 return 0;
13321 }
13322
13323 const int diff = here.climb_difficulty( from );
13324
13325 if( diff > 5 ) {
13326 return 0;
13327 }
13328
13329 return 50 + diff * 100;
13330 // TODO: All sorts of mutations, equipment weight etc.
13331}
13332
13333void Character::environmental_revert_effect()
13334{
13335 addictions.clear();
13336 morale->clear();
13337
13338 set_all_parts_hp_to_max();
13339 set_hunger( 0 );
13340 set_thirst( 0 );
13341 set_fatigue( 0 );
13342 set_lifestyle( 0 );
13343 set_daily_health( 0 );
13344 set_stim( 0 );
13345 set_pain( 0 );
13346 set_painkiller( 0 );
13347 set_rad( 0 );
13348
13349 recalc_sight_limits();
13350 calc_encumbrance();
13351}
13352
13353bodypart_id Character::most_staunchable_bp()
13354{
13355 int max;
13356 return most_staunchable_bp( max );
13357}
13358
13359bodypart_id Character::most_staunchable_bp( int &max_staunch )
13360{
13361 // Calculate max staunchable bleed level
13362 // Top out at 20 intensity for base, unencumbered survivors
13363 max_staunch = 20;
13364 max_staunch *= get_modifier( character_modifier_bleed_staunch_mod );
13365 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Staunch limit after limb score modifier %d", max_staunch )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Staunch limit after limb score modifier %d"
, max_staunch ) ) ); } } while( false );
13366
13367 // +5 bonus if you know your first aid
13368 if( has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ||
13369 has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ) {
13370 max_staunch += 5;
13371 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "Wound care proficiency found, new limit %d", max_staunch )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Wound care proficiency found, new limit %d"
, max_staunch ) ) ); } } while( false );
13372 }
13373
13374 int num_broken_arms = get_num_broken_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::arm );
13375 int num_arms = get_num_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::arm );
13376
13377 // Don't warn about encumbrance if your arms are broken
13378 if( num_broken_arms ) {
13379 // Handle multiple arms
13380 max_staunch *= ( 1.0f - num_broken_arms / static_cast<float>( num_arms ) );
13381 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER, "%d out of %d arms broken, staunch limit %d",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%d out of %d arms broken, staunch limit %d"
, num_broken_arms, num_arms, max_staunch ) ) ); } } while( false
)
13382 num_broken_arms, num_arms, max_staunch )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%d out of %d arms broken, staunch limit %d"
, num_broken_arms, num_arms, max_staunch ) ) ); } } while( false
);
13383 }
13384
13385 int most = 0;
13386 int intensity = 0;
13387 bodypart_id bp_id = bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID();
13388 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
13389 intensity = get_effect_int( effect_bleed, bp );
13390 // Staunching a bleeding on one of your arms is hard (handle multiple arms)
13391 if( bp->has_type( body_part_type::type::arm ) ) {
13392 intensity /= ( 1.0f - 1.0f / num_arms );
13393 }
13394 // Tourniquets make staunching easier, letting you treat arterial bleeds on your legs
13395 if( worn_with_flag( flag_TOURNIQUET, bp ) ) {
13396 intensity /= 2;
13397 }
13398 if( most < get_effect_int( effect_bleed, bp ) && intensity <= max_staunch ) {
13399 // Don't use intensity here, we might have increased it for the arm penalty
13400 most = get_effect_int( effect_bleed, bp );
13401 bp_id = bp;
13402 }
13403 }
13404 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_CHARACTER,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Selected %s to staunch (base intensity %d, modified intensity %d)"
, bp_id->name, intensity, most ) ) ); } } while( false )
13405 "Selected %s to staunch (base intensity %d, modified intensity %d)", bp_id->name, intensity, most )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_CHARACTER ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Selected %s to staunch (base intensity %d, modified intensity %d)"
, bp_id->name, intensity, most ) ) ); } } while( false );
13406
13407 return bp_id;
13408}
13409
13410void Character::pause()
13411{
13412 moves = 0;
13413 recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
13414 map &here = get_map();
13415
13416 // effects of being partially/fully underwater
13417 if( !in_vehicle && !get_map().has_flag_furn( "BRIDGE", pos( ) ) ) {
13418 if( underwater ) {
13419 // TODO: gain "swimming" proficiency but not "athletics" skill
13420 drench( 100, get_drenching_body_parts(), false );
13421 } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, pos() ) ) {
13422 // TODO: gain "swimming" proficiency but not "athletics" skill
13423 // Same as above, except no head/eyes/mouth
13424 drench( 100, get_drenching_body_parts( false ), false );
13425 } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, pos() ) ) {
13426 drench( 80, get_drenching_body_parts( false, false ),
13427 false );
13428 }
13429 }
13430
13431 // Try to put out clothing/hair fire
13432 if( has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
13433 time_duration total_removed = 0_turns;
13434 time_duration total_left = 0_turns;
13435 bool on_ground = is_prone();
13436 for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
13437 effect &eff = get_effect( effect_onfire, bp );
13438 if( eff.is_null() ) {
13439 continue;
13440 }
13441
13442 // TODO: Tools and skills
13443 total_left += eff.get_duration();
13444 // Being on the ground will smother the fire much faster because you can roll
13445 const time_duration dur_removed = on_ground ? eff.get_duration() / 2 + 2_turns : 1_turns;
13446 eff.mod_duration( -dur_removed );
13447 total_removed += dur_removed;
13448 }
13449
13450 // Don't drop on the ground when the ground is on fire
13451 if( total_left > 1_minutes && !is_dangerous_fields( here.field_at( pos() ) ) ) {
13452 add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns, false, 0, true );
13453 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13454 _( "You roll on the ground, trying to smother the fire!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You roll on the ground, trying to smother the fire!"
) ) ),
13455 _( "<npcname> rolls on the ground!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> rolls on the ground!"
) ) ) );
13456 } else if( total_removed > 0_turns ) {
13457 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13458 _( "You attempt to put out the fire on you!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You attempt to put out the fire on you!"
) ) ),
13459 _( "<npcname> attempts to put out the fire on them!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> attempts to put out the fire on them!"
) ) ) );
13460 }
13461 }
13462
13463 // put pressure on bleeding wound, prioritizing most severe bleeding that you can compress
13464 if( !controlling_vehicle && !is_armed() && has_effect( effect_bleed ) ) {
13465 int max = 0;
13466 bodypart_id bp_id = most_staunchable_bp( max );
13467
13468 // Don't warn about encumbrance if your arms are broken
13469 int num_broken_arms = get_num_broken_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::arm );
13470 if( num_broken_arms ) {
13471 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13472 _( "Your broken limb significantly hampers your efforts to put pressure on a bleeding wound!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your broken limb significantly hampers your efforts to put pressure on a bleeding wound!"
) ) ),
13473 _( "<npcname>'s broken limb significantly hampers their effort to put pressure on a bleeding wound!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s broken limb significantly hampers their effort to put pressure on a bleeding wound!"
) ) ) );
13474 } else if( max < 10 ) {
13475 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13476 _( "Your hands are too encumbered to effectively put pressure on a bleeding wound!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your hands are too encumbered to effectively put pressure on a bleeding wound!"
) ) ),
13477 _( "<npcname>'s hands are too encumbered to effectively put pressure on a bleeding wound!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s hands are too encumbered to effectively put pressure on a bleeding wound!"
) ) ) );
13478 }
13479
13480 if( bp_id == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
13481 // We're bleeding, but couldn't find any bp we can staunch
13482 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13483 _( "Your bleeding is beyond staunching barehanded! A tourniquet might help." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your bleeding is beyond staunching barehanded! A tourniquet might help."
) ) ),
13484 _( "<npcname>'s bleeding is beyond staunching barehanded!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s bleeding is beyond staunching barehanded!"
) ) ) );
13485 } else {
13486 // 5 - 30 sec per turn (with standard hands)
13487 time_duration benefit = 5_turns + 1_turns * max;
13488 effect &e = get_effect( effect_bleed, bp_id );
13489 e.mod_duration( - benefit );
13490 add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
13491 _( "You put pressure on the bleeding woundâ¦" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You put pressure on the bleeding woundâ¦"
) ) ),
13492 _( "<npcname> puts pressure on the bleeding woundâ¦" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> puts pressure on the bleeding woundâ¦"
) ) ) );
13493 practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care, 1_turns );
13494 }
13495 }
13496 // on-pause effects for martial arts
13497 martial_arts_data->ma_onpause_effects( *this );
13498
13499 if( is_npc() ) {
13500 // The stuff below doesn't apply to NPCs
13501 // search_surroundings should eventually do, though
13502 return;
13503 }
13504
13505 if( in_vehicle && one_in( 8 ) ) {
13506 VehicleList vehs = here.get_vehicles();
13507 vehicle *veh = nullptr;
13508 for( wrapped_vehicle &v : vehs ) {
13509 veh = v.v;
13510 if( veh && veh->is_moving() && veh->player_in_control( *this ) ) {
13511 double exp_temp = 1 + veh->total_mass() / 400.0_kilogram +
13512 std::abs( veh->velocity / 3200.0 );
13513 int experience = static_cast<int>( exp_temp );
13514 if( exp_temp - experience > 0 && x_in_y( exp_temp - experience, 1.0 ) ) {
13515 experience++;
13516 }
13517 practice( skill_driving, experience );
13518 break;
13519 }
13520 }
13521 }
13522
13523 search_surroundings();
13524 wait_effects();
13525}
13526
13527template <typename T>
13528bool Character::can_lift( const T &obj ) const
13529{
13530 // avoid comparing by weight as different objects use differing scales (grams vs kilograms etc)
13531 int str = get_lift_str();
13532 if( mounted_creature ) {
13533 auto *const mons = mounted_creature.get();
13534 str = mons->mech_str_addition() == 0 ? str : mons->mech_str_addition();
13535 }
13536 const int npc_str = get_lift_assist();
13537 return str + npc_str >= obj.lift_strength();
13538}
13539template bool Character::can_lift<item>( const item &obj ) const;
13540template bool Character::can_lift<vehicle>( const vehicle &obj ) const;

1#pragma once
2
3#include <functional>
4#include <map>
5#include <optional>

9#include <vector>
10

13#endif

20enum class kb_menu_status;
